29b4(sman dpyad): nyag re las ni skye ba bsngags// lkog ma mdog dang mgrin par 'brel// rang bzhin zlum la snyoms pa dang // ldan ljin gyis ni gos pa med// dri ma med na bsngags pa yin// spel mdud zlum zhing mnyam la 'brel// dbyibs ni drang
29b5(sman dpyad): bor 'dug pa bsngags// ske mgrin rim gyis zlum pa dang // ring zhing dbyibs ni legs pa dang // mid pa rtse'u chung dang 'brel cing // de bzhin mgo bo dang 'brel ba// lkog ma'i phyogs ni sha srab cing // lhod min cung zad 'gugs pa dang //
29b6(sman dpyad): sha rgyus legs par 'brel ba ni// rta la bar du bsngags pa yin// skra rtsa legs par rgyas pa dang // sha che sum mdo yangs pa dang // sha mkhregs yan lag legs 'brel cing // sha ni lhod na bsngags pa yin// ze'u ne legs 'brel cher mi
30a1(sman dpyad): mthong // ze'u lcug dang ni rje sA su 'brel// phrag gong ze lhag 'brel cing yungs// sha rgyas tshig 'brel mnyam zhing sra// sogs pa sha rgyas dang rab 'brel// rta la bsngags par gyur pa yin// ba ha zlum zhing sha rgyas la// gtsug med
30a2(sman dpyad): shin tu brtan pa dang // yang zhing dbugs ni rgyu ba dang // mtho bar gyur na bsngags pa yin// dpung rgyas zlum zhing rgyas pa ru// mi mngon tshigs dang sha snyoms la// sha ni cung zad mtho bar snang // de ni shin tu mengags pa yin// dpung pa sha rgyas
30a3(sman dpyad): ring ba dang // sra zhing zlum la drang zhing mnyam// rim gyis phra bar gyur pa dang // tshigs ni legs par 'brel ba bzang // pus mo dag ni rab mnyam zlum// tshigs dam tshigs ni mi mngon dang // mdzes shing rtsa mi sngon pa dang // 'gro tshe dgug
30a4(sman dpyad): par bden bzang // tshe grang ring zhing shin tu zlum// shin tu sha srab ma yin mkhregs// rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon la// nad med pa ni rtu la bsngags// tshe'u rtsub cing 'greng ba dang // zlum zhing legs skyes thung ba dang // tshigs mi mngon
30a5(sman dpyad): zhing long mo dang // sgrog mkhan ring por snang dang bcas// rkang pa dang 'brel mnyam zhing ring // rta la mngags par gyur pa yin// tshe'u tshe shin tu mnyam zhing zlum// ring zhing zlum la mdzes pa dang // dbus ni cung zad lcong ba dang /
30a6(sman dpyad): tshe'u spus g.yogs bsngags pa yin// rmig pa mtho zhing zlum pa dang // shin tu sra zhing 'thug pa dang // za ma tog ltar zlum zhing mdzes// bong rmig 'dra na'ang bsngags pa yin// de bzhin sgros ni ma gas zhing // rno zhing mi gug zegs
30b1(sman dpyad): ba med// kha dog du ma'ang kha dog gcig/ khra bor gyur pa med na bzang // dbus ni shin tu zab pa dang // rmig mthil rdo leb ltar sra zhing // sbal 'tshams legs par skyes pa ni// mdzes pa dag dang ldan pa dang // sbal ba bub cing
30b2(sman dpyad): gsal bar mngon// mtshams ni legs par dod pa dang // nyen 'khor mnyam zhing 'jam pa dang // rkang pa'i nad dang bral ba dang // brtan zhing ldan ljin med pa dang // kha dog bsdum pa bsngags pa yin// ze'u shas ni rgyas pa
30b3(sman dpyad): dang / gtsug med pa ni bsngags pa yin// skra 'og mnyam zhing yangs pa dang // rgyab ni mtheb sor tsam gyis dma'// rgal tshigs cung zad mtho ba dang // sha yis rgyas na bsngags pa yin// rtsig ma gug cing ltung lcong med//
30b4(sman dpyad): mi mngon rab tu mnyam zhing sra// phrag gong rgyas par khyab gyur cing // mnyam zhing 'jam na bsngags pa yin// gsus khyim zlum zhing yangs pa dang // ri dgas kyi ni dbyibs 'dra zhing // bu ga med la thung zlum chu// sku snyoms
30b5(sman dpyad): pa ni bsngags pa yin// Ing do mnyam zhing zlum pa dang // dbyibs ni legs par gyur pa dang // mjug do shin tu rgyas min zhing // ha cang zhum pa'ang ma yin la// rgyab gzhung bas ni mtho na bzang // sra zhing zlum la rus
30b6(sman dpyad): mi mngon// gsal zhing rim gyis mdzes par gnas// shin tu thung dang ring ba min// gdong gi tshad dang mnyam pa dang // mjug ma dang legs 'bral ba bzang // d+ha yi rnga ma spu ring zhing // ma nyams kha dog gicig pa nga
31a1(sman dpyad): mnyen zhing sbrum par gyur pa ni// rta la shis par bshad pa yin// mjug tsos shin tu mtho ma yin// shin tu gyis dang 'dus pa'ang min// lusa? dang rjes mthun tshwad dang ldan// de lta bu dgra bsngags
31a2(sman dpyad): pabapa yin// rku ba ni zab cing zlum pa dang // dbyibs legs phyi rol gnyer ma med// gang gis rtswa sbyangs legs gtong ba// de ni rab tu bsngags pa yin// brla na pa shin tu yangs min zhing // dge bar gyur pa min na
31a3(sman dpyad): bsngags// rlig pa do mnyam legs 'brel skyes// spu ni med par gyur pa dang // dbus ni bil+la tsam zhig ni// shin tu mi 'phyang gyur pa bsngags// mtshan ni rtsa sbram rim gyis phra// 'jam zhing myur du ldang ba
31a4(sman dpyad): dang / sbubs yangs pas ni g.yogs pa dang // khaM zheng shin tu phye zhing zlum// gting ring kha dog gcig ldan pa'i// rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// dbyi mgul mnyam zhing dbyibs med la// pags srab sU ni legs pa
31a5(sman dpyad): bzang rkub rtsos sra zhing legs par 'brel// rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon bzang // dpyi ni legs par 'byor pa dang // legs par rdzogs par gyur pa dang // yangs shing dkyus ni ring ba dang // pags pa srab la sha rgyas
31a6(sman dpyad): bzang / rje ngar snyoms shing dbyibs legs dang // rim gyis phra bar gyur pa dang // shin tu phra ba'i rus pos khyab// rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// che grang la sogs lus stod ni// ci 'drar ro smad de bzhin du// mtshon nyid
31b1(sman dpyad): thams cad bshad par bya// de'i 'og tu rgod ma yi// lus kyis phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dag/ gang dag yin pa bshad par bya// de'i mtshan ni mnyam che gsal// legs par bltams shing legs par 'dzag/ bu ga che zhing grwa mtshams
31b2(sman dpyad): chetsheche// ring zhing mtshan ni rga phyed la// mngal gyi nyes pa dang bral ba// de'i mo mtshan de 'dra bsngags// nu ma zlum zhing rgyas pa dang // shin tu 'chang ba ma yin dang // 'o mra skyon med legs par rgyas// rgod ma rab tu bsngags pa yin//
31b3(sman dpyad): nu so mnyam zhing zlum pa dang // bu ga legs shing 'o ma rgyas// shin tu 'dus min gyes pa'ang min// 'thug cing brtan la legs par skyes// shin tu 'byar min rab 'phyang min// rte'us 'o ma btung bde bsngags// lhag ma
31b4(sman dpyad): rgod ma'i yan lag kun// rta pho dang ni 'dra bar bsngags// de lha mod kyi gzugs mdzes pas// rgod ma'i gzugs ni bzang bar bshad// lus ni sbom por gyur pa yang // phra ba lta bur mngon pa yi ni// lus srab par ni
31b5(sman dpyad): gyur na yang // rgod ma spu mdangs yod pa mngon// de 'dre'i tshul gyis lus kyi ni// dbyibs kyi bye brag shes par bya// rgod ma rta pho 'dra ba dang // rta pho rgod ma 'dra ba ru// gal te phyin ci log ci snang // dgos pa'i 'bras
31b6(sman dpyad): bu 'byin mi 'gyur// lus che mdangs ni bzang ba dang // legs par skyes shing tshad dang ldan// gzi brjid yan lag dbyes pa dang // yan lag cha ni snyoms pa dang // gtsug 'khyil dge zhing gzi mdangs dge/ dri bzang
32a1(sman dpyad): yan lag mi sdug med// lus rgyas 'gros ni bzang ba dang // 'jigs med gnas gsum yangs pa dang // tshad mnyam dbyibs ni legs pa ste// gang zhig de 'dra'i lus ldan pa// bdag po'i grags dang rigs dang
32a2(sman dpyad): nor/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin// yon tan phyin ci log ldan pa// bdag po'i don rnams nyams byed yin// shA li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las// yan lag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // dka' thub
32a3(sman dpyad): bsam gtan chen po yis// gzi byin gsal gyur drang srong la// blo dang ldan pa legs thos kyis// sngar bshad pa ni dris gyur pa// khyed kyis phyogs bstan gsungs mod kyi// bshad pa dag ni me gsungs pas// bstan pa rnams
32a4(sman dpyad): kyis bshad pa ni// legs ldan gsung bar mdzad pa'i rigs// bstan pa bshad pa dang bcas pa// bu yis bskul bas smras pa ni// mid pa sgrol kong dang 'brel bAs// ro 'dzin lcer ni shes par bya// de'i steng ni rkan
32a5(sman dpyad): yin te// ma rkan lce 'og yin+da ber bshad// 'gram so 'gram pa las skyes pa// ldang pa'i sngo nI yin par bshad// de las gzhan pa mdun gyi so// bcu gnyis mtshan mar ldan pa yin// de rnams kyi ni dbus gnas pa// steng 'og bzhin
32a6(sman dpyad): mche ba yin// steng 'og gi ni so 'geb pa// gnyis po mchu ni yin par bshad// mchu mtha' yi ni ngos gnyis na// 'gram pa'i dbus chung khe 'gram yin// sa mchu'i stong na bgros yod de// de yi steng gi mchu lhag yin// ma mchu'i 'og ma kro
32b1(sman dpyad): ko s+ye// de lhag 'gram pa yin brar bshad// sna gong mi gnyis par 'tshems gdong // gdong gi yan lag snga gong gnyis// gdong gi bos gnyis khung chos yin// de bar dmar ba mchi ma'i stan// de dag rnams kyi gong na mig/ mig 'bras 'bebs
32b2(sman dpyad): pa mig mchu yin// mig mtha'i dkar po mig sprin yin// de dbus zlum nag mthong mig yin// mthong mig nag po zlum po'i dbus// 'dra zhing dang ba mig rgyal mo// mig ltag gnyis ni mig gi sgra// di stengs smin ma gnyis yin no// mig gi rgyab
32b3(sman dpyad): ni mig zur ste// nang gi mtshams ni mig phugs yin// smin ma gnyis re dpral ba ste// dpral ba'i steng gi dpral mtshams yin// de stengs spyi bo yin par bshad// rna ba'ang gnyis par glad pa ste// mig zur mu 'gram par mur kong //
32b4(sman dpyad): mur kong+ka rna ba'i bar mur 'gram// mkhur chos gnyis kyi rgyu ba za yu// de gnyis phyi rol 'gram glang yin// 'gram pa srol gong gnyis kyi b.ro// lkog ma zhes ni bya bar bshad// rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang rgya bA// rtswa ltag dang ni rna
32b5(sman dpyad): mtshan yin// mgo dang phrag so'i bar ske mgrin// ske mgrin phrag so'i lhag te rtsa// de steng rdog g.yab yin par bshad// rdog mtha' rna ba'i bar phum phum// rdog g.yab mtha' ni ze'u lhag ste// de yi rgyab ni dang ru yin// dang
32b6(sman dpyad): ru'i 'og ni nam tshong zhes// rta rnams la ni bshad pa yin// ze'u ltag gi ni 'og ma nyid// ze'u yin par shes par bya// ze'u'i rjes thogs kho na la// sgra 'og yin par shes par bya// de phan cad na rgal tshigs dang // rgyu ba nyid yin
33a1(sman dpyad): par shes par bya// ze'u ngos gnyis phrags ste// zag so rtsa ba dpung mgo yin// lkog ma dang ni sgrol grong bar// ming ba'o de 'ag sol mdung yin// mad 'og lagra par brang yin no// de rjes lag 'og bar snang
33a2(sman dpyad): ga de 'og dpung sna dpung pa yin// dpung pa'i nang nI mchan khung phan// rgyab kyi cha ni dpung rgyab yin// de 'og pus mo gnyis kyi ltag/ pus gong dang ni lag ngar gnyis// pus mo'i 'og ru tshig grang ste// de 'og tshig grang phra mo yin//
33a3(sman dpyad): tshig grang spo phra'i ba rAn ni// tshig klung nang de de 'og gi/ mdun gyi cha nI tshe'u gdong yin// rgyab nI tshe'u spur shes par bya// de'i lhag de ni sgrog mkhar yin// de'i yang 'og na yod pa yi// tshe'u tshe zhes ni bya bar bshad// de'i 'og
33a4(sman dpyad): rmig pa'i mtshams yin la// de yi 'og tu rlig pA yin// rmig pa'i mtha' ma rmig spros yin// rmig pA'i 'og ni rmig mthil te// rmig mthi lnga nang mtha' sprul pa'i mtshams// rmig mthil dbus ni sprul pa yin//
33a5(sman dpyad): dpung mtha'i mgo na snying yod de// de'i ngos ni rtsib logs yin// rtsib log 'og tu dku yin la// de yi steng ni sga 'dab yin// rgal tshigs kyis ni cha dag gI// mtshams ni ro slad yin par bshad// rus pa gsum
33a6(sman dpyad): ni 'dus pa yi// sum mdo mjug to yin par bshad// mjug to'i 'og tu ong do ste// de rjes rnga rtsa yin par bshad// de'i ngos gnyis spyi steng yin// dpyi steng 'og ni ro hi ni// bar na rnga ma rnga snying bcas// de gnyis
33b1(sman dpyad): 'ogro ni brla dpyi'i mtshams// rnga rtsa'i 'og ni rkub yin la// de yi ngos gnyis rkub tsos yin// de yi 'og ni 'breg yin+da la// de dag par ni mjug srubs yin// brla yi nang mu rlig pa ste// rlig pa dang 'brel mtshan yin no// de
33b2(sman dpyad): gnyis mdun na sma kha ste// smang ga snying de'i dbus lte bA// dku yung ba ra nra gnas pa yin// dku na lte ba'i bar na rgyu// rgyud dang dku yau bi ra ran 'dra// ran 'dra'i 'og ni sdug gu mig/ dwe yi pha rol dpyi yin taM//
33b3(sman dpyad): de yi 'og ma brla yin no// de yi yang 'og baR+Ya phra mo// di yi 'og nI N+De dArA yin// de 'og sre long tshig gling yin// lhag ma ro stong rjes 'brangs te// thams cad nye bar dbye bar bya// sha li ho tra'i mdo gnas las
33b4(sman dpyad): bstan pa rnams bshad pra ste le'u bcu pa'o// // rta yi tshe yi rig byed mkhan// drang srong mgyogs 'gro'i gI nyen gyur pa// sha li ho tra dbang thul la// mdza'i la rgyal gyis yongs dris pa// rta yi tshul
33b5(sman dpyad): gyi de nyid mkhyen// tshad ni rnam pa du ru bshad// mi sdug gzhal min gang zhig lags// sdug cing gzhal bzod gang zhig lags// yan lag nyid lagra shes pa dang // grangs nyid kyi ni bye brag rnams// bdag cag
33b6(sman dpyad): blo gros zhan pas na// legs ldan khyed las mnyan par 'tshal// de skad smras tshe slob dpon gyur// drang srong dam pas slar smras pa// ji skad bstan pa 'di mnyan nas// mdza' las rgyal gyis bzung bar gyis// rgur
34a1(sman dpyad): zhing gdong dang rked pa zhum// 'khums dang shin tu rgyas glags drang // 'dug dang dbang po yul gyi gnas// de bzhin brang ni 'phrugs pa dang // rkeng pa sbyangs par gyur pa dang // shin tu dma' dang shin tu mtho/
34a2(sman dpyad): glang zhig lus stong shin tu che// de bzhin rgya bo ni lhag par dma'// lus ni shin tu mi sdug dang // de bzhin rked pa zhum pa ste// mI sdug rta ni bcu po 'di// gzhal min yin par shes par bya// stobs mA nyams shing mdzes pa
34a3(sman dpyad): yi// lus ldan rta ni bco lnga pa// lus kyi chu zheng legs gnas shing // gnas kyi cha ni ma 'chugs pa// tshod shes pa yaM gzhal bya yi// gzugs ngan nam yang mi gzhal lo// rke mgrin lus ni cha mnyam zhing // rnga snying mgo dang
34a4(sman dpyad): mnyam pa drang // ong madro dang ni brang zheng mnyam// pus mo'i tshe'u mnyam pa dang // dpangs dang zheng gi tshang dang ni// legs pa snyoms par gyur pa'i rta// de 'dra'i tshad dang ldan pa dag/ cha mnyam yin+da par shes prar bya//
34a5(sman dpyad): rta ni lus kyi cha mnyam pa'i// tshad ni rnam gsum mnyan par gyis// rta mchog gi ni dpral ba la// sor ni bcu gnyis yod par bshad// rna ba sngor drug yin zhes bya// so dag sor ni phyed dang gnyis// mig ni sor
34a6(sman dpyad): gsum shes par bya// mche ba'i dpangs ni sor gnyis yin// mgo'o sor ni nyi shu brgyad// phum phum gnas ni dpangs sor gsum// rta mchog gi ni chu ru ni// sor brgya rtsa bzho nyid yin no// ske mgrin sor ni sum cu ste// ze'u
34b1(sman dpyad): ltalhag sor ni drug yin la// rgyab ni sum cur shes par bya// ong dro gdong pa dag dang mnyam// 'bregu ni sor ni bcu yin te// 'di yi chu yI tshad du bshad// rlig pa bilba bzang po yi// tshad tsam yod pa shes par bya// rta mchog gi ni
34b2(sman dpyad): mtshan dag la// sor ni bcu drug yin shes bya// 'phrog so sor ni nyi shu drug/ dpung mgo nyid ni sor bcu yin// dpung pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// pus mo'i tshig ni sor drug pa// tshe'u spu sor drug yin zhes bya// tshig grang dkyus su sor bcu
34b3(sman dpyad): drug tshe'u tshe sor ni drug pa yin// rmig pa'ang de dang mnyam pa yin// rked pa'i dbus kyi zheng gang yin// dpangs ni de dang mnyam pa yin// tshang ni rta mchog dag gi yin// de nas bar ma'i bshad bya ste// dpral ba'i tshad ni so
34b4(sman dpyad): bcu yin// gdong pa sor ni nyi shu drug/ mig la sor ni phyed dang gsum// phum phum gnas kyang de dang 'dra// so lnga sor gcig bzhi cha gcig/ mche ba ser gcig bzhi cha gnyis// rna ba'i dpangs su sor lnga
34b5(sman dpyad): bar ma'i yin par bshad// ske mgrin nyi shu rtsa bdun du// bstan bcos rtogs pas shwes par bya// rdog mtha' sor ni lnga ru bshad// rgyab nI ske mgrin dag dang many+dza ma// 'breg la sngor ni bdun yin te// oM dA do nyid
34b6(sman dpyad): rtswa drug yin// bar ma 'di yi chu ru ni// sor ni dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yin// mgo bo sor ni nyi shu drug/ 'di yi rnga snying de dang mnyam// bar ma rlig pa'i tshad dag ni// bil+la 'bring po tsam yin no// bar gyi mtshan gyi tshad dang //
35a1(sman dpyad): ni/ sor ni bcu bzhi yin bAr bsha// spangs su sor ni bcu dgu dag/ 'di la bsngags par gyur pa yin// phrag sor song ni nyi shu lnga// dpung mgo sor ni brgyad yin no// dpung pa sor ni ny+dzi shu gsum// pus
35a2(sman dpyad): mo tshe'u dang mnyam pa yin// tshig grang sor ni bcu bzhi ste// tshe'u spu sor ni lnga pa yin// tshe'u tshe'ang sor ni lnga pA ste// rmig pa'ang de dang 'dra bar bshad// rta yi tha ma dag gi tshad// dpral ba sor ni brgyad yin to// mgo bo sor
35a3(sman dpyad): ni nyi shu bzhi// mig ni sor gnyis yin zhes bya// phum phum gnas kyang de dang 'dra// mche ba sor ni phyed dang gnyis// so yi dpangs su sor gcig yin// rna ba'i dpangs ni sor bzhi ste// ske 'gram nyi shu rtsu bzhi ste// rdog
35a4(sman dpyad): mtha' sor ni bzhi yin no// rgyab ni rked pa nyid dang mnyam// 'breg gi tshad ni sor bzhi ste// oMng ngo sor ni nyi shu bzhi// chu ru sor ni brgyad cu yin// mgo bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rnga snying dag kyang de dang mnyam// rlig pa bil+la chung
35a5(sman dpyad): du tsam// pho mtshan sor ni bcu gnyis yin// rta ni tha ma'i dpangs su ni// sor ni brgyad cu yin par bshad// phrag so sor ni nyi shu bzhi// dpung mgo 'di yi ser drug yin// dpung pa sngor ni nyi shu gnyis// pus mo sor
35a6(sman dpyad): ni bzhi yin la// rta ni tha ma'i tshig grang gi/ dpangs ni sor bcu gnyis yin no// tshe'u spu'i gnas ni sor bzhi ste// tshe'u tshe rmig pa de dang 'dra// de ltar chu yi tshad bshad pa// cha ni ci bzhin bzhag pa yin// ro stod kyi ni
35b1(sman dpyad): dpangs gang yin// 'og nas rdog mtha'i bar du gzhal// ro slad mjug to'i mtshams nas ni// 'og nas steng du de bzhin gzhal// de ltar dpangs su gzhal nas ni// bstan bac+doMs mkhas pas bya ba yin// rnga snying rtsa nas mi
35b2(sman dpyad): gzur gyi// bar du chur ni gzhal baR+Sha bya// dbyi ste mjugrA to dipye mgul dang // brla dpyi'i mtshams ni gang yin pa// mchog drang bar ma tha ma 'ang // phra so dang ni mnyam pA yin// rje dar dApyi yi bA ha las// sor gcig
35b3(sman dpyad): gis ni chung bar bshad// sgur pus mo'i tshad las ni// sor gcig lhag par shes par bya// tshig grang la sogs sngar bshad pa// phyi rkang gi yang de 'drar ldan// nas brgyad kyi ni lto gshibs pa'i// zheng ni sor du shes par bya// la la mthe
35b4(sman dpyad): bopo'i tshigs kyi zheng // sor yin par ni 'chad par byed// gzhan dag skyes bu ran pa yi// lag sor gyi ni gung mo yi// tshigs ni dbus ma'i nang dag la// sor yin par ni 'dod pa yin// rta gzhan gang dag yod pa dag/ tshad 'di yis ni gzhal bar bya//
35b5(sman dpyad): de ltar mchog dang bar ma dang // tha mar gyur pa'i rta gsum la// tshad ni rnam pa gsum dag gis// gzhal bar 'dir ni bshad pa yin// de ltar chu zheng tshad ldan pa'i// lus dang ldan pa gang zhig yin// lus dang 'tsham par sha rgyas shing // rkang
35b6(sman dpyad): pa sra la mtshan dang ldan// yan lag gsal zhing mnyen pa dang // lus snyoms sha ni mkhregs pa dag/ bkra shis dpal skyed dge ba dang // 'dod pa thams cad sbyin byed yin// sha li ho tra'i mdo gnas las// tshad gzhal ba'i le'u ste bcu
36a1(sman dpyad): gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang yan lag bcur// 6 ye le'u / da par bya// nas ni dpral ba yin// mthar thug tshang du bshad pa yin// gnyis pa dpral ba'i steng gi ni// klad pa la ni brten pa yin// gsum
36a2(sman dpyad): pa skye mgrin phrag so yi// lus kyi phyogs ni yin par bshad// nam tshong ze'u stagra ze'u// dpung mgo de bzhin phrag so dang // sogs pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa// bzhi pa dag ni yin par 'dod// lus kyi ro stong cha mnyam dang // dpung sna la sog
36a3(sman dpyad): lnga po yin// snying ga lag 'og rtsib logs dang // sgra 'og dang ni rgyab nyid ni// rta yi gnas ni drug pa yin// rgal tshig dang ni lto ba dang // mtshan gyi nye 'khor gang yin dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yin rnams// gnas ni bdun pa dag tu bshad// ong
36a4(sman dpyad): do'i phyogs na gang yod dang // brla gnyis dang ni bcas pa dag/ de dag gnas ni brgyud pa yin// dpung pa dpung rgyu ba pus mo dang // rkub tsos dpyi mgul spyi mtshams dang // rje ngar dang ni bcas pa dang // gnas ni dgu pa yin par 'dod
36a5(sman dpyad): pus mo rje ngar man chad ni// gnas ni bcu pa zhes bya'o// dge ba 'am yang na mi dge ba// thams cad kyang ni mtshon par bya// gnas skabs che yi 'bras bu dag/ de yi rtag tu brjod bya yin// de bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yi// d+hU yi tshad
36a6(sman dpyad): la sogs pa'ang bshad// gnas shes pa yi gnas rnams ni// rtogs par byas la'ang 'bras bu brjod// tshe dang na tshod cha rnams ni// gnas las shes par byas te bstan// mtshan nyid ldan na 'bras bur bcas// go zlog pa
36b1(sman dpyad): ni 'bras bu med// mtshan nyid gnas ni 'khrugs pa las// 'bras bu khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// mdog dang gzi mdangs snying stobs dri// ci bzhin dus su 'bras bu ster// lus kyi 'gros dang skad dang ni// rtag tu 'bras bu 'byin pa yin//
36b2(sman dpyad): thig le dang ni gtsug gi ni// gnas skabs cha ni 'di las 'byung // sha li ho hra'i mdo gnas las// yan lag bcu'i cha dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas/ sha lI ho tra la dris pa// mi
36b3(sman dpyad): sdug ci ltar shes par gyis// ji bzhin sdug pa ji lta bu// dman dang de bzhin mi dman dang // yan lag tshang dang ma tshong dang // gzhal bya nyid dang gzhal min dang // gso sla gso dka' ji lta bu// de ltar bu yis dris pa dang // sha
36b4(sman dpyad): l-i ho tras slar smras pa// so so'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba// de dag khyod la bshad par bya// gang yang lus kyi byibs legs shing // rtse rgyus gnad par mi 'gyur dang // sha ni gnas dang 'tsham par skyes// lus snyoms gsus
36b5(sman dpyad): pa chung bA dang // yid dang mig ni dga' byed pa// ro smad mnyam zhing zlum pA dang // mdzes shing dbyibs ni legs gnas dang // yan lag nyid lag rdzogs pa dang // yan lag kun gyis dbyibs legs dang // nyid lag
36b6(sman dpyad): rnams ni mi sdug dang // mgyogs zhing nyams dang ldan pa dang // des shing stobs dang ldan pa dang // na tshong gzhon zhing 'gros che dang // ske mgrin phrag so brang gi phyogs// sha rgyas tshad dang ldan la sogs// 'di dag
37a1(sman dpyad): gzhal bya cha mnyam dang // gso sla mi sdug med pa yin// de las zlog par gyur pa'i rta// gnal bya la sogs ma yin no// de lta'i mi sdug la sogs dang // ldan pa'i rta ni gang yin pa// shing rta lam dang khal dang
37a2(sman dpyad): ni// rtsed mo'i gnas dang g.yul dag tu// las dang 'chim pa ma yin pas// de phyir de ni spang bar bya// de ltar blang 'os blangs nas ni// lhag ma spang bya rnam par spangs// tshong pa rnams la rta dag ni// bzang po blang bar gyur pa
37a3(sman dpyad): dang // de phyir bzang po shes byas la// de lta'i rta ni blang bar bya// spris ma bshus pa'i zho lta bur// lhag ma snying po med pa yin// de lta mod kyis brtse ba yin// spang bya de yang tshong pa dang // rta la brtse bar bya ba'i phyir// blangs te sbyin
37a4(sman dpyad): ba btang bar bya// mtshan nI ngan par gyur na yang // mgyogs shing rigs dang na tshod ldan// rgyal pos lha khang rnams dang ni// bram ze la ni sbyin par bya// ma ni nga rgan dang nad kyis nyen// nye 'khor gnas pa'i mi la sbyin// rlig pa
37a5(sman dpyad): med dang rlig gcig pa// rlig ser dang ni lhas skems dang // yan lag ma tshang gyur pa dag/ nyung rAm li sogs rnams la sbyin// g.yul du 'jug par mi nus pa// gar mkhan dang nI glu mkhan dang // khrus mkhan dang ni 'drag
37a6(sman dpyad): mkhan dang // de 'dra'i tshul ldan dag la sbyin// de la shin tu mi sdug pa// shin tu bzang ba'ang mi sbyin no// shu la ka dang gzugs mi sdug/ so mi sdug dang mi bsrun pa// nye 'khor gyi ni pho la sogs// drag shul byed pa
37b1(sman dpyad): rnams la sbyin// 'gros chung ba dang sgeg pa dang // rkang ngan blas kyi nang mi smin// rta la gdug par gyur pa ni// mtshams bsrung mtha' 'khob pa dag dang // nyes pa cher ldan dag la sbyin// rang gi yul du de mi bzhag/ de rnams
37b2(sman dpyad): rtog la mkhas pa ni// rgyal po'i drung du rtag par bzhag/ de ltar d+hA nI rnam phyin// rgyal po'i 'byor pa 'phel 'gyur zhing // yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba ni// g.yul dang sgra las rgyal bar 'gyur// sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las//
37b3(sman dpyad): sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnam par phye bi'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba yi// drang srong ba la phyag byas te// legs thos kyi ni zas kyi tshad// rnam par btags pa dris gyur pa// legs ldan mi
37b4(sman dpyad): la zas kyi tshad// bshad kyiswa rta lo ci zhig 'chi lnga// phyugs rnams dang ni khyad par du// rta la de gso ma mchis te// de rnams dbugs 'byin tsam gyis ni// zos shing btsas pa 'ju gyur la// phyugs ni lto bar grags
37b5(sman dpyad): pas na// de lnga tshad ni ci zhig bgyi// de skad legs thos kyis spras tshe// shA li ho tras slar smras pa// blo gros bzang po nan tun du// shin tu grangs kyang tshad tsam du// byin na dga'u ba skyes byed cing // tshong zin
37b6(sman dpyad): dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur// tshod ma zin na bdud rtsis kyang // gsod par 'gyur ba nyid yin no// bde zhing gso la 'tsho byed pas// tshong zin 'jig rten ma dang 'dra// de med srog mtha'i 'jigs po skyed la// de dang ldan na
38a1(sman dpyad): gnas mchog 'gyur// rta ni mang du za bas na// tshad cing dgos pa bden mod kyi// sman dang zas skom cho ga ni// 'grong na bong bu la yang dgos// tshod ma zin na sman gyis kyang // nang gzhan skyed par 'gyur yin la// tshod dang
38a2(sman dpyad): ldan par byas pa yis// dug gis kyang ni nad 'joms so// rdzas dang 'ju stobs rdzas ci yang // tshad ni rnam pa gsum la 'jug/ snying dga' shugs ni ma bkag dang // lho la shin tu mi gnod dang // rtsib logs rnams ni bde ba dang /
38a3(sman dpyad): gsus pa lci bar ma gyur la// bkres dang skom ni zhi ba dang // dbang po rnams ni tshim pa dang // dbugs rngub dbugs dbyung bde ba dang // gnyid ni bde bar log byed dang // stobs dang kha dog 'phe la byed dang // bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur ba/
38a4(sman dpyad): dang // lus gzungs 'khrug par mi byed pa// tshong zin zos pa yin par bshad// kha zas lci bas lto bA yi// phyed ma sum cha bkang ba bsngags// kha zas shin tu yang ba yang // shin tu 'grangs par mi sbyin no// de ltar tshad
38a5(sman dpyad): las tshad min par// kha zas shin tu yang ba yang // shin tu 'grangs par mi sbyin no// de ltar tshad las tshad min par// lhag pa 'am tshungs par gyur pa ni// stobs dang snying stobs blo dang ni// mdog dang dbang po la gnod byed// rlung ni 'gag pa/
38a6(sman dpyad): 'am sngo bar byed// nang skyed byed pa'i mchog yin la// ro mi ci zhing tshe thung dang // mdangs med bkra mi shis par 'gyur// de bas rta rnams log pa yi// zas la spyod lam bzlog par bya// 'grangs grags par ni gyur pa las// nad gzhi thams cad
38b1(sman dpyad): 'khrug byed cing // gsung dang pho ba'i nad skyed pas// rta ni de las bzlog par bya// ji tsam gyis ni lto ba'i me// 'bar gyur de tsam sbyin par bya// tshad mi ldan par byin pa yis// yung na glags pa 'am tshungs par 'gyur// rdzas ni chu skyes brlan
38b2(sman dpyad): can dang // skam sar skye ste gsum du 'dod// de dag tshad mi ldan par ni// bza' ba'i bya ba'ang thob 'dod de// mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam zas sogs// tshad mi ldan dang 'dra ba yi// zas ni smos kyi skom 'am ni// snum mam rtsa yi tshogs dang ni// grangs
38b3(sman dpyad): lcags bsten pa grags pas kyang // tshad mi ldan par gnod pa skyed// de bas spyi dang khyad par gyi// tshad ni nga yis bshad par bya// 'ol ma se bzhi ma sha yin// de bzhi la ni sha na ste// de gcig la ni su bzla// de nyid zho gnyis zhes bya'o// de bzhi
38b4(sman dpyad): la ni srang gcig ste// de bzhi la nI phul du bshad// phul bzhi la ni bre gang yin// de bzhi la ni bre bzhi ste// de bzhi la ni dron yin// 'di ni spyi yi tshad yin la// gsher rdzas la ni nyis 'gyur bya// snum ni tshad kyi phyed du bya// ak+ShaM lag pa'i
38b5(sman dpyad): mthil la sogs// zho gnyis kyi ni ming yin no// srang phyed ming ni a mrar bcas// srang gcig u dum+ba rar bshad// srang gnyis khyor gang zhes byar bshad// de gnyis la ni snyim par bshad// de la rtswa skam dag las srang // brgyad brgya rta/
38b6(sman dpyad): la ran pa yin// rlon pa de'i 'dab snye mar bcas// bzhi brgya nyin mtshan gcig la ran// thug sogs las ni bre bzhi tsam// bza' skam bre ni phye dang gnyis// snum las phul gang btung ba ni// bre gang sbyin par shes par bya// sbrang rtsi las
39a1(sman dpyad): ni phul gang sbyin// bu ram las ni srang brgyad sbyin// hwags dang kha ra gang yin pa// srang ni bcu yi tshad du sbyin// sna sman khu ba phul gang ste// snum gyi sna sman de yi phyed// du bas bdug la zho drug ste// du ba drag po zho gnyis
39a2(sman dpyad): tshad// sman kha'i gong bu srang bzhi dag/ bad kan nad la sbyin par bya// rta la dgongs ka btung bar ni// chang ni bre gang blud par bya// rta rnams la ni phye ma'i sman// btags pa srang gnyis sbyin par bya// zas dang snum ni mnyam byin tshe// skom
39a3(sman dpyad): du chang ni blud par bya// rta la lan tshwa srang lnga yi// tshad tu rab tu sbyin par bya// lus kun bsku byug bya ba mang // snum ni pra dang sbyar bar bya// rna bkod la yang snum+ba dag ni// srang gnyis nye bar gzhug par bya// bsku ba'i snum la sman las ni
39a4(sman dpyad): srang brgyad phye mar btags pa gzhug/ phyi las bre ni de dag dang // de ni buM ra ma bsrang brgyad gzhug/ maur las phul do sres pa yi// skyo ma dgra ni sbyin pAr bya// chu skyes sha ni srang lnga bcu// brlan tson shi ni srang bdun cu//
39a5(sman dpyad): ma pa'i shi ni srang dgu bcu// sha yi kha zas tshad yin no// khrag bre do la rgyum tshwa ni// srang gnyis nye bar gzhug bya zhing // snum yang sring gnyis bcug pa ni// khrag zad pa la sbyin par bya// mus btang bya la bre gang tsam//
39a6(sman dpyad): dum bu gsum du byas te btang // btags pa las ni srang wa tsam// srang r-i ru ni bcad di btang // 'jam rtsi phul bzhi btang bar bya// 'jam rtsi'i gong ma phul gang btang // ma la 'dzam rtsi btong ba ni// phul do dag ni bya bar ba
39b1(sman dpyad): sman ni srang bzhi'i tshad dag ni// chu srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bkrol// bzhi cha lus par byas pa dag/ 'di yi sman khu yin par bshad// chu sman bcu drug 'gyur nang du// skol ba'i sman ni srang brgya gzhug/ snum yang srang brgya bcug nas
39b2(sman dpyad): ni/ bzhi cha cha gsum bsdu bar bya// der ni snum gyi ba ni cha yi// sman phye bcug la ldo gur bya// de la sha khu 'o ma nI// chu yi bzhi cha gzhug por bya// bskol chu sman dang sbyar ba yang // zhag lon pa ni spang bar bya// bu ram snyil du 'dod
39b3(sman dpyad): ba dang // bsregs na sgra mi 'byung ba yi// mtshan ma de dang dang bar ni// snang na thab la dbog par bya// de ni tshos pa yin pa'i phyir// snum de slar ni dbab par bya// de ni btsags par gyur na ni// yon tan lhag par 'gyur ba
39b4(sman dpyad): yin// snum zhing dang bar 'gyur ba dang // gsal bar gyur na mkhas pa yis// snum de mdog ni phyin po'i phyir// tshos pa yin par shes par bya// de 'dra nad kun 'joms byed yin// ma tshos chu dang 'dres pa dang //
39b5(sman dpyad): chos dwags nag por gyur pa ni// nang kun 'khrug par byed pa yin// rma dang rtswa sman 'jam rtsi la// 'jam+ba par tshos pa btang bar bya// bskul tshos drags btung ba la// bar a tsam ni bsngags pa yin// ma tshos
39b6(sman dpyad): sbru ma ni nad skyed la// chos drag phan pa med pa yin// legs par tshos pa'i snum dag ni// rta yi nad ni 'jig byed yin// rlung ma khris bde kan sel ba'i snum// btung dang bsku dang sna sman dang // rma dang 'jam rtsi las
40a1(sman dpyad): rnams te// rnam pa lnga la btang bar bya// tshang 'di dag nI rta rnams las// mchog gi yin par shes par bya// bAr ma lnga ni bzhi cha dra bri// tha sA la ni byed dbri'o// so so'i zas skom cho ga dang // snum gyi cho ga tha
40a2(sman dpyad): dang pas// rang rnams zhi ba nyid 'gyur gyi// dun pA gcig ni bsngags ma yin// ut+pa ni kha 'byed pa// zla ba'i 'od der nyid rid la nyi ma'i zer gyis pad+ma nI// kha 'byed par ni spang ba yin// tshad ni mye stobs las shes la/
40a3(sman dpyad): ji dga' sbyin par mi bya'o// me drod de yang rnam bzhi ste// rno ba tul mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'o// rno bas shin tu myur du 'ju// brtul bas bska ba 'ju ba yin// ma snyoms pas ni 'ju mi snyoms// snyoms pas 'ju ba snyoms
40a4(sman dpyad): ba yin// me drod btul bas gzi mdangs mdog/ dbang po dang ni 'gros zhan 'gyur// me drong rno bas de rnams dang // ldan zhing nad ni nyung bar 'gyur// me drod snyoms pas snying stobs mdog/ nad med 'gros dang skad
40a5(sman dpyad): dang ni// dbang po bde ldan nad med 'gyur// me drod mi snyoms skad dang mdog/ stobs chung nad ni mang ba dang // bde ba med par 'gyur ro zhes// sha li he tras rjes su bstun// shU li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas lngas tshad kyi le'u
40a6(sman dpyad): ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // rta bris la ni legs gnas pa'i// drang srong chen po dbang po thul// me la sbyin sreg byed brtson la// legs thos la sogs kyis dris pa// tshes shing gang gi don 'gyur zhing // gang
40b1(sman dpyad): gi yon tan skyon bshad pa// de yi zas kyi bya ba ni// lus dang nges 'brel bka' stsol cig/ de skad sha li ho tra la// drang srong dam pa bus dris tshe// zas kyi sbyor ba drang srong che// mdangs dang ldan pas skyur smras pa// zlas kyi sbyor bas kha
40b2(sman dpyad): dog mdangs// mgyogs mdzes snying stobs dran pa dang // 'drangs dang sems ni dga' ba dang // na tshod la ni 'jog pa yin// la la 'tsham dang mi mtsham dang // zas kyi sbyor bas bder 'gyur ba'i// sbyor ba'i cho ga bshad par
40b3(sman dpyad): bya// bshad pa de ni mnyan par gyis// me drod chung dang yid mi bdaM// lto ba na dang dbugs mi bde// dubu cing khal gyis nyin pa dang // dug 'thungs pa dang skom pa dang // lam 'gro mtshan ni mi ldong dang // dub la'ang khwa
40b4(sman dpyad): zlos mi sbyin no// stobs ldan lci ba'i kha zas ni// de la sbyin par mi bya'o// lam gyi nyam chung gyur stobs bri// rgan drang rab gzhon dbang nyam chung // rtswa dang 'bras dang glo gcod can// zas sbyor rtag tu bya bar rigs// gang tshe
40b5(sman dpyad): phyi dro'i dus su ni// skyes bu gsum po'i grib ma lhags// cung zad lhag pa 'am ma tshang ba 'am// zas sbyor bya ba'i dus yin no// 'bras bre gang ni legs bcos la// de rjes tshwa dang bsre bA dang // snum dang ldan por byas pa nI// byin
40b6(sman dpyad): nauni legs par 'ju bor 'gyur// dang por snum dang ldan pa yi// rjes la lan tshwar ldan pa dang // zas sbyor 'di ni skom dad dag/ mi skyed legs par 'ju bar 'gyur// zhong dang ku lang+tha'i khu ba// tshing dang sbrang rtsi kiny+tsau dang // til mar
41a1(sman dpyad): bsres pas mnye bya yi// khu ba gzhan dang bsre mi bya// kany+dzi dang ni sha khu 'am// 'o ma 'am yang na hwags dang ni// 'di dag mnye ba sbyin bya zhing // yang nau til mar sbyar ba'ang rung // zhag drang til mar mAr sbyar
41a2(sman dpyad): ba/ gsum po sbyar ba zhes bya ba'ang bsku// de la sha khu mchog yin tI// de dang nye bar bya ba 'am// nas dang ma sha gro dang ni// drug cu pa yi sbyor ba gang // de ni 'o ma 'am sbrang rtsi 'amo// mar dang sbyar bas mnye bar bya// 'di dag
41a3(sman dpyad): dang ni mnye ba'i tshe// de ru lon tsha gzhug mi bya// rlung dang bad kan gyis nyen dang // rta yis snum mang mthungs pa dang // me drod chung dang mi snyoms dang // sdig la lan tshwar bcas pa btang // mnye ba'i sbyor ba bya ba dang //
41a4(sman dpyad): chang dang chang rnying zho ga chus// lto ba'i ma zhu rnam sbyang zhing // kha chu rgyun ni 'dzag par bya// khong ba'i srin bu yod pa la// ba gcin dang sbyar sbyin par bya// gang zhig rgan dang lud pa can// de la kha zas skam mo sbyin// de lta bu
41a5(sman dpyad): la snum dang ni// bcas pa'i zas kyi sbyor ba bya// rta l-i zas ni sbyin pa ni// mgo bo gyen du legs bstan nas// zas ni kham re bcad naswa ni// myur min 'gor ba med par sbyin// na sA thug mar dang ldan pa 'am// yang na chag tsA mar
41a6(sman dpyad): gyis spangs// rta rnams rta byed dam pa yin// mkhris pa can la mchog tu phan// chag tshe nas thug snam med pa// lan tshwa dang ni ldan pa ru// bca' lga btab par gyur pa ni// bad kan la sbyin par bya// rgyam tshwa dang ni bcas
41b1(sman dpyad): pa dang // ma sha til mar bcug pa ni// rlung nang can la phan mod kyi// de las mkhris pa skye ba bsrung // sha rnams sna tshogs dag dang ni// bAd kan tsan+da la chang blung cing // mkhris pa can la 'o ma blung // rlung nad can la sha khu sbyin//
41b2(sman dpyad): mkhris pa can la rab bsil ba// rlung ning can la dro 'jam tsam// cung zad dro 'jam bad kan can// zas dang skom ni sbyin par bya// sdug cing snum nI med pa dang // yang zhing tshang las chung ba ni// bad kan can la sbyin bya/
41b3(sman dpyad): yi/ kha zas snum pa'ang mi sbyin no// chu drin gyis ni/ kha bkrus la// kha 'gram legs par bltams nas ni// mnyes la sna sman btang nas ni// de yi 'og tu 'di ru gzhug/ de yi med la rtswa mi sbyin// khyad par du ni sngo mi sbyin// de tshe lam 'gro dubo
41b4(sman dpyad): pa 'am// chu rgol ba ni bsngags ma yin// zas sbyin 'og tu btung ba ni// chang bre phyed ni blud par bya// de ni drod bskyed nad gzhi sel// legs par 'ju bar byed pa yin// mgyogs shing stobs dang ldan pa dang // sha mkhregs dbang po brtan pa dang //
41b5(sman dpyad): khal dang khur la sran phye bar// zas de yis ni 'gyur ba yin// snying dang 'bru yis zos pa dang // tshig dang du bas khyer ba dang // g.yul sar char gyis nyen pa yi// rtswa nI rta la mi bsngags so// skyon med pa ni nad pas kyang // yi gar 'ong zhing zos
41b6(sman dpyad): pas sreg/ des na rta yi 'tsho ba ni// rtsa yis nges par bsdus pa yin// ldang pa dga' zhing yi gar 'ong // me drong gzi mdangs srog 'phel byed// de phyir rta yis ldang ba ni// zos na de 'drar 'gyur ba yin// ldang ba tshad ldan byin na ni// nad rnams
42a1(sman dpyad): skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // rigs par ldang pa byin pa yis// skyes zin nad kyang 'ju bar 'gyur// bong nga phul shel tsha ba gsum// byi dang ka dang dug mo nyungs// 'bras btags chang dang sbyar ba ni// mdog dang tshe ni 'phel byed mchog/ 'o
42a2(sman dpyad): ma mar dang ma sha bcas// til btags sbyar ba zho can yin// ma sha'i phye la lan tshwar bcas// stobs skyed byed pa gzhan dag gam// sa lu'i phye ma sbrang rtsi rA bcas// ba da ri dang ldan pa ni// 'o mar sbyar ba zhag gsum byin// stobs dang kha dog
42a3(sman dpyad): 'phel byed yin// zho dang skyur rdzas lan tshwa dang // mar dang bcas par dkrugs pa ni// nas dang sbyar byin lus zungs zad// stobs dang kha dog skyed byed yin// skom dang chu la skyel ba dang // rtsa ni sngon po dag dang ni// gang zhig kha zas
42a4(sman dpyad): mngar po dang // mar la sogs dang sbyar ba dang // sha la sogs bcas bsil ba ste// drug po 'phral du srog gter yin// 'brog du rtswa ni sna tshogs las// rtswa gcig la ni sred pa gang // goms pas bsten pa yin zhes bya// ro
42a5(sman dpyad): yi goms pa zas sbyor las// de yi r-i las shes par bya// bya ba'i sbyor bas lus 'phel 'gyur// gzhan gyis zos de gang bor dang // gang zhig rtswa nas byung ba dang // nang du rul bar gyur pa yi// rtswa ni shin tu stobs 'phrog byed//
42a6(sman dpyad): sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ zas kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga po'o// / gang zhig zas sbyor sna tshogs kyis// 'bad pa mang pos sgrubs byas pas// mdzes pa zhes 'di grags pa 'di// ci 'dre rnams pa dri zhig mchis// legs
42b1(sman dpyad): ldan de ni gsungs shig ces// de ltar legs thos kyis bskul to// sha li ho tra drang srong ches// go rim de ni slar smras pa// ldang pa zas dang skom rnams dang // de bzhin mar dang snum tshogs kyis// sos par gyur tshe mdzes gyur te// de ni rnam
42b2(sman dpyad): pabapa lngar bshad do// khrag bcas zhes bya dang po ste// gnyis pa rtsi ba logs 'gengs byed yin// gsum pa stobs ni skyes pa ste// bzhi pa sha ni rgyas pa yin// lnga pa lung pa can zhes bya// de ltar rnam pa lngar bshad do// 'di dag rnams
42b3(sman dpyad): kyi mtshan nyid ni// so so'i bshad kyis mnyan bar gyis// mtshan dang rlig pa rmang ka dang // rku ba dang brang dang rtsa sbubs rnams// khrag dang sha ni srab pa yin// gnyen zhing khrag gis rgyas 'dra ba// de ni khrag bcas mdzes la granas//
42b4(sman dpyad): rta ni gdul skyong dag la sbyar// yan lag sha ni 'jam po yis// cung zad g.yogs par gyur pa dang // phrag so brang sogs sha skyes pa// stobs ldan rtsibs logs 'gengs byed yin// rked pa brla ni sha rgyas shing // rtsib
42b5(sman dpyad): ma shas na legs par khebs// stobs chen cung zad ma rdzogs pa// mdzes pa dang ni stobs skyes yin// 'dir ni ji ltar dga' ba ru// gzhon pa'i don du bshad par bya// ci nus par ni bkol ba yang // de ni nyam
42b6(sman dpyad): chung gis 'gyur ro// sha ni rgyas par gyur pa'i rta// bya ba kun la nus par ldan// dregs por btsas shing mdzes dang bcas// dpa' zhing stobs ldan dpa' ba dang // tshigs rus rtsibs lags rked pa dang // mjug de
43a1(sman dpyad): rang gi shar nub zlum// ze'u nas rnga snying bar du nI// dma' zhing gang gi ri mo chags// sha ni shin tu rgyus gyur pa// de ni lung pa can zhes bya// mdzes pa 'di dang ldan pa'i rta// bya ba thams cad bde
43a2(sman dpyad): blag nus// sha rnams 'phyang zhing dbugs mi bde// rdul dang dub pa'i shwas che ba// khrus sman legs par btang ba yis// 'di ni nyams smad nyid du bya// de yan chad ni shu rgyas par// rta ni nam yang mi bya'o// tshil
43a3(sman dpyad): ni shin tu ches gyur pa// de yi las sbyor mi nus 'gyur// gso dka' ba yi nang ldan na// rigs pas legs par gso bar bya// zas kyi sbyor sogs spang ba dang // rIm gyis phri zhing sbyang bar bya// nyams dmed pa'am
43a4(sman dpyad): myur du ni// byas na ma goms dbang gis 'chi// me drod khong nas 'bar gyur pa// rgyu ba'i lam ni tshil gyis bka'o// snum rnams byin par gyur pa ni// de nI nye dur rgyas par 'gyur// de bas brta ba grags pa
43a5(sman dpyad): dang / nyams smad drags par mi bya'o// de dag gnyi ga drags pa yis// gsor mi rung ba nyid du 'gyur// grib ma 'dod dang skom dang che// lud pa dbugs mi bde bas nyen// khu bzhi'i nad ni mang bya dang //
43a6(sman dpyad): gcin mang bde ba med pa dang // gang zhig bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhing // nyam thag par ni 'gro gyur la// lam 'jug par ni mi nus pa// bzhon pa po yi ci byar yod// de ni grang grags tsha grags pa'im// bkres
43b1(sman dpyad): dang bsgom pa mi bzod pas// mdzes 'dod rta ni sgyid chos dag/ shin tu grags par mi bya'o// bkol du med cing lus nyam chung // gzi mdangs chung zhing stobs med la// las la sbyor bar mi nus pa// de ni mdzes par mi 'dod do//
43b2(sman dpyad): sha li tro tra'i mdo'i gnas las// mdzes pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // shaM li ho tra drang srong mchog/ legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa// gzugs ni gang dag nyid kyis na// rta ni gzugs gdug gyur pa lags// spyod
43b3(sman dpyad): ba dang ni mtshan dag ste// de ni bdag la lung bstan rtsol// de nas rti'i mtshan la mkhas pa'i// sha li ho tras slar smras pa// rta yi yan lag nyid lag gi/ skyon med mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis// mtshan nyid sum cu drug
43b4(sman dpyad): ldan pa// gang gis de ni bsngags pa yin// rigs dang mtshan nyid nad med dang // lus kyang smad par med gyur pa// gang la 'di bzhi yod pa yi// rta de bsdigs par 'os pa yin// gang zhig dbugs ni cher 'byin cing
43b5(sman dpyad): mi pa srab par mngon pa dang // sna yi sbubs ni 'thug pa// rta ni rab tu bsngags pa yin// mchu lcig mnyam zhing zlum pa dang // che bar gyur na bzang ba yin// ma mchu srab cing mnyen pa dang // mi 'phyang ba ni bsngags
43b6(sman dpyad): pa yin// so ni thams cad snyoms pa dang // thags bzang dkar zhing nang mtho la// snum zhing srab par gyur pa dang // mtshan nyid legs par ldan na bsngags// rkan ni srab cing gnyer ma chags// zab cing
44a1(sman dpyad): dmar ba bsngags pa yin// lce ni srab cing mnyen pa dang // rtsa 'thug rgya skyegs 'dra ba la// khyi yi lce dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i// rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// mgo bo phra min sgom pa min// lus dang 'tsham
44a2(sman dpyad): par gyur pa dang // 'gram glang che bar gyur pa ni// bsngags par gyur pa nyid yin no// dpral po mnyam zhing yangs la che// pags pa srab cing mi lcong la// dbus na gtsug 'khyil gnas pa dag/ gang yin de ni bsngags pa yin//
44a3(sman dpyad): rta yi mig ni mig mchu ngag/ srub cing legs granas rdzi ma srab// mig 'bras kyi ni mtha' ma dag/ legs par dkar zhing dbus nag la// gang zhig gzugs kyi mdog sdug cing // phra zhing thag ring mthong ba dang // glang po'i mig
44a4(sman dpyad): bAdra me two gU ni// ma li ka yi snying po 'dra// shIl ltaR+Sha yongs su dang ba dang // mthong ba bArtan pra bsngags pa yin// rna ba srab cing mnyen pa dang // s+phu srabA thung bar gyur pa dang // gang gis sgra grag 'phra ba dang // thag
44a5(sman dpyad): ring ba 'di thos pa bzung // gdong pa gsal zhing rnaM mI mngon// sha srAH sha 'thug ma yin zhing // dpal mtshams chung zhing rdog ring bsngags// ske mgrin+d+ra shrI rgyus ri ba drang // rna lhag rna mtshan log sdu bar gnas
44a6(sman dpyad): pags bsrab rim gyis sbom par ni// gyur pa de ni dge ba yin// phreg so legs 'brel nas tshong nub// rdog mtha' legs par 'dus pa dang // rim gyis kha zheng chen bzang // brang ni 'thug cing yangs la
44b1(sman dpyad): mkhregs// sra zhing gnyer ma med pa dang // bar yangs dpung sna che ba dang // 'di 'dra ba dag bsngags pa yin// dpung pa mkhregs shing yangs pa dang // zlum zhing sbom la rtsa mi mngon// rim gyis phra bar gyur pa ni// rta la bsngags par
44b2(sman dpyad): gyur pa yin// lag ngar phra mo rim gyis phra// pus mo zlum par gyur pa dang // gnyen zhing rkyang bar bde ba dang // rta la bsngags par gyur pa yin// phyi grang ring zhing dbyibs legs pa// sha srab rtsa rgyus mi mngon srab// pags srab shin tu zlum pa yi//
44b3(sman dpyad): NA ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// tshe'u legs skyes mnyam zhing zlum// dod cing snyoms par gyur pa dang // spu phra pags pa srab pa yi// rta ni bzang por bshad pa yin// rmig pa srab zhing dkyil legs la// bong bu'i rmig pa 'dra ba dang // sbal pa nub
44b4(sman dpyad): cing legs par 'byar// cha mnyam par ni 'gro ba dang // rgyani zab mo dang 'dra zhing // rmig spros snyoms shing sra ba dang // mkhregs shing gnyer ma med pa yi// rta ni rab tu bsngags pa yin// rgyab so thung dang rab tu bsngags// rtsib ma
44b5(sman dpyad): legs par dgu pa dang // ngos gnyis legs par skye ba bsngags// skra 'og gnas ni khengs pa bzang // lto ba zlum zhing rtsib ma'i nAng // 'dus pa ltar 'dug bsngags pa yin// oM do yangs shing che la 'jam// spu yi tshogs kyis
44b6(sman dpyad): khebs pa bzang // mjug ma rnga ma phra zhing 'jam// mjug rtsa ong ngo legs par 'brel// mjug ma'i phyogs su drang por skyes// rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// rku ba ni zlum zhing legs par 'dzum// thung zhing gnyen ma legs par gnas
45a1(sman dpyad): gang gis rta spangs bde bar 'byin// de ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// rlig pa mnyam zhing legs par skyes// spu med par ni gyur pa dang // bi lba chung ngu'i tshod tsam zhig/ ma 'phyangs gyur pa bsngags pa yin// rta yi pho mtshan rim gyis
45a2(sman dpyad): phra/ thung zhing drang la myur du 'byin// gting ring kha dog gcig par ni// rta la bsngags par gyur pa yin// rje ngar rgyab mtho la yo med// sha srab gug pa ma yin zhing // mnyam zhing ma na khums dbyibs legs pa'i// rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin// rta
45a3(sman dpyad): spu slab cing drang ba dang // mdangs ldan kha dog ma 'dres bzang // rta ni 'dre bar byed pa'i tshe// gang gis legs par sprugs pa dang // stobs dang ldan pa'i gzugs yod pa// mtshan nyid mchog tu bshad pa yin// chu la rgal ba'i gnas
45a4(sman dpyad): dang ni// khal bkal lam du 'gro ba dang // bsnun dang nyam nga'i gnas dog tu// brtsal 'byin gzi can mtshan nyid yin// de ltar bsdigs pa'i mgyogs 'gro ni// rgyal po'i bzhon par rab tu brjod// sho li ho tra'i mdo'i
45a5(sman dpyad): gnas lus// mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // legs ldan rta yi kha dog dang // de bzhin mdog gi dbye ba dang // de yi ming gi nyes pa dag/ bdag cag mnyan par 'tshal lags so// bu yis de skad smras pa dang /
45a6(sman dpyad): snyan pa'i tshig gis slar smras pa// nga yi gzhung gis ma 'dres mdog/ rdal rnam bzhir yod par 'dod// dkar dang dmar dang gnag pa dang // bzhi pa ser po zhes bshad do// 'di rnams lus kyi phyogs gnas dang // phan tshun/
45b1(sman dpyad): 'dres par gyur pa dang // rdzas dang rdzas min 'dres pa las// rgyas par mdog ni du ma yin// dkar la sogs pa de dag rnams// ma lus shes bya mnyan par gyis// pags pa dkar zhing ba spu dkar// de bzhin rnga ma rdog ma dkar// 'di ni
45b2(sman dpyad): dkar po zhes bshad do// rta de srid sgrub yin par 'dod// pags pA dmar zhing ba spu dmar// rnga ma rdog ma dag kyang dmar// khrag dang nyi ma 'char ka 'dra// rta ni dmar po zhes bya'o// pags pa spu dang rdog ma gnag/ bud+d+ha pa
45b3(sman dpyad): 'dra ba gang yin pa// stang zil nag po'i mdangs 'dra'i rta// de yi thams cad nag por bshad// pags pa rnga rdog spu rnams ni// gang zhig gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing // dor ni ser po'i mdangs ldan pa// rta de ser yin zhes
45b4(sman dpyad): bya/ na de ltar kha dog rnam pa bzhi// so sor yang dag bshad pa yin// de rnams mdog ni 'dres gyur pa// bshad pa las rtogs par gyis// pags pa dmar zhing mig skyon med// kha dang rkan dang pho mtshan dmar//
45b5(sman dpyad): ma du ka'i me tog 'dra// 'di nI la las kar kar bshang // pho mtshan rmangs kha rlig pa dang // rmig pa de bzhin rkub dang ni// mchu ltag mchu dang kha dang ni// pags pa pad+ma'o mdog 'dra gang // mig dang phum phum rdog ma'i
45b6(sman dpyad): bar// ba spu dkar bar gyur pa ni// rta ni dkar ka kha gcig 'dod// bkra shis dge ba'i dam pa yin// pags pa dmar zhing pa spu dmar// rnga ma rngog ma dmar ba ni// nyi ma skyon bral mdog 'dra ba// de yang kar kar shes par bya//
46a1(sman dpyad): btso ma'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i// spu ni gang la yod gyur pa// pags pa pad+ma'i dbus 'dra zhing // mig ni me yi rtse mo 'dra// rmig pa kha dog gcig pa yi// rta de 'khor los sgyur ba'i yin// gang zhig kAr ka
46a2(sman dpyad): rta'i gzhi la// yan lag lto dang dpyi dang stong // thig le nug po chags gyur pa// rta ni khyim bya can zhes bya// gang zhig kar kar can 'dra la// dpyi la sogs pa dmar po yi// thig le chags par gyur pa ni// de yang khyim bya can gnyis
46a3(sman dpyad): pa/ ba sU rnga ma rdzogs ma ni// dkar la pags pa nag po can// mtshan dang rmig pa mig kyang nAg/ dau ni ngur pa'i gshog par bshad// pagos 'jam pagras pa mig dang s+phu// rnga rngog rmig pa dkar ba dang // sin du bar dang
46a4(sman dpyad): 'dra bas// mdog ni sin du bA rA can// pags dmyur seng ge'i spu 'dra zhing // rnga ma dang ni rdog ma dkar// rlig pa dmar zhing dbyar gyur pa// rta de seng ge'i mdog can+da yin// gang zhig spu rtse du ba 'dra// cung zad dmar
46a5(sman dpyad): zhing ser skya 'dres// kha dog de yis rta de ni// go ri'i spu zhes bya bar bshad// de bzhin du ba'i mdog ldan pa// dud ser zhes ni bya bar bshad// ser shas che ba gang yin pa// me tog kun+da ta dang 'drar bshad// ser po'i
46a6(sman dpyad): nges tshig 'di yi ni// dpe yang khyed kyis mnyan par gyis// sog ma mngal spug dang 'dra zhing // so dang ka ran da 'dra la// gang zhig ser po zlum po yang // de ni khyab 'jug bzhon pa ste// rgyal dang rnam rgyal don gnyer
46b1(sman dpyad): la/ 'di dag thams cad bsngags pa yin// de bzhin kha dog mang ba dang // seng ge'i mdog dang 'dra ba dang // dung dang kun da kha sha dang // 'o ma dang ba nyi ma'i mdog/ ku mu da yi mdog 'dra dang // chu skyar bzang po 'dra ba dag/ dkar
46b2(sman dpyad): dang ser po 'dres pa ni// thams cad dang ba zhes byar bshad// gang zhig me tog mkha' lding 'dra// rnga mA rdog ma nal po ni// yod pa'i rta de stang zil gyi spyi bo can zhes bya ba yin// rdog ma 'jam zhid dkar ba ni// rdog ma muny+dza
46b3(sman dpyad): can zhes bya// shin tu dkar la rdog ma gnag/ rngog ma mig sman mdog 'drar bshad// gang zhig rngog ma'i mdog sna tshogs// 'dres pa'i rdog ma zhes byar bshad// rnga ma'i kha dog sna tshogs pa// rnga ma 'dres pa zhes byar bshad// de dang
46b4(sman dpyad): 'dra ba gzhin dag kyang // dkar po'i mdog 'dres pa zhes bya// gso ma'i me tog mdog 'dra dang // ldum bu chu gsher 'dra ba dang // a mri'i lo ma'i mdog 'dra dang // rta gang ki ngi shu dang 'dra dang // chu shing me tog 'dra ba dang // kar
46b5(sman dpyad): kan ru yi mdog 'dra dang // me tog man+du dzI ba'i mdog/ ljang mau a shwa ka'i mdog dang // gang yang b+hu ru'i mdog 'dra dang // mig dang rnga rngog nag pa dang // mtshan dang pags pa de bzhin gnag/ da ni spu gnas zhes byar bshad
46b6(sman dpyad): de dag dmar po dang 'dres mdog/ nag po dang 'dres mdog nyon cig/ khu brug dang ni char sprin 'dra// ngun pa 'am ma he'i mdog 'dra ba// a mra smra ba'i mdog 'dra ba// gang yang lung gtang rlon 'dra dang // sa la tau la'i
47a1(sman dpyad): mdog 'dra dang // ut+pal sngon po lta bu drang // gang gzhan tshul ni 'di 'dra ba// rta ni nag po dang 'dres mdog/ gang yang sa lu'i dra ma 'dra// ne tso'i sgo gshog 'dra ba dang // mar gyi snying po'i mdog 'dra dang //
47a2(sman dpyad): pad+ma'i sa bon mdog 'dra dang // pad+ma'i gau ser lte bu dang // de bzhin me yi rtse 'dra dang // gang zhig gzha' dang 'dra ba dang // gang yang bab la 'dra ba dang // yu ti ka yi ser po 'dra// shri sha'i me tog 'dra ba dang // gang yang khre
47a3(sman dpyad): 'bris mdog 'dra dang // gang yang spyang khu'i mdog can dang // kha dog ser po ji snyed dang // gzhan yang ser po dang 'dres dang // de 'dra de las gzhan pa dang // rta nI ser po dang 'dres mdog/ de ltar rnam pa bzhi po ni// mdog
47a4(sman dpyad): 'dres pa zhes bya bar bshad// gzhan yang kha dog dbye ba dang // kha dog sna tshogs mnyan par gyis// phug ron gyi ni ske 'dra zhing // pags pa spu yi mdog dmar bu// phug rlon ske 'dra phug ron ske// dmar dang nag po
47a5(sman dpyad): cung zad 'dres// pags pa rnga ma rdog ma gnag/ mig dang gsang ba rmig pa'ang granag/ mkhal ma'i mdog 'dra nag tsau rA ba// 'di nyid gnag pa'i shas che ba// nag tsher ba ni yin zhes bya// gal te dmar nug cha mnyam
47a6(sman dpyad): 'dres// rgun 'bru ltar 'tsher yin par bshad// dgun 'bru ltar 'tsher de nyid la// cung zad ser skyas 'dres pa ni// kha dog gnyis ni bsdus pa las// gang zhig shas che de lasau gdugs// nag po dkar po dang
47b1(sman dpyad): 'dres shing // pags pa nag por 'dug pa ni// spu 'dres drang srong pa zhes bshad// gsal ba ri dgas mdog can yin// de nyid dkar por ma gyur na// dkar po'i drang srong pa zhes bshad// dkar po'i gzhi la gnag dang 'dres// khor ling
47b2(sman dpyad): mang du gnang ba dang // yan lag gnag cing mjug ma dkar// de ni skya ba'i drang srong pa// dkar dang dmar dang nag por 'dres// pags pa nag po yid gyur cing // mig dang pho mtshan rmig pa gnag/ 'dren ma'i drang srong ba zhes bya// dmar dang ser
47b3(sman dpyad): dang nag po yis// dkar la 'dres gyur gso dar mdog/ dmar ser dkar po mdog 'dres rta// ser skya'i ba 'dra ser skya yin// nag po dmar pos khyab gyur cing // dmar po dang yang cher ldan pa// rta de rta mkhan dag gis ni// dudau kha zhes ni bya bar
47b4(sman dpyad): sha/ khrag dang btsag gi dog 'dra zhing // pags pa 'dren mar snang ba dang // rnga ma rdog ma dmar po yi// ser dang dmar po 'dres gyur pa// spu rtse mdog ni gnag pa dang // rnga rngog gnyis kyang gnag gyur ba// rta de 'tshal bu zhes byar bshad//
47b5(sman dpyad): grang zhig spu rtse gnag gyur pa// gzhan dag sder sbyar gnas gyur pa// gdong gi mdog ni ma 'dres pa'i// rta de ngur pa zhes byar bshang // kun tu dkar dang dmar ba yi// spu ni 'dres mar gnas gyur la// pags pra pho mtshan mchu dmar ba'i// rta
47b6(sman dpyad): ni se bo zhes byar bshad// dkar dang ser ba'i mdog 'dres shing // pags nag rnga ma 'dren mar gnas// ser la dkar shas che ba ni// khan dza re zhes bya ba yin// gos ni srab mos bkang pa ltar// kha dog gcig tu mi mngon zhing // 'khor ling
48a1(sman dpyad): mang po dang ldan pa'i// rta de 'khor ling can zhes bya// kha dog mang po dang ldan zhing // mdog gzhan 'khor ling gnas pa yis// brgyan pa lta bur snang ba ni// rta de khra bo zhes bshad do// rta yi rkang pa bzhi dang ni// mdog dang rnga ma rdog
48a2(sman dpyad): ma dang // rkeng pa dkar por snang ba ni// rte de bkra shis brgyad par bshad// dmar ba 'am dkar ba'i 'khor ling ngam// nag pa 'am kha dog gzhan dag las// kha dog dang ni rjes mthun par// de las ming du gdags par bya// gang gi kha drog gang
48a3(sman dpyad): dag la// mdog gis 'dres par gyur na yang // mdog gi shas ni gang che ba// de yi mdog las gdags par bya// gang zhig mdangs snum brtan zhing gsal// kha dog de ni thams cad bsngags// de nas dkar ba mchog yin la//
48a4(sman dpyad): de dang ldan pa gzhan yang bzang // rta yi kha dog thams cad la sna// khwa dog dkar po mi 'gyur yin// brtan zhing mi bzang nyid kyis na// dkar po nyid ni khyad par 'phags// de ltar dzA yi kha dog ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin//
48a5(sman dpyad): kha dog dbye ba ma lus par// smra bar nus pa ma yin no// sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las// kha dog shes par bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // sha li ho tra thub mchog la// legs thos kyis ni yongs dros pa// zhur dang de bzhin
48a6(sman dpyad): brgyan mtshan dag/ ji ltar gnas pa bka' stsol cig/ de ltar dris tshe legs ldan ni// sha li ho tras slar smras pa// mchu smos lhag nas dpral mtshams par// dkar ba 'am shin tu dkar gang yin// de ni zhur por shes bya ste// 'di yi
48b1(sman dpyad): 'bras bu rnam bzhi yin// gnas dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang // rang bzhin las shas mi shis 'gyur// zhung ba de yis 'bras bu ni// rim pa bzhin du bshang par bya// mchu lhag dpral ba sna gdong dang // de bzhin sna gdong dpral ba'i bar//
48b2(sman dpyad): gzhan yang mchu lhag gdong pa dang // mchu ltag phrum phum mthar thug dge/ rta yi gdong pa kun dkar ba// rigs kyi dbang phyug 'phel byed yin// mgo bo rna bar bcas dkar ba// bdag po bde ba kun skyed do// gnas gnyis na ni gang gnas
48b3(sman dpyad): pa de yi 'bras bu bshad par bya// me long lcags kyu bum pa dang // gdugs dang rnga yab 'dra ba dang // dpal shing rim gyis 'phel 'dra dang // bum pa g.yung drung dbyibs 'dra ba'i// zhur ni gang gi rta la yod// de yi bdag por gyur pa yi
48b4(sman dpyad): bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// bran dang mdza' 'phel 'gyur zhing // rgyalnga pos legs par bkur 'gyur la// rta yang bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang zhig gi ni rta yi zhur// byang chub shing gi lo ma 'dra// de'i bdag bskal pa bzang 'gyur
48b5(sman dpyad): zhing // bru nI mang po yod par 'gyur// zur bzhir yod na rgyal pos ni// yul khams rnyed par ston pa yin// ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje gzhu// gshol dang gtun shing dbyigs pa dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan gzugs 'dra ba// gang
48b6(sman dpyad): gi zhur ci'i dbyig byung ba'i// de ni rgyal po chen po yis// zhon na g.yul las rgyal byed yin// rta de zhon nas rgyal po yis// dgra rnams thul bar 'gyur ba yin// chung ma bu dang tsha bo dang // nor yang shin tu mang bar 'gyur//
49a1(sman dpyad): dbang gzur blugs gzar mchod gdong me// kha khyer gyi ni dbyibs 'dra bA'i// zhur ba gang gi rta la yod// de'i bdag 'bras bu chen po 'thob// mchod sbyin mang du byed pa dang // sbyin pa mang du 'gyed par 'gyur// gang /
49a2(sman dpyad): ki zhur ni bum pa 'dra// me tog mgo lcogs dbyibs 'dra yod// rta de yi ni bdag po yis// gter ni rgya chen thob par 'gyur// me tog pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba'amo// mig mangs ris kyi dbyibs yod pa// bdag po bkur sti/
49a3(sman dpyad): nor mang dge/ shing rta'i dbyibs 'dra'i zhur yod pa'i// rta ni nor rnams 'phel byed yin// steng cha kha zhing che ba'i zhur// nor dang 'bru dang phyad byed do// de yi bdag pos dpal thob cing // bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// de yi
49a4(sman dpyad): khyim du dbul rta gnas// rgyal srid kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur// rta d+he ci 'drod ma skyes par// badre bar 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// de ltar shis pa bshad nas ni// mi shis pa yi mtshan nyid nyon// rta'i zhur kha dog 'dres pa/
49a5(sman dpyad): dang / g.yon ngogs 'gram glang bar du chags pa dang // g.yon pa'i mig dkyu dpral ba'i ngos dang bcas// khyad par gang gi rta la skyes gyur pa// dpral chags zhes te de ni ngang tshul ngan// rgyun tu snang zhing 'thab
49a6(sman dpyad): rtsod dga' bar 'gyur// mur 'gram dag tu chags pa'i rta yang smad// de bzhin gdong par dbyibs 'dra'i zhur chags dang // g.yon ngos che zhing cung zad chad pa dang // dbus na lcags sgrog 'dra ba gang la yod// de lta'i
49b1(sman dpyad): zhung ba gang la yod// rta de bde bar mi 'gyur ro// de yi bdag po thug pa 'am// lcags sgrog gis ni bcings par 'gyur// mtshan nyid de 'dras mi 'gor bar// de ni dgra bo'i dbang du 'gyur// 'phreng du zheng ni che ba'i zhur// nor brlag/
49b2(sman dpyad): par ni ston pa yin// nag nog can gyi zhur yod pa// bdag po'i nor ni nyams par byed// zhur ba yo dang sgrub pa dang // chad pa'i zhur yang sdug bsngal bskyed// spang li ba 'dra dang 'dres pa yi// zhur yod rta yang de dang 'dra//
49b3(sman dpyad): kha dog dkar la mdog gzhan gyi// nur yod pa ni smad pa yin// nag pos bdag po mi zad du// reg pa 'am rlag par byed pa yin// gang zhig glog gi dbyibs 'dra dang // mdung thung gi ni dbyibs 'dra ba 'am// gzhan yang rnam pa de
49b4(sman dpyad): 'dra ba// gang gi rta la yod gyur pa// de bzhin mi gnang gzhan dag dang // srab cing gsal bar mi mngon pa// des ni nor rnams brlag pa dang // 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de ltar zhur ni ngas bshad nas// mdongs kyi mtshan
49b5(sman dpyad): nyid gang yin pa// slar yang gnas dang dbyibs las ni// shis dang mi shis khyad par dag/ rta yi bar du bshad pa yis// de ni ci bzhin mnyan par gyis// zla ba'am skar ma 'dra ba yi// mdongs ni gang gi rta lnga yod// de
49b6(sman dpyad): yi bdag pos rgyal srid thob// bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur// gang gi dga' 'khyil 'dra ba 'am// rus sbal pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra yi// mdongs yod rta de'i bdag pos ni// nor ni mang po rnyed par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal mtshan
50a1(sman dpyad): sogs dbyibs 'dra// mdongs yod pa yi rta de ni// bdag po'i rgyan la sogs 'phel zhing // bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// nas 'bras 'dra ba'i mdongs yod pa// tha snyad kun la mkhas par 'gyur//
50a2(sman dpyad): gdub bu 'dra ba'i mdongs yod na// bdag pos zas ni rnyed par 'gyur// bA glang rwa dang bya dang sbrul// rnga mo yi ni dbyibs 'dra ba'i// mdongs yod de ni shis pa ste// bdag po skal ba bzang po 'phel// de ltar shis pa bstan nas ni
50a3(sman dpyad): mi shes pa yang bshad par bya// dpral bar bya rog rjes 'dra dang // ba glang lci ba'i 'bu 'dra dang // g.yon 'dug pa 'am 'og na 'dug/ gang zhig thur du bltas pa yod// rta de'i bdag po sdug bsngal zhing // rta dang lhan cig nyam
50a4(sman dpyad): nga thob// chang dang kha dog mi sdug dang // mig gsal ba dang srab pa dang // 'dres dang sbags pa lta bu dang // gang zhig dbyibs ni mi sdug dang // kha dog gzhan la gzhan pa dang // rtsub dang rtsog pa can rnams kyi// mdongs
50a5(sman dpyad): des nor rnams 'jig pa ni// nges par ston par byed pa yin// 'di gzhu bar dbye ba ste// rgyal mtshan la sogs mtshan la sogs mtshan ma nyon// myugo dang rna ba mig rdog mtha'// rnga ma rkang pa lto dang rgyab// kha dog steng du
50a6(sman dpyad): mdog gzhan gyi// mtshan ma yod par gyur pa'i rta// de la zhon te 'gro na ni// g.yul du dgra las pham par 'gyur// de bzhin skra mtshams gdong dang tsog/ ze'u dang ze'u mtha' an to dang // sbyin maM dang ni sna rtse gnyis// mchu
50b1(sman dpyad): ltagra pho mtshan rnga ma dang // mdog steng kha dog byung gyur pa// rta de rgyal mtshan can zhes bya// rgyal mtshan can de zhon nAs ni// rgyal po g.yul 'jug dpung nyams 'gyur// sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las// zhur mdongs brtag
50b2(sman dpyad): pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / sha li ho tra thub chen la// rgyal po ni shra tAs dris pA// rta la kha dog du mA yi// thig le rnams ni mthong lcags nA// dge dang mi dge zhu 'tshal lo// drang srong gis ni slar smras pa/
50b3(sman dpyad): gang zhig thig le'i mdog mi gsal// lus la skyes par gyur pa ni// phra zhing migasal ba yi gzugs// snre la thig le zhes bya'o// kha dog 'dra ba'i thig le ni// 'jam pa nyid kyis mngon gyur cing // snum dang rtsub dang gsal ba dang /
50b4(sman dpyad): spu 'dus gyur pa las kyang sngon// ji ltar shig 'bras nag po'i dbus// mig gi rgyal snang ba ltar// logs shig gyur pa med gyur cing // mdog mthun na yang mngon pa yin// mdog ni phan tshun 'dres pa las// thig la gzhan yang 'byung bar
50b5(sman dpyad): 'gyur// ji ltar shing la 'bras bu ni// me tog snang ba skyed byed ltar// de bzhin ltas su thig le ni// rta la snang bar gyur pa yin// de ni gnas dbyibs kha dog las// shis pa dang ni mi shis bskyed// gang gi mdun so la chags dang // ma mchu ya
50b6(sman dpyad): mchu dag la ni// snum zhing dkar ba'i thig le snang // rmig pa rnams la'ang de 'drar chags// mkhas pas des ni zhag bdun na// nor thob ltas su shes par bya// tshe chung las kyi zla phyed ni// bdun nam zla ba bdun gyis thob// mchu sgros las ni thog
51a1(sman dpyad): le chags// zas dang skom ni snyed par bshad// kha 'gram kos kor byung na ni// de yis zas dang skom rnyed cing // bdag po longs spyod 'phel ba dang // nor 'bru bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// 'di yis khyim ni 'phel 'gyur zhing
51a2(sman dpyad): gter thob par yang snang ba yin// shis pa nga yis bshad zin gyis// de bzhin 'dres ma mnyan par gyis// sna ru byung na mtshon gyis 'chi// mkhur bar byung na bu nges 'chi// dpral bar byung na nor thob 'gyur// dpral mtshams kyis ni
51a3(sman dpyad): rgyal srid 'gyur// lkog mar byung na zas skom rnyed// mu 'gram dag tu byung na phung // mchi stan byung na nyer 'tshe byed// mu 'gram za yur byung de 'dra// rna ba g.yon pa'i g.yas las 'pho// g.yas su byung na mdza'o 'phel// ske mjing
51a4(sman dpyad): lhag pa ze mtshan du// byung na mtshon gyi 'thab mo 'ong // lkog mar byung na rta bdug gis// chung ma dang ni bu rnyed 'gyur// phyag sor byung na bu rnyed do// rtsib logs byung na rang phyogs 'phel// pus mor byung na gnod pa bskyed// dpung
51a5(sman dpyad): bar byung na mdza' dang phrad// g.yon logs kyis ni skrod par byed// lus kyi stod slad du byung na// bdag po phrogs par ston pa yin// mchun khung dku yi gnas su byung // lhogs 'gyur ma mchur byung na 'chi// ya mchur byung nA mi
51a6(sman dpyad): 'chi la// mig ngu thung na gos zas thob// ze ba lhag dang ze'u dang // spyi mgul brla ni phra mo dang // rdzi ngar dang ni de mtshams su// byung na 'di ni dmad par bshad// ske rtsar thung na nor thob cing // rdog ltag gis ni rgyal srid bskyed//
51b1(sman dpyad): rgyu mtshams thig le nor rnyed la// snying gar byung na chos can 'gyur// rtsib logs g.yas byung zad med rnyed// mjug rtor byung na nor zad 'gyur// sgyur byung na ni skal ba bzang // rgyab tu byung na gnas rnams 'phel// lhor byung ltogs
51b2(sman dpyad): pa'i 'jigs pa ste// rta yi rlig par byung gyur na// skal ba bzang por 'gyur bar ston// lta ba'i rtswa las dmag dpon 'gyur// ong dor byung na chung me 'phyo// rku ba dang rnga ma'i rtsa bar byung // nor rnams thams cad brlag par 'gyur// pus mor
51b3(sman dpyad): byung ni 'chi ba skyed// lkog ma tshe'u spus lam 'go ston// sman kha ru ni thig la chags// bu skye bar ni ston pa yin// dbyi las bud med nyes pa bskyed// tshe'u tsher byung na gnod pa skyed// gang zhig bstan pa'i gnas su byung // 'dod pa thams
51b4(sman dpyad): cad skyed byed do// yan lag kun la thig le byung // bdag po'i don kun 'grub byed cing // mdza'o 'phel zhing dpal skyed la// rigs dang glags pa 'phel bar byed// mdog dong rjes mthun ma dog byung shis// mdog gzhan shes pa
51b5(sman dpyad): ma yin no// ser po byung na g.yul du 'jug/ dkar po la'ang de dang 'dra// nag po 'thab mo skyed par byed// nag po byung na g.yul du 'chi// sdug dang mi sdug pa dag gis// bdeg po la ni 'jigs chen 'byung // thig le'i steng
51b6(sman dpyad): du thig le byung // de yang rjes mthun mdog tu min// des ni rgyal po brlag pa dang // yul 'khor dag kyang 'khrug par ston// gang tshe rta ni dkar po la// thig le dkar por snang gyur na// de yi bdag po rtag tu bde// bu dang tshe
52a1(sman dpyad): bo rnam par 'phel// gang zhig rta ni dmar bro la// thig le dmar po snang gyur na// bdag po mi bzad dgra 'dul zhing // longs spyod chen po'ang yun+da ring 'gyur// nAd kyis thebs kyang myur du 'tsho// gang tshe rta ni
52a2(sman dpyad): ser po la// thig le ser po snang gyur na// dwe yi bdag po'i rigs brgyud ni// btsun zhing nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur// gang tshi rta ni nag po lo// thig le nag po snang gyur na// de yi bed ka po mi bzad pa'i// nad kyis btab cing
52a3(sman dpyad): myur du 'chi// gang tshe rta ni dkar po la// thig le dmar po gnang gyur na// de yi bdag po myur du ni// dgra yis gsod pa nyid du 'gyur// gang tshe de nyid la thig le// nag po byung bar gyur na nI// de yi bdag por myur bar ni// 'chi ba
52a4(sman dpyad): 'am yadra na 'chi bar 'gyur// gang tshe rta ni dmar po la// thig le ser po snang gyur na// de ni bdag po mi snang ba'i// dgra bo yis ni gsod par 'gyur// gang tshe rta ni dmar po la// thig le nag po sdang gyur ni// de yi bdag po
52a5(sman dpyad): grags min pa'i// las kyis gsod par 'gyur ba yin// gang tshe rta ni nag po la// thig laM dkar po snang gyur na// de yi bdag po grags thob cing // g.yul lasra rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// drag po la ni gang gi tshe// thig la
52a6(sman dpyad): dmar po snang gyur na// de yi bdag po g.yul du ni// grags pa dam pa thob par 'gyur// dkar la shin tu dkar ba dang // snum zhing mnyam par gyur pa yi// thig le gang du snang gyur pa// de yi bdag pos rgyal srid thob/
52b1(sman dpyad): de ni rgyalnga po'i rgyal por 'gyur// bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor shis// dpung drung mdzod kyang 'phel bar 'gyur// thig le shis pa'i gzugs ldan zhing // rjes su mthun pa'i mdog can la// snum zhing
52b2(sman dpyad): kr-I nI sdug pa dang // gnas las mdun du blta ba dang // de ni noR+Ya rnams rnyed par 'gyur// go bzlog pa ni smad pa yin// thig le nas 'bras 'dra ba nI// bdag po bu dang phrad par 'gyur// kha dog sna tshogs dmyar shis che// nor
52b3(sman dpyad): rnyo par-I ni stonas paM yin// mdog mi sngag cing 'thor ba dang // rtsub cing tshwa ni mi nyes dang // dbyibs ngan pa dang 'phra ba dang // de bzhin rgyabA tu lta ba dang // mi mthun gnas drang mtshon tshogs dang // mdog las mdog gzhan gyur ba
52b4(sman dpyad): rnams// de ni yul 'khor 'jig byed yin// rgyal srid nyams par byud pa yin// rgyal po yi ni dpung rnams dang // mdzod dang bu ni 'joms pa yin// thig le shes pa'i gnas byung yang // gang zhig mtshams su
52b5(sman dpyad): skyes pa dang / sgyuma? mad+maHsa chung bar gyur pa rnams// dmyed pA yin+da zhes rnam par bstan// snum zhing mdzes par gyur pa ni// shis pa thob pa kho nAr bAstun// de ltar gnas dang gnas min par// skyes pa'i mtshan ma kun
52b6(sman dpyad): bsnyen nas// 'di ni kha dog kun 'bras bu// 'di ni rtse gcig yid kyis zung // ji ltar gnas ni rnam pa bcur// mtshan nyid so sor rnam par phye// de bzhin thig le'i 'bras bu yang // ltas su gyur par shes par bya// de bas gan
53a1(sman dpyad): dang ltas rnams ni// mtshan mya dag kyang bzung bar bya// de lhung thig le ma lus pa'i// mtshan nyid ji bzhin smras pA yin// sha li hU~M hUM'i mdo'i gnas las// thig le bzang ngan brtag pa'i ler+ya ste nyi shu pa'o//
53a2(sman dpyad): shu lI he tra bder gnas la// legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa// sha r-i zhes bya'i khyad par mdog/ dka' thub chen pos de gsungs shig/ dkar la mdog gzhan dang 'dres pa// sha ra zhes ni bya bar bshad// gang zhig kha dog gzhan
53a3(sman dpyad): gyis ni// khwa dog dkar ba zilnga mnan na// gnas dang grags pa gzhan dag gis// de yi bdag po zil mnan 'gyur// 'dri yang gnas dang dbyibs dag ni// gzhan las 'bras bu gzhan du 'gyur// ra bu mya du' yab 'dra
53a4(sman dpyad): dang // ba'i phyi skor lcu bu yi// rta la sha ra yod na ni// bdag po sa la dbang byed 'gyur// gdengs ka sbrul 'khyil shing 'dra dang // khyu mchog rus sbal chu srin 'dra// she r+ya rta la yod ni nI// bdag po shin tu phyug par
53a5(sman dpyad): 'gyur// khang bzang ri yi rtse mo 'dra// ri mo gsal po yod pa'i rta// bdag po dbang phyug ldan pa dang // rang dang gzhan dbang bskur bar 'gyur// chag pa'i shing dang skra 'dra yod// bdag po la phran zad par 'gyur// rnga rtse
53a6(sman dpyad): dag tu byung na ni// bdag po'i 'ching ba 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig lte ba nas gzung nas// ri stod nyi ma shar kha 'dra// de bzhin ro smad cha dang ni// zla ba yi ni mdog 'dre ba// mdangs dang mdog ni phun tshogs pa// nyi mo
53b1(sman dpyad): g.yul las rgyal byed yin// de las go bzlog gyur pa dang / mtshan mo g.yul las rgyal byed yin// gang zhig lte ba nas bzung nas// ro stod mdangs snum dkar ba la// ro spad mdangs sbrum nag po nI// de yang nyin mo rgyal byed yin// de las
53b2(sman dpyad): go bzlog gyur rta yang // mtshan mo rgyal bar byed pa yin// cha ni 'di dag nyid kyi ni// g.yas dang g.yon du 'od gzhan byung // nyin mo 'am ni mtshan mo dag/ 'thab pa'i tshe na rgyal byed yin// g.yas phyogs kyi ni kha dog dang // ro stod kyi ni mdog
53b3(sman dpyad): 'dra zhing // mdangs snum shis pa'i gzugs can ni// rta de bsngags par gyur pa yin// bram ze 'am ni rgyal rigs las// gzhan gyis de thob mi rigs so// des ni drug kun zad byed yin// chos dang 'dod pa'ang gter byed yin// gang gi ro stod
53b4(sman dpyad): mdog nag cing // ro smad mdangs snum dkar ba ni// dgra 'joms mdza'o 'phel byed de// de yang g.yul las rgyal byed yin// ro stod dung da ltar dkar ba la// ro sbed mdog gzhan ldan pa yin// de la mdzara' skyes ces bya ste// rigs 'phel nyin
53b5(sman dpyad): mo shis pa yin// pA ta la ltar mchu dmar zhing // kha dang lce'u chung dmar gyur pa// khyim du'ang shis par 'gyur ba dang // lam du'ang phan pa skyed byed yin// gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba'i rta// mdog gsal spu ni srub po dang // mdangs snum shis
53b6(sman dpyad): ba'i gzugs can ni// rta mchog de ni bsngags pa yin// gnag dang dmar dang ser po la// zlum ris dkar pos brgyan pa 'am// dkar la mdog gzhan gyis brgyan pa'i// rta ni dpal skyed byed pa yin// sha~M li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las//
54a1(sman dpyad): ri'i mdog gi khyad par zhes tetwe le'u nyi shu b+hA gcig pa'o// lha dang drang srong grub pa'i mtha'// gtsang ma'i bdag nyid dbang po thul// rta yi tshe yi rig byed mkhas// rta bres na ni gnas pa la// ka ta ya nas rkang
54a2(sman dpyad): legs par bzung nas tshig 'di dris// rta yi shes dang mi shes pa'i// mtshan nyid thams cad shes bya ba// so sor rgyas par dag tu ni// legs ldan gyis ni sngar bshad na// 'di dag thams cad ma lus pa// bsres pa dag kyang
54a3(sman dpyad): sa par 'tshal// de ltar dris tshe legs ldan ni// sha li ho tras slar smras pa// mtshan nyid thams cad phun sum tshogs// bsres pa'i mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis// nag po snum mdangs ldan pa la// kha dang rkang pa rdog ma la// de bzhin
54a4(sman dpyad): mig dang brang rnams ni// gang zhig dkar por gyur pa dag/ rta de zhon na rgyal po ni// ma lus pa las rgyal bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmig pa spu yis ni// kun nas khebs par snang gyur pa// rta de g.yogs pa zhes bya ste// bdag po'i
54a5(sman dpyad): phun tshogs 'phel byed yin// yan lag nying lag la brten nas// gang gI mdangs ni shis pa yod// mthong na mig ni dga' byed cing // yid kyang mgu bar byed pa yin// rta ni kha dog gcig gyur pa'i// lus dang ldan pa de yi bdag/
54a6(sman dpyad): 'jig rten du ni 'gro kun la// srog 'dra bar ni sdug par 'gyur// 'dzam bu smin pa lta bur snang // gnag pa legs par bris pa 'dra// rta de rgyal pos zhon nas ni// mi dbang ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// shin tu dmar shing rab snum pa'i//
54b1(sman dpyad): rta ni gang zhig 'phyang byed pa// de yi don kun phun sum tshogs// g.yul ngo dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// kun nag bya rog 'dra ba 'am// ce spyang sbyang khu'i mdog 'dra ba 'am// gang yang gra ma'i mdog 'dra ba// de ni g.yul du rgyal byed yin// rgyab
54b2(sman dpyad): gzhung bong bu 'dra ba yi// mdog gzhan gyi ni ri mo can// de ni gzhung thig yin zhes bya// rta de nor ni 'jig byed yin// gang zhig lus mdog ri dgas 'dra// rmig pa sor mo 'dra ba skye// byi ba'i sde mo zhes bshad do// rta de mdza' dang 'bral
54b3(sman dpyad): byed yin// gzhung thig can dang mig mi sdug/ de bzhin byi ba'i sdeng mo can// mdog mi sdug pa'i rta mthong na// ring du yongs su spang bar bya// rdza gyo chag pa'i mdog 'dra ba'i// thal ba'i mdog dang byi la'i mdog/ byi ba'i mdog can
54b4(sman dpyad): gang yin dang // ngu ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug/ de dag gis ni bdeg po gsod// don grub pa la smad pa yin// du ba du ba mig mdog 'dres// me tog pA la'i mdog 'dra// rnga ma rngog ma dmar ser yod// rta de rigs ni rlag byed yin//
54b5(sman dpyad): gang gi rlig pa rmig pa dang // rnga ma mig dang rkan yang gnag/ de ni 'jug nag zhes bya ste// rigs dang mdzod ni zad byed yin// phrag so rgyab dang rked rtsa dang // oMng to dag tu ri dwags ni// e na ya yi mdog ltar gnag/ de ni g.yang
54b6(sman dpyad): gzhi can zhes bya// phrag sos bu ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rke rtsas kha lo pa 'chi 'gyur// rgyab kyis bdag po 'chi bar 'gyur// ong ngos chung ma ngan spyod 'gyur// gang zhig stag 'dra'i ri mo yod// rta de blun po zhes bya de// gser can zhes
55a1(sman dpyad): kyang de la bya// g.yul du bdag po gsod byed yin// ro stod dam ni gzhan dag tu// ri dgas lpags 'dra'i nag pos khyab// bdag po gsod cing kun gsod skyed// gang zhig mdongs dang bcas pa yi// rkang lag
55a2(sman dpyad): gnyis kAr shis pa yin// rkang lag gnyis ni dkar gyur pa// mdongs dang bcas nA de mi smad// lag pa gcig dkar mdongs med pa// bdag po gsod byed g.yul du spang // rkang lag gnyis ni dkar gyur pa// g.yul
55a3(sman dpyad): du shis shing dpal bskyed yin// rkang lag dkar ba'i 'bras bu ni// rgya cher nga yis bshad par bya// rta gang gis ni mdun rkang gi/ g.yas pa dkar por gyur pa de// bkra mi shis par gyur pa ste// g.yul du don mi
55a4(sman dpyad): 'grub par byed// snga rkang gasmon pa dkar gyur pa// dpung pa snod pa skyed byed yin// phyi rkang gi nI g.yas pa dkar// badrag po gsod par byed pa yin// g.yon pa dkar bas g.yul du ni// zhon pa po dang bcas brtson 'khyer// snga rkang
55a5(sman dpyad): gnyis dang de bzhin du// phyi rkang gi ni g.yon pa dkar// bdag po g.yul du mda' mdung gis// 'chi bar byed pa nyid yin no// snga rkang gnyis dang de bzhin du// phyi rkang g.yas pa dkar gyur pa// g.yul du bdag po 'chi gyur nas/
55a6(sman dpyad): de yi rjes la rang nyid 'chi// snga rkang g.yon pa dkar gyur cing // phyi rkang gnyis ka dkar gyur pa// rta de g.yul du 'jug gyur na// grogs dang bcas pa 'chi bar 'gyur// snga rkang g.yas pa dkar gyur cing // phyi rkang gnyis ka dkar
55b1(sman dpyad): na ni// rta de bdag po gsod byed yin// las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar mi shis bshad nas ni// shis pa bshad kyis nyan par gyis// snga rkang g.yas pa dkar gyur cing // phyi rkang g.yon pa dkar ba ni// thad dkar dkar
55b2(sman dpyad): po zhes bya ste// mdza' bshos nye du 'phel byed yin// de bzhin gcig shos gnyis dkar ba// mdza'o 'phel bar byed pa yin// snga rkang gnyis ni dkar gyur na// nor dang bad+ma dang dga' ba bskyed// phyi rkang gnyis ni dkar gyur pa/
55b3(sman dpyad): g.yul du dgra las rgyal bar gyur// ngos gnyis dkar bar gyur pa las// g.yas pa dpung dang mdzod 'phel byed// g.yon pas skal ba bzang ba dang // nor dang mdzod kyang 'phel bar byed// rkang pa bzhi char dkar ba'i rta// rigs
55b4(sman dpyad): dang chos ni 'phel byed yin// tshig grang man chad rkang bzhi dkar// 'bras bu chen po bskyed shes bya// ba spu'i mtha' 'am rting pa 'am// spyi bor gang zhig dkar gyur rta// de ni sngar bshad las khyad par// 'bras bu chung ngu bskyed
55b5(sman dpyad): bar byed// pus mo'i bar du dkar ba'i rta// 'bras bu gsal por 'byin par 'gyur// rta ni kha dog gzhan yod pa// rkang pa lus mdog mi mthun na// de yi 'bras bu sngar bshad pa'i// khyad par bzhin du shes par bya// gang
55b6(sman dpyad): gis log pa gnyis dkar zhing // rkang pa gnyis ni gnag pa 'am// dmar ba'i kha dog gzhan yod pa// de ni nyin mo rgyal byed yin// de las bzlog par byung ba ni// mtshan mo rgyal bar byed pa yin// gang zhig kha dog dmar po'i
56a1(sman dpyad): d+ha/ rkang pa sngo ser dkar dang gnag/ yang na rmig pa sngo ba 'am// seng dang dmar dang dkar dang gnag/ kha dog gnyis sam gsum mam bani// mdog gam mdog rjes yod gyur ba// s+thA li ta ni de 'dra 'byung // dam/
56a2(sman dpyad): rgyal po rgyal byed cing // dgra rnams thul bar byed pa dang // g.yul tu rtag tu shis pa dang // nor dang bu dang tsha bor ldan// gang zhig skyes pa tshun chad ni// rnga rngog skye bar mi 'gyur ba// bdag po rigs ni brlag byas nas// de yi rjes
56a3(sman dpyad): la rang nyid nyams// rmang kha yI ni g.yas g.yon na// ba yi nu sor lta bu dag/ gang zhig la ni snang gyur pa// rta de rgyal srid 'jig byed yin// gang zhig pa lang rA 'dra ba// ru ru'i rwa rtse lta bu 'am// ba yi nu sor dbyibs 'dra 'am//
56a4(sman dpyad): lci ba'i rtse mo lta bu 'am// de bzhin pags pa'i 'dzer ba'i dbyibs// yang na bil ba'i lta bu 'am// lag sor lta bu'i rwa dag ni// sbom po 'am yang na phra mo dag/ ring dang thung dang rtsub dang 'jam// sra dang snyi ba gang yang rung //
56a5(sman dpyad): rna rtsa 'am skra mtshams tha ma 'am// dpral ba 'am yang na spyi bo 'am// de las gzhan pa'i gnas dag tu// de las gzhan pa'i dbyibs yod pa// gAng byung de ni rwa can de// bdag po yul 'khor 'jig byed yin// yul
56a6(sman dpyad): phyogs gang na rta de yod// yul de rlag par 'gyur ba yin// des na de ni dgra bo yi// yul du skyal la rjes zhi bya// rta ni gang gi kha la ni// sha khrag gis ni kun tu khyab// de bzhin rku ba dang rlig pa dang // rna ba dag dang mig
56b1(sman dpyad): byu // d+hAd khrug can zhes bya// mo shes sdig pa'i mtshan nyid can// d+hA zlas sun+ti mr-i gzhug cing // 6 shes 'dod pas rAgs bya// rig gi nyis pA ba sh+tsa b+hA sas// de ni nga las mnyan par gyis// rgyu mig dpa dang bye ba'i mye/
56b2(sman dpyad): sbrul mig nor bu'i mig 'dra dang // byi ba 'ug pa nye mig can// phag dang khyu mchog lta bu'i mig/ bya rnyog lug dang khra mig can// khyA yi mig can smad pa yin// mig yo mig ni gdug pa dang // mig ser ba yang spang bar bya// des ni bdag po mi bdi
56b3(sman dpyad): zhing // rigs zad par yang byed pa yin// de ni g.yul du bdag po dag/ gsod cing pham par byed pa yin// rkan gyi mdog ni sna tshogs dang // mdog dang dbyibs ni mang ba yi// 'bras bu khyad par gang dag yin// de ni nga las mnyan par gyis// ge
56b4(sman dpyad): sar nag po lta bu yi// thig le gang la khyab gyur pa// des ni lam du nyon mongs 'gyur// rkan gyi phyed ni dkar ba yis// nor zad ge sar lta bu yis// 'gags ni mi shes gyur pa yin// rkan ni snum zhing zab pa dang // dmar bar gyur na bsngags
56b5(sman dpyad): pa yin// shin tu dmar zhing cher khyab la// rtsub mo med la'ang 'bras bu che// snum chung dmar ba'i shas chung ba// 'bras bu chung bar shes par bya// rkan gyi kha dog 'bras bu dang // so yi 'bras bu nyid dang ni// mtshan nyid gnas dang bzhi las/
