150b1(sman dpyad): gsum dang 'bras bu gsum// de bzhin ha ti pi pi ling // lde gur sbyar ba dang bsres/ bskol// mdze yi nAd ni thams cad dang // dug sel me drod skyed mchog yin// rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur dang // khong tsha khrag

152a3(sman dpyad): pa dang ku bid+d+he dang dong kA dang // lug smra su dang ni pad+mA dang // ka rI bi ra ba~M da dang // ro hi d+hA dang skA d+hesma dung // pre ha ti yi 'bras bu dang // ra thAg kai ni gcin dang btags// 'di dkyi snang gnyis sbyar ba la// mar srang snum

152a6(sman dpyad): pa'i smon mod gyi le'u'o// / de nas gzhan yang til mer gyi// le'u nges par bshad bya ste// sra pa ra ni srang brgya ni// chu bri bcu drug nang du bskol// bzhi cha lus par gyur pa ni// ba de ni thab la dpog/
152b1(sman dpyad): s+yAnA khu de dang mAHm+b+ha prA yi// til mar nye bar gzug par byA/ kany+dzi rang spyad nyis 'gyur gzhug/ de lA spyan ni 'di dag gi/ lde gu nye bar gzhug par byA// rA s+thA ba la grwarbe ma dang // lde myang tsha dang shing klu dang // swa sa ra
152b2(sman dpyad): none'i rtsa ba tung // pi pi ling gi rtsa bar btsas// tsi tI ka dang btso' sga dang // shr-i tI dang ni theng shing dang / bos shing 'bras bu bo bi dang // pi pi ling yang srang re ni// cha ni mnyam por sbyar nas kyang // phye ma zhib mo 'thag tu
152b3(sman dpyad): bzhug/ me ni chung ngu dang btsos te// snum de smod ni bzang por gzhug/ 'di ni sna sman bsku ba dang // 'jam rtsi btung ba dag la bsngags// rta ni rlung nad kyis bcom dang // mo 'am yang na glang pos rung // lus
152b4(sman dpyad): 'theng yun ring nad kyis btab// nges par badri ba thob par 'gyur// rta gang bu ni mI 'chags pa// 'di yis nges par mngal skyed 'gyur// pho minra skyes pa nyid 'gyur zhing // mo sham yang ni bu skye byed// 'di yi
152b5(sman dpyad): 'ong ba khye 'jug rigs// rabs rgyud bu ni yid 'ong skye// swa si ta'i tI la mAr 'di// nang kun 'jig par byed pa yin// sha lo ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ sra pa ta yi til mar ro//
152b6(sman dpyad): sra sa ra na'i rtsa ba dang // yal ga lo ma bcas srang brgya// rtsa ba bcu ni de yi byed// chu bre bcu drug nang du bkol// bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang // thab las slar ni dbog par bya// sman khu de yi nyis 'gyur
153a1(sman dpyad): gyi swa kAny+tsi rang skyur gzhug par ni// de la nye bar gzhug par bya// sman ni 'di rnams srang re la// lde gur byas la de ru gzhug/ bos shing 'bras bu bca' sga dang // tsi tra ka dang lce myang tsho// pra
153a2(sman dpyad): sa ra yi rtsa ba dang // de bzhin pi pi ling rtsa ba// thang shing dang ni shu ti dang // me da tsauka hAM gAn dang // e raN+Da'i rtsa dzI ban+ti// ru ta shu dag sa ha tsar// bo son cha ni bzang po dang // de bzhin mang du sru ba dang // so ban
153a3(sman dpyad): dza na srir po gnyis// A shwa gun+d+ha ha sU sha/ ba ma s+yeng khrom smrig rkang dang // shre ya se ni cha many+dzam gzhug/ 'di ni bsku dang sna sman dang // btung dang 'jam rtsi dag la btang // rlung gi nang ni thams cad dang /
153a4(sman dpyad): de bzhin nad gzhan kun sel byed// sgyu dang 'byung po brjed byed dang // de bzhin gdon nAd sna tshogs dang // zha'o me dpal gyis thebs la// til mar bsten pa bde thob 'gyur// skam drang rus pa'i nad
153a5(sman dpyad): rnams la// til mar 'di ni btang bar bya// rgo ma bu ni mr-i 'chags pa// 'di byung na ni buM 'chags 'gyur// rgod ma dang ni rta pho yi// rlung na dra brgyad cu sel bar byed// gnyer ma 'dus shing na tshong rgas//
153a6(sman dpyad): slar yang lang tsho thob par 'gyur// sa sa ro yi til mar 'di// rta la phan byed mchog tu bshad// tshe dang stobs ni skyed byed cing // dran pa'ang sems gsal dpal skyed byed// rus po chad dang rtsa chad la// ti
153b1(sman dpyad): mar 'di yis sna sman btang // sha li ho tA'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyud pa las/ prA sa ri rA ti la mAr gnyis pa'o// / sle tres chu yi nang bskol la// khu ba bani cha'i til mar gzhug/ 'o ma de
153b2(sman dpyad): dang mnyam btsug la// sman 'di dag gi lde gu gzhug/ pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gA sum+ba// tsi tra ha tI pi pI ling // shu dag rus pA byi dar ka/ sbyiR+Sha pa dang nri lce myanga? tshwa// pra sa ra ni ba la dang // ra sna gze ma ha/
153b3(sman dpyad): sus pa// bcug lnga me ni chung ngus btso// de bzhin bece' sgra gzhug par bya// 'di yis sna rengs rlig spos dang // lus rengs sked pa na ba dAngo // de bzhin rgyab ni rengs pa dang // rlung nad pa la shi dang ni//
153b4(sman dpyad): rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad la// khyad par du ni rtag tu btang // sle tres la sogs tilA mar ni// tshangs pas mngon tshe bshAd pa yin// sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gAnA sa brgyad pa la sa/ sle tres la sogs
153b5(sman dpyad): pa'i til mar ro// / shu ti ra ga dong gra dang // btsod dang ru rta lce myang tsha// thang shing dAng ni ba la gnyis// ser po gnyis dAnga? tsan dan dan dAmA ra// sle tres kyi ni khu bo dang // til mar 'o ma dang bcas
153b6(sman dpyad): bskol/ 'theng ba'i nad ni thams cad la// bsku dang sna sman 'jam rtsi btang // gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ shu ti'i til mar ro// pi pi ling dang po son cha// bil+la shing mngar shu ti dang // ru rta
154a1(sman dpyad): de bzhin ma nu dang // tsitra kra dang thang shing ni// btags twe til mar 'o ma ni// nyis 'gyur bcug te bskol bar bya// gnang 'brum rlung ni 'khyil ba lA// 'jam rtsir btang ba'i mchog yin
154a2(sman dpyad): no// gzhang 'brum pa dang gzer na da dang // gcin sri ba dang za gu dang // rkeng pa brla yi nad rnams dang // sgeg pa dang ni spos nAng dang // khrag 'jog pa dang gzhang khe skrangs// rlung 'khyil bA ni sel bar byed// de la sogs
154a3(sman dpyad): ba'i nang rnams la// 'jam rtsir btang na sel 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i gnas de brgyad pa las/ bi pi ling la sogs pa'i til mAR+Sha ro// 'tsho byed shing mngar me da dang // pi pi ling dang po sngon cha// shu dag ra sna
154a4(sman dpyad): ba la dang // bil+la ny+tsi shu shing shu tI ni// btags pa'i lde gu tIl mar dang // 'o mo nyis 'gyur bcug ste bskol// til mar 'di ni 'jam rtsi ru// btang na rlung nang sel bar byed// gsang ba'i gnas las 'tsho
154a5(sman dpyad): byed la sogs pa'i til mar re// ma sha'i rtsa ba srang baN+ya ni// dus su skyes pa btung bar bya// chu br-i bcu drug nang du bskol// bzhi cha lus par gyur po dang // sman gyi khu ba de dang ni// til mar bre bzhi bsres
154a6(sman dpyad): pa ru// sman 'di dag ni srang gnyis pa// mnyam byas lde gu bcug ste bskol// btsod dang a shwa gan+d+ha dang // rgyam tsha dang ni shing mngar dang // nim+ba'i rtsa ba shu ti dang // ra sna yang ni bcug ste bskol// me chung
154b1(sman dpyad): la bskolA til mar 'dis// rlung gi nang kun sel byed cing // lus rengs pa yi nad rnams ni// rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin// rlung las gyur pa'i nang brgyad cu// thams cad 'di yis sel bar byed//
154b2(sman dpyad): gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las// ma sha'i til mor ro// ra sna la sogs bshad bya yis// legs thos ma yongs nyon par gyis// ra sna'i rtsa ba lo ma dang // 'bras bu yal ga srang brgyad ni// brdungs te
154b3(sman dpyad): chu bro bcu drug dang // bskol la bzhi tshwa lus pa na// de yi khri ba bre bzhir ni// ti lau mar bre do gzhug par bya// ra snA dwe nyid lde gu byas// srang bcu der ni gzhug par bya// der ni 'o ma bzhi 'gyur dang // blo
154b4(sman dpyad): ldan sman pas sbyor bar bya// kha ra srang ni bco lnga dag/ srang bcu nye bar gzhug par bya// kha ra rnyed par ma gyur no// bu rim nyis 'gyur gzhug par bya// me ni chung ngus bskol naswa ni// u dum+bA ra'i snod nang bzhag/
154b5(sman dpyad): til mar 'dis ni rlung gyur na// brgyad cus sel bar byed pa yin// rA sne'i sbyor po ci bzhin du// ha sa tsa ra'ang de dang 'dra// sna sman bsku dang btung ba dang // 'jam rtsi'i las la'ang bsngags pa yin//
154b6(sman dpyad): shA li ho tra'i gsang po'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ra sna la sogs pa'i til mor ro// 'bras phu gsum dang na le sham// bca'i sgri ldong ros bab la dang // nag tshur dur byid gla sga nga dang // de bzhin a
155a1(sman dpyad): ka'i lo ma dang // thang shing dang ni ser po gnyis// s+yAng spos dang ni tsan dran dmar// 'di dag s+yAdA ri'i tshad byas pa// ba gcir dang ni lhan cig bskol// yungs mar dang ni sum cu dang // dug
155a2(sman dpyad): ni sbyang gcig gzhug par bya// lcags kyi spyod du me chung gis// rim gyis de ni bskol bar bya// til mar 'di yis rta yi ni// lus kyi nang rnams sel bar byed// galdan pa dang nI rkang shu dang // de bzhin 'brum bu
155a3(sman dpyad): smra tshigs ni// bskus pa yis ni sel byed cing // gnyen par yang ni 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rma reng gyur pa dag/ de la 'dra spyan 'di mchog yin no// shau li ho tra'i gsung ba'i gnas te brgyud pa las// dug
155a4(sman dpyad): go snying po can gyi ti la maR+Sha ro// ru rta ma tsha ser po gnyiswa// ka ra bi ra na le shama?// na ta man t+ya ni sha la// skam pa'i l-i dang skye rtsi pog/ yungs kar gla sga pa to la// nim+b+ha sprang ma skyer khaN+Da// byi dang
155a5(sman dpyad): ka ni cha mnyam bya// 'di dang til mar ba gcin+da ni// nyis 'gyur bcug la bskol bar bya// til mar ska bar gyur pa'i tshwa// rnying mar bcas pas bskus na ni// sngo dang g.yan pa'i nod rnams drang
155a6(sman dpyad): mdze nang lo mang lon pa 'joms// rkang shu dang ni sha bkra yang // lan gcig bskus pas sel bar byed// mdze yi nang ni bco brgyad dag/ dbang po'i thos babs la tur 'joms// sha li ho tra'i gsang
155b1(sman dpyad): bA'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ru d+ha la sogs pa'i til mar gyi le'u rdzogs so// / ra sna ba la sle tres dang // ba spu ba dang e ran dang // shi sgyu bca' sga thang shing dang // a shwa gan+d+hany+tsa
155b2(sman dpyad): shing ba/ rtsa ba wA po a ru ra// sa ha tsa ra s+phu spu'i rtsa// chu dang bskal ba'i sman khyu 'di// gu gul bcas pa 'am de gcig puM// snang rtsi dang nI sbyar byas pas// ske rengs rgyub rengs mjug do'i
155b3(sman dpyad): nang // gzhang 'brum r-i stod nang rnams drang // sna smug+sa 'byung ba sel bar nges// sha li hA tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyud pa las/ ra sna la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu bo'o// bla sna bo da pa tha dang // shu thag dang ni a ru ra//
155b4(sman dpyad): bu tse shel dang khyi lce ba// thang shing dang ni parba ti// pi pi ling rtsa byi tsher bya// sle tres drang ni bca' sgaskra dang // pa to la yi lo mar bcas// smin khu bzang po bskol bar bya// me drod bri dang rims bcas dang // sems khong chung
155b5(sman dpyad): dang lkog nang dang // gzhong 'dra skrangs nad ludA pa dang // ma zhu'i rlung dang stobs zad pa'i// rta yI nad la btang gyur na// na da kun sel ba'i mchog yin no// gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las// gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman
155b6(sman dpyad): khu'o// shr-i ga ta ka shri sha yi// shun pa arga'i rtsa ba dang // a shwa gan+d+ha ra sna dang // sra pa ra yi rtsa ba dang // cha ni mnyam par sbyar byas la// gtun gyi nang du bsres te bskol// bzhi tshe lus par gyur pa dang // dro 'jam rti
156a1(sman dpyad): la blud paR+Sha bya// brang gi nAd ni thams cad lA// sman khu 'di ni mchog tu bsngags// gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ shr-i ga ta ka la sogs pa'i sman khu'i le'u'o// sman khu'i le'u rdzog so//
156a2(sman dpyad): NA ni ma zhur gyur pa dag/ rtsa nyung za zhing yid mi bA de// byin pa gnyis ni 'theng gyur zhing // nyam thag pa yi glacin rtug gtong // yang na byin pa srungs pa 'am// rma yi nang ni 'byung bar 'gyur// spong dang nga rgyal med 'gyur
156a3(sman dpyad): zhing // rmongs bag ma zhu las byung skye// de la ci sring nad de ni// nyam chung gyur par myur bar bzhag/ shin tu ne na na bzhi gsum// sel ba'i sman khu dro 'jam blung // rta la sbyang ba byas rjes la// dus mthun zas dang
156a4(sman dpyad): skom byin te// zhag lnga 'am zhag bI zho bar du ni// rjes su btung ba blud par bya// dwe yisa? nang byung ma gyur na// nad stobs skyes la sman pa yis// zhag bdun gyi ni rjes la ni// gtor ka nye bar gtang bar bya// rna ba

159a4(sman dpyad): gtsang chen gyis nyon dang // nyam chung lam gyis dub pa dang // 'o ma mar dang phyer byas pa'i// lde gus de la sbyin par bya// yang na phye mar pi pi lIng // kha r-i dang sbyar sbyin gyur na// sems ni gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/
159a5(sman dpyad): mkhris nang ngal ba sil bar 'gyur// lus kyis sgom pa nyis 'gyur pas// rtag tu rta la 'di sbyin bya// snga dro khrus byas chu 'thungs nas// phye yi lde gu sbyin par bya// gang gis khong par rlung zhugs dang // lus
159a6(sman dpyad): la mkhris pas nyen gyur pa// de la btung ba dang sbyar sbyin// rlung mkhris nad rnams sel bar byed// sha li ho tr-i'i gsang bo'i gnas te brgyad pa les// phye ma'i lde gu'o// ya bak+Sha ra che ba gsum// ser po gtsu
159b1(sman dpyad): dang tsi tra ka/ ka ra bi ra dkar rtsa ba// lce myang tsha dang bcas pa dang // arka'i rtsa bA bi sha la// khyang pa'i dud pa yungs kar bcas// de bzhin sa rdzi kA kA ra// dug ni chu phyed dang bsres pa// rang sbyar dang ni btags nAs kyang //
159b2(sman dpyad): grib ma la ni skam par bya// ba gcin dang nI sbyar nas kyang // snga dro mdze n+dan rta la sbyin// ldan ljin rnam par sbyar nas kyang // thal sman gyis kyang dril phyis bya// phye ba dang ni bsku ba dang // zhag bdun gyi ni bar du bya// 'di yis
159b3(sman dpyad): 'bus zos sbrul gyis zin// galdan pa sngo dang 'brum phran dang // de bzhin pags pa'i na dri gzhan dang // sdig pA dang nI de bzhin du// srog chags gdug pus zin pa dang // rkang nang gsor ni mi rung rnams// nges par sel
159b4(sman dpyad): byar byed pa yin// thal sman gyi ni sbyor ba 'dri// dr-ing sr-ing rnams kyis ston tshwa bshud // 'di yis rma reg rtag tu ni// sbyong bar byed pa rI the tshom med// shA li ho tra'i gsung ba'i gnas twe brgyad pa las/ arka'i thal sman
159b5(sman dpyad): no// nas tshig 'khrus thal cho ga bzhin// byin de yi yon tan gang // de ni dA yis bshad par bya// ngas bshad pa los mnyan par gyis// chen po la ni srang gcig byin// chu gcig phri ba bor ma la// tha mA la ni srang phyid
159b6(sman dpyad): byin// yang thal la ni zho gnyis so// dbyar tshe til mar dang sbyar ba// rtag tu sbyin par bya ba yin// dus kun tu ni mar bcas par// byin par gyur pa rab tu bsngags// 'di yis skrangs pa drug dang ni// mdze nang khong pa'i
160a1(sman dpyad): srin bu dang // rlung 'khyil ba dang spos nang dang // gzer gyi nang dang gzhang 'brum dang // phyo ba yi ni nang rnams dang // kha yi nang rnams ma lus dang // shu ba'i nang rnams sel ba yin// de
160a2(sman dpyad): ni tshad tsam byin gyur na// stobs skyed mdog ni gsal bar byed// rta la nas tshig 'khrus thul ba// bcud len mchog ni yin par bshad// rtswa gang rtag tu 'di 'thung ba// de ni rtag tu nud med 'gyur// de ni rlung gi nad
160a3(sman dpyad): rnams dang // mkhris pa dang ni bad kan dang // ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa dang // de bzhin glo bur ba yi nang // khrag las byung ba'i nad rnams sel// sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ nas tshig
160a4(sman dpyad): 'khus pa'i thal ba'i cho ga'o// de nas gzhan yang lan tshwa yi// cho ga dam pa bshad par bya// lan tshwa yi ni yon tan rnams// bshad kyis de ni nyan par gyis// rgyam tsha rta la phan pa'i mchog/ rlung dang bad kan
160a5(sman dpyad): sel bar byed// de yis snying nad ma zhu ba'i// nad rnams sel bar byed pa yin// rta ni nad med par 'gyur zhing // rnga rngog kyang ni legs par skye// pho ba'i na rnams 'byung mi 'gyur// zos pa myur du 'dzu 'gyur zhing // bde
160a6(sman dpyad): pab kho nar smin par byed// lan tshwas rte yi gcin rtug dag/ bde ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur// lan tshwa rta yi tshe yin par// dus ni rtag tu bsngags pa yin// sman pas dgun stong dgun slong tshe// lan tshwa snga dro
160b1(sman dpyad): sbyin par bya// dpyid dang spos ka dbyar dang ston// phyi dro'i dus su sbyin par bya// rta ni mchog tu gyur pa la// lan tshwa srang drug sbyin par bya// bar ma la ni slang bzhi sbyin// chung ba la ni srang gsumu sbyin// dbyar
160b2(sman dpyad): gyi tshe na lan tshwa nau// nim+b+ha'i lo mA dang sbyar sbyin// dgun gyi tshe ni dgun tha yi// lo ma dang btsas sbyin par bya// pa tr-i la yi lo maur bcas// dgun spyod dang ni dbying duso sbyin// sos ka dang ni ston gyi tshe// mar dang
160b3(sman dpyad): sbyar ba sbyin par bya// lan tshwa yi ni sbyar ba 'do// bu la nga yis bshad pa yin// sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa lngas/ lan tshwa'i cho ga'o// tshangs pa drag po khyab 'jug ni// bad kan mkhris pa rlung dag
160b4(sman dpyad): tsani/ phan tshun rton par byed pa dang // gcig la gcig ni ma 'dres gnas// de la tshangs pa bad+ma kan te// drag po mkhris pa yin par bshad// khyab 'jug rlung gi bdag nyid can// de ltar tshul ni rnams gsum
160b5(sman dpyad): yin// sa la bcos mas gnas pa yin// tshangs pa la sogs lha gsum po// lus can rnams kyi brtan pa'i rgyu// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// ba ru ra de 'bras bu gsum// 'di yi yon tan rnams dang nI// sbyor ba'i
160b6(sman dpyad): khyad par bshad par bya// rked pa brla yi nad sel cing // lus zad thams cad dang bar byed// mdog dang stobs ni skyed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gnas gsum sbyor bar byed// 'dis ni me drong skyad byed cing // smin
161a1(sman dpyad): drang brtas byed mchog yin no// de bas rlung dang mkhris pa dang // bad nad 'khrugs par gyur pa na// 'bras bu gsum skom sbyor ba yis// nang ni sbyong bar byed pa yin// a ru ra ni
161a2(sman dpyad): cha gcig sde// pa ru ra ni de'i nyis 'gyur// skyu ru ra ni ba ru ri'i// nyis 'gyur kho na gzhug par bya// sman ni bre gang dag dang ni// chu ni bre bzhi bskol bar bya// bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang // sman khu de ni thal
161a3(sman dpyad): las dbog/ tshags kyis legs par gtsags nas ni// dus kyi cho ga shes pa yi// me stobs che chung brtags byas la// rta la nye bar blud par bya// rlung nad can la til mar sbyin// mkhris pa can la mar
161a4(sman dpyad): sbyar blung // bad kana? can la sle tres dang // pi pi ling dang sbyar ba blud// mig gi nad drung rlig skrangs dang // rma dang rus nad 'khums pa dang // rdo dang g.yan+da pa 'brum phran dong // 'brum bu lho yi nang

161b1(sman dpyad): dog mtshan nyid dang // rta yi nyes pa gang dang gang // sel 'gyur thub mchog khyed kyis gsungs// bu yis de skad dris pa dang // sha li ho tras slar smras pa// brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba ni// thigs pa sa la
161b2(sman dpyad): lhung bar 'gyur// de las rigs dang yon tan ni// thams cad dang ldan sman skye 'gyur// bsil dang bdud rtsi'i thigs laswa byung // yon tan gsum ldan a ru r-i// lan tshwa nyid ni ma gtogs pa// ro lnga
161b3(sman dpyad): dang ni ldan bshad de// bska dang mang rA dang tsha ba dang // kha dang skyur bar glegs da ldan// de ltar ro lnga bshad nas ni// de yi ming ni bshad par bya// rnam rgyal 'phel ba zhes bya dang // skem byed de
161b4(sman dpyad): bzhin bdud rtsi dang // nug po dang ni 'jigs mida? dang // 'tsho byid ces ni ming du grags// rnam rgyal sku ba la tur zlum// 'phel byed shi na tu zlum pa yin// skem byed rus pa che zhing dokar+Ya/
161b5(sman dpyad): bdud rtsi rtse mo sbom pa yin// 'tsho byed gla ser gyi mdog can de// 'jigs med zur ni lnga pa yin// nug po zur gsum pa nyid de// rigasau ni bdun du shes par bya// 'jigs mi dA rta yi rkang pa yi// nad
161b6(sman dpyad): la rtag tu btang bar bya// 'phel byed dang ni bdud rtsi dag/ rtag tu lta ba'i lus la btang // nag po sbyong bar byed par bshad// 'tsho byed stobs ni 'phel bar byed// skem byed mig gi nad la btang //
162a1(sman dpyad): rnam par rgyal ba 'khru bar byed// de ltar rigs dang mi dag gi/ rnam pa bdun du bshad pa yin// rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur dang // khyad par du ni bad kan nang+ga// mngon du
162a2(sman dpyad): 'phrog byed a ru ru// skyur bas rlung ni sel bar byed// mngar dang kha bas mkhris pa sel// tsha dang bska bas bang kAn sel// de bas nyes gsum 'joms zhesau bshad// rta la ji ltar sbyin bya ba// dai yi
162a3(sman dpyad): des pa mr-iny+dzan par gyis// ba gtsin nang du zla ba gcig/ a ru ra ni bzhag par bya// dang po'i zhag ni rtog ma lnga// gnyis pa la ni bcu sbyin bya// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig par// lnga lnga yis ni skyod par bya//
162a4(sman dpyad): nI ma pA yi ni khu ba dang // seng ldeng khu ba dAng btags la// lcags kyi snod kyi nang bdug ste// mtshan mo bkab ste dben pAr bzhag/ lde gu btang ba'i tshad gang yin// snum gyi tshad kyang de tsem du// smon pa mchog
162a5(sman dpyad): gi swa sbyin bya yis// snum mangs skyon ni yod shes bya// shu ba g.yan pa 'brum bu dang // mdze nad rkang shu 'bras dang ni// nang ni rkeng la zhugs pa dang // gzhang 'brum dang ni sha bkra dang // de bzhinu
162a6(sman dpyad): rta yi rkang pa'i nad// a ru ra yis sel bar byed// dbyar tshe rgyas tsha dang bcas sbyin// ston ni kha ra a ru raM// dgun ni bca' sga dang bcas pa// dgun smad kha ru tsha dang bcas// sbrang rtsi dang sbyar dpyid che/
162b1(sman dpyad): sbyin// sos ka pra ram sbyar bu sbyin// de 'dras me yis shing bsdigs ltar// nad kyi tshogs rnams zad bar byed// gnad dang rus pa tshigs gnas dang // drug mdo dang ni gnas pa'i nadra// rlung mkhris
162b2(sman dpyad): lces ni gyur pa dang // de bzhin bod kan+da las gyur dang // khrag les gyur pa'i yan lag gi/ nang ni sna tshogs gronas pa sel// blo dang stobs des dbang po yi// tshogs kyis kha ni mdzad pa yin// rlung dang
162b3(sman dpyad): mkhris pa bad kan gyi// nang rnams khA ni 'dzums par byed// gcin dang de bzhin rtug pa dang // dri mi rnams ni spyod byed pa// A ru ras ni rta yi nI// nad ni ma lus 'joms brar byed// sha li ho tra gseng b+ha'i
162b4(sman dpyad): gnas te brgyad pA las/ a ru ra yi cho ga'o// sha li ho b+ha thub mchog la// legs thos kyis ni yongs dris po// gu gul ji ltar b+hung gyur cing // rang bzhin mtshan nyid ci 'dri legs// tshad dang tshul ni
162b5(sman dpyad): dzi tsam zhig/ nad ni gang la btang bar bgyi// bu yis+dza de skad drisuM pa dang // sha li ho tras slar smrasna pa// bdud rtsi bsrubs par gyur pa'i tshe// thigs pa phra mor 'thor gyur pa// dzam+bu'i chu bo grub pa dang // dri zas
162b6(sman dpyad): rten pa'i gnas su bab// de las rtsa ba rgyas pa yi// shing ni chen por skyes par gyur// de yi khu bcud 'dzags gyur pa// gu gul zhes ni bya bar grags// bska zhing tsha la kha baM ste// zhu rjes dngar po min

163a3(sman dpyad): gsum sbyir btang // 'di dag tshu lU ni rnam gsum sin// spos kha dAng ni dbyar gyi tshe// mAr+ra dang sbyaR+Ya to sbyin pa ri bya// ston gyi tshe ni dgun stong ni// 'bras bu glasum khu dong sbyar btang // dgun sma dA da
163a4(sman dpyad): nI dIpyid kyi tshe// ba gcin dAng sbyar sbyin par bya// dang po srang ni phyed sbyin zhing // srang phyed kyis ni rim bzhin skye// srang lnga dag gi tshad byas pa// tshe tshung kho nA yin par bshad// rta la snga dro blung ni ni//

163a6(sman dpyad): ma la ni bzhi bcu brgyad// nye bar sbyin pa nyid du bya// chung ngu la ni srang sum cu// rtsa gnyis kyi ni tshang du sbyin// 'di ni rta yi nang gzhi gsuma'o// 'khrugs par gyur pa bsngags pa yin// tshigs bsgrangs pa dang sman dang ni/
163b1(sman dpyad): de bzhin rma yi nad rnams dang // lus rengs yan lag skrangs pa dang // skrangs dang gzhang kha'i nad rnams dang // lto ba yi ni nang rnams dang // de bzhin bad kan+da rnams dang // 'theng ba'i nadA ni thams cad la// 'dze
163b2(sman dpyad): nad bad kan las gyur dang // rta gang me drod nyams pa dang // de bzhin 'byung ba mi snyoms dang // mtshan dang rlig pa skrangs pa dang // na du rnams sbyor bar byed pa yin// rgod ma rte'u shor ba la mi chags// gang zhig rtag
163b3(sman dpyad): tu bu 'chi dang // gang zhig rtag tu rlung gi gnod// rgod ma de la'ang sman bas byin// lus kyi stobs dang goms pa dang // me drod che chung shes byas la// nyamo stobs brtan cing gzugs dregs gda'o// khur drang sdug bsngal

165b4(sman dpyad): mkhyen/ 'di ni khyed kyis bshang du gsol// legs thos kyi ni tshig thos nas// sha li ho tr-is sla smras pa// na tshod kyis ni tsha ba yis// skye sna bus sngar ni smras pa yin// sum cu mA lon byar ma yin//

165b6(sman dpyad): mtshon cha yi ni thabs la mkhas// legs par go bgos yan lag bde// de lta bu dag rta la skyon// dz+ha ni rigs bzang legs btags la// 'thab pa brtsed mo'i tshul du sbyar// 'di yi dbang po'i khur po
166a1(sman dpyad): ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// dang por cho ga srang tshad ni// brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yin par bshad// las gcig la ni rjes bsngags pa// de yi srang tshad sum cur bshad// mgo
166a2(sman dpyad): bo 'gebs pa legs brdungs pa// sring tshad sum cu rtsa lngar bshad// brla 'gebasdu pa ni srang brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu nI yin par bshad// lkog ma dang ni rmig pa sogs// bsrung bzhin rgyas par byed pa ni//
166a3(sman dpyad): thams cad srang ni lnga bcu ste// rta mchog la ni de ltar bya// bar ma lA nr-i brgya yis 'bri// chung ngu la ni brgya lnga bcu// ci nas g.yulA du shugs drags pas// 'gro b.rarA mI 'gyur de ltar bya// ralnga gr-i srang tshad nyi
166a4(sman dpyad): shu lnga// g.yon logs su ni gAdags par bya// gzhu nyid srang ni nyi shu lnga// de nyid du ni gdags par bya// g.yas ngos su ni mnga' yi tshogs// brgya po srang ni nyi shu gsum// tshod du phyin pa gdags par
166a5(sman dpyad): bya// phub dang de bzhin thag pa yi// tshad ni 'dir ni nga se ma byas// mdung la'ang tshad cig yod gyur pas// 'di 'dra gdagras zhes de la smras// rta yi rgyab ngu skab bya ba// ri dag sA ri'u ba l-I shA ri ga/ spu
166a6(sman dpyad): gzhan 'jam pa las byas pa// sra zhing shin tu 'jams pa bya// shin tu legs par brtags pa la// sna tshogs mdog ni brgyan par bya// de yi 'brel thag dang bcos pa// srang ni sum cu'i tshad du bya// gdong //
166b1(sman dpyad): brgyan srang ni nye bu lnga// legs par bzlas pa gdugs par bya// glo ni snyems par byed pas na// rgyub tu gnod skye da mi 'gyur bar// lugs la shin tu 'jam pa yi// srad bu la ni legs par bya//
166b2(sman dpyad): yang na pags pa nyes pa 'am// ra bal dkar po la byas pa 'am// der rama? gso me dar la byas// gzhan yong mdzes shing sra la 'jam// stan dang cha byed legs gnas pa'i// rdzas kyi gzo ni du ma bya
166b3(sman dpyad): de bzhin gdong gzin srang tshad ni// bcu dag rna ba'i bar nas gdags// gdong ni legs par bsrung byed pa// shin tu legs pa nyid du bya// ga yi rI ka shin tu snyan+da pa ni// srang re yi nI tshad byas pa// sra
166b4(sman dpyad): zhing lus ni bstan bla deg/ rnga ba'i ngos nas gdags par bya// de lhur thams cad rtags nas ni// de rjes rtu la zhon par bya// g.yul du N+Da yi bskur bye ba'o// khur dag bdag gis bshad pa yin//
166b5(sman dpyad): shwa li ho tra gsadI ba'i gnas tre brgyad pa las/ go chu la sogs pa'i khur bstan pa zhes bya'o// // de nas shing rta dang sbyar ba'i// nges ba dI yis bshad par bya// r+d+ha ni gang gi mchu ltag+ma na//
166b6(sman dpyad): shin tu shes pa'i mtshan ma yod// ba dan bzang po 'am zla ba rgyas// nya dang rgyal mtshan yod gyur pa// rta de rtag tu bsngags pa yin// de 'dra'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i// rta ni sa steng shis
167a1(sman dpyad): pAr bshad// da dra tshul bzang zhing bu bzang la// skad ni rung dang 'dra gyur pa// rta de rgyal po la shes pas// rigs mthun shing rta la sbyar bya// mdog dang tshad ni mtshungs gyur cing // stob
167a2(sman dpyad): ldan nyon mongs bzod pa shis// 'thab bu'i tshe ni mi skrag cing // 'dres pa na yang mi 'then la// mda' dang dbyig pa mdung sogs kyis// rgyab pa na ni sran che ba// de 'dra ba yi NA dag ni// ge yul gyi dus su
167a3(sman dpyad): bsngags pa yin// rna bar bzlas pa'i tshe na ni// mig las mchi ma 'byin byed cing // spu sbubs shin tu rgyas byas nas// nyi ma la yang lta bar byed// rkang pa g.yas pa sa la ni// yang dang yang du rdeb par
167a4(sman dpyad): byed/ |'di ni skye ba dran pa yi// mtshan nyid dang ldan mchog tu bsha // dau las zhan po'i rta ngan dag/ shing rti la yang sbyar mi bya// legs thos rnam pa thams cad du// rna bar bzlas la brtag par bya/
167a5(sman dpyad): sngon tshe nga yis ji ltar thos// rna bar bzlas pa gang gis ni// rte ni shin tu rigs ldan byung // don mring mI 'gyur de mnyam gyis// shing rta yan lag kun+da ldan zhing // 'khor lo legs brir brtagasra ba drang //
167a6(sman dpyad): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng // shin tu rdzogs pa nyid du sbyar// legs par sbrel zhing shin tu phyis// nyi ma lta pur gzi mdangs ldan// rigs dang mtshan nyid bzang ba yin// rta bzhi dang ni yang
167b1(sman dpyad): dag ldan// kha lo bsgyur ba bzang por bcas// 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra sgrogs pa// shIng rnga dwe ni legs gnas pa// shar phyogs su ni khA bstan bzhag/ g.yas su bskor zhing bkra shis drang // shis par brjod pa
167b2(sman dpyad): legs par bya// de ni rna ba g.yas pa ni// sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod par bya// khyod ni dri za'i rigs su skyes// rigs sun par ni ma byed cig/ khyed ni dngul las byung gyur zhing // dpal mo'i lag tu gnas na 'phel//
167b3(sman dpyad): me yi bu nyid khyod dran byos// ko sdu pa'i nor bu'ang sngon// 'o ma'i mtsho los bdud rtsi'i phyir// lha dang lha min gyis bsrubs tshe// dang po u tsau sra ba byung // de las khyed skyes dran par gyis// shugs mchog ston de nga
167b4(sman dpyad): yis ni// dgra dpung ma lus rgyal gyis// tshangs pa dang ni zla ba dang // chu lha yi ni bden tshig dang // nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid dang // de bzhin drang srong dka' thub dang // stobs bzang gi ni tshangs spyod dang // de bzhin rlung
167b5(sman dpyad): gi shugs nyid dang // me nyid kyi ni nus mthu yis// rta khyod rgyal ba skyed gyur cig/ 'thab pa'i tshe na rta khyod kyi// gal te ldog par 'gro 'gyur na// bram ze pha ma gsod 'dra yi// nyes de khyod kyis thos par 'gyur//
167b6(sman dpyad): gal te g.yul las rgyal gyur na// bdag po'i bde ba nyid skyed byed// oM na ma/ A di t+ya ya u pa yau ga ga ga sUhA// rta yi rna ba g.yas par ni// 'thab pa'i tshe na brjod gyur na// skye ba dran pa tsam gyis ni// don
168a1(sman dpyad): med snying ngu 'gyur ma yin// de 'dra'i stobs dang snying stobs ldan// rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rdung zhugs// go bgos mtshon char brtson pa yul 'khor 'jigs pa las skyabs bya// sha li ho tra gsang ba'i
168a2(sman dpyad): gnas te brgyad ba las// shing rta sbyar ba'i cho ga'o// de nas rnam par bzlas bya ba// gleng zhig shes pa tsam+ba gyis ni// sngon gyi skye ba dran byed pa// // bu li mtshan nyid 'odi dag ni// dang por nga las
168a3(sman dpyad): mnyan par gyis// s+thAm na so ba b+h+ra dwe nas// so mas bA r+yA na sA tsa// oM dzaM s+tha tse mo ba sud+d+ha sa// mA ni na ma ta pa pe tA ta// d+ha tra saM b+ha ma \u0f7f a b+hu b+he na phu Sha shas// ba d+ha sa trama? r+Na gA ma// oM
168a4(sman dpyad): yA ya ya yA/ gA gA ga~M ga swAhA/ 'od ni bdag nyid chen po nau// rta yi snying por gyur pa yin// g.yul gyi dus su dran bya yi// ba shing gi babs nag zhon napa ni// 'ag
168a5(sman dpyad): shig/ rang gi don gyi phyir// rmongs pas bdag nyid skyob byed kyi// legs thos rta yi lus yan lag/ legs par srung bri mi byed ma/ bar 'gru snang bam+b+ha pa
168a6(sman dpyad): gnas par byed/ rnga lo ga zhing ma bskyon yang// bdag nyid kyi rkyen zhon byung pa// mang du bshad pas ci zhig bya/ 'i sdig pa/ sa tan gyi ga
168b1(sman dpyad): rta tshe'i rig byed la mkhas pa// legs ldan sha li ho tra yis// 'di skad ces bstan smras pa yin// sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ rnam par bzlas pa bstan pa'o// drang srong chen po sha li ho tras yang
168b2(sman dpyad): dag par bsdus pa'i rta'i tshe'i rigs bying mtha' dag rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyas pa rdzog so// rgyu gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya/ d+harma shrI b+ha dra/ bud+d+ha shrI shan+ti dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen po bzang
168b3(sman dpyad): bos bstA cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / dpal ldan rgyal po'i rgyal ba tshe// mi dbyung mnga' bdag ces grags pa// btsod pa'i dus 'byungs kAr kyang // dmya ba'i spyod pa kun dang ldan// khyod ni thams cad mkhyen
168b4(sman dpyad): dud cing // khyed lnga bzod dang bden sgyogs mnga'// khyed la yon tan kun gnas pa// khyod nyid ston par 'os pa dang // khyed la mkhas dang rgyal phran gnon// brim ze skyong mo pa rnams kyis// rang re gsor gyi dbang phyug tu// rgyus
168b5(sman dpyad): chen khyed ni gcig tu bsgrags// mi dbang rgyal po dgyes pa dang // gso dpyad kyis gzhan phan gdags phyir// bka' yis bskul bas gzhung rgyas 'di// bod kyi rang skad spyod yul byas// chos ldan gzhung lugs la mAkha
168b6(sman dpyad): byas// sa rnams legs par spyong mdzad cing // yon tran phran tsho gros kun ldan pas// skye dgu yun ring rgyang bar mdzod// drang skyong shes pa rgya mtsho'i pha mthar phyin// mngon shes lnga ldan yon tan phran tshogs pa'i// sha li
169a1(sman dpyad): ho tras tshangs pa las thos nas// rta yi tshe'i rig byed gang brtsams te// yul mtho sa gtsang 'dzam gling dkyil sgang na// mi rje lhas mdzad par rgyal btsun po gdung // byang chub sems pa'i sbrul
169a2(sman dpyad): ba'i rgyud du 'khrungs// mtha' bzhi'i rgyal po gzhan las khyad par 'phags// mkhyen pa'i gting phyin gso dpyad kun la'ang mkhas// sa yi bdag po seng ge'i gzi byin gyis// rgyal phran gleng chen myos pa'i dregs
169a3(sman dpyad): 'phrog pa// mi dbang bkra shis lha lnga btsan gyi bkas// gsang sngags phyi rol phyin dang bden po yI// lgang dang rig pa'i bstan bcos kun la mkhas// skye 'gro dam pa mi drang mgyogs 'gro yi// tshe yi
169a4(sman dpyad): rig byed kun kyang zhugs slad ngu// sman la snying brtse brag yod khrel la sogs// gtod la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan// mi shes brda' sprod sgra bsgyur lots+tsha bas// lha mi skal ba can gyis mchod pa'i
169a5(sman dpyad): gnas// rin chen kun la yod kyang bzang po med// rin chen sngon 'gro bzang pos mtha' brgyan pa// gus pa sngon 'gro'i bka' yis rab bskul bas// sgro dang mtshan ma'i bstan bcos la mkhas pas//
169a6(sman dpyad): rgya gar mkhan po sangs rgyas zhing dpal dang // rta dpyad sha l-i ho tras bsdus pa bsgyur// 'di ni dbang po'i rdo rjes sdebs tshul du// tshigs bcad phyed dang bdun du byas pa'o// /
169b1(sman dpyad): oM ye ta rmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tud+he ShAn ta thag to h+ya ba da ta te ShAny+tsa mo ni ro d+ha me waM wA ng+gi mahA sha ma Na swA hA/ tshul 'di'i rgyal brtan yun ring 'phel bar glon// sam lan yaM/
170a1(sman dpyad): sran pyad gces grub ces bya ba le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa bzhugs/
170b1(sman dpyad): rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha sa ra/ bod skad du/ sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba// / bam po dang po'o// sman dpyad kyi gzhung 'di la le'u bsdus pa sum cu rtsa gcig yod de/ rgyud
170b2(sman dpyad): kyi le'u dang / sman gyi sde tshan gyi le'u dang / zas kyi le'u dang / 'chi ltas kyi le'u drang / rims kyi le'u dang / 'khru ba'i le'u dang / khrag lung pa'i le'u dang / gcong chen po'i le'u dang / skran gyi 'u dang dmu rdzing gi ladra dathA gaucin
170b3(sman dpyad): snyi ba'i le'u dang / mdze nad kyi le'u dang / gzhang 'brum dang / mtshan par rdol ba'i le'u dang / skya rbab kyi le'u dang / skyigs bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i le'u dang / lud pa'i le'u dang / skyug pa dang / skems pa'i le'u
170b4(sman dpyad): drang/ gtsin+da sri ba'i le'u dang / rtug skam gyi le'u dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed kyi le'u dang / rlung nad kyi le'u dang / tshong nad kyi le'u dang / me dpal gyi le'u dang / skrangs pa'i le'u dang // rma gso ba'i le'u dang /
170b5(sman dpyad): mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u dang / dug gso pa'i rgyud kyi le'u dang / sman bcud kyi len dang / ro tse ba'i rgyud kyi le'u dang / byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u dang / las rnam lnga'i le'u dang / cho ga'i le'u rnams so// bgrod par
170b6(sman dpyad): dka' bas bsrungs pa'i bus// kun phan kun mkhyen phyag btsal te// yang dag phan pa gces grub 'di// nyi mas bsrungs pas bshad par bya// blo chung ngu gang dag tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho brgal bar mi nus
171a1(sman dpyad): pa de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyud kyi gzhung 'grol bar 'di byas so// tshe 'dzin pa'i rig byed 'di ni// tshangs pas mtho ris su bshad do// rim gyis yul ku shi'i rgyal pos ma
171a2(sman dpyad): rnams la bshad do// de la rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ 'di'i ya na lag nr-i mig sman dang / lus gso ba dang / gdon bsol ba dang / mtshon zug rngu dbyung ba deng / dug las bsrung ba dang / tshe bsrung ba dang / byas
171a3(sman dpyad): pa bsrung ba dang / khu chu 'phel bar bya ba'o// 'byung ba chen po'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin can gyi mi ni/ nad kyi gzhi yin te/ de yang lus kyi na dang / sems kyi na da dang / glo bur gyi nad dang / lhan cig skyes
171a4(sman dpyad): pa'i nang rnams yin par 'dod do// de la lus kyi nang ni rims dang / mdzel sogs pa'o// sems kyi nang ni khro ba la sogs bya'o// glo bur gyi nAng ni gland pa las byung ba'i nAd do// lhan cig skyes pa'i nod ni
171a5(sman dpyad): bkres pa dang / skom pa dang rga ba la sogs pa'o// dus+yA ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste mig 'dzum pa'i yud tsam la sogs pa'i mtshan ma can no// de'i rgyun gyi rnam pa dbye bya ni/ dus tshigs rnam drug tu bshad de//
171a6(sman dpyad): de la dbyar zla tha chung dang / ston zla ra ba gnyis ni dbyar gyi dus so// ston zla 'bring po dang / ston zla tha chung gnyis ni ston gyi dus so// dgun zla ra ba dang / dgun zla 'bring po gnyis ni dgun gyi dus so// dgun zla tha/
171b1(sman dpyad): chung dang / dpyid zla ra gnyis ni dgun smad kyi dus so// dpyid zla 'bring po dang / dpyid zla tha chung gnyis ni dpyid kyi dus so// dbyar zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po gnyis ni sos ka'i dus so// nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba dang
171b2(sman dpyad): sgro phyogs su 'gro zhing lam gnyis su 'jug pa'i phyir/ de la char 'bab pa glang ba'i dus dang / tsha bo'i du su dang gyur pa'o// char 'bab pA dang / grang ba dang / che ba'i dus su mkhris pa dang / bAd kan dang / rlung rnams gsog cing /
171b3(sman dpyad): ston dang dpyid dang dbyar 'khrug par gyur te/ nad kyi grangs dang / dus kyi grangs rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro// rlung nud ni phye 'bred kyi dus dang / kha zas zhu ba'i mjug tu ldang ngo // mkhris pa'i nad ni nyi ma'i gung dang / nam+b+ha phyed
171b4(sman dpyad): dang / kha zos 'ju ba'i tshe ldang ngo // bAd kan nI zas zos ma thag dang / srong dang / snga d+mo ldang ngo // de bzhin du gnyis kyi cha 'dus pa dang / gsum g+hi cha 'dus pa'i bye breg gi nad gzhi 'khrug pa sbyar bar bya'o// nang go'i
171b5(sman dpyad): dang lus zungs dang / dri ma'i gnas kyi lus zhes bya ste/ de dag cha mnyam na ni nad med dri/ shas chu chung ngu gyur na nI nang du 'gyur ro// dwe la na bzhi ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams so// lus zungs ni bdun te/
171b6(sman dpyad): dngas ma dang / khrag dang / sha dang / tshil dang / rusaM pa dang / rkang dang / khu chu rnams so// dri ma ni phyis dang / gcin dang / rdul la sogs pa'o// rlung ni grang ba dang / yang ba dang / che phra ba dang / mkhrang ba dang / rtsub pa
172a1(sman dpyad): dang / mi brtan pa dang / stobs che ba dang / dbugs rgyu bar byed pa dang / ngag 'byung bar byed pa dang / legs par 'jog pa dang / bskyod pa dang / dri ma 'byin pa rnams kyi bye brag dang ldan pa'o//
172a2(sman dpyad): mkhris pa ni sgyur ba dang / ro tsha ba dang / drod tsha 'un ru ru byed pa dang / 'dzug par byed pa dang / mdangos bskyed pa dang / bzhin mdog dmar ba'i rgyu byed pa'o// bad kan nI mngar bau dang / lan tshwa'i ro bro ba dang / 'jam
172a3(sman dpyad): pa dang / lci ba dang / shin tu 'byil ba'o// rlung ni gzhang dang / sgyu do dang / 'dod mo'i bar gyi nang na gnas so// mkhris pa ni long ga'i nang ni gnas so// bad kan ni pho ba dang / lkog ma dang / mthong ga dang /
172a4(sman dpyad): mgo dang tshigs rnas kyi nang na gnas so// nad gzhi rnams nor bar byung na/ gnas de nyid kyi cho ga bzhin du bya'o// tshabs che bar gyur na yang bye brag phyed par byas la/ cho gar bya ba bsgyur te bya'o// mngar ba la sogs
172a5(sman dpyad): pa ro rnam pa drug pa rnams kyang / nad gzhi de dag gi bye brag las nad med pa'i rgyu gang yin pa rtag tu bza' bar bya'o// de ltar ma byas na nang du 'gyur ro// tsha ba dang kha ba dang / bsko ba rnams kyis ni rlung 'khrug
172a6(sman dpyad): pabapar 'gyur ro// tsha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tshwa rnams kyis ni mkhris pa 'khrug par 'gyur ro// mngar ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tshwa rnams kyis ni pang kan 'khrug par 'gyur ro// nang gzhi ngo dag ni
172b1(sman dpyad): bar bya ba'i phyir de dag las ldog ste/ zos na nad yod pa rnams ni sos par 'gyur ro// nad med pa rnams la ni bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// ro mngar pa ni mig la phan te/ lus zungs 'phel bar byed do// sgyur ba ni phyi
172b2(sman dpyad): s+ya bau shang po 'khru bar byed/ snyid la phan pa dang / zas 'ju ba dang / tshos par byed cing drod skyed par byed do// lan tshwa ni'i khru ba dang / tshos par byed pa dang / 'ju ba dang / sha slo bar byed do// tsha bA sha che ba dang
172b3(sman dpyad): snyoms pa dang / dug rnams sel cing drod bskyed cing tshos par byed do// kha pa ni rims dang / sbom po'i nad sel ba dang / drod bskyed pra dang / 'khru bar byed de yi ga 'byed par byed do// bska ba ni sha na bAr byed pa
172b4(sman dpyad): sha 'bri ba dang / rtug skams su byed/ 'khru ba gcod rma btso bar byed do// sman ni ro dang nus pa dang / zhu ba rnams kyi rton yin pas na gtso bo yin no// ro la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang / phyi ma phyi ma
172b5(sman dpyad): la/ snga ma snga ma ldan par yod pas ne/ phyi ma phyi ma la gtso bo yin no// de la nus pa ni ro zhu bar ma gyur pa'i bar ma la byas te/ rdzas lnga gnas shing brten la/ grang ba dang tsha ba'i mtshan nyid do// yang ni rdzas kyi
172b6(sman dpyad): mthu nyid la yang bya'o// ro rnams ni zhu ba'i 'og tu mngar ba dang / tsha ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi nang na snga ma ni lci/ phyi ma ni yang ngo // sman pa dang / sman dang / nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang /
173a1(sman dpyad): 'di bzhir ldan pa ni gso ba'i yan lag yin te/ de dag dang mi ldan pa ni mi 'grub pa yin no// de la sman pa'i yan lag ni sman dpyad kyi yi ge kha ton du bslabs shing don shes pa dang / sman gyi
173a2(sman dpyad): las shes pa dang / lag gsod pa dang / gtsang zhing re ba med pa'o// nad pa'i yan lag ni nor dang ldan pa dang / tshe ma zad pa dang / snying stobs dang ldan po dang / rang nyam dang ldan pa gsor rung ngo // sman gyi yin lags
173a3(sman dpyad): ni sa bzang po nas skyes pa dang / ro che ba dang / mchog tu gyur pa dang / dus su legs par brngas pa'o// nang g.yog gi yan lag ni gtsang zhing re ba med pa dang / yi rangs pa dang / bag yod pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa'o//
173a4(sman dpyad): sman btang ba'i lasau byA na/ yul dang / dus dang / na tshod dang / me drod dang / goms pa dang / rlung bzhin dang / sman dang / lus dang / snying sto'i sA dang / nyams stobs dang / nad dang 'di rnams mthong nas gdong bya'o//
173a5(sman dpyad): dr-i la yul ni chu mang po/ nags ri can nI gsher ba'i phyogs zhes bya ste/ bad kan dang rlung gi nad bskyed do// sman ni chu nyung zhing shing nyung ba'i yul te/ khrag las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad bskyed
173a6(sman dpyad): do// yul skam gsher gyi cha 'dren ma ni nad kyang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// na tshod kyang rnam pa gsum ste/ byis pa dang / bar ma dang / rgan po'o// de la lo gcig gi bar du 'o ma dang / kha zas kyi 'tsho ba nas/

173b2(sman dpyad): dus sor sbyar ro// byis pa dang / rnon po la ni thul sman+de ba dang / me btsa' dang / gr-it+tar ka lta bu'i dpyang drug po mi b+h+yo bar dpyad 'jam+b+ha bo byA'i// lus kyi bye brag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'dod de/ lus skem pa la nI
173b3(sman dpyad): sha bskyed par bya'o// sha che ba la ni shaM dbri ba'i sman bya'o// lus kyi sha ran pA la ni mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o// nyam sA stobs ni la l+r-i sha che la/ nya mos stobs chung ba yang yod/ la la sha skem la nyams stobs

179b1(sman dpyad): mar las byung / sman gyi khru bzhin 'gyur du b+has te skol lnga/ sman gyi khu ba du nas/ spyan gyi phye ma legs par 'dres par gyur na tshos pa yin no// de lnga btung ba dang / mas btang ba gnyis ni 'dra ste/ tshos ran tsam du bya'o// lus
179b2(sman dpyad): bsku ba ni chos rab tu bya'o// snar blugs pa ni tshos pa nyid du mi bya ste/ gsum char yang btsigs nas spyad par bya ba 'di ni// spyi'i cho gar bstan pa yin no// sman gyi sde tshan gyi le'u gnyis pa'o// // kha zas dang / btung ba
179b3(sman dpyad): ma gtogs par/ 'gro ba rnams kyi 'tsho ba gzhan med pA'i phyir/ de'i phan+ya gnod kyi bye brag nges par bshad do// de la 'bras l+r-i shun lpags dmar po dang / sa lu chen po dang / sa lu ka lA ma rnams ni mAr bA yin te/ khu rgu
179b4(sman dpyad): mang bar byed pa dang / snum pa dang / 'phyen chung zhing / phyis nyung bar byed do// de'i nang na yang sa lu shun lpags dmar po ni/ nad gzhi gsum 'joms par byed cing sgom pa'i nad dang / tshil rgyas pa'i nad sel to// sa lu
179b5(sman dpyad): chen po mchog tu ro tsa bar byed do// sA lu ka la ma ni bad kan dang / mkhris pa sel to// 'bras zhag drug nus smin pA dkar po ni ro mngar la bsil zhing lci ba yin te/ nad gzhi gsum 'joms par byed do// 'bras zhag
179b6(sman dpyad): drug cu sin pa shun lpags nag po ni/ snga ma las ro dang / zhu ba'i mthu cung zad tsam gyis chung ngo // khre rgod ni rtsub pa yin te/ skem par byed cing rlung bskyed la/ bad kan dang / mkhris pa sel to// khre dang tsi tse dang ko ra
180a1(sman dpyad): dri rnams kyang d+he dang 'dra bar bshad do// nas ni bsil ba yin te/ 'phyen che zhing phyi sa mang la/ mkhris pa dang bad kan+da sel bar byed do// gro ni bsil zhing lci lnga mngar ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed la rlung sel to//
180a2(sman dpyad): mon sran ste'u nI/ bska zhing mngar ba yin te/ yang la bang kan dang mkhris pa dang / khrag nAd sel to// mon sran gre'u nI snum zhing lci la drod che ste/ 'dzag sgo dgu'i dri ma mang ba dang / ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel to//
180a3(sman dpyad): mon sranra dkar po ni/ ro tsa prar mI byed cing / bad kan dang / mkhris pa sel lA/ rlung gri nyam thag par byed do// / rgya sran ni dbugs mi bde ba dang / skyigs bu dang / gzhang 'brum dang / bad kana? dang / khu chu dang rlung
180a4(sman dpyad): sel lo// mon sran nA gu nI/ bsil ba yin te/ khrug lung pa'i rims sel zhing / phyi sa 'gags par byed do// mon sran tsA na ni/ nyal po la zhan par byed cing khrag gi nang dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa sel lo/ rlung bskyed
180a5(sman dpyad): pabapar byed do// snyan chung ni bsgyel zhing ro mngar te/ phyi sa 'gug par byed cing / bad kan dang / mkhris pa sol to// sran chung ni sran rlung dang 'dra bar bshad do// ce sran yang de dang 'dra ba las/ lhag par rlung bskyed pa
180a6(sman dpyad): byed do// til ni thal ba'i ro bro ba dang / mngar zhing kha la drong che ste/ nyam stobs dang / mkhris pa bskyed do// spyir na gang bu can sna tshogs rnams ni/ bsil zhing rtsub pa yin te/ nyam stobs 'bri bar byed do// da na sha'i bye
180b1(sman dpyad): brag bshad de/ ra sha nri ha cang bsil ba yang ma yin/ ha cang lci ba yang ma yin/ ha cang sdum pa yang ma yin te/ nad gzhi bskyed par mi byed cing spel bar byed do// lug sha ni mngar zhing bsil la/ lci ba yin te/ phyi sa 'gag
180b2(sman dpyad): pa dang / sha skye bar byed do// ma he'i sha ni sdum zhing lci ba yin te/ gnyid 'ong bAr byed li/ khu chu mang bar byed cing / sha skye bor byed do// pha gA sha ni lci ba yauna? te/ ro tsA bar byed cing rlung sel la/ rdul snyi bar byed do// ri bong
180b3(sman dpyad): gi sha ni me drod bskyed cing / bad kan+da dang mkhris pa sel la/ rlung ni bskyed brir mi byed de tha rgyal ba'o// khar go sol gyi shi ni bsil ba yin twe/ nAng gzhi gsum spel zhing / phyi swo dang gcin sri ber byed do// rma bya'i sha nI
180b4(sman dpyad): rlung sel zhing // rna bo gsang ba dang / mig rno ba dang / shA mdog bzang ba dang / skad snyan po dang / khu chu 'phel bar byed do// byA gag gi sha ni/ snum zhing lci la drod che ba yinA te/ rlung sel cing ro tsa bar byed dro// sreg pa'i sha ni/
180b5(sman dpyad): hatsAng lci bA yang ma yin/ ha cang drod che bA yang ma yin/ ha cang mngar ba yang ma yin te/ nang gzhi thams cad spel tr-i// 'ur ba dang / co ga dang / brda ka rnams kyi shra ni/ drod bskyed cing 'dus pa'i nad srel to//
180b6(sman dpyad): mchil ba'i sha ni/ 'dus pa'i nang sel cing / bang kan dang / khu chu 'phel bar byed do// gong ma sreg gi sha ni bsil zhing yang ba yin te/ bang kan dang / khrag lung pa'i nang sel to// phug ron gyi sha ni bsil zhing lci ba
181a1(sman dpyad): yin te/ khrag lud pa'i nad sel to// pug rlon sngon po dang / thi ba'i sha ni de las cung zad tsam gyis yang ngo // chu byA rnams kyi shu rnams kyi sha nI/ snum zhing drong che la lci ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed cing rlung
181a2(sman dpyad): sel to// de dag gi nAng na/ bya dang ba'i sha ni ro tsa bar byed cing / shas cher rlung sel do// ny+dza sha ni snum la drod che zhing / lci ba yin traM/ rlung sel cing mkhris pa'i nad dang / khrag lus pa'i nad bskyod do// chu'i
181a3(sman dpyad): srogs chags bu lu ki dang / rus sbrul dang / karka Ta rnams kyi sha ni rlung dang / mo khris pa sel zhing // ro tsi par byed do// / da ni ldumo dang sdad kyi bye brag bshad de/ lduma? ka ka ma tsi ni/ nad gzhi gsum sel to//
181a4(sman dpyad): ka la ma ni nu zho 'phel ba dang / ro tsa bar byed do// tse gI ri ni pad+ma kan dang / rlung sel to// yungs kAr gyi lo mas ni nang gzhi thams cad bskyed do// rgya sno'u dang sne'u tshul lI dang / sne'u rgod dang / mon sne'u du mar
181a5(sman dpyad): ru dang / 'di rnams ni rlung drang / bad kan saul zhing / phyi sa bde bar 'byung ba dang / khrag lud pa'i nad med par byed do// la phug rjen pa ni nad gzhi bskyed par byed do// btsos pa ni rlung dang / badra kana? sel to//
181a6(sman dpyad): la phug gzhon nu ni nad gzhi thams cad sel zhing // snying dang lkog ma la phan no// karko Ta ka dang / pArta ka dang / pa to la dang / marme la ka dang / 'di rnams ni/ mdze dang gcin nang dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang /
181b1(sman dpyad): lu pa / mkhris pa dang / bad+ma kan sel to// ku sh+ma ma TA ni/ nang gzhi thams cad sel zhing / snying la phyan te chu so sbyong ngo // kA li 'i 'bras bu dang / ku ba ni mkhris pa sel zhing / rlung bskyed do// grus dang / ga
181b2(sman dpyad): gon ni/ rlung dang / bad kan bskyed la/ mkhris pa sAlA to// skrig mde'u dang / nye'u shring dang s+pha'i to r+No dang / kau bu ka dang / 'di rnams ni pang kan dang / mkhris pa sel to// pad+ma'i sha paM dang / shA lu ki dang / shrI gA Ta
181b3(sman dpyad): da ma lu ka dang / ka she ru kaM dang / 'di rnams ni lci zhing posil te/ khrag lud pa'i na da sel zhing / ro tsa ba dang / nu zho 'phel bar byed do// / da ni shing tog gi bye brag bshad de/ bal po se'u ni phyi sa sri bar
181b4(sman dpyad): byed cing // 'khru ba gnod/ rlung sel la/ da kan dang mkhris pa dang yang mI 'phrod pa ma yin no// skyu ru rA ne de drang 'ang ba lIs mos pa'i rjes la ro mngar bar 'gyur zhing / nang gni rig pa dang 'khru ba dang /
181b5(sman dpyad): bar byed do// kha lung ni sbyin dang // rlung dang // bad kan dang // dbugs i bde ba dang / lung pa rnams sel to// biSh+ka'i nga tog smin pa naM/ lci ba yin te// phye sa sri bar byed cing // nad gzhi dang // dug sel
181b6(sman dpyad): to/ shing tog a mra ni rlung sel ni nga / sha skye ba dang / khu chu 'phel ba dang / sha mdog bzang ba dang / nyams stobs skye bar byed do// dzam+bu'i shing tog ni/ rlung spyi bar byed yo da kan dang mkhris pa sel te/
182a1(sman dpyad): d+his sri zhing spro bar byed do// tIn+na ka'i 'bras busa? ni/ bad kan dang mkhris pa sel to// rgya shug gi shing tog ni/ rlung dang mkhriswa pa sA lA to// biShaDI shing tog nI/ rlung bskyed cing thung ngu mi 'a
182a2(sman dpyad): bar byed do// bi ya la'i shing tog ni rlung sel to// shing ta la dang / rA dzA da na dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu dang / pa na sa dang / na li ke re rnams kyi shing tog ni/ mngar zhing snum la lci ba yin te/ khu chu dang shA skye bar
182a3(sman dpyad): byed do// rgun dang / ma d+hu ka dang / byA go dang / taM pal dang / pa ru sha ka dang / 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang / khrag gi nad sel lA/ phyi sa bde bar 'byung bar byed do// sha mi'i shing tog gi so skra
182a4(sman dpyad): 'byi bar byed do// ko sha ma mra dang / nyo tA dang / dan+ta sha thA dung / kArma dza dang / shing tog 'di rnams ni/ khrag lung pa'i nad bskyed par shes par bya'o// pi lce'i shing trog ni sbyin sas lo// / dA ni spod kyi
182a5(sman dpyad): brag bshod de/ bca' sga dang / na le sham dang / pi bi ling ni bad kan dang rlung sel to// de la na lde sham ni ro tsa bar mi byed do// bca' sgra dang bi bi ling gnyis ro tsA bar byed // shing kun ni/ snyun dang gce
182a6(sman dpyad): ba dang / phyi sa 'gags pa sel cing / rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed do// la la phung dang / 'o su'i 'bras bu dang / go stong ni rlung dang / bad kan sel ba'i mchog yin no// / da ni lan tshwa'i bye brag
182b1(sman dpyad): bshad de/ rgyam tsha ni mig la phan zhing ro tsa bar byed la/ nad gzhi gsum zhi bar byed do// kha ru tsu nI drod che ste/ phyi sa 'gag pa dang / snying na ba sel to// tsa ba ru tshwa ni drod che zhidra rno ba yin te/ snying na bu sel
182b2(sman dpyad): zhing / rlung dang 'phrod do// tsha kha da ni/ de dang 'dra ba las cung zad tsam gyis mthu chung ngo // rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa ni lci ba yin tre/ kha zas 'drul bar byed do// nas tshig 'khus pa'i thil ba ni/ dug dang / snying na ba
182b3(sman dpyad): dang skya rba ba dang / lkog ma'i nAd sel cing / me'i drod bskyed do// swa tsi ka'i thal ba ni/ rno ba yin te/ lus tsha bar byed cing / khong pa'i drod bskyed la/ pags pa 'jig par byed do// // da ni btung
182b4(sman dpyad): pa'i bye brag bshang de/ char ba'i chu ni yang ba yin te/ nad gzhi sel zhing snying+ga la phan te/ dug sel to// char pA'i chu sa gzhi dang / snod sna tshogs tha dad pra dang / phrad pa las no// de'i ro'i bye brag dang / mthu
182b5(sman dpyad): yang tha dad bar 'gyur ro// 'bab chu ni rtsub pa yin te rlung bskyed do// mtsho'i chu ni mngar la yang ngo // rdzing bu'i chu ni rlung dang bad kan sel to// lteng ka'i chu ni rlung bskyed do// chu mig gi chu nr-i rtsub pA yin te/
182b6(sman dpyad): me'i drod bskyed do// brag mthon po'i kha nas bab pa'i chu ni yang zhing pad kan sel to// khron pa'i chu ni drod che bar byed cing / rlung bskyed do// chu mig 'phar ba'i chu na mkhris pa sel to// chu snyog cing srin bu dang /
183a1(sman dpyad): nya cig yod de/ ma rung bar gyur cing / nyi ma mi mthong ba'i chu ni blang bar myi bya'o// skyon de dag med pa'i chu ni blang bar bya'o// chu sgrol bya ni rims dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / tshil rgyus
183a2(sman dpyad): ba'i nad dang / rlung drang / bad kan sel to// chu skol te bsgrangs pas ni na du gzhi gsum sel lo// de nyid zhag lon par byas na nad gzhi bskyed par byud do// // da ni 'o ma'i bye brag bshad de/ ba'i 'o ma
183a3(sman dpyad): ni snum zhing lci ba yin te/ rlung dang mkhris pa srel zhing tshe ring bar byed do// ma hai'i 'o ma ni pa'i 'o ma bas lci zhing snum+ba bya yin te/ bye brag tu dr-id 'bri bar byed do// ra'i 'o mas nI khrag tshad sel zhing
183a4(sman dpyad): lung pa dAd+ya/ skem pa dang / rims med par byed la/ dreg na bi'o steng du blugs na drug med par 'gyur ro// lug gi 'o mas ni mkhris pa dang / bad kan bskyod do// rnga mo'i 'o mas ni skrang ba dang / dmu rdzing

183a6(sman dpyad): sel to// zho ni nyams stobs bskyed cing rlung sel to/ ro tsa bar byed la/ mkhris pa dang / bad kan bskyed do// zho ma longs pa ni nang gzhi gsum bskyed do// zho kha chu ni 'dzag sgo skyong bar byed do// mar ni pho ba'i
183b1(sman dpyad): nad dang gzhang 'brum dang / bzhin g.yo ba dang / mjing ba yo ba'i nad sel to// 'o ma las sna gzhan du bsgyur ba/ phyur ba la sogs pa ni lci ba yin te/ mdze nad kyi rgyur 'gyur ro// dar ba'i ro ma ni/ nad gzhi gsum

183b3(sman dpyad): yang phan la/ de sman gzhan dang sbyar na/ nad gzhi gsum yang sel por byed/ mar rnying pa ni brjod byed dang / smyo ba dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / brgyal ba rnams sel to// ra la sogs pa'i mar ni/ so so'i 'o ma'i yon tan

184a5(sman dpyad): rtsi'i kha re ni rtsub pa yin te/ tshimo par byed cing skyug pa dang / 'khru ba sel to// // da ni chang gi bye brag bshad de/ chang ngo cog ni mkhris pa bskyed la skur pa'i phyir na/ ba / na dAng rlung sal te/ ran cing tshod zin par
184a6(sman dpyad): 'thungs na/ drod bskyed cing dga' bar byed pa dang / nyams stobs bskyed do// de ltar ma byas na dug tu 'gyur ro// de la 'bru'i chang ni gzhang 'bum la phan te/ skem skye bar byed gi ge rlung sel/ bu ram chang ni 'khru
184b1(sman dpyad): bar byed cing / sbyin par byed do// bu ram shing gri chung ni brang kun dang / tshil rgyas pa'i nang spel to// dun nang ni rlung dang mchis ba sal to// ma du kA'i ma tog gi dzAdA ni d+hU ba bA yAn te/ rlung dang mkhris pa bskyed du//
184b2(sman dpyad): tshwa dang rtsubs kyi rigs su gtog sdu pa rnams ni/ rno ba yin+da te/ khrug lung ba'i rang bskyed do// da ni thug pa'i bye brag bshad de/ 'bras rjes te btagus pa'i thug pa ni sbyin par byed cing // drong bskyed de phar

185b5(sman dpyad): snum brag dang dron po dga'o// mkhris pa can la ni tshal nan du mngar ba dang bsil ba dag ro// bad kan can la ni tshal nan du rtsub pa dang / dro bag dge'o// nad khrod skem yod pa la ni/ tshil n+yan du sha khu bzang ngo // bud
185b6(sman dpyad): mod kyis dub pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / smyung bas dub pa dang / mang du smras pas dub pa dang / tsha bas gdungs pa sa dub pa dang / de rnams la ni tshal nan du 'o ma bzang ngo // sha che ba la ni tshal
186a1(sman dpyad): nan du sbrang rtsi dang chu sbyar ba bzang ngo // rid pa la ni tshal nun du chang bzang ngo // glo 'grams pa dang / skad 'gags pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lung pa dang / skyigs bu dang
186a2(sman dpyad): mchil ma mang du 'byung ba dang / nam tshod yan chad kyi nad kyis nyam thag pa la ni/ tshal nan 'thungs nA mi bzang ngo // de ltar kha zas dang btung bla rnams gzhung la brten te/ ci rigs par sbyar na/
186a3(sman dpyad): nad pa yang 'tsho la/ sman pa de 'ang 'jig rten na grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// zas lci ba ni nyung ngu bza'/ zas yang ba ni mang du za zhing / dus dang / me'i drod dang / tshod shes par sbyar
186a4(sman dpyad): ba'i bye blag dang / goms pA dang / me'i drod shes par byas nAs/ ci rigs par byas na ni/ kha zas lji pa yang yang bar 'gyur la/ yAng baM yang lci bar 'gyur ba drug kyang yod do// kha zlas drA d+hA/
186a5(sman dpyad): byAtA b+h+r-i cho ga byashad pa'i lce'u ste gsum+b+ha bya'o// // rIm+b+has nAng gso ba'i le'u bshung par bya'o// rims nad ni nAd do cog gi rgyal po yin b+harar+ya bshad do// de bas na 'dir/ de gso
186a6(sman dpyad): cho ga 'di thog ma kho nar bshad de// rims ni thog ma lha chen po drag po zhes bya ba la/ drang srong shes nyon can zhes bya bas brnyas te/ lha chen po drag po khros nas dbugs btang ba las byung ba/
186b1(sman dpyad): rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan+da so so'i rims dang / rlung dang mkhris pa 'dus pa'i rims dang / mkhris pa drang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa'i rims dang / rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad+ma kA
186b2(sman dpyad): 'dus pa'i rims dang / glo bur gyi rims dang / rims rnam pa brgyad du gyur to// de la rims thog mar byung ba'i thabs ni/ kha zlas kyi nyes pa dang / 'dug nyal la sogs pa'i gnas pA'i nyes pa la
186b3(sman dpyad): nang gzhi rnams po ba'i nang du zhugs te/ khong pa'i drod phyi rol tu bo ton pa de dang / dngas ma dang 'dus shi nga gnas par gyur pa ni rims bskyed par byed do// de la rlung las gyur ba'i rims kyi ma
186b4(sman dpyad): ma ni/ lus grang zhing 'drar ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / sla ba dang / ba spu langs pa dang / glal zhing bya rmyang byed pa dang / mgo bo dang / rked pa dang / baR+Ya dang rtsi ba logs na zhing / byin snying sgyur ba dang
186b5(sman dpyad): skom dang che ba dang / mig+na dang pags pa'i mdog dang / sngon mo dang / phyi sa dang / gcin rnams mdog kanag cing khar ro bska ba bro bA dang / 'gram pa na ba dang / dbugs mi bdo zhing lung pa 'grogs
186b6(sman dpyad): su mi btub pa rnams yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ lus shin tu tsha ba dang / khong pa tsha ba dang / skom dang che ba dang / brgyal ba dang / rdul 'thung ba dang / khe'i ro tsha bar bre
187a1(sman dpyad): ba 'am/ mgo 'khor bA dang / smra ba dang / sna'i nad dang / kha'i nadA dang / mchu dang lkog ma rnams su 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / khyo ning shin+da tu khro ba dang / bsil ba 'dod pa dang / mig dang / sen mo
187a2(sman dpyad): dang / 'gas pa'i mdog dang / phyi sa dang / gcin rnams kyi mdog ser ba dang / sgregs pa'i ro kha ba dang / 'khru ba rnams yin no// bad kan las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ dbugs mi bde ba dang / lung ba lu ba
187a3(sman dpyad): dang cham pa dang / mchil ma mang ba dang / yi ge 'chus pa dang / skyug pa dang / gnyid che ba dang / lus lci ba dang / dang ga mer mer por gyur pa dang / slong bar gyur pa dang / khar mdun pa bro ba dang / grang 'brum
187a4(sman dpyad): 'byung ba dang / mig dang / sen mo dang / pags pa'i mdog dang / phyi sau dang / gcin gyi mdog skya ba dang / dro ba 'dod pa rnams yin no// rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma nI/
187a5(sman dpyad): sko ma dang che bA dang / lus tsha ba dang / lusa? tshwa ba dang / lkog ma dang / kha skam pa dang / s+phu la ngas pa dang / gnyid mi 'o ba dang / skyug pa dang / tshigs dang / klad pa rab tu na ba rnams yin par bshad do// rlung
187a6(sman dpyad): dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ snyom pa dang / slong bar gyur pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / tshigs dang / klad pa na ba dang / lus lci ba dang / lus grang ba dang / lud pa dang / yi ge
187b1(sman dpyad): 'chus pa dang / lus rdul ba rnams las rtogs par bya'o// mkhris pa dang bad kana? gnyis 'dus pa lngas gyur pa'i rims kyi tshul ni/ phyed grang phyed tshwa ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / lu ba dang snyom pa dang /
187b2(sman dpyad): khar ro kha ba bro ba dang / rmongs pa dang / sgyid lug pa dang / skom dang che ba rnams yin no// rlung deng mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum 'dus pa lngaso// rims nad du gyur ba'i tshul ni/ tshigs drang rus pa dang / klad pa na ba
187b3(sman dpyad): dang / phyed grang phyed tsha ba dang / snyoms pa dong / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / lkog ma ngar ngar zer ba dang / rna bar zug pa dang / mig dmar zhing yon por gyur pa dang / kha nas mkhris pa dang / khrag 'byung ba dang /
187b4(sman dpyad): skyug pa dang / skom dang che ba dang / nub mo gnyid mi 'ong ba dang / ldi tshig pa bzhin nag por gyur zhing / reg na rtsub pa dang / lus kyi mdog sngo bsangs su gyur cing / 'brum bu dmar po 'thon pa dang / 'dzag sgo rnams nas
187b5(sman dpyad): 'brum bu 'byung ba dang / skyug pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba rnams yin te/ rnam pa 'di dag thams cad tshung bar gyur na gsor mi rung ngo // tshang bar gyur na gso dka' bar bshad de/ glo bur gyi rims ni/ snang ba dang /
187b6(sman dpyad): sngags drag po spyod pa dang / dmod pa dang / gdon gyis btab pa las gyur pa dang / sems 'khrug pa'i gdung ba las mkhris pa'i rims tsha bar 'gyur te/ de yang 'dod pa dang / mya ngan dang / 'jigs pa dang / khro ba
188a1(sman dpyad): rnams las sems 'khrugs te/ rims su gyur to// de dag lta bu las rims su gyur nas ni nang gzhi rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum gang byung ba las rims su gyur pa de dag so
188a2(sman dpyad): so'i mtshan mas bstan to// rims nang gso ba'i thabs ni/ rims thog ma byung ma thag tu nyams stobs la mI gnod par sbyang ba'i cho ga bya'o// de la rlung dang ngal ba dang / khro ba dang / mya ngan dang / lung ba lu
188a3(sman dpyad): ba dang / glo rdo lnga pa rnams la rims su gyur pa la r+thi smyung ba'i cho ga mi bya'o// sbyang bar bye ba'i tshad ni bkres shing skom par gyur pa dang / phyi sa dang gcin tshul bzhin tu 'byung bar gyur pa dang / lus yang bar
188a4(sman dpyad): gyur na sbyang ba'i cho gA legs pa yin no// smyung ba'i cho ga ha cang drags na ni skem pa'i nad dang / snyom pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / dbugs mi bye ba dang / ngal ba'i nad du 'gyur ro// de la bad kan+da dang
188a5(sman dpyad): rlung gi rims la ni skom du chu skol ba dron po blud do// mkhris pa dang / chang dang / dug las gyur pa'i rims la nri skom du ro kha ba skol ba'i khu ba grang mo blung ngo // bca' sga dang / ba li ka dang / ldum bu skra lo
188a6(sman dpyad): dang / pu shel tse dang / gla sgang dang tsan dan rnams skol ba'i khu ba grang mo blud na yang skom pa dang skyug pa dang / rims dang / lus tsha ba sel to// smyung ba'i cho ga byas pa'i rjem la/ kha zas smin pa ni rlung dang mkhris
188b1(sman dpyad): pa dang badra kan so so'i chos par byed pa'i sman gang yin pa'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i thug pa phan+da zhing 'phrod par blud do// yang na 'bras yos btags pa'i thug pa sla ba bca' skas btub pa blud do// yang
188b2(sman dpyad): na rlung gi rims la ni/ sa lu'i chan ri dwagasi dang / ri bya'i shA khu bcud dang bcas pa sbyin ni// des zhi bar ma gyur na/ zhig bdun lon pa'i 'og tu tshos par byed pa'i sman dang / zhi bar byed pa'i sman blung ngo // zhag
188b3(sman dpyad): bdun gyi snga rol rims gsar bu byung ba'i tshe/ sman btang ba ni sman de nyid kyis nang gzhi shin tu bskyed par byed do// de la rlung las gyur pa'i rims la ni tshos par byed pa'i sman bil+la la sogs pa rtse ba lnga skol
188b4(sman dpyad): bya'i khu ba blung ngo // yang na pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / sle tres drang / bca' sgra rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blung ngo // yang ni sle tresa? dang / gla sbrang dang / byi tser dang / bca' sgra rnams ldan cig skol ba'i khu bA blud
188b5(sman dpyad): do// yAng ni skyu ru ra dang / gla sgang dang / rtsa ba lnga pa dang / sle tresa? dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do// yang nA rtsa mkhris dang / gla sgreng dang / sle tres dang / ba la ka dang / br-i hA tI
188b6(sman dpyad): rnam gnyis dang / gze ma rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blung // yang na s+thi ra dang / ka li shi dang / bca' sga rnams lhan cog skol ba'i khu ba blung na rlung nang la phan no// yang na thal tres dang / pi po ling
189a1(sman dpyad): dang / rgun+da dang / shu ti'i 'bras bu dang / ha re nu kA rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do// yang na thadra shing dang / b+hek+Sha da ni dang / sman ra sna dang / sgron shing dang / e la ba lu ka rnams
189a2(sman dpyad): lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud // yang na/ sle tres dang / aM shu ma tri dang / rgun dang ba t+yA lu kra rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do// yang nA ra sna dang / shing mAngar dang / dong ka dang / taM bA lA dang / shal

192a6(sman dpyad): kun dang / bca' sga dang / sman ro tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / rno ba dag dang / sbyar ba'i khu ba btsogs pa slar dran par ma gyur gyi bar du khar blugs so// shing ma d+hu ka'i snying po dang / rgyam tsha dang / shu dag
192b1(sman dpyad): dang na le sham drang / pi pi ling rnams cha mnyam la chu'i nang du bdar te/ btsags nas snar blugs na yang slar dran pAr 'gyur ro// shi ri sha'i 'bras bu dang / pi bi ling dang / na le sham dang / rgyam tsha dang /
192b2(sman dpyad): skyer khar+b+ba dang / byi sku dang / ldong ros dang / shu dag rnams cha mnyam la/ ba gcin gyi nang du bder te/ btsags nas mig tu bskus na yang dran par 'gyur ro// gang cho ga de ltar byas te/ yanga? na slar dran par
192b3(sman dpyad): gyur pa de ni 'phral be 'am/ rkang pA gnyis kyi rting par lcags kyi thur mas bsreg go/ bya g+hi dang / byi tsher dang / b+ha gri dang / li zer ba dang / bu branra shing dang / ma nu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu be 'thungs na
192b4(sman dpyad): yang / bad kan+da dang / ror 'byin pa'i nAdra rims rmong bu zhi bar byed do// khA lung dang / shing ske s+yA b+hi dad+ya/ bil+la dang / bya gri dang / pA thA dang / e raN+DA'i rtsa ba rnams skol bA'i khu bi lan tshwa dang bA gcin dang sbyar te blud
192b5(sman dpyad): na yang ror 'byin pa'i nad dang / lto spro zhing rtul ba'i nad sil tau// ka ra bi dang / ma nu dang / I rartA'i rtsa ba dang / khyi lce ba dang / ba shi ka dang / sle tr-is dang / sngar bshad pa'i rtsa ba lnga pa chen po zhes bya bA/ bil+la la
192b6(sman dpyad): sogs pa dang / rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu zhes bya ba/ br-iSh+Ta par+Ni la sogs pa dang / lnga tshan cha chung gnyis bsdus pa'i ming ni/ rtsa ba bcu pa zhes bya ste/ bcu po de dag dang / li zur ba dang / bu bran shing dang / byi tsher dang /
193a1(sman dpyad): b+ha rgi dang / pu na sna ba dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam la ba gcin gyi nang du skol te 'thungs na yang dran pa sor chud par 'gyur zhing / ror 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rims tshabs chen po dang / ngal
193a2(sman dpyad): ba'i nad tshubs chen po yang myur du sel bAr byed do// kA rany+dza dang / kru trug tres dang / btsod dang / khyi lce ba dang / bil+la dang / ku la ke dza dang / br-i ha tI rnam gnyis dang / ka r-i bI dang / tsha ba gsum dang / 'di rnams
193a3(sman dpyad): skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang / ror 'byin pa'i nad kyi rkyen gyis med pa 'gags shing sgra ngar ngor por gyur pa yang sel bar byed do// // da ni rims ldang du bu gyi dus mi 'dra bar bshad de/ drangs
193a4(sman dpyad): ma la sogs pa lus zungs mdun gyi gnas rnams rlung la sogs pa nang gzhi gsum po rnams zhugs pa las rimus ldang dubu con du gyur te/ de yang rgyun chags kyi rims dring / rtag pa'i rim dAng / nyin re
193a5(sman dpyad): ba'i rims nyi ma gnyis shing lan gcig lan gcig ldang ba'i rims dang / nyi ma gsum zhing lan gcig ldang ba'i rims dang / rnam pa lngar gyur te de dag gso ba'i thabs ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman shing
193a6(sman dpyad): nim pa dang / a ru ra dang / sle tres dang / gla sgang dang / pa to la dang / dug mo nyungs kyi 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam ste/ lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / khyi lce ba dang / pu tse shel dang / pa tha dang / thal tres rnam gnyis

193b2(sman dpyad): dang pu shel tse dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / gla sgang dang / sle tres dang / btse'i sga rnams cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang / thang shing dang / s+thi ra dang / bca' sgo dang / ba sha ka dang / s+yu ru ra dang
193b3(sman dpyad): a kA ru rnams cha mnyam ste lan cig sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di dag so sor skol ba'i khu ba bsgrang sngo pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang / shwa kha ras buskyed de/ sbyar ba so sor 'thungs na//

193b5(sman dpyad): ni rims lnga po re re zhing yang sman gyi sde tshan lnga char gyis so so nas sel bar yang bshad do// de ltar tshos par byed pa'i cho ga bshad nas/ rims nad can gyi khong na/ nad gzhi tshos par gyur pa na/
193b6(sman dpyad): gnas pa slar ma phyin na yang gnod pa chen por gyur te/ de bas na khong na nad gzhi tshos par gyur pa dang / chos par ma gyur pa yod pa/ nyams stobs dang / dus dang / nad las dpags te/ ci rigs
194a1(sman dpyad): pA ra bkru sman gyis dbyung bar bya'o// de lnga bsku sman nI shing mngar dang / drong ga dang / rgunu dang / pu tse shrel dang / pa tha dang / 'bras bu gsum drang pa to la rnams lhan cigra skol ba'i
194a2(sman dpyad): khu ba'i nang du/ A ru ra'i phye me btAb pa ni bsgyu bar byed de rims sel to// pa t+yo la dang / dong ga dang / bu tse shail dang / bi sh+ya la dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / shing nya rong rnams skol ba'i khu ba nasa?
194a3(sman dpyad): tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar ba ni 'khru bar byed do// rIms thams cad sbyong ngo // pra tsI shel dang / a ru ra dang / shing nye rong dang // dAn+ti'i rtsa ba dang / ShI lce ba dang / dong ga dang / nus tshig 'khus pa'i

194a5(sman dpyad): ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbrus te/ ri lur byas pa yang 'khru bar byed pa yin te/ 'dus pa'i rims dang / 'or nadrA skrang ba dang / khrag lud pa'i nad sel to// rims rnying dang / bad kan zad par gyuR+ShA pa la ni 'o ma
194a6(sman dpyad): bdud rtsi dang 'dra'o// rims gsar bu la ni de dug dang 'dra ste mi gsod par byed do// de la 'o ma btang ba'i thabs ni/ 'o ma rtsa ba lnga pa dang skol te bsgrangs pa 'am/ yang na 'o ma chu bzhi 'gyur dang skol
194b1(sman dpyad): te chu ngu bar byas pa 'am/ yang na 'o ma shi sha pa'i snying po dang skol ba 'am/ yang na 'o ma bzhos pa'i 'phro la dron po 'thungs na rims to// 'o ma pi pi ling dang / shing mngar dang / rgun dang / ldum bu ba la dang
194b2(sman dpyad): tsan dan dkar po dang / thal tres rnams dang / lhan cig skol te 'thungs na rims myur du sel to// 'o ma shing bil+la gzhon nu dang skol ba 'am/ yang na e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / skol ba 'thungs na dre ma thag
194b3(sman dpyad): tu gdug pa'i rims sel bar byed do// 'o ma bu ramA dang / bcu'i sgra dang / ba la dang / bya g+h+ri dang / gAze ma dang lhan cig skol te bsgrangs pa 'thungs na/ skrang ba dang / rims dang / phyi sra dnganga?/ gcin 'gags
194b4(sman dpyad): pa zhi bar byed do// 'o ma'i cho gas kyang ma smon te/ rims kyi drod kyis mdangs med par byas pa la ni gso ba'i thabs gzhan bya ste/ myur khu nye tshe 'am/ yang mar sman dang bskol ba'i me'i drod las dpag/
194b5(sman dpyad): twe btung por bya'o// de la mar sman dang skol ba ni/ rgun dang skol ba 'am/ yang na ba la dang skol ba 'am/ yang nA shing mang r-i dang skol ba 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang skol ba 'am/ yang na
194b6(sman dpyad): sle tresi dang skol ba'i mar 'thungs na/ de ma thag tu rims sel bar byed do// ba sha ka chen po'i mar zhes bya ba ni/ shing ba sha ka dang / shing a rish+tsa dang / sle tras dang / b+hirgi dang / rtsa ba lnga pa dang /

195a2(sman dpyad): 'gyur dang / skol te chu ngu bar byas pa'i mar 'di'i ming ni ba sha ka chen po'i mar zhes bya ste/ de la tshod ran par 'thungs na rims thams cad sel to// bai shaM kA chung ngu'i mar bya bA ni/ shing ba sha
195a3(sman dpyad): ka skol ba'i khu ba dang / ba sha ko nyid phye mar btags pa rnam pa gnyis kyis mar skol la sman gyi khu ba du bar byas te bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ming ni/ ba sha ka chung ngu'i mar zhes bya

195b1(sman dpyad): me tog dang / balnga po se'u rnams cha mnyam ste/ zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags la mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / lhan cig tu skol nas/ chu ngu bar byas pa ni dge ba'i mar

195b5(sman dpyad): rnams kyis kyang mnan la/ 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ 'o ma du bar byas pa'i mar gyi ming ni dge ba chen po'i mar zhes bya ste/ na da do cog sel to// dug mo nyung dang / pu shel tse dang / te ri dang / pu tse
195b6(sman dpyad): shel dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / bong nga dkar po dang / gla sgang dang / khyi lce ba dang / thal tres dang / bilpa dang / ta ma la ka dang / bi pi ling dang / skyu ru ra dang / bya g+h+ri dang / 'di rnams zhib tu btags te/ sngar phye ma'i
196a1(sman dpyad): sman sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa bzhin du skol ba'i mar ni rims sel zhing / glo gcong chen po zad par byed pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / lud pa 'jam por byed de/ glo 'or dang klad pa na ba yang med
196a2(sman dpyad): par byed do// gla sgang dang / a rista dang / s+thi ra dang / byi tsher dang / ba la dang / sku lo dang / gze ma dang / khyi lci ba dang / daM ba ni dang / bya g+h+ri dang kA la shi rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du phye ma'i

196a4(sman dpyad): bi dang / klad pa'i nad sel to// dpyad de dag gis kyang rims rnying thams cad la/ nad gzhi long gA na gnas pa ma phyin na/ sman mar mas btang ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas btang ba gnyi ga cho ga bzhin du bya'o//

196a6(sman dpyad): cad sol to// yang na pa to la dang / bo son cha dang / a ris+t+ra dang / smr-i tres dang / shing mngan rnams dang / til mar lhan cig pa'i sgron mar mes btang na/ des kyang rims sel to// yang na 'jam brims

196b6(sman dpyad): ngun po son cha dang / gla sgang dang / pi pi ling dang / dug mo nyung dang / shing mngar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba 'di rims so cog bsal ba'i phyir mas btang na/ nad gzhi phyir 'byung zhing / lus
197a1(sman dpyad): shIn tu dag par 'gyur te/ de ma thag tu rims med par byed do// yang na bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni/ po son cha dang / drong gra dang / pu tse shel dang / shing mngar dang / lo mu rnams

197a6(sman dpyad): mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di dag gi skyabs su/ sman gyi tshad la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du ma spros pa ni/ 'og nas las lnga'i le'u las rgyas par 'byung ngo // rims ldong dub cer gyis gnod par gyur pa lo ni/ 'o ma
197b1(sman dpyad): skol ba bi pi ling gi phye mA dang sbyar te/ gzhan mi bsam par btung ngo // yang nA 'o ma skol ba'i nang du/ nyin re bzhin pi pI lI bcu bcur bskyed de btab pa 'thungasA la/ pi pi ling gi grangs brgyar phyin
197b2(sman dpyad): nas slar yang nyin ro bzhin bcu bdu phri ste btung bar bya'o// 'o maM dang mar skol te bslangs pa sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / pi pi ling dang / sbyar te dkrugs pa 'thungs na/ rimAs ljang ngub can dang / snying narba
