198b2(sman dpyad): bathung blo 'joms par byed la/ snum ma rnams lo yang dge ba yin no// me mkhris po'i nad drage pos bo t+ta be/ lus shin tu tsha bar gyur pA la ni// bang po thosol zhing bser gyi 'jo ba'i gnas su bzhig
198b3(sman dpyad): bsil ba'i cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba 'di dag bya'o// de lta bsil bar bya ba'i cho ga ni skyeng rung mar gyi nang du badzes te/ btags pa'i bye ma rtsibs skyur pos 'dag gu byas pas lus la bsdus na/
198b4(sman dpyad): tshwa ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang na chu'i lbu ba 'am/ rgya shug gi lo ma brdungs te/ rtsu bas sbyar pos btab pa 'am/ nya lcibs shin tu bsil ba 'am/ rtsa dur+tha btigs te rtsabs spyir pos btab pa 'am/ 'dam
198b5(sman dpyad): shin tu bsil bas lus thams cad bsku bar bya'o// yang na sngar smos pa'i shing n+ya gro da la sogs sman gyi sde tshon nam/ me taMg ut+pa la la sogs pa sman gyi sde tshan+da phye mar byas la/ rtsabs skyur po
198b6(sman dpyad): dang sbyar bas lus la bsku bar bya'o// yang na sman gyi sde tshan de gnyis las/ gang yang rung ba sgrol ba'i khu ba bsgyangs pa'i nang du/ tsha ba mi bzod pa'i mi nyid 'ju bar bya'o// yang na bu ram chang ngam/ rgun
199a1(sman dpyad): chang gi tsha 'am/ chang thu mal pa 'am/ rtsabs skyur po 'am/ 'o ma'i rgun lus la byug na yang tsha ba sel te bzung ngo // shug pa dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / ko lha ra dang / pad+ma'i b+ha lag
199a2(sman dpyad): dang / le brgan rtse dang / bu shel rtse dang / btsod dang / pad+ma dang / btso ga dang / kat+pal dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / gseng phrom dang / gla sgang dang / tshun dang / 'bra go dang / tsin denA da ka ri bo dang /
199a3(sman dpyad): skyu ru ra dang nye'u shing rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu bi'i nang du/ sman de dag nyid kyi phye me dang / rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang / 'o mA dang / tshwa dang / rtsabs kyi dngas ma dang / zho kha chu dang / tIl mar rnams
199a4(sman dpyad): blugs te skol la/ til mar ny+dzi tshe lus par byas la btsags pa 'di ni/ pags pa'i mdogra bzang zhing / lus tsha ba dang / skom pa'i nad sel ba'i mchog yin te/ lus bsku bar bya'o// ka ling ya ka dang /
199a5(sman dpyad): dz+yo shug dang / a dan+ta dang / shing mngar dang / btsag rnams btags la zhun mar dang s+yAR+Ya te/ mgor bskus na yang skyom pa'i nad dang / lus tsha bA'i gnod pa sailba to// brel po sr-i'u drung // rgya shug dang / grwas
199a6(sman dpyad): phrom pa dang / da d+hi tha dang / kha lung rnams btags la/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba 'di'ang skom po'i nad dang lus tshe pa sel to// mgo bsku bar bya'o// pad+ma'i lo ma dang / chu shing gi lo ma bting ba'i ste ngo du nyal la/ shing /
199b1(sman dpyad): ta la'i lo ma tsan dan bdur ba'i khu ba'i nang du dmyags pa'i bsil g.yabs kyis galabs nA yang tsha ba'i gnod pa sel to// rdzing bu'i me tog pad+ma khA bye ba dang ldan pa'i phyogs sam/ chu 'dren pa'i 'khrulnga 'khor
199b2(sman dpyad): yod pa'i phyogs su bsil khung bzang po byas po'i nang du 'dug cing / bud med kyi lus tsan dan gyi 'dag gus byugs pas mthar sbyar na yang / lus che ba'i gnod pa sel to// da ni bad kan dang / rlung gi rims kyis
199b3(sman dpyad): thebs te/ grong bas nyen pa'i cho ga bshad de/ de ltar grangs pas nyen pa la ni/ khyim dron po'i nang du 'dug la rdul gdon pa'i dugs bya zhing gos lci ba la sogs pa bgo bar bya'o// sman ka la s+tha dang / na ku li dang /
199b4(sman dpyad): pu tse shel dang / sle tresa? dang / a ka ru dang / zhog tamu ku dang / sa hra de ba dang / shu dag rnams lhan cig sbyar bas lus byug cing / dau dag bsregs pas lus bdugs na yang grangasaM ba sil to// yang na smen de
199b5(sman dpyad): dag nyid btags pa'i phye ma dang / lan tshwa dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / tshwa dang rtsabs skyur po la sngogs pa drang / til mar rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i til mar nyi tshe lus pas lus la bskus na
199b6(sman dpyad): yang grang ba sel to// zhi kha mu'am/ ba gcin nam/ tshwa dron pos lus la byug gam/ yang na byi'u rug pa dang / zin tig li dang / shi kru rnams brdungs pas lus la bskus na yang grang ba sel to// yang na sgribs
200a1(sman dpyad): par gyur pa lA ni rlung sel ban rtsi shing rnams dang / gAso ma brdungs pa'i khu ba dron po'i nang du/ lums su 'jugyu pur bya'o// yang na thung shing dang / a ka ru bsregs pas bdug kAm/ 'dun pag dang //
200a2(sman dpyad): k+Sha bu ka bsregs pas bdug par bya'o// bud med lang tshu la bab pA nu ma rgyas shing 'bu laM yid tsam skyibs dgu zhing / rked pa legs pa'i lus/ A ka ruSh+Ti lde gus byugs pa dang / mthar sbyar na yang grang ba shin tu sbubs
200a3(sman dpyad): mi med par byed do// / da ni rims nad can gyi kha zas kyi bye brag bshad de/ rimyas nad can la ni// kha zos 'bras sa lu shun lkugs dmar po la sogs pa dang / 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa bzang ngo // tshod ma da
200a4(sman dpyad): khu bdud du nau/ sran chung ngung / monr-i sran tsa nu dang / myon sran sde'u dang / rgya sran dang / mon sran na gu bzang ngo // byA na dang / khu bcud ni/ rI bonga? dang / dgo ba dang / 'ur ba dang / bya bar ti ra dang / bAr+ha ka dang / gong mA sreg
200a5(sman dpyad): rnams kyi sha bzang ngo // tshod ma nI shing ba to la'i lo ma dang / berta ka dang / karko ta la sogs pa bzung ngo // de la cho gar bsrung ba'i mdo ni/ rims na ba 'am/ rims byung nas/ nyams ma brtas kyi bar du/ kha zas lci ba dang /
200a6(sman dpyad): bsil ba dang / chu grang mo dang / nyin par nyal ba dang / mgo mi 'thub ste ngal bar gyur pa rnams shin tu bsgrims te spang bar bya'o// rims la nad brla brnyan 'byung ba mgo 'khor ba dang / dpags mi bde ba dang / skom
200b1(sman dpyad): da che ba dang / skyug pa la sogs par gyur na/ rims nyid la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i so so'i sman gang 'os pa rnams kyis de dag bsal bar bya'o// rims drag po 'byung du mi btub cing cho ga gzhan gyis ma slon
200b2(sman dpyad): pa la ni/ sman chen po lus la gdags pa dang / sman gyi khu ba 'am/ sngags chus khrus bya ba dang / zhi ba'i cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma sbyin pa dang / dka' thub spyad pa dang / grub pa'i sngags kyi cho ga rgyas par
200b3(sman dpyad): bya ba rnams kyis ni thar 'gyur ro// rims nad byung ba'i mtshan ma ni// khazas 'dod pa dang / mgo g.ya' ba dang / spyod pa 'byung ba dang / lus yang ba dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / khor 'byung ba 'byung ba rnams la
200b4(sman dpyad): rdzogs par bya'o// rims nad gso ba'i le'u stau lnga pa rdzogs so// / 'chi lhas kyi le'u bshad pa/ nad pa blud par ma shes te/ gya tshom du sman gyi las byas na/ dul gyi snron de las sto bar zad do// dre bas na
200b5(sman dpyad): byin pa dang / 'chi ltas dang / mtshan ma 'di gsum las tshe rtogs par bya'o// de 'chi ltas ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i ngang tshul dang / lus kyi mdog dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa'i tshul rnams 'gyur ba gang yin pa
200b6(sman dpyad): de dag ni/ mdor na sman pa mchog gis 'chi ltas su rig par bya'o// de la dbang po rnams don rnams la log par 'dzin la/ sman pa da mdza'o bla ma la sdang zhing // dgra la dga'i bar gyur pa gang yin pa de
201a1(sman dpyad): ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nam thang ba la sprin dang / 'ja' dang / glog mthong zhing / gzhal med khang dang / bzhon pa rnams kyis nam mkha' khebs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'tsho bar mi
201a2(sman dpyad): 'gyur ro// skar ma lha mo sgrib med ces bya ba dang / skar ma gong cug dang / dgu tshigs mi mthong ba dang / sa chen po gom pa brgyad kho ra khor yug tsam du chung ngur mthong ba de ni/ srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin
201a3(sman dpyad): no// nyin par skar ma me 'bar ba 'dra ba mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i mdog kha dog sna tshogs su mthong ba dang / rlung la gzugs yod par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni nges par 'chi bar bstan to// nyi ma 'char ba'i
201a4(sman dpyad): ngos la gu gu dod par mthong ba dang / mar me shi ba'i dri snar mI tshor bA de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro// me long la sogs pa la bdag gi gzugs brnyan yan lag ma tshang bar mthong bam/ yang naM ye med par mthong
201a5(sman dpyad): ba dang / sems can sna tshogs kyi cha byad mthong na de nI gshin rje'i khyim na gnas pa yin no// mig g.yon pa khyung du bros pa 'am/ lce nag por gyur tam/ sna'i dbyibs 'gyur tam/ mchu nug por gyur
201a6(sman dpyad): cing dbyibs nyams sam/ kha mnam por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o// mig dmar por gyur pa dang / mig dmar bar gyur pa dang / mig mi 'gyur ba dang / mchi mas gang ba dang / ya yor gyur pa dang /
201b1(sman dpyad): smyon ma zhum pa dang / ya yaur gyur pa dwe nr-i ror+ra gyur paR+Ya shes par bya'o// bzhin gyi mdo/ dmar ba dung / gna?g pa dang / ser+ya ba dang / sngo sangs su gyur pa dang / dro tsha med pa dang / mdog mi stug pAr gyur
201b2(sman dpyad): pi dang / dran pa nyams pa gang yin pa de'i tshe ni 'das zin par shes par bya'o// mgo bel ba lang gi lci ba'i phye mas stug por khebs pa lta bur snang ba dang / skra shi ba dang / sen mo dang / so mdog mi sdug
201b3(sman dpyad): par gyur cing zho byung bar gyur na/ de ni tshe zad par shes par bya'o// dpral rtsa ser skya dang / dud ka dang / dmar ba dang / sngo sengs dang / nag po dang / dkar bo lta bur gyur ba gang la snang ba ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro/
201b4(sman dpyad): bar 'gyur ro// dpral ba lu shig 'gro ba dang / gtor ma bya rog mi 'dod pa dang / ho cang gnyid che ba dang / ha cang gnyis med par gyur pa de'i tshe ni ring por mi thub bo// long bu dang/ pus mo lha pa dang / dpral ba
201b5(sman dpyad): dang / phrag pa dang / mkhur chos dang / 'gram pa dang / mur 'gram gyi sha lhod pa dang / sha 'phyang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni srog ring por mi thogs par spong bar 'gyur ro// sha byos la skad kyi gdangs che
201b6(sman dpyad): bar gyur pa dang / nyam stobs yod bzhin du skad zhom par gyur pa dang / skra mtshams bye ba gang yin pa de/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi zhags pas zin par shes par bya'o// kha zas zos kyang sha bros pa dang / kha zas ma zos
202a1(sman dpyad): kyang nyam skye ba dang / bzhin gyi mdog snum por gyur tam/ kha dog gzhan du gyur pa de ni srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no// glo bur du dri ma zhim pa dang / dri mi zhim pa zhig tu gyur tam/ sbrang ma
202a2(sman dpyad): sngon po 'khor bar gyur na de'i tsho bar 'gyur ro// dA ni mtshonA ma'i bye brag bshad de/ rmi lam du lus snum gyis byugs pa dang / lho phyogs su 'gro ba dang / phog dang / mA he dung / gan+dan gzan dang / bong bu dang / rdu mo
202a3(sman dpyad): le zhon pa rmis na mi bzang ngo // bud med skra bshig cing gos nag po dang / dmar bag gyon pas bcings te rgod bzhin du lho phyogs su khrid pa rmis na mi 'dra 'dod pa yin no// gshin ngog dang / mu stegs can gyi rab

202b3(sman dpyad): po dang / me tog dkar po dang / gos dkar po dang / chu dang / ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / mdza' bo gson po dang / mi dge zhing des pa dang / bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong zhing rmis na bzang ngo // rmi lam du khru be dang
202b4(sman dpyad): rta zhon pa dang / ri lA 'dzeg pa dang / shing 'o ma yod pa dang / 'bras bu yo pa la 'chag pa dang / me long dang / sha rjen pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba rnyed pa dang / chu chen po las brgal ba rmis na/ mi na bas ni nor rnyed

202b6(sman dpyad): dang / dbyig pa lag na thogs shing // rgod bag tu gyur pa dang / gos dmar po dang // nag po dang / rnying pa gyon pa dang / khyed reng can dang / 'di rnams mi 'dod pa yin par bshad do// phrin pa lag pa nyed pa dang /

203a2(sman dpyad): mU nIng gi rtsig gi mying dang ldan pa/ myig la stsogs pa lnga lag gos nom pa dang pho mtshan gyi phyogs su lag pas nomA pA dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he zhon te 'ongs pa dang / bldad cing dri khar skya ba 'di dag
203a3(sman dpyad): ni mi rung ba yin no// de dge las ldog pa ni dge ba yin no// sman pa nad pa'i gan du 'gro bar chas pa na/ glang po che'i skad thos pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra la sogs pa thos pa dang / rin po che dang / me tog

203b1(sman dpyad): yin no// khyi dang / wa g.yas phyogs su na dge'o// srog chags go d+ha dang / sbrul dang / klu sbrul mthong ba ni dus thams cad du mi 'dod pa yin no// de ltar sman pa gang gis bsgrims te/ legs par brtags shing bye brag phyed par

203b6(sman dpyad): 'byung ba dang // 'khrig pa dang / sgra dang beces su 'byung ba rnams so// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/ phyi sa'i mdog ser ba dang / dmar pa dang / gnag pa dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu khor 'dug pa dang shin tu

204a3(sman dpyad): phag tshol 'dra ba dang / mar dang / 'bru mar 'dra ba dang / sha bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba rnams yin te/ gAso dka' bar shes par bya'o// phyi sa sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang / mar dang 'bru mar 'dra ba dang / mchin pa'i dum bu 'dra bar 'byung ba
204a4(sman dpyad): dang / 'o ma 'dra ba dang / shu brdungs brdungs pa 'dra ba dang / tshon sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang / dri shin tu dku pa dang / zhag tshig tshig po yod pa ni mi 'tsho/ gzhang kha ra 'brum pa 'byung ba dang / gzhang phyir byung ba dang / sha zad

204a6(sman dpyad): las gyur pa'i 'khu ba'i mtshan ma ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang / 'dra bar shes par bya ste/ de gnyis la yang rlung bsal ba'i cho ga bya zhing / dga' ba bskyed pa dang / snying mal du dbab par bya'o// de ltar 'khru/
204b1(sman dpyad): ba rnam pa drug po thams cad kyang / smin pa dang / ma smin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ de la 'khru ba smin pa la ni/ sbyang ba'i cho ga dang / skyug pa'i cho ga go rim bzhin du bya'o// 'di'i skom dang / zas ni bca' sku

205a1(sman dpyad): dang / bong ba dkar po dang / shIng kun dang / gla sgang dang / dug mo nyung dang / kru trug tres rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / gla sgang dang / te dzi ba ti dang / pa tha dang / pI pi ling dang / dug mo rnams

205a6(sman dpyad): ba'i phye ma chu skol ba'i nang du btab ste blud na 'khru ba ma smin pa tshabs chen po sol bar byed do// yang na/ shu dag dang / bilpa dang / pi pi ling dang / bca' sga dang / ru rta dang / go snyod dang / ku la ka dang / byi dang ka
205b1(sman dpyad): rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma chu skol ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru bA 'chad dro// da ni 'khru ba smin pa'i cho ga bshad de/ de la pho ba'i drod chung ste/ 'khru ba smin pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa la ni/
205b2(sman dpyad): da sman gyi cho ga sbyar te bya'o// de la gcod pa'i sman nI ldum bu sa mang ga dang / shing shal+lA li'i lo ma dang / gseng 'phrom dang / pa tha dang / d+ha thA dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tig rnams lhan cig tu sbyar bA dang / shing ldang ko dang /
205b3(sman dpyad): gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / me tog pod+ma dang / ti ri tra dang / bil+le'i shing tog gi shegs ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing dir g+ha brin+ti'i shun lpags dang / bca' sga drang / shing mngar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / dug
205b4(sman dpyad): mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / bal po se'u dang / gseng phrom+ba dang / d+ha ta ki dang / gan+d+ha ma li ka lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba
205b5(sman dpyad): sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba smin pa gcod par 'gyuraro// yang na 'khru ba smin pa la/ gla sgang skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do// de bzhin du gseng phrom la sogs pa'i
205b6(sman dpyad): sde tshan dang / am pan+ta la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshid pa yon tan chen po 'di gnyis las/ gang yang rung ba gcin skol ba'i khu ba bslangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyor te blud do// yang na taM bal dang / me tog pad+ma'i 'dab
206a1(sman dpyad): ma dang / shing ro tsha ba'i shun lcags rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ pad+ma'i ze ba dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na gcod par 'gyur ro// shing n+ya gro d+ha lwa sogs pa'i spre tshan sngar bshad
206a2(sman dpyad): pa zhi ba tu btags pa'i phye mas bya sreg pa'i khong pa bkang la/ snod kha bcad pa'i nang du btsos pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ dmu rdzing sel por byed cing / 'khru ba gcod do// yeng na
206a3(sman dpyad): rtsa ba lnga pa dang / ba la dang / bil+la dong / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / ut+pa la dang / bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i 'bras thug bal po se'us skyur por byas pa 'am/ yang na/ kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi drang / rgun
206a4(sman dpyad): sogs pas mngar bar byas pa blud do// yang na kat+pal dang / bong ba dkar po dang / gla sgreng dang / dug mo nyung dang / bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar he blad na/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba
206a5(sman dpyad): sel to// yang na ut+pal dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / bca' sga dang / bal po se'u'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ldum bu sA mang ga dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / gsung phrom dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i
206a6(sman dpyad): khu ba dang / til rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / dug mo nyung dang / gla sgang dang / rtsa mkhris dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gseng phrom dang / ut+pa la dang / bca' sku rnams
206b1(sman dpyad): lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pa tha dang / byi tsher dang / bca' sgra dang / shing lung kho dang / 'dzam bu'i shing tog gi rus pa dang / kat+sa la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / bil+la dang / skyur ba'i shun lpags dang / byi tsher
206b2(sman dpyad): dang / ba la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba daung / d+ha ta ki dang / bong ba dkar po dang / btsa' sgasgra dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang / 'bras bu dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / kat+pal dang / shing mr-i ngar
206b3(sman dpyad): dang / gseng phrom dang / bal po se'u'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing lung khong dang / d+ha tau ka'i me tog dang / ldum bu sa mang go dang / pad+ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dwang / dug mo nyung gi shun
206b4(sman dpyad): lpags dang / skyer pa dang / pa tha dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa bA dang / btsa' sgra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar bA dang / sman gyi sbyor ba bcu po 'di dgra las gang ying rung bla zhib tu bAtrags pa'i phye ma/ 'bras bkrus pa'i
206b5(sman dpyad): khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du bAtags te/ 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel te// mkhris pa lis gyur pa'i 'khru ba yod bzhin du/ mkhris pa dang mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos pas/ khrag 'khrugs
206b6(sman dpyad): par byas nas/ khrag las gyur pa'i 'khru ba tshabs chen por gyur pa la ni/ khrag lud pa'i nad sel ba'i cho ga myur te bya'o// de la khrag lud pa'i nad bsal ba'i cho ga ni/ btung ba dang / kha zas dang / mas btang ba kun
207a1(sman dpyad): la yang / ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya'o// pa ya s+ya dang / thal tres dang / gseng phrom dang / kha ra dang / shing mngar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma grang mo dang / sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste
207a2(sman dpyad): 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sil to// pog dang / rgyo shug dang / shing dzam+bu dang / pi ya la dang / a mra dang / urdzu na rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shun+da lpags zhib tu btags pa'o phye ma/ 'o ma dang / sbrang
207a3(sman dpyad): rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang / khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to// ut+pa la dang / a mang+ga dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i ze ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / til drang / sha ba ra'i gAseng phrom
207a4(sman dpyad): dang bau shing mngar dang / saM maM ga dang / thal tres dang / ung+ga la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar bya dang / ut+pa la dang / shal+le la'i shun lpags dang / shing dmar dang / sha ba ri'u go seng phrom dang / til rnams lhan cig tu
207a5(sman dpyad): sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag gsum las/ gang yang rung ba btags pa'i phyi ma 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste/ 'thungs na yang khrag nang las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to// tsan+da dan dkar po 'am/
207a6(sman dpyad): gon+d+ha pri yaM ku gnyis las/ gang yang rung ba'i phye ma/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to// yang na char ba'i chu dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
207b1(sman dpyad): bu ram gyi dbu ba sbyar ba'i nang du/ dug mo nyung gi shun lpags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to// yang na shing myangar dang / ut+pa la dang / chu smin gyi sen mo dang /
207b2(sman dpyad): kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba btang ngo // khrag tshad dang / phyi sa thal ba stsol zhing byung ba la ni 'o ma'i nang du 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma btab pa 'am/ yang na 'o ma bzhos ma theg pa dron mo tsi ran parA 'thungs
207b3(sman dpyad): lan mang du 'khrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro// bad kan las gyur pa'i 'khru bos gnod par gyur pa lA ni/ kha zas sman bu til ka dang / tsha ba gsum dang / bilpa dang / kru trug tres dang / dar ba dang / bal po se'u dang / shing kun
207b4(sman dpyad): rnams dang / legs par sbyar ba'i khu bcud dang ldan baM bza' bar bya'o// dbyi myong dang / bong b+hA drAkaR+Sha po dang / ru rta dang / brA b+hU dang / pu tse shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / A ru ra dang / kra skang dang / btsa'
207b5(sman dpyad): sga dang / brilpa dang / karka to rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / kru trug tr-is dang / pi bI ling dang rA pi pI ling gi rtsa ba dang / pi bi ling chen po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba rnams dang / byi dang ga dang / shu dag dang / shang shing
207b6(sman dpyad): dang 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / tsha ba gsum po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba blung na long bzang ste/ me drod dang / nyams stobs bskyed do// yang na
208a1(sman dpyad): a ru r+yA dang / kru t+yug+hA tres+t+ra dang / ba tha dang / shu dag dang / pi bi ling gi rtsa ba dang / dug mo nyung dang / bca' sgra rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo 'am/ yang na de dag gi phye ma'i sman byas na/ bad kan+ta
208a2(sman dpyad): lhas gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to// shring oM ko te'i rtsa ba dang / skyer pa rnams lus srang re re btAgs te/ cha re pA'i chus brdzis la zho gnyis tsam reng bur byas te/ mas btang na 'khru ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do//
208a3(sman dpyad): bIl+ma dang / glu sbrang dang / d+hA ta ku'i me tog dang / pa thA dang / btsa'i sga rnams kyi phye ma dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba rnams cha mnyam la bu ram dang / dar ba sbyar ba'i nang du btabA stu 'thungs na yang 'khru ba gcod do// da
208a4(sman dpyad): ni rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i cho ga bshad de/ khrag dang / phyi sa byung ba'i rjes lo rlung gi mthus byi sa 'gags te/ be'u stabs dbu ba 'dra bar 'byung zhing / 'khrog pa'i nad kyi ming ni be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa zhi
208a5(sman dpyad): byAbya ste/ de lA ni me drod chen po zhig na/ kru trug tres dang / bil+la 'o ma dang / skol ba'i khu ba/ bu ram dang / til mar dang spyir te nang par 'thungs na/ phyi sa 'gags pa bde bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma skol te phyung ba'i nang du/
208a6(sman dpyad): baM paM ling gi phye ma 'am/ yang na na l-i shim gyi bye ma btab ste/ zhag gsum gyi bar du 'thungs na be'u snabs su 'thung zhing 'khrig pa yun ring du lon pa yang sel to// til mar dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 5
208b1(sman dpyad): dang / bca' sga dang / bu ram gyi khu ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar la dkrugs te/ 'thungs na yang de ma thag tu be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khres pa sel to// d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / rgya shug gi lo ma dang / shi ka pat+tA
208b2(sman dpyad): dang drub mar cang dang / gseng phrom rnams kyi phye ma zho dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang be'u sbubs su 'byung zhing 'khrig pas nyam thag pA selA to// bilpa'i 'bras bu'i shags ma dang / bu ram dang / gseng phro ma dang
208b3(sman dpyad): til mar dang / na le sham rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te/ zos nr-i yang be'u stabs su 'byung zhing / 'khregs pas du mar gyur pa myur du sel zhing bde bar 'gyur ro// des kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/ shing mngar dang / til
208b4(sman dpyad): mar mas btang ba'i cho ga ni/ shing shal ma li'i lo ma btsos dkris li/ 'jim pas g.yogs te/ me mar mur gyi nang du bcug la/ 'jim pa ni skams/ lo ma ni tshos par gyur nas/ lo ma de gtun gyi nang
208b5(sman dpyad): du zhib tu brdungs pa'i phye ma/ mAr dang / shing mngarA gyi phye ma dang ldan par 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis skol te/ phyung ba'i nIng du brdzis pa'i ming ni/ mas btung ba'i smana? 'jam zhing 'byil ba zhes bya ste/ 'di
208b6(sman dpyad): mas btang na/ rims dang / mkhris pa las gyur ba'i 'khru ba sel zhing // skran dang / tshad rnying 'joms par byed la/ pho ba'i nad dang / skrang ba med par byed do// da ni pho ba'i me drod nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga
209a1(sman dpyad): bshad de/ me drod phri nas/ nad gzhi rnams kyis pho ba'i me drod dkrugs bya las/ pho ba'i me 'drod 'khru ba'i na du/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang / brad kan gsum so so las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus
209a2(sman dpyad): pa las gyur pa rnam pa bzhir gyur te/ de dag mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs ni 'khru ba dang 'dra'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i pho ba'i mi drod 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs ni/ rlung las gyur
209a3(sman dpyad): ba'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thubs dang 'dra'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las gyur pa yang de bzhin du so sor sbyar ro// de la me d+hod bskyed pa'i thebs ni
209a4(sman dpyad): sman e jo mo dang / kru drug tres dang / dbyi mong dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgyu ma tsha dang / sngar bshad pa'i thal ba rnam gnyis dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / shing kun rnams shing tog kha lung gi khu bos ri lur byas
209a5(sman dpyad): te zos nA/ me 'drod bskyed par byed do// 'bras bu gsum dang / go bye'i 'bras bu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tsha dang / tsabs ru tsha rnams btags te/ rje'u kha sbyar gyi nang du btab ste 'thungs na/
209a6(sman dpyad): sgyu rbab kyi nad dang / bo bi'i nang dang / sman dang / zug cing na ba rnams sel to// sman la la phung dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / go slong rnam gnyis dang / shing kun rnams kyi phyi me mar khu dang brdzis pa
209b1(sman dpyad): kha zas kyi snga rol tu zos na/ rlung sel cing me drod bskyed do// shu ti dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / pA thA dang / bil+la dang / kru trug+ma tres dang / bcu' sga dang / la la phud dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dwang / rgya shug gi
209b2(sman dpyad): 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang / zho myur gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / ldum bu tsang gi ri'i khu ba myur gyi bzhi 'gyung dang / 'di rnams sgrol la/ bar nyi tshe lus par byas te/ dzi ran par 'thungs na/ bo ba'i nang dang / gzhang
209b3(sman dpyad): 'brum dang / gzhang byung ba dang / gcinA sri ba dang / lto spyi ba dang / be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / snyoms pa'i nad dang / lud pa dang / dragra du stug cing
209b4(sman dpyad): 'tshong du mi btub pa rnams sel cing yi ga 'bye bar byed de/ mkhris paM las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nang la ni/ skyer ba'i khaN+Da dang / bong ba dkar po dang / bilpa dang / byi tsher gyi shun lpags
209b5(sman dpyad): dang byi tshir b+hI 'bras bu dang / kla sgang dang / pA b+hU dang / d+ho ta ki dang / pu tse shel dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma char pa'i chu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na/ gA zhang 'brum dang / be'u snabs su
209b6(sman dpyad): 'byung zhing 'theg pa dang / khrag nang dang / mkhal rked na pa dang / gzhang nang rnams sel to// drug mo nyu dzig shing dang / che'i gsub dang / grwa sgang de / rtsa mchis dang su tshaM shel rnams cha mnya
210a1(sman dpyad): kru trug tres tshwa'i nyis 'gyur dang / dug mo nyung gi shun lpags cha'i bcu drug 'gyur dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khyA ba dadA sbyar te 'thungs na/ po ba'i nad dang / mig
210a2(sman dpyad): ser dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / gcin nad dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / 'khru ba dang / skran dang / skem po'i nad dang rims sel to// bad kAn las gyur pa'i bo ba'i mi drod 'khrugs pa'i nad lA ni/ sman
210a3(sman dpyad): shA thi dang / tshwa ba gsum dang / a ru ra dang / thal ba rnam gnyis dang / pi pi lIng gI rtsa bra dang / kha lung gi 'bras bu dang / rgyam tshwa rnams kyi phye ma chu skol te/ phyung ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na zhi bar 'gyur
210a4(sman dpyad): ro// ma d+hu ka'i me tog skol te/ gdus pa'i khya ba bsgrengs pa'i nang ngu/ sbrang rtsi de'i bzhi cha thug ste sbyar te/ bum+b+ha pA'i nad pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / a ka ru dang / til mar rnams sbyar bas thugs pa'i nang
210a5(sman dpyad): du blug staM/ zla ba gcig gi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa las ran par 'thungs na me 'drod bskyed do// bi bi ling gi rtsi ba dang / kru trug tres dang / a rA ra dang / pi po ling dang / byi tang ga rnams
210a6(sman dpyad): lhan cig tu sbyar bas rdza ma'i nang du bskus la/ de'i nang du dar ba blugs te/ nas kyi nang du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag pa las ran por 'thungs na/ pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / lung ba dang
210b1(sman dpyad): skraskan dang / srin+da bu rnams sel to// de ltar pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs pa'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni mdor na tshabs che chung la sogs pa las dpags te/ shin tu bye brag phyed par byas nas/ ma
210b2(sman dpyad): drong bskyed pa'i kha zas dang / btung ba dang / sman gyi phye ma drang / sman gyi zhu ba btung ba dang / sman mar la sogs pa ci rigs par btang ngo // / 'khru ba dang / pho bo'i me drod 'khrug pa'i nang
210b3(sman dpyad): las/ srin bu'i nad 'byung ba'i phyir/ dwe 'og tu skabs 'dir/ srin bu nod kyi bye brag dang / de'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs bshad de/ de la srin bu'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ rims na bar
210b4(sman dpyad): 'gyur ba dang / shwa mdog dun bA dang / ru shring ni byA dang / snying na dang / lus s+thi pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / khA zas mthong na yid du mi 'ong ba dang / 'khru bar gyurarA nA/ lhor srin bu skyes pa'i
210b5(sman dpyad): mtshan ma sIn no// de gso ba'i thab s+yA ni/ sman byi tang dang / rgyam tsha dang / nAs tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / kam+bi l+ya ka dang / a rA ra rnams zhib tu btag s+t+ra prAlI phye ma/ dAr ba dang stAr te
210b6(sman dpyad): 'thungs na/ srin bu thams cad sel to// sha kru dang / skyer pa dang / mu sha par+Ni dang / kla sgang dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / 'di rnams skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ pi pi ling dang / byi tang gi'i phye ma
211a1(sman dpyad): btab ste/ sbyar pa 'thungs na langa? srin bu sel to// mu shra par+Ni btags pa'i phye ma dang / 'bras bsreg pa'i khu ba zos lA/ tshal nan du rtsabs skyur po 'thungs na yang srin nad sbyong ngo //
211a2(sman dpyad): byi tAng gi'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyor te zlos na yang srin bu se la to// shi dwA pi rA byAng tra kra'i lo mu'i khru ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs nA yang srin bu selpa to// yang na 'bras bu gsum dadA/ shu dag dang /
211a3(sman dpyad): dan+tha'i rtsa ba dang DAkaM pa'i l+ya ka rnams kyi phye mu/ mar dang / ba gcin mar gyi bzhi gyur gyi rlung ngu skol la/ bi gAcin du byas nas tshogs ma btsags pa'i maru dzi ran par 'thungs na yang srin bu sel to//
211a4(sman dpyad): 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rtogs so// // de la khrag lud pa'i nad ni/ nyi ma dang / me la sogs pa'i tshwa ba brten pa dang / kha zas la sogs pa tsha ches pa dang / skyur ba dang / lan ts+tsha
211a5(sman dpyad): dang / thal bsnon pa'i sman dang / ro tsha ba'i bag zos pas/ mkhris pa 'khrug par gyur pa las mchin pa dang / mcher pa'i nang na khrag gnas pa lung par gyur te/ yAr yang 'byung la/ mAr yang 'byung
211a6(sman dpyad): bar 'gyur ro// de la rlung las gyur pa'i khrag lung pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khrag gi mdog sngo sbyar 'dug pa dang / dmar ba dang / sla ba dang / dbu pa can rnams yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag la'o/
211b1(sman dpyad): pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khrag gi mdog gos tshon nag por btsos pa'i kha dog 'dra ba dang / dud khar 'dug pa dang / pa gcin gyi mdog 'dra ba dang / skyer khaN+Da'i mdog 'dra ba rnams yin no// bad kan las gyur pa'i khrag
211b2(sman dpyad): lung+ga pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khrag gi mdog snum pa dang / yId tsam skya ba dang / 'byil pa dang / ska ba rnams yin no// nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus po las gyur pa'i khrag lung ba'i mtshan ma ni/ 'dren mar 'gyur ro// nA dA
211b3(sman dpyad): gzhi gsum char 'dus pa lngas gyur pa'i khrag lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ kun gyi mtshan mA thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// de la nang gzhi re re las gyur pa'i khrug lud pa'i gyen du 'byung ba ni gasngo sla'o// nad gzhi re re
211b4(sman dpyad): las gyur pa dang / gnyis gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lung pA thur du 'byung ba ni/ khwa zas dang / smen gyi cho gas mi ldang bar so tsam du rung ngo // nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khrag lud pa ni/ gyen
211b5(sman dpyad): du 'byung ba yang rung // thur du 'byung ldeng rung ste/ shA na? tu gas dka' ba yin no// khrag lud pa'i rkyen gyis smyig pa dang / brgya le ba dang / rims dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lung pa dang / skad 'gags pa dang / lus
211b6(sman dpyad): tshatshe bar gyur pa dang / khrag gi mdog shing 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang / 'ja' 'dra ba dang / mi ro'i dri minam pa ni gso ba'i thabs med do// de la nyam stobs dang ldan zhing za phod pa ni/ nad khrag ngan pa thog ma
212a1(sman dpyad): nasa? bcad na/ de lAs lkogA nad lha 'or dang / sman dang / gzhang 'brum dang rims dang / mdze la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur ro// de bas na sngar bcad par mi bya'o// khrag lud pa la thog mar ni/
212a2(sman dpyad): ci nus kyis smyung ba'i cho ga bya'o// de'i skom ni tsan dan dkar po dang / pu shel tse dang / sgo lo dang / gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blang do// khrag lud pa gyen du 'byung ba la ni thog mar brta pa dang / bklu
212a3(sman dpyad): swan bya'o// thi ra du 'byung ba ni/ nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing / thog mar 'bras thug gi cho ga dang / skyug pa'i cho ga bya'o// de la lus brta ba nI/ maur dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'bras brngos pa'i phye ma dang / kha ra rnams sbyar
212a4(sman dpyad): ba'i nong du/ skyu ru ra dang / bal po se'u btab ste/ ro sgyur bar byas pa blud do// de la bkru sman ni dong ga'i tshigau gu dang / skyu ru ra dang / shing nye rong dang / a ru ra 'di rnams las gang yong rung ba'i phye mA chu skol te/

212b2(sman dpyad): sha ka dang / gseng phro mo dang / sa nag po dang / ma da yan ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / ka ko la dang / ra many+dza'i rtsa ba dang / thal tres rnam gnyis dang / shing mang ro dang / nye'u shing gi rtsa ba rnams lhan cig tu

212b5(sman dpyad): ba'i phye ma/ ldum bu baM sha kra brdungs pa'i khu ba 'am/ skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa gang yid rung ba khA re dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbyar ba'i nAng ngu bo tab ste/ 'thungs na yang khrag lung pa'i nad sel to// chu srin gyi sen mo
212b6(sman dpyad): dang / shug pa dang / gan+d+ha bri yaM ku dang / gseng phro ma dang / btsag rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma char ba'i chu kha ra dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag 'byung ba gcod do// seng lded dang / sap+pa
213a1(sman dpyad): par+N+Na dang / bar+tha dang / shal+ma li dang / ko bi da ra rnams kyi me tog gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud ba sel to// u dum ba rA dang / taM pa la dang / a rA ra dang / 'bra go dang / rgyun rnam

213b6(sman dpyad): thag lung pa nad med par byed do// sna nas khrag 'byung ba la ni/ dung dang / btsag dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang / shing mngar rnams gang yang rung ba'i bye mo btsags pa bud med kyi nu no dang sbyar te/ snor thugs na gtso

214a3(sman dpyad): ba bzhin du bya'o// khrag lud pA bud med kyi mo mtshan las 'byung ba lA ni/ 'o ma kha rA dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blung na phan te zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang na btsag yug snum/ shing 'dzam bu'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i rtse

214a5(sman dpyad): ku dang / tsan dAn dang / na ga ge sor rnams gang+gA yang rung ba'i phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chad par 'gyur ro// yang na mon sran sne'u di mar ru'i rtse ba'i phye me/

214b1(sman dpyad): lu ka dang / sran chung dang / a ldum bu sa rnams las gang yang rung ba btsos pas mo mtshan la dugus byas na yang na ba sel to// yang mu drA purti btags tre/ til mar dang btsos pa'i nang du/ sbyin bal laM

215a1(sman dpyad): bar bya'o// de ma yin pa gzhan ni sman dang ldan pa zhig na glu sbyar te bya'o// kha nas rnag 'dra ba dang / bad kan+na dmar po dang / sngo sgyu dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po 'byung la

217b5(sman dpyad): yid gzhungs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / ro tsA bar byed de/ sman bcud kyis len+da du 'gyur ro// shing ka bit+ta'i 'bras bu dang / byi shal gnyis las srang bco lnga bco lnga dang / skyur+ra ru rlod pa srung sum cu rtswa gnyis/ skam na sra
217b6(sman dpyad): bcu drug dang / a ru ra de'i phyed dang / pi pi ling dang / e la~M ba lu ka dang / gseng phro ma dang / byi dang ga dang / na le sham rnams las srang gnyis gnyis chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du skol la/ bzhi cha gcig lus pa'i khu
218a1(sman dpyad): ba btsags te/ bsgrangs pa'i nang du bu ram srang nyis brgya blugs te sbyar ba da 'thungs na/ gzhung 'brum dang / gcong chen po dang / mdze nad sel zhing / sang ba dang / skya rbab dang / rims dang / mcher pa na ba
218a2(sman dpyad): dang / snying na ba dang / mkhal rked na ba dang / sman med par byed le/ pho ba'i nod dang / migo ser dang / shA kra dang / srin bu dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams sel to// gcod chen po'i nang lo rims la sogs pa'i nang bla gnyan
218a3(sman dpyad): gzhan zhig byung na/ gsor rung ba gang yin pa de dag so so'i gso ba'i cho ga bya'o// mdor na skem pa'i nad gcong chen po yod pa la ni/ lus bkru ba dang / dri ba la sogs pas lus brta zhing / nyam stobs bskyed par bya'o//
218a4(sman dpyad): gcong chen po gso ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // skra ni kha zas kyi nyes pa dang / 'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes pa las rlung la sogs pa shin tu 'khrugs nas/ khong ba'i nang ngu skan pur ma lta bur 'dug
218a5(sman dpyad): pA rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ lnga po de dag gI gnas ni/ blo g.yas g.yon dang / snying ga dang / chu so rnams yin no// gzhan gang de'i mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs dang bcas pa yang bstan par bya ste/ de la snyan no cog
218a6(sman dpyad): niHyi ga 'chus pa dang / phyi sa dang / gcin sri ba dang / rlung gi shas che ba dang / rgyu ma 'khrug pa dang / lho spo ba dang / skegs pa mang du 'ong ba'i mtshan ma rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i sgra
218b1(sman dpyad): hUM mtshan ma ni/ zag cing gzer ba dang / lho skyo ba dang / phyi sa dang / gcinA 'gags pa dang / sman nyid 'phar ba dang / gnas 'pho ba dang / che chung ngu 'gyur ba dang / lhug pa dang / mgo bo dang / za 'gram du zug pa dang /
218b2(sman dpyad): shIng nu ba rnams yin par bstan to// mkhris pa laso gyur pa'i spyan gyi mtshan mA ni/ lus tsha ba dang / skom dang che ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / sgrogs pa sbyar ba dang / khar kha ba bro ba dang / sman nyid reg tu
218b3(sman dpyad): mi bzod pa rnams yin par bstan to// bud kan las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ mchil ma ma hA ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa dang / kha zas 'ju
218b4(sman dpyad): mi btub pa dang / skran nyid sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang / skyug pa rnams yin no// 'dus pa las gyur pA'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ skran nyid mi zad par na zhing / tshe 'ur 'ur bor 'dug pa dang / rdo bzhin du sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang /
218b5(sman dpyad): sems dang / lus dang / me'i drod nyams par byed pa rnams yin te/ gsor mi rung ngo // bud med kyi khrag skan+da nI/ mngal rlug pa dang / bu byung ba dang / zla mtshan 'dzags pa lngas 'gyur te/ sman nyid na zhing tsho ba bur 'u
218b6(sman dpyad): bor 'dug pa sbrum ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// ngo la skran gyis nyam thag ste/ rus sbal bzhin du phyi rol tu rlo zhing / rtsa mngon la na da mang po bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thebs shing / snying ga dang / lte ba'i phyogs dang / rkang
219a1(sman dpyad): lag skrangs te mi bzod par gyur pa ni sbyang byar bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i sman la/ thog mar spyan mar blung ngo // de'i 'og tu phye ma'i sman dang / lus snum gyis bslu ba dang / drug dang / bak+ku sman drag po mas btang/
219a2(sman dpyad): ba dang / 'jam rtsims btung ba rnams kyis gso bar bya'o// nga la sman mar ni byi dring ga dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / NI pe gsum dang / dibye mo'i lo ma dang / 'u su'i 'brus bu dang / kyu trug tres rnams kyi mar dang / 'o ma dang /
219a3(sman dpyad): chu'i nang du skol la myur nyi tshe lus pa las rAn par 'thungs na rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to// kha ru tsha dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / shu dag dang / pu tse shel dang / a ru ri dang / kru trug tres dang / byi dang ga
219a4(sman dpyad): deng tshwa ba gsum po rnams kyi phye ma/ zho gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtse gnyis dang / 'o ma de dang mnyam pa dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thung sA na yang / rlung
219a5(sman dpyad): gyur pa'i spyan nA ba dang / bcan du sel cing skyigs bu dang / dbugs mI badre ba dang / srin bu dang / mcher ba'i nad dang / lud pa rnams sel to// bca' sga dang / dbyi mo dang / kru drub tres dang / pi pi ling dang
219a6(sman dpyad): chog 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re/ sman tsi ri dang / bil+la skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du sgrol te/ mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni sman dang / rtug skam dang /
219b1(sman dpyad): rbab dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / lung pa rnams sel cing / rims dang / cham pA drag po dang / mcher ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum rnams zhi bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// shing kun dang / star bu dang / tsha ba
219b2(sman dpyad): gsum dang / bye'u rug pa dang / sug smespel dang / shu dag dang / tsa bas ru tsha dang / khA ru tsha dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / go snyod dang / nas tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / bal po'i se'u dang / ma nu dang / a dza gin+d+ha dang / li zu ba
219b3(sman dpyad): dang kru trug dris dang / la la phung rnams kyi bye ma/ mar dang / zho mar dang bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du sgrol te/ mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni/ rlung laswA gyur pa'i spyan dang / zug cing na ba dang / lte sngo ba'i nang rnasems sel ti/
219b4(sman dpyad): mA'i 'bras bu dang / sug snrel dang / kru trug tr-is drang / tsha ba gsum dang / drub+hi mong dang / lwa la phung dang / rgyam tsha dang / g+ho snyod dang / pi pi lding gI rtsi ba rnams kyi phye ma/ rmya shug gi 'bras bu dang / la phug lhan cig tu skol
219b5(sman dpyad): ba'i khu ba skyur por gyur pa zho dang 'o mar ldan pa'i nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa'i skran dang / zug cing na ba dang / phyi sa 'gags pa sel cing / mngal gyi nyes pa dang / zas 'jur mi btub pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang /
219b6(sman dpyad): dbugs mi bde ba dang / snying na pa dang / rtsi be logs na ba rnams med par byed do// mar dang sbyor ba'i sman bstan pa'i do dag nyid zhib tu btags te chu skol ba dang / zho kha chu dang / chang dang / rtsabs skyur po dang / tsha rnams lnga
220a1(sman dpyad): gang yang rud+d+ha ba dang / s+thu rA te 'thungs na yang / s+yAn+ma dang / zug cing na ba la sogasu pa sel bar byed do// shing kun dang / shu dag dang / tsabs ru tsha dang / bca' sga dang / la la phud dang / a ru r+ra
220a2(sman dpyad): drang / kru trug tres dang / ru rta rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du/ dang po'i cha res bskyed de btags pa'i phye mu chang la sogs pa gong du smos pa glang yang rung ba dang sgyeng te 'thungs na/ skran dang / lho sba ba dang / dam rte
220a3(sman dpyad): sel te/ zug cing na ba dang / gzhang 'brum dang / dbugs mau bde ba dang / lud po 'joms par byed l-i/ pho ba'i drod bskyed par bshad do// shing kun dang / kha lung dang / star bu dang / bal po'i se'u dang/ t+ya ma tsha dang/
220a4(sman dpyad): tsabs ru che rnams kyi phye ma tshang bzang po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to// tsabs ru tshe dang / kha ru tshwa dang / star bu dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / shing kun rnams ci ma/
220a5(sman dpyad): chu la sogs pa gang yang rlung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang / zug tsaid+l-i na pa dang / phyi sa 'gags pas ny+tsam thag pa bde bar byed do// byi dang gu dang / bri ha ti dang nga na'i rtsa ba dang / s+yA ha k+Shi ra dang / 'bras @
220a6(sman dpyad): rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis mar srang brgyad dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las nyin re srang phyed phyed sha pu dang ngas pas/ thar du bkres pas/ kha za
220b1(sman dpyad): par zos na/ skan dang / rtug sgam dang / madz+re dang / gzhung 'brum dang / me'i drod nyams pa dang / dAmu rdzing rnams med byar 'gyur ro// shing nye rong drung / s+yAma? hA k+Shi ra dang / s+phu ru ra dang TA ba la ka dang / kram pi l+ya ka rnams lnga
220b2(sman dpyad): srang re re dang / rgyu ma tsha srung phyed dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar spyang brgyad dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du sgrol te/ mer nyi tshe lus pa'i ming nI d+hi bin+ni'i mar zhes bya ste/ 'di las nyin re zhing zho gnyis gnyis
220b3(sman dpyad): 'thungs la/ chu skol ba dron pos phul te/ thur du bkrus na/ swAn+da no cog dang / dmu rdzing thams cad 'joms par byed do// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran yod pa la ni/ thog mar bu tshang rtol sogs pa'i sman mar dang
220b4(sman dpyad): ma hA tik+ta zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang / ba shwa ka la sogs pa'i sman mar rnams las gang yang rung ba btang ste/ lto 'jam por byas pa'i rjes la bkru spun btang nas de'i 'og tu bcud mas btang bar bya'o// n+ya gro d+ha
220b5(sman dpyad): la stsogs pa'i sde tshun dang / ut+pa la la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams las gang yang rung ba sgrol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sna bcu sngar+ya bstan pa rnams kyi phyi ma btab
220b6(sman dpyad): ste skol la/ mar nye tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag lung pa'i skran sel to// a ru ra'i phye ma mar a ru ri'i bzhi 'gyur dang / spyi ru ri skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du
221a1(sman dpyad): btab ste/ skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa lngas gyur pa'i skran myur du sel to// yang na mkhris pa'i skran yod pa la nI 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba'i nang
221a2(sman dpyad): shing nye rong gi phye ma btab pa blud dam/ yang na kha ru dang / kam byi la'i sbrang rtsis sbyar ba btab ste/ thur du bkru bar bya'o// bad kan las gyur pa'i smanA ni dugs dang / bcing ba'i dugs dang / sman marA btung ba
221a3(sman dpyad): dang / bkru sman rnon po dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnon po dang / bkru sman drag po mos btang ba rnon po dang / sngar rlung skan gyi cho gar bstan pa rnams kyis kyang gso bar bya'o// drod bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman bca'
221a4(sman dpyad): sgra dang / pi pi ling dang DApi pi ling gI rtsa ba dang / kru trug tre sA dang / dbyi mod dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma srang re re mar dang 'o ma s+yang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / chu mur gyi bzhi 'gyur
221a5(sman dpyad): gyi nang du skol te/ mar+Ya nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni srang drug pa'i mar zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na yang / bad+ma kr-in las gyur pa'i skran sel to// pho ba'i nod dang / skya rbab kyi nang dang / mtsher pa'i nad dang
221a6(sman dpyad): lung pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / rims 'joms shing spang ba dang / rtug skam med par byed do// dong ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du drod bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i sman rnam pa drug
221b1(sman dpyad): po gong du smos pa'i rnams btags pa'i phye ma mAr nyi tshe lus pa 'am/ yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa dang / sbyar ba'i mar sngar bshad pa las ran par 'thungs na yang / bad kan las gyur pa'i skran sel to// /
221b2(sman dpyad): kha ru tsha dang / kru trug tres dang / shing kun rnams kyi phye ma/ dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na? yang me'i drod bskyed do// tsAbs ru tsha dang / la la phud kyi phye ma dang / dar ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang bId kun dang / rlung dang
221b3(sman dpyad): 'phrod bud med kyi mngal myi khrag les swAna? du b+hur+yA pa d+hU bra bcu 'das nas/ bu ma yin te/ s+thAnA yin tu/ s+thAn+d+ha yin par gyur na/ spyan mar blud pa dang / dugs byas pas lto 'jam por byas pa'i 'og tu/ snum pa'i
221b4(sman dpyad): cho ga bya ste/ bkru sman btang ngo // shu ti dang / tsi ri be liM ba'i shun lpags dang / thang shing dang / birgi dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phyi ma/ til mar skol baSh+Ti khu ba drang s+phAr+ya te 'thungs na yang // mngal gyi khrag lis gyur
221b5(sman dpyad): pa'i skran sel tau// til skol bI'i na drA du/ bu ram dang / tsha bya gsum dang / zhun mar dang / pyargi rnams kyi phye ma btab stau 'thungs na yang khrag gi skran sel to// bud med zla mtshan mi 'byung ba la ni/ skyu ru
221b6(sman dpyad): ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing king+ku ka'i thal ba blugs la skol te yang blud do// yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i khu ba dang / che ba gsum gyi phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang khrag gi skran sel to// khag gau snyun
222a1(sman dpyad): sal ta/ khrag gi skAr khong du gum skye mngal gyi khrag drag tu 'byung zhing mi chod pa lA ni/ byug lung ba'i cho ga sngar bskrun pa dang / rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga sngar bstun pa rnams kyis bcad cing / nu ba yang zhi bar
222a2(sman dpyad): byA'o// rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i nadra 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/ sman pa sngon byed pa mthong zhing goms pas lag pa'i rtsa gtar zhing / bdaM kan dang / rlung las gyur pa'i sbyin li me btsa' gdab byar bya'o// skran n+danal
222a3(sman dpyad): ni mdor na/ kha zas lci pa dang / bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i bag spang zhing / me'i drod dang / nyam stobs rtag tu bsrung bar bya ste/ kha zas dang / btung ba rnams tsho bas che chung las dpag cing bza' bar bya'o// snyan gos pa'i le'u
222a4(sman dpyad): ste dgu pa rdzogs so// de nas dgra rdzing gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dmu rjerdzing ni mo'i drong chung ba dang / khA zas mi 'phrod pa zos pas nang gi TI 'khrugs nas/ lus rdul ba dang / chu grang mo 'thungs te rtsa dang 'dzag
222a5(sman dpyad): sgo rnams 'gags pa las/ dbu rdzing gi nang ma rungs pa rnams brgyad skyo bar 'gyur ro// de la rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma ni/ lhor zug cing na bai dang / rdol la thug pa ltar na be dang / sgra 'byung ba dang / rkang lag
222a6(sman dpyad): dang / rlig pa spang ba dang / gnyer ma nag po 'byung zhing rtsa mngon par 'byung ba rnams yin par zi shad do// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu hU~Mng gi mtshan ma ni/ sha reg na 'jam pa dang / rims kyimi 'debs pa dang /
222b1(sman dpyad): rdul 'byung ba dang / skom dang che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rtsa sngon po dang / ser pos g.yogs par 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad do// bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma ni/
222b2(sman dpyad): mchil ma mang ba dang / lus lci ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / gnyid che ba dang / skrang pA dang / yi gA 'chus pa dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / 'byang dka' ba dang / lto 'khrang ba dang / pags pa stug pa dang /

222b4(sman dpyad): dang / lus ma rung bar byed pa'i drug las kyang 'byung ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o// du mu rdzing glo g.yos phyogs su 'byung ba la ni/ mchin pa'i da mu rdzing zhes bya'o// g.yon
222b5(sman dpyad): phyogs su 'byung ba ni/ mtsher ba'i dAmu rdzi dA zhes bya ste/ 'di gnyis ka yang bad+ma kan dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ mkhris pa dang / bod kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no// kha zas bya sgo dang / s+phu
222b6(sman dpyad): 'dres pa zos te/ rgyu ma 'gags te phyi se mi 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing snying ga dang / lte ba'i bar gyi nang du dmu rdzing skye ba ni 'byung dka' ba yin te/ gzhing 'gags po'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o// kha zas zug
223a1(sman dpyad): rngu dang bcas pa zos nas rgyu ma nang nas brtol te/ khA zlas kyi khu bu phyir zags pa las nad du gyur te/ lte ba'i 'og tu zug cing na ba byung ba'i midra ni/ rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya ste/ de'i mtshan ma
223a2(sman dpyad): nichu sor zug pa'i mAtshan+da ma la sogs pa sngar bshad pa dang 'dra'o// chu'i dmu dz+r-ing zhes bya bya ni/ sgyum bgo 'thungs s+yam/ spyug smyen+da nam/ bkru sman btang ba'i rjes la/ chu grang mo 'thungs pra la sngo nang du gyur nA/ lte
223a3(sman dpyad): byA'i phyogs su zlum zhing cher gyur te/ mdog snum pa lto rgyal pa gang ba bzhin du gyur pa yin no// dA mu rdzing rnam pa brgyad po 'di rnams kyi nang du/ rgyu mi rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang / gzhong 'gags pa'i damr-i rdzing gnyis ni gas
223a4(sman dpyad): myi rung ngo // lhag mo gzhan ni gso dka' bar bi shad do/ de dag las kyang chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa ni spang bar bya'o// do la rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzi nga la ni/ sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang /
223a5(sman dpyad): skol ba'i sman mar blud pa dang / dugs bya ba dang / snum brag gi bkru sman btang la lto zhi bar gyur nas/ lho phyir mi skye bar ras kyis bcing ba dang / nang dri dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar bas lto bskus pa'i steng nas
223a6(sman dpyad): pags pa drod che zhing spyi 'jam la ma rul ba la li gau ge to byas pa 'am// de mod na dang srin bal can gyi log to 'am/ lug lpags kyis bcings pa'i dugs byas la/ krut+yA gr-I tres kyi phye ma dang / til ma
223b1(sman dpyad): lhan cig bskol ba'i 'jamu rtsims btang ba dang / sman+da s+thi rA la stsogs pa'i sde tshan sgrol ba'i khu ba dang / sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang pra dang / kha zlas 'o ma dang / khu bcud dang / sha khu gang yang rung ba dang ldan par bza
223b2(sman dpyad): ba rnams rim bzhin du bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rting la ni/ thog mar 'jam rtsi sman ro mngar ba'i phye ma dang mar sgrol ba 'thungs la/ de'i 'og tu shing nye rong dang / 'bras bu gsum gyi phyi ma mar gyi nang du skol ba'i
223b3(sman dpyad): bkru sman btung ngo // yAng na shing n+ya gro d+hA lA sogs pa'i sde tshun skol ba'i khu ba myur dang skol la mar nyi tsho lus pa sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang sbyar bas/ bkru sman drag po myes btang ba bya ste/ duM yang sngar 'jam rtsi mas btang bA dang
223b4(sman dpyad): ldan par bya'o// 'jam rtsi mas bting ba ni/ n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ sman gyi sde tshan de nyid kyi phye ma dang / til mA ru dang lhan cig tu skol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo // de nA
223b5(sman dpyad): 'bras kyi 'o thug skra busa? bcing bya'i dugs byas te/ khwa zas kyang sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khye ba 'o ma dang snyil lA/ 'o ma nyi tshe lus bla dang ldan par bza'o// bad+ma kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing la ni thog
223b6(sman dpyad): mar 'jam rtsi pi bi ling la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i sman mar sngar bshad pa btang nas dregs byas pa'i 'og tu/ shing sna ha ga shi ri dang / skol ba'i mar gyi bkru sman btang ngo // de nas sman mu ska ka la sogs pa'i
224a1(sman dpyad): ste tshan skol ba'i khu ba til mar dang / ba gan+din dang / tsha ba gsam gyi phye ma rnams dang / sbyar ba'i bkru spyan+ta drag po myas btang bar bya zhing / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i cho ga yang bya ste/ 'jam rtsims
224a2(sman dpyad): btang ba na sman gyi sde chen gong ma nyid skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ til mar dang gsum gyi phye ma lhan cig tu skol te/ ti l-i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo // de nas phabs dang / la phug gi sa bon dang / yung
224a3(sman dpyad): kar rnams sbyar bse bcing ba'i dugs bya'o// kha zas ni rgya sran gyi khu bcud dmu/ le ma tsha ba gsum dang ldan pas dkrug cing bza'o// 'dus pA las gyur pa'i dmu rdzi ba la ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing lA sogs
224a4(sman dpyad): gong du smos po rnams kyi cho ga sngar bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya'o// yang na 'di lnga ni/ pog dang / shaM ka ni'i bye ma dang / mur lhan cig tu skol ba'i bkru sman yang btang ngo // mtsher ba'i dmu rdzing can
224a5(sman dpyad): la yang / 'jam rtsi dang / dugs dang / bkru sman la sogs pa'i cho ga byos la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i gru mo'i nang gi rtsa yang gtar bar bya'o// byi dung ga dang / kru trug tres dang / rgyam tshwa dang / phye dang / shu dag rnams cham
224a6(sman dpyad): chom du brdungs la mar gyis bskus te/ snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsngos nas/ zhib tu btags la 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang / skan dang / mtsher pa'i dmu rdzing sel to// yang na le sham dkar po skol ba'i khu ba/ rgyam
224b1(sman dpyad): tshwa dang / kru chug tres dang / pI pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang / sbyar ba 'am/ yang na na le sham dkar po sgrol pa'i khu ba shing pa la sha'i thal ba dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal pa dang sbyar te blud do// ro hi tra ka dang / u ru
224b2(sman dpyad): ra'i phye ma ba gcin nam/ chu'i nang du spangs te/ 'othungs na yong dmu rdzing thams cad drang / gcin sI ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum dang / srin bu dang / skran sel to// yang na rgya mtsho'i nya lcibs bsregs pa'i thal ba 'o ma
224b3(sman dpyad): dang sbyar te tshed ran par btung bar bya'o// yang nA 'tsher pa'i dmu rdzing la/ bi pI ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te blud do// mtsher pa'i dmu rdzing gso ba'i cho gar bstan pa de thams cad ni/ mchin pa'i dmu rdzing la
224b4(sman dpyad): yang btang bar bya'o// yang+ga nA mchin pa'i dmu rdzing lA ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i gru mo'i nang gI rtsa gtang bar bya'o// dmu rdzing rnams la nI phyi sa la sogs pa lto'i dri ma shas che bas ni/ bkru sman lan mad du bya
224b5(sman dpyad): bar bAstan to// de nas dwe'i 'og tu dmu rdzing gi spyi'i cho ga ces pa yang bstan par bya ste/ dmu rdzing la ni e raN+Da'i mar 'o ma dang / ba gcin gang yang rung ba dang s+yAr+ya te lan mang du btung bar bya'o// yang na trai la
224b6(sman dpyad): mar shing kun dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang / sbyar ba 'am/ sman dz+yo ti ka'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud do// mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'o ma mar gyi brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du/ sU ha kI ri sring gcigau dang / shing nye rong
225a1(sman dpyad): gi phye mA srang drug skol la/ mar nyi tshe lus par byas te/ btsags pa laswa rAn par 'thungs na yAng / dmu rdzing dang / skran sel to// 'bras bu gsum dang / bya d+hu dang / bog dang / shi drod dang / shu dag
225a2(sman dpyad): dung khyi lce ba dang / s+phu m+bu'i 'bras bu dang / pu tse shel dang / shing nye ring dang / rgyam tsha dang / pi pi ling gi phye mya ba gcin dang / chu skol ba dron mo dang / shaM khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang skyurA tAM 'thungs na
225a3(sman dpyad): yang sprin dang / dmu rdzing dang / mtshar ba'i nad dang / mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / khrag tshad dang / skang po 'or thabs rnams kyis nyam theg pa thams cad sel to// sman byig sha la dang / shing khi ni dang / ngan+da'i
225a4(sman dpyad): rtsurtsa ba dang / shing nye rong dang / shing dod dang / 'brasna bu gsum dang / yung dang / byi dang ga dang / kaM pi l+ye ka rnams kyi phye mA/ ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs na yAng dmu rdzing sol to// zhag bdun gyi bar du khwa zas dang /
225a5(sman dpyad): skom gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar/ ma he'i gats+tshin dang / 'o me sbyar ba 'bra'o zhig btung dAma?/ yong+ga na zla ba gtsog kI bar du kha zas dong / skom gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar/ rnga mo'i 'o ma 'ba' zhig 'thungs
225a6(sman dpyad): na yang / skrang ba 'or thabs su skrang ba dang / dmu rdzing sel to// yang na dmu rdzing can la pi bi ling gi phye me shing sU ha'i 'o ma zags pa'i nang du/ spangs pa las ci ran par btung ngo // yang na dmu rdzing zhi bar bya
225b1(sman dpyad): ba'i phyir/ dbyi mong dang / dan+da'i rtsa ba dang / kru trug+sa tres dang / byi dang glu dang / tshwa ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma 'o mA dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na thang shing dang / kru trug tresa? kyi phye ma 'o ma dang / skra skol ba'i khu ba gnyis
225b2(sman dpyad): las gong yang rung ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na dbye mong dang / btso' sgra'i phye ma 'o ma dang / sgra skol ba'i khu ba gnyis los gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o// na sro tshig 'khus pa'i thal bra dang / swa rtsi ka'i
225b3(sman dpyad): thal ba dang / kru trug tres drong / tsha ba gsum dang / shi drod dang / lan tshwa rnam lnga rnams kyi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar ti 'thungs na/ sman dang / dmu NIng thams cad sel tau// da mu NIng ngo cog gsal ba'i byir/ s+thAn+tha byaM sha la
225b4(sman dpyad): drudrang shIng ki ni dang / dan+ta'i rtswa ba dang / shi dong+ga dang / byi tsher rnams kyi phyi ma ba gcin dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o// mdor na da mu rdzing ngo cog ni/ phal cherwa nad gzhi mang po 'dus pa las byung bas no// de'i phyir dAma?
225b5(sman dpyad): rdzing ngo cog la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nang ga'i rnams zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga bya'o// rgyu mi rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dong / chu'i dmu rdzi dang / gzhang 'gegs pa'i dmu rdzidu 'di gsum la nI/ sman pa cho ga shes pos so
225b6(sman dpyad): shi rdo bar dam bces la lha dbug pa dang / dral ba'i cho ga yang bya'o// dmu rdzing rnams kyis nyam thag pa'i kha zas su ni/ 'bras sa lu rnams dang / nas dang / mon sran sde'u dang / 'o ma dang / srog chags rnams
226a1(sman dpyad): skam sa nA gnas pa'i sha khu rnams nyam stobs las dpags te bzla' zhing btung bar bya'o// da muNIng can la ni/ chu btung ba dang / nyin par gnyid ldog pa dang // kha zas lci ba dang / bud kan bskyed pa'i
226a2(sman dpyad): bag dang / drag shul gyi bag mi bya'o// bzhon pa la zhon pa rnams yongs su spung bar bya'o// dmu rdzing gso bo'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so// // de nas gcin snyi ba'i nang gso ba bshad par bya ste/ kha zas mi 'phrod
226a3(sman dpyad): pa zos pa dang / 'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes pa las/ gtsIn snyi ba'i nad rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur bar bshad de/ de yang gcin sI ba'i nad du gyur nas/ shin tu mang ches par gyur pa ni/ gcin snyi be'i
226a4(sman dpyad): nad yin no zhes/ drang srong thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so// gaN+DIn spyi ba'i nad des thog mar 'debs pa'i mtshanA ma ni/ so la stsogs pa shin tu dri ma che bar 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag tsha ba dang / lus kyi mdog dam
226a5(sman dpyad): bor gyur pa dang / skom dred che ba dang / khar mngar ba bro ba rnams yin no// de la bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ chu 'dra ba zhes bya bu dang / bu ram shing gi khu bA dang 'dra ba dang / chang 'dra bA dang /
226a6(sman dpyad): 'bras phye 'dra ba dang / phye ma 'dra ba dang / bska ba dang / 'breng ba dang / lan tshwa 'dra ba dang / dbu ba 'dra ba dang / khu chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang rnam pa bcu'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ ljang
226b1(sman dpyad): sred zhes bya ba dang / sngon po dang / btsod kha dang / thal kha dang / khrag 'dra ba dang / skyur bu tshos pa zhes bya ba dang rnam pa drug go// rlung las gyur pa'i gcin skye ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ mAr khu dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang / sA
226b2(sman dpyad): rtsi 'dra ba dang / glang po che'i gcin 'dra ba dang / zhag 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang / rnam pa bzhi'o// gcin snyi bA'i nad 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni/ so so'i ming du smos pa'i don bzhin du lta'o// de la bad kan las
226b3(sman dpyad): gyur pa rnams ni gA so sla bar bshad do// rlung las gyur pa rnams ni/ glasor mi rung bar mthong ngo // mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams ni/ kha zas dang / sman gyis gso tsam du 'jog rus so// de las bad kan lngas gyur
226b4(sman dpyad): ba'i gcin sbyi ba'i nad yod pa lA ni/ smyen la la pud dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sle tres dang / a ru ra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pa tha dang / skyer pa dang / byi dang ga dang / yung dang / ardzun dang / byi tsher
226b5(sman dpyad): rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / byi dang gi dang / yung dang / skyer pi dwang / a ru ra dang / rgyu spros lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shings la dang / ardzu nA dang / ka dam pa dang / skyer pa dang / la la phud rnams lhano cig
226b6(sman dpyad): tu sbyar bi dang / tsan daMni dkar po dang / a ka ru dang / ru rta dang // thang shing rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / t+pa laM dang / gla sbrang dang / pe tha dang / tai ri ta dang / a ru re rnams lhan cig tu skyer ba dang / oM bash+tsA
227a1(sman dpyad): dang seng sdeng dang / skyed pa dang / ag+ni mAn+ta dang / 'bras bu gsum po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba bdun po 'di rnams las/ gang yang+ga rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/ sbrang

227a3(sman dpyad): dang / pu shrel tse dang / ni lo ba rI dang / gla sgang rnamasde lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / shug pa dang / gla sgang dang / a ru ra dang / dug mo nyung rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / u di ts+ya dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tig
227a4(sman dpyad): dang / gseng 'phrom dang / ka li ya ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar bA dang / ut+pal dang / pu shI la tsI dang / gseng phro ma dang / ardzu na dang / tsan dan dkar po rnams lhan tsog tu sbyar ba dang / snron gyi sbyar ba lU po 'di
227a5(sman dpyad): rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bskangs la/ sbring rdzi dang star+ya ti brud do// gtsinA snyi ba'i nad lA/ rlung gtso bor gyur la/ bad+ma kun dang / mkhris pa gnyi sna las/ gaucig grogs su gyur nA/ gang grogs
227a6(sman dpyad): su gyur pa rtogs par bya ste/ bad kan grogs su gyur pa la ni de dang 'phrod pa'i sman ro tsha zhing drod che ba'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang / sman gyi khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/

227b3(sman dpyad): blobro btsos pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du yung gi phye ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang / thang shing drung / sgyer po dang / gla sgang rnams sgrol ba'i khu ba bsgrang sA la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na dug mo nyung
227b4(sman dpyad): gri shing swap+tAr+Na dang / skyer ba dang / kru trug tris dang // 'bras bu gsum po rnams bsgrilA ba'i khu ba bsgyangs pa sbrang rtsi drang sbyar ba 'thungs na/ gcin snyi ba'i nad sal to/ shing sa la dang / s+yAska ra dang / kaM bi ka rnams
227b5(sman dpyad): phye ma zho gnyis gnyisngo skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi ra sbyar te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nAd thams cad selnga pa'i mchog yin no// yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am
227b6(sman dpyad): lcags kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ sman gyi lde gu gcin snyi ba'i nad bzlog pa'i phyir bza' bar bya'o// gseng phro ma dang / sug smal dang / kru trug tres dang / dan+da'i rtsa bo dang / ba
228a1(sman dpyad): Tha dang / gan+d+ha pa trA dang / shing tsa dang / nA ga ge sararA dang / klub dang / m+b+ha nA dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rtsa mchis dang / drugu mo nyung dang khi sha la dang khong da dkar po da / bar+b+bi dang / rAr+N+Na dang / myAn+tha dang / gAr+d+ha d+hA/
228a2(sman dpyad): yaM ku dang / byi dAng ka dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / pu tse shel dang / dbyi mong dang / pi pi lid dang / rtsa ba dang / la la phung rnams kyi phye ma zho grenyis gnyis chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du sgo la
228a3(sman dpyad): tre/ chu banI cha gcig lus nas bsgrangs te btsags la/ sbrang rtsi sman gyi khu ba gdungs pa de'i phye dang sbyar nas/ bum pa mar snod du byas pa'i nang du blugs te/ kha bcad la zla ba phyed kyi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa'i sbrang cher
228a4(sman dpyad): 'di les nyin rI bzhin srang gnyis gnyis 'thungs nra yang gcin snyi ba'i nad sel zhing / pho ba'i nad dang / skya rbabA kyi nad dang / gizhung 'brum dang / mdze dang / yi ga chus pa rnams 'joms par byed do// gcin snyin da yod pa'i kha zas
228a5(sman dpyad): ni/ tshod ma kha ba'i bag dAng / skam sa na gnas pa'i ri dgAs sha bkri'i sha dang / bya sha dang / nus lasA byas pa'i kha zas dang / mon sran sde'u dang / 'bras sa lu dang / zhag drug cu smin pa rnams dge'o// ske mA du nI bu ram+ba dang
228a6(sman dpyad): rgutshun chang dang / seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs pa skol ba'i khu ba dang / sbrang chang dang / rtswa ku sha skol ba'i khu ba dang / 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba rnams gcin snyi ba'i nad la bsdigs pa yin no// gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi rkyen

228b2(sman dpyad): sman dbyung gtses pa grub pa zhes bya ba bam po bzhi pa'o// de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par b+ha'o// mdze nad ni sdig can dang / kha zas ngan pa thos twe nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs nas/ begs pa dang / sha dang / khrug
228b3(sman dpyad): dradang chu ser rnams ma rung bar gyur pa la/ mdze nad rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur te/ mdze nad u dum+ba ra zhes bya ba/ u dum+be ra'i 'bras bu 'dra bA dang / sha gzi gu zhes bya dung gi khA dog 'dra ba dang / ka ka na zhes bya ba 'o ma
228b4(sman dpyad): se'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba dang / pags pa shul grub ces bya ba glang po che'i pags pa 'dra ba dang / pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba rang gi ming gi mdog 'dra ba dang / ri dgas ri sha'i lce 'dra ba zhes bya ba rtsub po dang / rma khru
228b5(sman dpyad): brgya pa zhes bya bi rma mang po dang / khyab pa rdul med ces bya ba dang / pags pa myags zhes bya ba pags pa zad pa dang / rkang pa zhigs pa zhes bya ba rkang pa ser ga mang po 'gas pa dang / mdze nad rnam pa bcu po 'di
228b6(sman dpyad): dag ni gsor mi rung ngo // lhag ma brgyad ni gsor rung ba yin te/ mdze nad gya mo 'dra ba zhes bya ba mdog gnag cing rtsub pa dang / me dpal zhes bya ba rma kha chen po dang / 'brum bu phra mo zhes bya ba sha sman 'dra zhing / mdog
229a1(sman dpyad): sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / shu ba zhes bya ba 'brus bu mang po phyogs gcig nas 'byung ba dang / sha bkra zhes bya ba ku ba'i me tog 'dra ba dang / thig le zhes bya ba mdog snum zhing 'byang dka' ba dang /
229a2(sman dpyad): g.yan pa zhes bya ba 'brum bu mdogra dkar zhing dmar baM dang / rkang shu zhes bya ba 'brum bu 'dzag pa rnams so// de la rlung las gyur pa'i mdze ni/ mkhrang zhing mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang / dmar zhing rtsub la mi bzad par na
229a3(sman dpyad): ba yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni lus tsha zhing shin tu myags l-i khrag 'dzeg pa yin par bshad do// bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad ni lus rul zhing pogs pa stug la g.ya' zhing medog sdum pa dang dkar

229a6(sman dpyad): nad tshabs chung ngu la ni zhal zhal gdab pa dang / sngab rus gzhib pa dang / ku bas khrag drang ba dang / srin bu pad bu 'jib tu bzhug go// nid gzhi tso 'dra ba las skyug sman dang / bkru sman yang bting ngo // 'dze nad
229b1(sman dpyad): gtar ga byar mi rung ba dang / tshor ba med pa bem bem po la ni sman mu ka'i thal ba dang / til gyi sogs ma'i thal ba la sogs pas gdab bo// mdze tshor ba med pa bem bem por gyur pa dang / pags pa mkhrang

230a2(sman dpyad): phreng ba rnams med par byed do// mkhris pa dang / khrag shas che ba'i mdze nad le ni/ mAr pa To la'i phye me dang skol ba 'am/ skyer ba'i phye ma dang skol bA 'am/ seng ldeng gi phye mya dang skol ba 'am/ nim pa'i phye mya dang skol/

230a4(sman dpyad): ba'i 'og tu zas su kro dri ba'i chan bza' bar bya ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re bzhin cho ga de ltar byas pa'i 'og tu zhag gsum gyi bAr du sman mi btang bar mthun zhing 'phrod pa'i kha zlas zlos li/ yang zhag
230a5(sman dpyad): bdAn gyi bA du/ sman gyi cho ga sngama? ltar bya ba de lto bur ma sos kyi bar du byas na/ mdze dang / sman+sa dang / dmu NIng dang / mtshan par rdol ba'i ni rnam sna las thar byAr 'gyur ro// yang na dze ti ka'i 'bras bu dang / sA
230a6(sman dpyad): ma'i me tog dang / tsha ba gsum po rnams btags la/ 'bru mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na ldong ros dang / na la sham btags pa'i til mar dang / shing arga'i lo ma dang / lus bskus na yang mdze nad cog sel
230b1(sman dpyad): to&.a ru r+ra dang / ka rany+dza dang / yungs kAr dang / yud dang / bAl guny+dza dang / rgyam tshwa dang / byi dang ga rnams lhan cig tu btags la/ bA gcin dang sbyar te lus bskus na yang mdze nad sel to// ru rta dang / e
230b2(sman dpyad): raN+Da dang / e dag dza rnams lhan cig tu ti lA mar ram/ ba gcin de de sbyar te lus bskus na yang mdze nad thub bo// gseng phro ma dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / rgyum tshwa dang / pre put+ka rnams kyang bsku ba'i rnam grangs su bshad

230b6(sman dpyad): ngam chu shing gi thal ba 'am/ shing kha ra'i me tog go thal ba gang yang rung ba til mar dang sbyar te lus bsdus de yang sha bkra sel bar byed do// sman dkun ti rma bya'i mkhris pa dang sbyar ba 'am/ sman pa la ka'i
