249a5(sman dpyad): te btung bar bya'o// mkhris pa dang / khrag ni da lngas gyur pa lA ni/ srin bu pad+ma pa rlig pa las khra 'a tu gsug pa dang / sman bIsil bas bsku zhing / sman gyi khu bu grang mos steng du blugs na? zhi par 'gyur ro// bad kAn
249a6(sman dpyad): las gyur pa la ni/ sman drod che ba btags pa'i phye ma pa gcin dang sbyar ba srin pas bsku zhing skal ba'i khu pi gcin dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// tshil rgyas pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad la ni//
249b1(sman dpyad): dugs bya ba dang / byi'u dug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan zhib tu btags te chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o// gcin las gyur pa la ni/ dang por rlig pa dugs byas pa'i rjes la rlig pa'i 'og gi srubs nas brtol te re
249b2(sman dpyad): zhig rma rtsi mI sbyar bar gce 'us bsu zhing ring du 'dzag tu gzhug go// rgyu mA rlugs pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs da dung tshabs chen por ma gyur pa ni/ bsreg pa dang / rlung sel ba'i sman rnams bya'o// bsreg go cog la ni
249b3(sman dpyad): bsregs pa'i 'og tu rna la cho ga ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bya'o// gcin sri ba'i nang sel ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// // de nas rtug skam gyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rtug skam gyi na ni/ dri ma
249b4(sman dpyad): 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung long kA na gnas pa 'khrugs te shas che bar gyur pas phyis bskams nas thur du 'ong ba'i lam 'gags te gyen du 'khyil bar gyur pa ni rtug skam gyi nang bskyed par bshad do// de'i mtshwa
249b5(sman dpyad): ma ni snying dang mkhal steng+ge dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / lgang pa chu so skrang pa dang / lto sgo ba dang / skad 'gag cing / lkog nad lha 'or du 'gyur ba dang / rIms kyis 'debs shing skyug pa dong / mig ljongs shing 'on par
249b6(sman dpyad): 'gyur ba dang / skom pa'i nad la sogs pa nad kyi sna grangs 'di rnams skye bar 'gyur te rtug skam gyi nad yod pa la ni dang por lus snum gyis bsku zhing dril ba dang / dugs byos la sman gyi reng bus gzhug pa
250a1(sman dpyad): dang bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / sman mar btung ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang / bkru sman btang ba'i las rnams bya'o// de la sman reng bu mas btang ba'i cho ga ni son+da cha
250a2(sman dpyad): dang / khyim gyi du ba dang / tso bAs ru tsha dang / tshwa ba gsum dang / bu ram rnams kyi byA mA bA gcin gyi nang du/ khaN+Da tshos pa tsam du skol te reng pu mthe bo tsam du byas nI sa mar gyis bskus te mas btang na phyi sa
250a3(sman dpyad): 'byung bar 'gyur la lto spo zhing na ba yang sel to// yang na khyim gyi du ba dang / pi pi ling dang / po sngon cha dang / yungs kar dang / pu ram rnams kyi phye mA la gcin gyi nang du khAN+Da tshos pa tsam skol te/ snga ma
250a4(sman dpyad): bzhin du rnyed bur byas pa yang bzang ngo // yang na shing kun dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang / tsA bas ru tsha rnams yas kyi rim+ba bzhin du drang po'i cha gnyis kyis bskyed de btags le chu
250a5(sman dpyad): skol ba dron po da sbyar te 'thungs na yang sto sgo ba dang / zug cing n+ya pa dang / snying na byA dang / snyun rnams sel to// shring nye rong cha gnyis dang / pI pi ling chu bzhi dang / a ru rA cha lnga rnams btags te/ de rnams
250a6(sman dpyad): sbyar ba bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i bu ram gyi nang du khaN+Da tshes pa tsam du skol la rol lur byas pa de ni phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad sel bar byed do// kha zas su ni nas rjen pa khram khrom du btags
250b1(sman dpyad): pa'i chun 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan pa 'am/ gzhan yang gang de dang 'phrod pa'i kha zas rnams bza' bar bya'o// de ltar rlung gi g.yos phyi sa 'gag par 'gyur ba las mkhris pa dang pad+ma kan bla gnyen du gyur pa
250b2(sman dpyad): lA nI de gnyis la phan pa'i sman mas btang ba rnam gnyis bya'o// rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gag pa'i nod ni chu sor zug par byed do// mkhris pa las gyur pa ni lte ba'i phyogs tsha ba yin no// bad kanA las gyur pa
250b3(sman dpyad): ni snying na ba dang / dang ka mer mer po dang / kha nas chu 'byung bar byed do// nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan mo thams cad dang ldan pa yin te spang bar bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'ag
250b4(sman dpyad): pa'i nAd la ni/ la la phud dang / shing kun dang / rgyam tshwa dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / kha ru tshwa dang / a rA ra rnams kyi phye ma chang zhim po dang sbyar te 'thungs na sel bar byed do// yang na kha ru tshwa drang shu dag
250b5(sman dpyad): dang go stong dang / na le sham rnams yis kyi rimo bzhin du/ snga ma snga mA las nyis 'gyur du bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma kha lung gi khu ba dang sbyar te brdzis pa'i ril bu zos na yang rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa
250b6(sman dpyad): 'gag pa'i nad sel to// yang na rlung las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gag pa'i nad la/ tshwa dang skar bu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / la la phung dang / rgya mtsho dang / kha ru tsha dang / tsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma/ kha lung gi khu ba
251a1(sman dpyad): dang sbyar te ril lur byas pa bzla' bar bya'o// ldum bu se ya ba dang / a ru ra dang / shing kun dang / mya nu dAng / rgyam tsha dang / kha ru tshwa dang / tsabs ru tshwa rnams kyi phye ma nA sa btsos pa'i
251a2(sman dpyad): khu bu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung los gyur pa'i phye sa 'gag pa dang skran dang / rlung nad/ rmugs byed rnams sel to// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad la ni/ spr-i ru ra'i khu bu dang / bri da
251a3(sman dpyad): ri'i khu ba dang / khyi lce ba'i khu ba dang / rgun gyi khu ba rnams las gang yang rung ba kha ra dnga? sbyar te 'thungs na de ma thag tu sel to// yang nr-i skyu ru ri'i phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'bras brdos pA'i phye
251a4(sman dpyad): ma dang / kha ra sbrang rtsi dwang sbyar ba ba tu do// bAd kan lus gyur pa'i phyi s+ya 'gagasdu pa'i nod la nI/ shu dag dang / gla sbrang dang / kru trug tres dang / u ru ra dang / bru tse she lo rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dong
251a5(sman dpyad): sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bil+lA la sogs bya'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu bo dron mo nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal bA drang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// // da ni snying na ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/ snyi na byA lnga ni
251a6(sman dpyad): rlu nga la sogs pa nang gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las nang du gyur pa dang / srin bu'i nyes pa las gyur pa dang / rnam pa lnga yod de/ thams cad kyang zug cing na ba yin no// bye
251b1(sman dpyad): brag tu na srin bu las gyur pa ni/ snying g.ya' lding na/ de la rlung lAs gyur pa'i snying na pa la ni/ tsa Ta bsgos pa'i nang pu tIl mar dang / rgyam tshwa blugs te btung bar bya'o// yang nA tIl mar sgrol ba/
251b2(sman dpyad): bA gan+dan dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skan drang / zug cing na ba dang / lto sgo ba yang sel to// yang na a ru rany+dzi 'brum bu lnga bcu'i phye ma dang / kha ru tsha srang gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / chu mir
251b3(sman dpyad): gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na snying na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba dang / skran rnams sel to// bun+na'i sgra dang / khu ru tsha da / sha kun dang bal po se'u dang /
251b4(sman dpyad): star bu rnams kyi phye ma chu sgrol ba dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi bde ba dang / snying na ba selu to// mi khris pa las gyur pa'i snying nI bA la ni/ sman bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs byas lus
251b5(sman dpyad): baM blugs pa dang // sman bsnol ba'i lde gus bskyo ba dang / sman mang+gar nAg gi bkru sman btang ngo // yang na pu tse shel gyi phye ma 'am/ shing mngar gyi phye ma glang yang rung ba khar chu dang sbyar ba'i nang du
251b6(sman dpyad): blugs te btung ngo // sman stir la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma/ mar dang / chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'o ma dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba dang / rgun gyi khu ba gsum las gang yong rung ba mar gyi
252a1(sman dpyad): tshad dang mnyam pa'i nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba sel to// bAd kan las gyur ba'i snying na ba la ni/ pi pi ling
252a2(sman dpyad): dang li zur bA dang / shu dag dang / ra snA dang / b+h+r-itsa'i sgra dang / u ru ra dang / mAn+yA rnams kyi phye mu bu gIcin bsros pa dang / sbyar bA bau tung ngam/ yang nra sman de dag nyid pa gcin dang skol+la te bzhi cha lus pa btung bar
252a3(sman dpyad): bya'o// nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i snying na bA la ni/ thog mar sbyang ba'i cho ga byas lo de'i 'og tu ny+tsam+be stobs dang sbyor zhing / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gang shas che ba'i cho ga bya'o// srin bu las gyur
252a4(sman dpyad): bo'i snying na bA lA ni/ byi da ga dang / ru rti'i phye ma pa gcin dang sbyar te btu d+ya bAr bya'o// rtug skam+bu gso bo'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// / de nas smyo byed dang / brjed byed kyi nad gso bi'i le'u bshad par
252a5(sman dpyad): bya'o// de lnga smyo byed kyi nad ni gzhan gyis ngan du byas pa dang / kha zos dang / skom mi gtsang ba zlos shing / 'thungs pA dang / 'jigs shing spungs pa dang / mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ yid dang / blo dang / dran pa log cing
252a6(sman dpyad): 'khrug pa yin no// de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad de/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi mtshan ma ni/ rang nyid la tsham rngam bya cing rdeg pa dang / ngu ba dang / rgod pa dang / glu len pa rnams yin par shes par
252b1(sman dpyad): byAbya'o// mkhris pA las gyur pa'i mtshan mA ni/ khro ba dang / bsgril bya 'dod pa dang / sdigs pa dang / snyigs pa la sogs pa rnams yin no// bad kan+da las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ gnyid che ba dang / smra ba nyung ba dang / bud
252b2(sman dpyad): midra la dga' zhing snyeg pa dang / kha zas mi 'dod pa rnams yin no// kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan te/ ma rungs pa yin gyis spang bar bya'o// glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni/ lha la sogs
252b3(sman dpyad): pa'i gdon 'khrugs pas ngan du byas pa las gyur pa yin te/ mi ma yin pa'i shes pa dang / shes nyen dang / stobs dang / tshig dang / dpa' ba la sogs pa dang ldan por shes par bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i spyo byed
252b4(sman dpyad): kyi nad lnga ni/ thog mar sman mar btung bar bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa lA ni/ thog mar bukru sman btang ngo // bad kan las gyur pa la ni thog mar skyug sman btang ngo // de ltar so so'i tshe gau sngar bya ba rnams byas po'i 'og tu
252b5(sman dpyad): 'jamra rtsims btang ba dang / bkru sman drag phyo mas btang ba la sogs pa'i cho gra rim bzhin bya'o// de'i 'og tu yung dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bras bu go sumi drang / shing nye rong dang / shu dag dang / yungs kar dang / shring kun dang
252b6(sman dpyad): shi ri sha dang / ka Ta b+hi dang / shr-i ti dang / btsod dang / tsha ba gsum dang / thang shing dang / ka rany+dza rnams kyi phye ma mar dang ba gcin gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na smye byed kyi nad
253a1(sman dpyad): sel to// yang na sman+da de dag nyid kyi phye ma mar dang ra gcin gyi nang du skol te/ mUrar+ya nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni/ sman gnod sel cis bya ste/ 'di zos na brjed byed kyi nad dang / dug sel bar byed
253a2(sman dpyad): do/ sman pa tha dang / a ru ra dang / shig gru dang / shu dag dang / tsha ba gsum dang / rgya me tshwa rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang / mar srang sum cu rtsi gnyis ra'i 'o ma'i nang du sgrol te/ mar nyi tshwa lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni lce bde
253a3(sman dpyad): byed pa zhes bya ste/ 'di lasU rlan par zos na/ dran pa gsal ba dang / yid gzhungs par 'gyur zhing 'on pa dang / dig pa dang / lkug pa rnams kyang de'i mthus sel bar byed do// yang na shing mngar dang / shing kun dang / shu dag
253a4(sman dpyad): dig dang / rgya spos dang / shi ri sha dang / sgog skya dang / ru rta rnams rA gcin+da gyi nang du brAdAr+ya te btsugs pa'i khu ba snar blugs shIng / mig tu bsku bar bya'o// / smyo byed kyis thebs pa la/ thog mar ni/ bcing ba dang / rdeg pa
253a5(sman dpyad): dang gar yang mi btang bar bsrung zhing / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsdigs la di'i 'og tu tshig 'jam pos gzham par bya'o// glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nod kyis thebs pa la ni/ sman pa gtsang zhing re ba med pas
253a6(sman dpyad): mchod pa dang / gtor ma dang / tshe shos dang / mchod sbyin dang / sbyin sreg dang / sngags dang / mig tu bsdu ba dang / sngar brug pa la sogs pas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsal bar bya'o// da ni brjed byed kyi bye brag bshad par
253b1(sman dpyad): bya ste/ brjed byed ni/ mun pa 'dra bas sems non nas na gzhi shas tsher 'khrugs pa las dran pa nyams shing khro bar gyur pa la brjed byed kyi nad ces bya'o// de yang rnam pa bzhi ste ma rungs pa yin par shes par bya'o//
253b2(sman dpyad): do lnga rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa lngas gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams kyi mtshan mA ni/ mdog gnag pa dang / ser ba dang / dkor bya rnams yina? te go rim bzhin du sbyar bI dang / ci mthong ngo cog kyang de dag so
253b3(sman dpyad): so'i rnams pa mthong ba yin no// nad gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur pa'i brjed byed kyi na da ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ gluso dka' ba yin/ de dag la thog mor ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /
253b4(sman dpyad): 'jam rtsims btang ba dang / skyug sman btang ba dang / bkru smyen btang ba dang / sman sner blugs pa dang / cho ga rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams na gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du btang bar bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa la ni bkru sman drag
253b5(sman dpyad): po mas btang ba dang / 'jami rtse masi btang bar bya'o// mkhris pa la ni bkru smin btang ngo // bad kan las gyur pa le nI smyug sman btang ngo // sman snar blugs pa ni so so'i smanA las sbyar na kun la yang phran no// kun
253b6(sman dpyad): 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni/ gang shas che ba dang yang sbyar zhing / cho ga de rnams las gang 'os pa btang bar bya'o// cho ga de dag gis lus rab tu dag par gyur nas/ de'i 'og tu ni smyo byed kyi nad bsal ba'i cho ga sder
254a1(sman dpyad): bstan pa bzhin du bya'o// yanga? na smAn+da shAng ka pu shi dang / shu dgA dang / ru d+ha rnams kyi phye ma sman bram m+b+hi khu ba dang / mar+ra rnying pA lo du ma lon pa'i nAng du skol lA mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te tsi ran
254a2(sman dpyad): bar 'thungs na brjed byed dang / skyo byed can sel zhing yid gzhungs pararu byed pa'i mchog yin no// mar dang til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / 'o ma mar gyi bcu drug gi nang du 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu
254a3(sman dpyad): lngar bshad pa rnams kyi phye ma sr-ing re re skol lA mar dang trile mar ny+Ni tsho lus pa btsags twe run par 'thungs ni yang brjed byed kyi nang sel to// shi kru dang / ru Na dang / lcong roswa dang / go snyod dang / sgog skyi dang /
