254a6(sman dpyad): byed kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa rdzogs so// // de nas rlung nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rlung nad rnam pa brgyad cu ni/ rlung 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste de rnams spyi'i mtshan ma ni nai ba dang / yan la
254b1(sman dpyad): chug pa snyam byed pa dang / zug pa dang / yan lag 'khums pa dang / sha skam pa dang / drag tu btsir bA 'dra bar na ba rnams yin no// de la rlung nad dam po zhes bya ba ni rang dbang med par lus 'gul ba
254b2(sman dpyad): yin no// rlung naudA skyur po gzhu 'khums bzhin du 'dug pa'o// rlung nang gzhogs phyed na ba zhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi gzhogs phyed ril gyis na bar byed pa'o// rlung na dr-i lag pa yab cig 'jas pa zhes bya ba ni/
254b3(sman dpyad): rlung gis phrag bi'i rtsa 'khums par byas pa yin par shes par bya'o rlung nud dpyi mig man cad zug pa'i de skran nI/ brla man chad du na ste/ smyung bskum mi nus te/ rting pa nas sor mo'i bAr du na zhing 'gro mi
254b4(sman dpyad): bA byas pa yin no// rlung rlung kha yon zhes bya ba ni/ rlung gis kha phyogs gcig tu yo bar byas pa yin par bshad do// rlung nang pus mo sbyang ba zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang khrag rgyus pas pus mo'i lha de sbyang bar byed kyi
254b5(sman dpyad): yin no// de lnga sman mar gyisA lus bsku ba dang / dugs bya ba dang / smana? mas btang dang / sngar thugs pa dang / snum gyis bkru sman btang ba dang / kha zos snum pa dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / ro
254b6(sman dpyad): tsa bar byed pa'i bag rnams ni rlung nad sel to// sman pa l-i dang / se ri ya gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba'i nad du de nyid kyi phyi ma/ til mar dang / 'o ma lhan cig tu skal la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags
255a1(sman dpyad): te 'thung sA na/ rlung nad kyi sna grangs thams cad sel to// ya dA na/ til mar dang / 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gAnyis gnyis dang / sman+ma a shwa gan+d+ha srang lnga bcu skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur
255a2(sman dpyad): gyi nang du/ spang spos dang / shing tsa dAng / gan+d+ha pi tra dang / btsod dang / tra ban+ti dang / byi'u rug pa dang / dza ti dang / ba lA dang / thang shing dang / sI rA dang / shing mngar drang / ra sA dang / sug smel dang / ma nu dang / shu dag
255a3(sman dpyad): dang / gze ma dang / ru rtA dang / pu ti ka da d+ya/ shu ti dung / puD+ga Na bI dang / br-i ha tI dang / pu shel rtsi dang / bi ra ri rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis lha ni cig tu skol te til mar 'ba' zhig lus
255a4(sman dpyad): pa btsags pa'i mIng ni a shwa gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i til mir zhes bya ste/ btung ba dang / lus bsku ba dang / smar blugs pA dang / masa? btang ba rnam pa bzhi po dag tu sbyar na rlung nad thams cad sel to// til
255a5(sman dpyad): mar dang / la phug gi khu ba srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / zho dang / rtsa bas skyur po dang / 'o ma rnams las re re yang / tIl mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'di rnams kyi nong du/ shu dag dang / ba la dang / ra sna
255a6(sman dpyad): dang / ma nu dang / bca' sga dang / kru trug tres dang / shi kru dang / rgyam tsha dang / gze mi dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i til mar gyi sman yang rlung nad kyis nyami
255b1(sman dpyad): thag pa thams cad sel ba yin no// til mar dang / 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang gnyis dang / sman+da pras ra ni srang brgya skolnga ba'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / 'di rnams kyi nang du sman dzi ba ka
255b2(sman dpyad): dang / ri sha b+ha ka dang / med rnam gnyis dang / bu tshang rtong dang / re mnya dang / ru N+Da dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / shu ti dang / thang shing dang / btsod drang / ra sna rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa
255b3(sman dpyad): btsugs pa 'di las mas btang ba la sogs par sbyar na yAng rlung sel to// til mar dang / 'o ma srang sumA cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / gze ma'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi gyur gyi nang du bu ram dang / bca'
255b4(sman dpyad): sgra'i phye ma srang brgyad brgyad lhan cig tu skol lA til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par 'thungs pa'i 'og tu 'o ma 'thungs la thur du 'khrus pa chud pa'i rjes la/ bca' sga dang / bu ram sbyar ba
255b5(sman dpyad): zos nas sman snga ma btang ba dang / zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas 'o mA dang lhan cig tu zos nA rlung nad mi bzad pa thams cad sel to// mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / srog skya srang brgya skol ba'i khu
255b6(sman dpyad): pa mar gyi bzhi 'gyur rnams kyi nang du dbyi mo dang / kru trug tres dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang / bca' sgra dang / shing kun dang / lan tshwa rnam lnga dang / 'di rnams las sreng re raM dang / sbyar
256a1(sman dpyad): srang phyed dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni sgrog sgyu la sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste 'di las ran par 'thung snga na rlung nad dang / rlung nad rkang
256a2(sman dpyad): zug ya gcig 'jos pa dang / rlung nad gzhogs byed na ba dang / skran la sogs pa srel to// dbyi mo dang / kho ru tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shog gru dang / rgyam tshwa dang 'o su'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma zho
256a3(sman dpyad): gnyis gnyis drang / mar srang sum+bi cu rtsa gnyis dad+yau/ la phug gi khu ba dang / sge'u gsher gyi khu bo dang / sha khu dang / tshwa dang / rtsabs skyur po dang / zho ga chu dang / dar bu rnams las srang sum cu rtsa gnyis
256a4(sman dpyad): gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi nang du skol la mAr+ra nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa lasa? ran par 'thungs na yang rlung nud sel to// rlung nyi tshe'i nad la ni/ snu mA rnam pa bzhi po// zhag dang rkang dang / mar dang / til mur
256a5(sman dpyad): rnams kyi sman bting bar bya'o// rlung yod pa'i steng du/ bang kana? dang / mkhris pa'i bla gnyen gyis thegs pa la ni re zhig bla gany+dzan btsan par byas te de zhi bar bya bya'i cho ga de bya'o// de la bad kan la ni sman drod
256a6(sman dpyad): che zhing rno ba rnams btang ngo // mkhris pa la ni sman mngar zhing bsil ba'i bag btang bar bya'o// rlung nad ba rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang / rlung nang pus mo sgreng ba la ni/ thog mar gtar te khrag phyung la/
256b1(sman dpyad): d+he nas rlung nAd sel ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o// bad+ma'i nang na bad ka dang / tshul 'dug pa gnyis ldan pas rlung non te/ brla rengs pa'i nad drug po bskyed pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni shin du lci bar gyur cing sgyid lug pa
256b2(sman dpyad): yin te/ de la ni/ thog mar bad kan sel ba'i spyan rngub blo cog go cho gu byas la/ de'i 'og tu rlung bsal ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o// / dreg ni/ mi sgying de bAr 'jus cing sdug ma myong ba las ngal bu la sogs pa drag shul gyi bag byas
256b3(sman dpyad): pas rlung dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ thog ma ni rkang lag gi naud na gnas la phyis lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de la rlung shas che ba'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ nai ba dang / rus pa krum zhing 'gas pa dang / lus skam pa dang
256b4(sman dpyad): rtsub pa dang / mdog gnag pa rnams yin par bshad do// khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing skrang ba dang / lhang ljang bor na ba dang / chu sar 'dzag cing 'jig pa dang / na ba dang / lus tsha
256b5(sman dpyad): bo dang / mdog 'jam pa rnams yin no// bad+ma kan las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ tshor mi na la/ lus g.ya' zhing rengs pa dang / cher skrangs pa rnams yin no// nang gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus pa dang / gsum char 'dus pa lnga
256b6(sman dpyad): gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ mtshan ma gong du bstan pa rnams cha 'dres pa las rtogs par bya'o// dreg nad gzhi gcig las byung la/ gsar pa ni gso sla ba yin no// nang gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las byung ba/ lo gcig tshun chad
257a1(sman dpyad): lon pa ni// kha zas dang sman gyi so tsam du 'jog nus so// nang gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las byung la/ cha rdol cing 'dzag ste rus pa 'gas pa gang yin pa ni/ gsor mi rung ste srung bar bya'o// de la dregs
257a2(sman dpyad): gso ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar spyan mar blud de/ nyam stobs bskyed pa'i 'og tu/ rlung nye tshe lus skyer ba ma gtogs pa/ gzhan rnams la gtar gA gdab cing khrag dbyung ngo // de'i 'og tu rlung gzhi gang yin pa dang sbyar zhing
257a3(sman dpyad): bkru sman drag po mas btang bri dang / 'dzom rtsi mas btang ba dong / skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / sman snar blugs pa dang / cho ga rnam pa lbu po sngar bstan pa 'di rnams las gang 'os btang bur bya ste/ rlung los gyur
257a4(sman dpyad): pa la ni/ sman mas btang ba'i cho ga bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa l-i ni/ bkru sman btang ngo // bad kin lis gyur pa la ni skyug sman btang ngo // ya nu rlung shas che ba las gyur pa'i dregra la ni/ bag che mor dung / r-i'i 'o ma
257a5(sman dpyad): dang sbyar bas bskus na sel bar 'gyur ro// yang na til brngos pa'i phye ma 'o mau dang sbyar ba 'am/ zur ma'i phye ma 'o ma drang sbyar ba 'am/ shu ti'i phye ma 'o ma drang sbyar ba 'am/ e raN+Da'i sa bon gyi phye ma 'o ma dang
257a6(sman dpyad): sbyar ba gang yang rung bas bslu bar bya'o// yang na chu na gnas pa'i srog chags nya lo sogs pa'i sha gang yang rung ba zhib tu brdungs pa ste/ spong sna tshogs kyis btab la legs par bcos pas bsku bar bya'o//
257b1(sman dpyad): mdzes pa shes rgyu ba las gyur ba'i drug la na/ shing myu sa phyi sa mang dang / 'o m+b+ha drung // skye rnams sbyang ba'i lce klus bAsgyu// Ad na 'a n+yad ces b+ha ba sman+da swA b+han rnams btu gas pa rgyu ba mang dang sgyu
257b2(sman dpyad): bas bstsu bar bya'o// bad kAn+te shas che ba las gyur pa'i drug lo ni/ a shA gan+d+ha dang / til gyi b+h+yA myA 'amaM/ yang nu yu sa kA raM g+h+ri phye ma 'am/ yong pud+d+ha r+m+ma ba dang / shr-IklAny+dzi phyi myA dang / 'di rnams gling yang rung br-i/ biM kuN+Di
257b3(sman dpyad): dang sbyar te bstu bur bya'o// dregA go cogA lA ni a ru ra'i phye ma bu ramA dang sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o// yang nA sle tresa? bskol bi'u khru bru btung bar bya'o// yung+ga na bi pi ling 'o me dang bskol ba'i sman bcud kyis len+da
257b4(sman dpyad): btung bar bya ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du prI pi ling lnga lngas bskyed de/ pi pi long gi grangs brgyar phyin nas/ nyin gcig bzhin pi pi ling lnga lngas phyi ste/ pri pi ling lnga la thug nas yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed de/ bsko
257b5(sman dpyad): ba dang lta bu cho ga legs par bsrung zhing / rtag tu btung bar bya'o// rlung nad gso ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// / de nas chang nad de gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dug la phrin gnod rnam pa bcu yod
257b6(sman dpyad): par bsten pa gang yin pa de rnams ni chang la yong yod de/ de btung nyes pa las nad gzhi rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bang kan rnams 'khrugs nas/ chang nad drag por skyo bar 'gyur ro// de la rlung gis tshul gyur
258a1(sman dpyad): pra'i mtshanA ma ni/ smra ba thogs pa dang / mang du smra ba dang / smra ba la bskam pa dang / tshigra mi brtan zhing khral khul ba dang / lus rtsub cing mdog sngon por 'gyur bA dang / dmar por 'gyur ba dang /
258a2(sman dpyad): myos pa rnams yin no// mkhris pas tshul gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang / khro zhing 'thab par dga' ba yin no// bad kani gyis tshul 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni/ smra ba nyung ba dang / tshig 'brel ba
258a3(sman dpyad): dang / sems pa dang / bzhin mdog dpal skya ba dang / rgyud zhan pa rnams yin no// nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las tshul gyur pA ni de dag thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad kyi mtshan
258a4(sman dpyad): ma ni/ snying dang / klad pa dang / rtsib log nu ba dang / lus rings pa dang / skyigs bus 'debs pa dang / lud pa lu ba rnams yin no// mkhris pa las byung ba'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ skom dad che ba dang / lus
258a5(sman dpyad): ba dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / mdog ser por 'gyur ba dang / mi dran zhing myos pa rnams yin no// bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ myer mer po dang / kha nas chu 'byung ba dang / yi ge 'chus pa dang / smyug
258a6(sman dpyad): pa dang / lus rengs pa rnams yin no// nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i chang nad ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni/ chang snga ma 'thungs po nu
258b1(sman dpyad): bar gyur pa'i 'og tu/ chang gi nung du kha ru tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang / chu nyung zad cig blugs te 'thungs na sel bar byed do// yanga? na chang gi nang du tshwa dung kha ru tshwa dang / nA le sham dang / zim+b+ha thig
258b2(sman dpyad): le dang / la la phud rnams kyi phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang / rlung las gyur pa'i chang na drag po sel to// yang na rlung las gyur ba'i chung nad bsal ba'i phyir/ chang 'ol kon gyi skyo mar byas pa'i nang du//
258b3(sman dpyad): rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / bal po se'u dang / tin+ti la'i 'bras bu dang / la la pud dang / rgyam tshwa rnams kyi phye ma blugs te ltung bar bya'o// skom du ni kha lung dang / bal bo se'u skyur chu'i nang du mnyes te btung bar
258b4(sman dpyad): bya'o// ri dgas skams na gnas pa'i sha khu snum dang ldan pa 'am/ rgyam tsha dang / bal b+ho se'u dang / sbyar ba yang btung ba dngakha zas sgeg par bzang ngo // mkhris pa las gyur ba'i chang nad la ni//
258b5(sman dpyad): tshong dang chu phyed mAr byas la/ sbrang rtsi dang / kha ri dang sbyaR+She te btung bar bya'o// yang na smen e dar bag bskol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang sbyar bya 'am/ mon sran sne'u'i khu bcud kha ra drang sbyar ba lAm/ sman mdar
258b6(sman dpyad): bag bskol ba'i khu bo las sha btsos te bsdus pa'i khu ba rnams las gang yang rung ba btung bar bya ste/ thams cad kyang grong mos byas pa yin no// bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni smyig sman
259a1(sman dpyad): chang dang sbyar te skyug tu gzhug pa dang / nyam stobs dang sbyar te smyung ba'i cho ga yang bya'o// yang na drod bskyed pa'i sman gyi phye ma chung dang sbyar ba 'am/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba/
259a2(sman dpyad): tsha ba gsum gyi phyi ma dang sbyar ba btung zhing cho ga bsrung bar bya'o// khA zas ni nas las byas pa'i khwa zas la phug skam po'i khru bcu dang / rgya sran gyi khu bcud gang yang rung bas s+pho da tsha bas sha snyed de sbyar
259a3(sman dpyad): ba dang / ri dgas skam sa na gnas pa'i shA s+yAma? bag chung ba da / lhan cig tu bzla'o// chang nAd kyi rkyen gyis bskos pa'i nad dang / rim dang / lud pa dang / rtsibs ldog na ba dang / 'khru ba la stsogs pa'i nadr-i
259a4(sman dpyad): bla gnyan gang yang rung ste/ de dag la ni so so'i sman btang bas zhi bar bya'o// tshang gis lus kyi sha zlad par gyur pa la ni/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang / 'jam rtsims btang ba dang / snum gyis lus bsku zhing
259a5(sman dpyad): dril bA dang / khrus bya ba dang / sman mar dang / 'o ma blud pa rnams kyis brta bar bya'o// de lnga sman mar ni nye'u shing dang / bud+d+ha r+Na ba dang / shring mdur gyi phye ma blug mar dang chu mar gyi bzhi gyur gyi nang du bskol te//
259a6(sman dpyad): mar nyi tse lus pa las rin por btung ngo // yang na ba la dang / a ti la pa bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs ni zad byed kyi nad sel to// pu na rno ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ mar dang / 'o ma dang
259b1(sman dpyad): shing mngar gyi phye ma blugs te/ bskol la mar nyi tshe lus pa tsir bya las rlan par 'thungs na yang / chang 'thungs pas mdangs med par byas pa phyir brta zhing sor chud par byed do// chang nad gso ba'i
259b2(sman dpyad): le'u ste nyi shu rtsartse gnyis pa rdzogs so// // de nas me dpal gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// me dpal ni/ lan tshwa dang / sgyur ba dang / tsha ba dang / drod che zhing rno ba la sogs pa'i kho zas rtag tu zos pas
259b3(sman dpyad): nad gzhi 'khrugs par byas pa las me dpal rnam pa bdun du shes par bya ste/ me dpal zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad du mched cing 'jug pa yin no// de la rlung las gyur pa'i mi dpal gyi mtshan
259b4(sman dpyad): mA ni/ 'brum bu 'jam zhing mdog gnag pA dang / skrang ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / gzer ba rnams yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dpal gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'bum bu'i mdog ser
259b5(sman dpyad): brIng du mar ba dang / lusa? tsha dang / rims kyis 'debs pa rnams yin no// bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbalpA g+h+ri man ma ni/ 'brum bri'i mdog dwakar zhing dpal smra ba dang / g.ya' zhing bad kan
259b6(sman dpyad): gyi rims 'debs pa yin no// kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i me dpal ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ glo rdol ba las gyur pa'i me dpal ni/ khrag dang / mkhris pa gnyis las 'byung ste/
260a1(sman dpyad): 'brum pa'i mdog gnag pa dang / sngo skyar 'dug pA dang / dmar ba dang / skrang ba dang brnags nas rdol ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / rims bdo bar byed pa rnams yin par bshad do// me'i me dpal
260a2(sman dpyad): zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dag las 'byung ste/ 'brum bu'i mdogra mes bsregs pa 'dra la/ nyen bskor me mdag bzhin du dmar zhing / lus tshwa ba dang / skom dud che ba dang // 'khru ba la sogasla ba'i mtshan ma
260a3(sman dpyad): las rtogs par bya'o// mi dpal rdzab 'dra zhes bya ba ni/ bad kun dang mkhris pa las 'byung ste/ 'brum bu'i mdog dpral skya zhing dmar ba dang / gnag cing 'tsher te dri mes g.yogs pA drung / tsha zhing nye skor du chu
260a4(sman dpyad): ser gyi 'dam zhing du 'dug pa rnams yin no// de la nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa'i mi dpal ni gso sla ba yin no// lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gsor mi rung bar bshad do// lus kyi phyi nang gnyis kar byung
260a5(sman dpyad): ba dang / tshigs kyi steng du byung ba ni/ bdun char yang lhag par gsor ma rung ngo // de la rlung las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni/ rtsa ba lnga'i sman lta phug lnga sngar bshad pa'i nang du nas/ rtsa'i rtsa ba lnga pa ma gautogs par rtsa ba lnga pa
260a6(sman dpyad): rnam pa bzhi po rnams las gang yang rung bas lus bsku ba dang / nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang / sman mar sbyar ba la sogs pa bya'o// yang na 'bras dang / nas dang shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma med dang / 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/
260b1(sman dpyad): thug pa tshos par byas pas nu ba'i steng du bsku bar bya'o// yang na 'o mas na ba'i steng du blugs par bya'o// yang na mar gyi snying pos steng du blugs par bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni/ sman pra put+pa ri ka dang / btsod
260b2(sman dpyad): dang / shug pa dang / pu shel tsi dang / tsan dan dang / shing mngar dang / ut+pa la rnams kyi phye ma 'o mau dang sbyar ti bsku bar bya'o// yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshun sngar bshad pas nad kyi sted du khu ba blugs pa dang /
260b3(sman dpyad): bsdu ba dang / sman+da mUr sbyar ba rnams byas na bzung ngo // yang na mar gzhu zhing 'khyeg du bcug pa de lta byur/ lan bai rgyu'i bor du b+hus te/ rul bar gyur pa'i nang du/ shing mngar gyi phyi ma shas cher b+h+r-ig s+yai sbyar bas bslu ba
260b4(sman dpyad): byo'o// yang na lokr-I mrig dang / pu shrel tsau dang / tsan dan dang / gla sgang dang / mu ti gA dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsug rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang / 'o mar sbyar te/ bskus nra mkhris pa las gyur bri'i maM dpal sel to//
260b5(sman dpyad): kan las gyur pa'i mi dpal lA nI/ seng ldeng dang / sap+ta pUn+d+ha dang / gla sgang dang / shing d+ha ba dang / dong ga dang / thang shing dang / ku rat+no rnams bdar ba'i lde gus bskus na zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang na shing mngar dang / 'bras bu
260b6(sman dpyad): gsum dang / bu tshang rto dang / shi ri sha rnams bdar ba'i lde gus bsku'o// yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i me dpal la/ sman pa ru na la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis bsku ba dang / khu bas blugs pa dang / sman mar sbyar ba
261a1(sman dpyad): la sogs pa byas na bzang ngo // pa to la dang / nim+ba dang / skyer ba'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags dang / pu tse shel dang / khyi lce ba dang / shing mngar rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thung na yang me dpal thams cad sel
261a2(sman dpyad): tot+mag+ma sgang dang / nim+ba dang / pa tau la rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang / me dpal lo tsog sel to// yang na skyu ru ra dang / pau hau la dang / mon sran sde'u rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar te bAtung bar bya'o//
261a3(sman dpyad): mdor na me dpal la ni/ dang por skyug sman dang / bkru sman gyi sbyang ba dang / gtur zhing khrag dbyung ba rnams kyang bya'o// cho ga de ltar byas pa las kyang 'brum bu rnags te rdol ba las gyur pa la ni/ rma gso ba'i tshe/
261a4(sman dpyad): gar bstan pa thams cad bya'o// me dbalnga gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // sman dpyad gtses pa grub pa zhes bya ba/ bam po drug pa'o// de nas skaskrang ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// /
261a5(sman dpyad): smad pa'i nAd ni/ mi zad pas/ kha zas lci ba dang / skyur ba dang / bad kun skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas zosngo nas/ nade gzhi rnamasu 'khrugs pa las skung ba'i nang mi bzad pa rnam pa drug 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skad ngo tsog gi/
261a6(sman dpyad): mtshan ma ni gso sla ba yin no// de la rlung las gyur pa'i spang pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ skrang ba nyid phan tshun du 'pho zhing / gar mnan pa'i mal shong ngar 'dug pa dang / mdog gnag cing dmar ba dang / mi bzad
261b1(sman dpyad): na pa rnams yin no// mthus pa lngas gyur ba'i smyung ba'i mtshan ma nAM/ spya du sbyin cing rdol ba dang / mdog 'dus bu dang / ser shing dbang ba dang / rgya ba dang / lus chub byud pa rnams pan+da no// da da
261b2(sman dpyad): masmra sbyar ba'i snang ba'i mtshan sna ni mdog snum zhing dukur ba dang / dpal spyi buM dang // dang ba dang / kAs ba rnams yin no// blagu lus stong ba dang / byung gyi snang d+ha'i man+t+ra na mi ni/ Dekhris pa'i chen me dang
261b3(sman dpyad): 'dra'o// kun 'dus pa lngas gyur pa'i sbyang ba'i mtshan mo ni/ thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// de la ni dgan+d+he pho ba'i nang na gnas ni n-i/ snong sbyang bar gyu ro// nadu ga ni yang ga'i rlung na gnas na ni/ de spyad du skung
261b4(sman dpyad): par 'gyur ro// nad gzhi bAr na gnas nA ni bar du smyung bar 'gyur ro// nad gzhi thams cadra du khyab na ni/ lus ril gyi spang bar 'gyur ro// de laM sbyang ba'i nad sme zhi ga cika las gyur pa yin la/ nad bla gr-inyan gzhan
261b5(sman dpyad): gyis kyang mya thebs te/ mi nyal stobs chen po zhig laM byung na ni gasngo skye ba yin no// lus ril gyis srung ba dang / mas yar mched de snang ba ni ma rungs pa yin no// snang ba'i nAd la sman pas nang gyizhi dang sbyar ning
261b6(sman dpyad): nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan rnams kyis sman mar sbyar ba dang / til mar gyi sman sbyar ba dang / bsku ba dang / nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang / btung ba rnams su sbyar bar bya'o// las rnam pa lnga po bkru sman drag
262a1(sman dpyad): b+ho mus btang ba dang / 'jam rtsims btung ba dang / smyug sman dang / sgyu sman dang / sman sngar blugs pa rnams kyang tshabs che chung dang sbyar zhing cho ga bzhin du btang bar bya'o// de ma yin pa snang ba'i nad
262a2(sman dpyad): zhi bar bya ba'i s+thi'i cho ga gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ thang shing dang / ai ru re dung bca' sgra dang / phyi na r+N+Na ba rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba dron po dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang ni byA dang ga dang / bo da dkar po dang / dug mo
262a3(sman dpyad): yungs kyi shun lpags dang / ba tsany+dza sgra dang / thang shing dang / na le sham rnams kyi phye ma chu bsgril ba dron byi drang sbyar ba 'om/ yAng nra tsha ba gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dIng / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams
262a4(sman dpyad): kyi phye/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang spang ba'i na daM selA two// yang nA pu tse she la dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / tsha ba gsum dang / shing nye rlong rnams kyi phye ma/ 'bras bu gsum bskol
262a5(sman dpyad): ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na gu gul dkaro bo ba gtsan+de dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pi pi lding gI phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// yang na bu ram a ru ru'i phye mya dang tshwa bsnyams te sbyar ba 'am/ yang
262a6(sman dpyad): na bu ram bca' sga dang cha bsnyams te sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o// yang na bu ram dang / sge'u gsher tshod rin par bza'o// rlung las gyur pa la ni kha zas sha khu dang lhan cig bza'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni kha zas
262b1(sman dpyad): 'o ma dang lhan cig bza'o// bad kan+da las gyur pa la ni kha zas khu bcud rtsub pa'i bag dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o// cho ga de ltar byas na skrang ba'i nad dang / skem pa'i nad dang / dmu rdzing dang / smyo byed dang / skran
262b2(sman dpyad): dang / gnang 'brum dang / dbugs mi bde ba bsnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thing shing dang / pu na rtsu ba dang / bca' sgra rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba dang / yang na kru trug tres dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ngo nye rong dang / theng
262b3(sman dpyad): shing rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang snang ba'i nad sel to// rkang 'bams zhes bya ba ni tshil dang / shA'i nad las 'gyur te/ rkang pa gnyis bum pa 'dra bar snang ba yin no// de yang nad gzhi gsum la bad kan
262b4(sman dpyad): shas che ba las gyur pa'i bye brag gi sku/ rnam pa gsum yod de nAd gzhi so so'i mtshan mas bstan to// de ni dus thams cad du grang zhing sel che la/ skum du mi btub pa'i sa rA skye bar 'gyur te/ lo gcig lhug
262b5(sman dpyad): pa dang / rkang 'bam grog mkhar lta bu ni mI 'tsho'o// de la gso ba'i cho ga nI nad gzhi dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyi bsku ba dang / dugs bye ba dang / gtar te khrag dbyung ba la stsogs pa'i cho ga dang / sbyang ba'i nad gso
262b6(sman dpyad): ba'i cho gar bstan pa thams cad kyang / ci rigs par bya bar bshad do// dpa' ba ni rlung las gyur pa dang / tshi la las gyur pa dang / bde kan las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yod de/ de la rlung las
263a1(sman dpyad): gyur pa'i dpa' ba'i mtshan mA nI/ mdog nAg cing dra mar ba dang / kha dri mi zhim pa dang / rkan skam par byed pa yin no// tshil las gyur pa'i dpa' ba'i mtshan ma ni/ 'jam zhing snum pa yin no/
263a2(sman dpyad): byad kan lus gyur pa'i dba' ba'i mtshan ma ni shin tu che zhing sra ba yin no// de la rIdwa de pa la byung ba dang / lo gcig phan chad lon pa ni/ gsor mi rung ngo// 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya bya ni/ lcog mar bad kan dang /
263a3(sman dpyad): tshil gnyis lus skyu ru ra'i rus pa 'dra bar smin bur gyur pa meng pos bskor ba'i ming ni/ 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ste/ yun ring du mi 'byang bar 'dug pa yin no// de la dpa' ba gso ba'i cho ga ni/ sman pas nad
263a4(sman dpyad): grazha dang sbyar zhing / na da gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshun gyis dugs bya bA dang / bsku ba dung / lums bya ba dang / gtur zhing khrag dbyung ba dang / skyugs sman dang / kru sman btang ba dang / til mar gyi sman btung ba rnamasde
263a5(sman dpyad): kyis dba'o ba med par bya'o// 'bras kyi phreng ba le ni/ sman sha ko tra kau'i shun lpags kyi phye ma/ til mar dang / chu'i nang du bskol ti/ ti lA mar nyi tshwa lus pa btsags pa 'am/ yang nA nim+ba dang / a shrI ma ra dang / ni rgun+ti
263a6(sman dpyad): rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags tau snar blugs so// yang na 'bras kyi phreng ba ma smin pa la ni/ dral te smin bu phyung la/ rma kha sreg go// smin cing rdol ba la ni sman mu
263b1(sman dpyad): ga ka'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku zhing sbyangs la/ 'di gnyi gu yang rmya'i tshig bzhin du gasngo bar bya'o// yang na rting pa nas sor bcu gnyis kyi gong du byin pa dral te/ byin pa'i nang na tshul gyi na bu nya'i sgro du 'dra
263b2(sman dpyad): ba 'dug pa rnams phyung laM/ rma kha sregs taM rmo gso ba'i cho gA bzhin du bya'o// shA rmen ni nud gAn+ti gsum so so las gyur te/ khyug drung / sha dang / tshil rnams kyi rmi n+ya bu yin no// de ni nad bzhi so so'i mtshan ma las
263b3(sman dpyad): shes par bya ste/ de laM khrag dang sha las gyur pa'i sha rmi na ni/ gsor me rung ngo // shA smin gso ba'i thabs ni/ draba'i ba gso ba'i cho gar bshad pa bzhin du byA'o// yang na dral ba dang / bsreg pa dang / sman+da gyi thal
263b4(sman dpyad): bas gdu pa rnams kyang bye zhing / ras mo 'am lo mas+dza g.yog par bya'o// skrang ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// / dAM nas rma gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rma ni lus nyid las 'bru
263b5(sman dpyad): ba dang / blo bAr du 'byung bI'i bye byAg gis rnam pU gnyis yod par rig par bya'o// de la s+thA mA ni nad gin+thi rnams las gyur pa yin no// phyi mA ni mtshon la sogs pas rma sde ba yin no// de lA rlung las
263b6(sman dpyad): gyur pa'i rmo'i mtshan ma ni/ blo'o nyin skor rtsub cing mdog dmar la sngo sbyar 'dug pa dang / 'dzag pa nyung zhing 'dang ba dang / tshir min pa rnams yin no// mkhris pa yas byung ba'i rma'i mtshan pra mi rdzi drang /
264a1(sman dpyad): nyen skor gyi mdog ser zhing dmar lA sngo bu dang / 'dzags pa tsha ba dang / lus tsha ba rnams yin no// byad kan lngas gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ mkhrang zhing dpal skya ba dang / chu ser skya bu 'dzag cing
264a2(sman dpyad): grang la/ ska ba rnams yin no// khragra nad las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ mdog dam zhing khrag 'dzug pa yin no// nang+ga gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa drang // gsum 'dus po las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni//
264a3(sman dpyad): gleng drang gang 'dus pa de dang de'i mtshan ma 'dres pas bstan to// de lu thog ma mya smin pa'i tshe ni/ zhi bar 'gyur ba'i n+dan rtsis bsku'o// rnags su che ba la ni smin par bya ba'i cho ga bya'o// rnags zin pa la ni brtol
264a4(sman dpyad): t+ye 'jib pa'i sman+d+ra gyis rnag dang chu saR+Sha dag par bsal+la nas/ rma'i shu'u skye'i sman bya'o// de la rnags par bya ba'i sman nI/ ti la dang / phebs dang / zar ma dang / ru rtA rnams kyi phye ma dang / phyi dang / rgyam tsha rnams zho sgyur
264a5(sman dpyad): blo dang sbyar te/ biSh+Tis pa'i gong bu ni smin par byed pa'i mchog yin par 'dod do// de la rnags su tsha ba'i mtshan ma ni/ tsha ba 'ur 'uru por 'dug pa dang / na zhing zug pa dang / mdog dmar ba dang / sbrang bA rnaMms
264a6(sman dpyad): yin par bshad do// rnags pa'i mtshan ma ni gong ma smin du tsha ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse gzhil bar 'gyur la/ gnyer ma 'dus shing phyogs gcig tu mthon po cog tsog por 'byung ba yin no// rdol bar bye ba'i sman/
264b1(sman dpyad): nI shIng nye rong dang / s+yA hak+ShI rA dang / asmA ri dang / tsi rI bil+yA ba lu sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / kru trug tres dang / thi ba dang / byA gag dang / 'chil ba'i rtug pa rnams kyi phye mu sbyar ba 'am/ yang na myu ska'i thal ba'i s+thAn+tha smar
264b2(sman dpyad): byis bslu ba ni rdol ba byi ba'i sbyin gyi ning na mchog yin no// 'jib pa'i spyan gyi skye rnag dang / chu saur bsal ba'i thabs ni/ til dang / rgyu ma tshwa dang / shing mang mi dang / nim+bu'i lo ma dang / lung dang / sbyir ba dang / shing nyi rang rnams
264b3(sman dpyad): kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bsku b.rI bya'o// yang na nim+b+ha ba tra dang / til g+hi phye mi sbrang rtsi dang skyu rA ti bskus na yang rma skyong bar byed do// rmya'i shr-i'u skye ba'i sman ni/ nas rjen par btags pa'i phye ma/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te//
264b4(sman dpyad): na rmo 'drub par 'gyur ro// rma rub pI'i mtshanA ma ni/ sbyang ba med la/ 'jam zhing snum pA dang / 'i mdog 'dra bar dmar bA dang / nu ba med cing 'dzig pa ched prA dang / rlob med pa rnams yIn te/ rma dag par 'gyur ba'i rtogs su
264b5(sman dpyad): bshad de// de la rlung las gyur pa'i rma la ni/ sman rtse bya lnga pa'i sde tshan che chung gnyis cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni/ shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar
264b6(sman dpyad): bya'o// bad kan le sa gyur pa'i rma la ni/ dong gi la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// yang ut+pal sngon po dang / ba laM dang / skyer ba dang / me dau dang / shing mngar dang / tsen dan dang / sa mang+ga dang / d+hi ta ki
265a1(sman dpyad): rnams kyi mA mAr dang sbyar te bslus na yang rma'i sharu skye bar byed do// yang na shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu'i phye ma mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang / shing ba ti'i yal ga'i thor to dang / seng
265a2(sman dpyad): ste dang / gseng phrom rnams kyi me ma ra dang sbyar bas bskus na rma kha 'drub par 'gyur ro// yang nA shing ardzu nA dang / u dum ba ra dAng / a shwa tha dang / gseng blom dang / dzam bu'i shun lpags dang / shI mung+gar+ya dang /
265a3(sman dpyad): b+h+ya.e dang / rgyu sgyu skyes rnams kyi mas d+d+he pa nA phyung shA'i bu spyi bar 'a sa dang / khri chel dang / l+r-ing dang / shing mang du dang / na ma la'i 'bras ze dang / khyi me da / y-i te dang / nI mra'i sna
265a4(sman dpyad): rnams kyi phye ma n+dor dang chu'i nang bskol to/ mur nyi tshe lus pa yang rmal phan pa yin no// yad na prA bud+d+ha rIk+Sha dang / shing mA dang dang / bu tshad rto dang / maMnye dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye mA/ shIng 'o ma can bsnol ba'i khum
265a5(sman dpyad): dang til mar gyi rlung du bskol te/ lce mAr nyi tshe lus pa btsugs pa yang mi 'tshe bar byed do// mkha sprin gyis bsdus pa'i steng rje/ shing karany+dza dang / b+h+ra k+Sha dang / dzam bu la sogs pa'i lo mas glan la/ de'i steng du ras
265a6(sman dpyad): la sogs pas dkri ba ni bzang ste/ rma sbyong zhing 'tsho bar byed do// rma la 'bu zhugs pa la ni byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbyar bas rma kha dang / rma'i nang bskus na phan no// rma sos pa'i mal shong du gyur pa laM ni/ spyan
265b1(sman dpyad): ma dang / mon spyan ste'u la sogs pa sran ma'i rigs rnams kyi lo ma'i phye mu chu dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang nu shing tog ko sha 'am/ shing ljang ko btags pa'i phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bskus na slar gadra bar 'gyur ro// ma
265b2(sman dpyad): 'khyil ba la ni/ cho ga shes pas rma'i phyag gar byung ba brtags te/ mtshon gyis dril lo dag par bsal zhing rnag drang / chu ser 'jib pa'i sman gyis bskus te myong ba ste/ rma ShA sha'i bu skye zhing 'drub pa'i sman la sogs pa
265b3(sman dpyad): rma'i cho ga thams cad ri mA bzhin du bya'o// rngu ba khong na yod pa'i rma la ni/ rngu pa skam pas drangs te phyung la/ rma gso ba'i sman gyi cho ga bstan pa'i rims bzhin du bya'o// rma rnying ring du lon pa'i rkyen kyis shi zad cing skam
265b4(sman dpyad): pabar gyur pa la ni/ sha rta ba'i sman gyi cho ga yang bya zhing / rma yang gso bar bya'o// rma red pA la nI/ rma'i nyaMnra skor gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba dang / spyug+sa sman dang / bkru sman btang / blo bur gyi rma lA/ rmA byung ba'i mod la/ mar dang /
265b5(sman dpyad): sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas bslus te/ bcings lA/ mkhris pa dang / khrag gi drod tsha ba dbri zhing bsil ba'i cho gA rnams bya'o// rus pa chag gam/ tshogs byung ba la ni/ cho ga shes pas srang zhing / tshigs bcug la/ mar dang
265b6(sman dpyad): shing mngar gyis bskus te/ bcings la ras kyis dam du dkris la/ shing 'o ma can gyi shun lpags kyis mi mgul bar dbang du byas te/ ci nas kyang ma rnags par nan tan bsrung bar bya'o// rma dang / tshag grugs
266a1(sman dpyad): dang bur ba'i kha zas ni 'bras swa lu dang / mon sran sde'u dang / nas la byas pa dang / ri dwags skams na gnas pa'i sha rnams bza'o// zho dang / 'o ma dang / skyur bag dang / kha zas lci ba'i bgra dang nyal
266a2(sman dpyad): po rnams spang bar bya'o// rma gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// // de nas mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// mig sman gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bshad pa gang yin pa ni rgya
266a3(sman dpyad): ches pas na/ 'dir dau dag thams cad mi bshad par cha tsam zhig bshad par bya'o// de la mig gi rang bzhin ni gong bur 'dug pa dang / dmar po dang / dkor ba dang / gnag pa yin no// de yang 'byung ba chen po sA dang /
266a4(sman dpyad): chu dang / me dang / rlung rnams dang ldan parA bshad do// gnAs khung bu yin pas nr-i na mkha' dang yang ldan no// de la rlung dang / mkhris pA dang / bad kan dang / khrag gi nyes pa rnams kyi bye brag las/ mig nad mchi ma
266a5(sman dpyad): 'dzag pa zhes bya ba/ drag po rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ de ni phal cher mig nad do cog 'byung bu'i gzhi yin no// de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mtsho ma grang ba dang / rdu ma skam pa
266a6(sman dpyad): yod pa dang / na zhing ha re 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad do// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag po'i mtshan ma ni/ mchi ma tsha ba dang / rdzu ma ser ba dang / tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug cing rtsi dmar ba
266b1(sman dpyad): rnams yin no// bad kan las gyus pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ rdu ma dkar pos yogs pa dang / mchi ma 'byar 'byar po dang / g.ya' zhing skrang ba rnams yin no// khrag gi nyes pa las byung ba'i
266b2(sman dpyad): mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mig dmar zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug la/ dmar por shar shar por 'byung zhing / mchi ma rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no// kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa dang / dus bzhin du mi
266b3(sman dpyad): zla ba'i rkyen b+hismA mIg nA mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba tshabs chen por gyur pa la ni/ mIg nad rdung pa skyes bya bar gyur te/ mig dang klad pa'i phyed mi bzad par na bar 'gyur ro// de'i mtshan ma yang gong du smos pa
266b4(sman dpyad): bzhin du nang gzhi so so'i mtshan ma dang sbyar zhing rtogs par bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nang gus pa'i cho ga ni// khar+yA dang / gseng phrom+ba dang / rgyum tsha rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa'i khyAb
266b5(sman dpyad): 'am/ yang na kha ra dang / bca' sgra dang / sho ba ri'i gseng phrom rnams cho ga gong ma bzhin du byas te/ mig tu byugs par bya'o// yang na ku rAn+ta'i me to go dang / shing mngar-I dang / kha ra dang / bca'o sga rnams kyi phye ma zho
266b6(sman dpyad): kha chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsigs pa 'am/ yang na bca' sga dang / rgyam tsha dang / shing mngar dang / gseng phrom rnams kyi phye ma mare gyi nang du brngos pa'i khu bas mig tu blugs so// yang na shing mngar dong / tsan
267a1(sman dpyad): dAn dang / btsod dang / gseng phrom dang / btsAg yug snum rnams kyi phye mya chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa 'am/ yang na bilpa la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol bas mIg gi nang du thugs
267a2(sman dpyad): na yang mig nang mi zad pa rA na bA sel to// yang na e raN+Da'i tsa ba ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/ 'jama? tsam+ba du bsgrangs la/ mig gadrangs te/ ras dkar po gtsang mas ga yogs pa'i steng du/ mig 'gram logs nas
267a3(sman dpyad): rgyun ma chad par blugs pa ni/ smyig sman tshags las bta ba zhes bya ba'i mchog yin no// yang na bi pi ling dang / ba la ka dang / shing mngar dang / rgyam tsha rnams ra'i 'o ma dang bskol tAM/ 'jam tsam du spangs
267a4(sman dpyad): bai sdu ma bzhin du tshogs lAs btang bi'i sman byas na yang / mig nud mau bzang+ga pa na ba sel to// yang na lcags sam zangs kyi snod du rgyum tsha dang zho sbyar ba 'am/ yad+hA na zangs sam ljags kyi gtun gyi nang du khar bya'i
267a5(sman dpyad): gtun bus yud dang / pI pi ling zhing du brji s+t+rai la zho dang sbyar te snod de nyid kyi nang du zhag lon par bzhag pa zangs dang / lcags kyi mig spyan gyi thur mas blang zhing mig tu bskus na/ mrig mi bzad par na ba sel to//
267a6(sman dpyad): mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni pre puN+Da ri ka dang / shing ma'ir dang / yung dang / sgye ru ra dang / shug pa rnams bskol baM bslangs pa spring rtsi dang / kha ras sbyar te sngar bstan pa bzhin du/ tshags las btang zhing
267b1(sman dpyad): tu blugas+yA na mig nad sel to// yang na tsan dan dang / a ri D+ha'i lo ma dang / shing mngar dang / skyer pa dang / lce myang tsha rnams kyis phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te/ sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang ldan pas byas la tshags las
267b2(sman dpyad): b+h+r-i ting zhing rgyun tu blugs so// bdA kan las gyur pa'i mig nang la ni/ dud pa dang / yungs kar cha re dang / yung dang / skyer ba cha gnyi sde gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jama? tsam dang sbyar ti/ tshags pa las btang
267b3(sman dpyad): zhing rgyun tu blugs na/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to// yang na snod kha sbyar nim pa'i khu ba bskus pa'i nang du/ gsong phrom cha bzhi dang / dud pa dang / yungs krar cha re rnams kyi phye ma tshig mor brdos te/ btags nas
267b4(sman dpyad): chu 'dzom tsam dang sbyar ba yang tshags las btang zhing / rgyun tu blugs par bya'o// khrag las gyur pa'i mig nadA la ni/ sman tA ri ta dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / shing mngar dang / kha ra dang / glu skrang chen blo rnams kyi phye ma
267b5(sman dpyad): chu grang mo dang sbyar tI/ tshags las btang zhing rgyun tu dz+nyAnas ni mig nad mochi ma 'dzag pa sel to// gseng blom dang / shing mngar dang / mdong ris dang / skyer ba dang / sgyer khaN+Da rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyor ba
267b6(sman dpyad): 'ame/ yang na sbyor ba'i khu ba bsgrangs te/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba thur mas blangs la mig la bskus na/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad sel to// thog ma migo nad kyis btob ste bod pa la ni/ gseng phrom dang / sgyu
268a1(sman dpyad): d+yA rA khrelta bur sbyar bya marA gyi nang du bsngos te/ zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang sbyar tre/ chu dang brdzis bAs mig gi phyi rol bgus pa'i steng du bsku'o// yAng na mig sman tsak+Shu ras+t+ra gtsang ma'i nang
268a2(sman dpyad): du phur la/ bA lang gi lci ba'i nang du bac+doMs ti/ chan chos rab tu gyur pa'i shun lpagasde me par byos te/ bskems la zhibya du btags pa'i phye ma nyal gar la ne cig mig tu blugs pa tsem gyis/ dre mra thag tu
268a3(sman dpyad): mig nang mi bzad par bdo ba yang med paR+Sha byed do// yang na mig na ste bo ba la/ shi kru'i sa bon cha gcig dang gseng phrom cha brgyad dang / lding ros cha gsum dang / 'di rnams zhib tu batrags pa'i phye ma sbyar
268a4(sman dpyad): bAs/ ras gtsang ma la zhen par byatub ste/ migo g.yog par bya'o// yang na skyer khAt+sa dang / a ru ra dang / skyer pa dang / bcig dang / rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu chu dragasu mar byas la/ myig gi phyi rol pogs pa'i
268a5(sman dpyad): steng du bskus na yAng mig nAng do cog sel to// mig nad rdung bA thams tsad la nr-i/ dpral rtsa gtar te khrag phyung la/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i skabs su sau so'i rkyen tu/ sman gyi cho ga dzi lhor bstan pa rnams
268a6(sman dpyad): kyang mthun du bya'o// mig gi 'bras bu na gu'i steng du dkar po'i thig le byung ba ni/ ling tog ces bya ste/ bad kan las gyur par shes par bya'o// mig gi sprin gyi steng du dmar po byung ba ni/ ling tog dmar po
268b1(sman dpyad): byung ba ni/ ling tog dmar po zhes bya ste/ khrag+na gi nyes pa las 'byung ba yin no// de la lding tog dkar po zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni/ drub mar chung dang / me tog ma d+hu ka'i shing gi snying po dang / ba du ru'i tshe gu dang / rgyum/
268b2(sman dpyad): tshe rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mig le bskus na ling trog med par 'gyur ro// yang nago bur dang / nA le sham dang / shing mngar dang / dung dang / ba lang gi so dang / rgyam tsha dang / ljong ros dang / tsun
268b3(sman dpyad): dran rnams kyis phye ma shig gru'i khro ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bsres na yang ling tog dkar po sel bar byed do// rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang / khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / rgyam tsha dang / dung dang / shi kru'i 'bras bu'i
268b4(sman dpyad): tshi gu rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar ta ri lur byos pas bskus na yang ling tog la sogs pa gris bzhogs pa bzhin du med par byed do// khyim bya'i sgo nga 'di shun lpags dang / ldong ros dang / dung dang / mching bu dang / tsan dan
268b5(sman dpyad): dang / rgyum tsha rnams kyi phyi mo chu bsnyams po'i steng du/ mgra sman gyi thur mra bsgres pas mig byugs na yang / ling tig dang / mig 'dzer la sogs pa med par byed do// tsan den dang / rgyam tsha dang / u ru ra dang / rgyu skyegs
268b6(sman dpyad): rnams kyi phye ma yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po'i tshe res bskyed de sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyis thur mas bsgres pas mig byugs na yang / ling tog dang / mig mdzer la sogs pa med par byed do// sna ma'i me tog kha ma
269a1(sman dpyad): 'bus pa dang / rgya skyugs dang / btsag yug snumra dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma cha mnyam lA chu dang sbyang ba'i ri lus mig bskus na yang mig snad cing rma byung ba dang / ling tog rnams sel zhing
269a2(sman dpyad): blag gis rgyas pa dang brla byed do// ling tog dmaR+Sha pau la ni dung gi phye ma sbrang rdzi dang sbyang ba 'am/ ka ta ka'i 'bras bu rgyam tsha dang sbyar bA 'ama?/ rgya mtsho'i dbu bri kha ra dang / sbyar ba rnams las// gang yAng rung bas
269a3(sman dpyad): mig byug par bya'o// sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang / yung+ga dang / sbyar ba'i phye ma dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi mig sman nam/ yang nai pi pi ling raswA gtsang ma'i nang du pur to/ ba lang gI lji ba'i khu ba'i nang du btsos
269a4(sman dpyad): la/ skams pa'i phye mis migra byugs na/ mtshon mo mithong ba'i mig nad sel to// ldong ros dang / yung dang / stang zilA dang / tsha ba gsum pa ljang gi mkhris pas sbrus la/ sran tsam gyi ring reng po dril la/ chu las
269a5(sman dpyad): bdar bA 'am/ ya na thang shing gI pye mA/ ra gcin gyis sbyang zhing bskam pA de lta bur lan grangs mAng du byas pas mig+na bskus nA/ mag mchi mas gang ba selpa to// yang na/ bA p+la dang / thang shIng da / shu dag
269a6(sman dpyad): mas kyi phye ma/ bye'u rug pa'i lo mo'i khu ba dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas la grib mar bskams pas mig bskus na yang mig tshig rnying sel to// ba bla dang / stang zil dang / de gnyis sdoms pa'i gnyis 'gyur gyi
269b1(sman dpyad): rangs rnams zhib du btags paSh+Ti pye myA'i nang du/ snig+na sman gyi b+hur+ya ma bsgres blas mig byug gam/ yAng n+ya tshwa byA gusum gyi phye m+bu dang / sgyer khAr+N+Na dang / chu dang sbyar tI bas+thA s+thA na yang / mig ts+tshag+h+ra bo s+ye l+ya d+ho/ mig
269b2(sman dpyad): nang rab rib du gyur pa thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan mo ni/ shin tu zo zi bor gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o// so so'i bye brag gzhon ni bshad de/ dwe laM rlung las gyur pa'i rabo ri kyi mtshan ma nI/ ci mthong ngo tsog
269b3(sman dpyad): dmar zhing g.yo ba dang / long long bo ra smyung ba yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rabA rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser por snang zhing / mo 'bar bI dang / srin+na bu me khyer dang / glog lta bu mthong ba rnam
269b4(sman dpyad): yin no// bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan+da ma ni/ mthong ngo cog mdog 'jam zhing skya bA dang / bstan par snang sna rnams yin no// 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ mtshan maM de dag thams
269b5(sman dpyad): nAcad lta bur mthong ba yin no// khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ mthong ngo cog shin tu dmar bar mithong ba yin no// mig nAd rab rib ces bya ba yal bar bor te/ tshangs chen po las gyurgyu pa las
269b6(sman dpyad): ni/ mig nang bris g.yogs pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ de'i mtshan ma yang thog ma ni nad gzhi gang yis gyur pa'i mtshan mar rab rib kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ba las/ phyir zhing 'khrul tshabs che ba dang /
270a1(sman dpyad): mi mthong bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de rnams kyi nang na bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nang bris gra yogs pa ni gso sla ba yin te rtswa gtar zhing khrag phyung na bzang ngo // de la rab rib gso ba'i
270a2(sman dpyad): cho ga ni/ a ru ra'i tshi gu dang / shing mngar dang / skyu ru ra dang / na le sham dang / spangs ma rnams chu drug swa su byas pa'i ri lus bskus na mI ga nad rab rib rnams sel to// tshwa ba gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang
270a3(sman dpyad): rgyam+ba tshwa dang / 'bras bu gAsum dang / stang zil rnams chu dgas su byas te/ legs par sbyar ba'i r-i lu'i ming ni/ ri lu nag po zhes bya ste/ 'dis bskus na yang mig nad rab rib sel to// yung dang / skyu ru ra dAng /
270a4(sman dpyad): po pi ling dang / kA ta ki'i 'bras bu dang / yungs kar rnams kyi phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas pas bskus na yang / mig nad do cog sel to// bya g+h+ri dang / gla sgang dang / shing thog a mr-i dang / shing
270a5(sman dpyad): mngar dang / pi pi ling dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zungs kyi snod kyi nang du ra'i 'o ma dang spangs pa'i r-i lus bskus ne yang / mig nad thams cad sel to// skong bzhi pa phyugs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i smo/
270a6(sman dpyad): dang / rgya skyegs dang / ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu dang / pri ha tI'i 'bras bu dang / gla pa dang / rnga mo'i rus pa dang / nya rus dang / byi dang ka ra dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ru rta rnams cha bsnyems te/ chu dgas su byas pa'i ri lu'i
270b1(sman dpyad): ming ni/ so'i ri lu zhes bya ste/ 'dis bskus na mig nad rab ribA drang / pris g.yogs pa drang / mig 'dzer dang / 'brum pa byung ba dang / rma byung ba dang / ling tog la sogs pa sel to// ldong ros dang / rgyas tsha dang/
270b2(sman dpyad): nag tshur dang / dung dang / tshwa ba gsum dang / skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i khu ba'i mig sman gyis bskus nA yang / mig nai dra pris g.yogs pa dang / ling tog dang / mige 'dzer dang / rab rib
270b3(sman dpyad): rnams selpa to// shing ka pit+ta'i khu gA/ mu zi'o khu bi nyes gyur dang sbyar ba 'am/ ya na skyer khar+b+ha dang / stang zil dang / gla sgreng gi bzhi gyur gyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyi thur mA bsgres te/ mig byugs
270b4(sman dpyad): na yang rab rib sel to// yang na li shI cha gcig dang / zangs cha ginyis dang / stang zil che gsum dang / mu zi cha lnga dang / na ga gre srar cha gsum dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma sno du kha sbyar gyi nadwa du tshig par brjes
270b5(sman dpyad): la zhib tu btags pas mig sman gyi thur mu la mgo zhing rtag tu mrig byug par bya'o// stang zi la 'am/ skyu ru ra gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang / sbrang rtsis sbyar te/ ai ru ra'i snying po phyung ba'i sbyin paR+Sha khong du
270b6(sman dpyad): bcug la slar kha sbyar te/ bag zan gyis g.yogs nas/ rgya shug gi me'i nang du sregs la/ bag zan tshig sta dud pa chad nas slar phyung ste/ bslasgrangs la/ oM ru ra'i khong na sman 'dug pa btags pa'i phye mas
271a1(sman dpyad): mig sman gyi thur mA la bsgo zhing / mig byug pa nri rab rIb sel ba'i mchog yin no// yung+ga dang / skyer ba dang / a ru dang / spang spos dang / ru rta dang / pi pI ling rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma
271a2(sman dpyad): 'di'i ming ni/ sangs rgyas pa'i mig smana? zhes bya ste/ snga ma bzhin du mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing / mig la byugs na mig nang thams cad sel to// yang na stang zil dang / spang spos dang / gAn+d+ha ba tra rnams
271a3(sman dpyad): kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar la/ sbrul nag po shrI ba'i mgo bcad pa'i khar bcug la/ 'jim pas g.yogs te bsregs la/ 'jim pa tshig ste da ra por gyur nas phyung ste bslangs lnga/ de'i nang gi sman zhib tu btags
271a4(sman dpyad): pa'i phye mas mig smon gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig byugs na yang rab ri bA sel to// dug mo nyung gi sa bon mar dang sbyarA la/ shing pa tI'i lo ma'i nang du phur maur byas te/ chu'i nang du bskol la tshos par gyur
271a5(sman dpyad): nas/ nang gi khu ba bsgrengs pa mig tu blugs pa 'am/ yang na dug mo nyung ki sa bon gyi sbyin par bya skams na gnas pa'i sgro nga snga ma bzhin du btsos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs na mig blta bar 'gyur ro// yang
271a6(sman dpyad): na 'bras bu gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phyephyi ma mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba nyal khar rtag tu zos na/ mig nad do cig sel cing / ro tsa bar yang 'gyur ro// 'bras bu gsum bskol bI
271b1(sman dpyad): khu ba dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyi nang du 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las nub mo zhing rlan par 'thungs nu yang / ring mo mi thogs par rab rib sel to// sman rA sna dang / 'bras bu
271b2(sman dpyad): gsum dang / rtsa bA byAcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba/ sna bcu pa'i phye ma bskol to// mar nyi tshe lus pa las/ ran par 'thungasra nu yang rap+ta ri bi sel to//
271b3(sman dpyad): da ni rna ba'i nad kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la rlung las gyur ba'i rna ba'i nid kyi mtshan ma ni/ rna ba gnyis su zug cing na la/ 'on zhing sgra 'byung ba dang / 'dzag pa rnams yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa ni tsha
271b4(sman dpyad): ba 'ur 'ur bor 'dug pa yin no// bdau kan las gyur pa ni rna ba'i nad skam la dri mnam pa yin no// de dag gA sau bA'i sman ni/ spyan mu raMm gA dang / chu shing dang / shi kru dang / lA phug dang / sge'u gshir rnams
271b5(sman dpyad): las gang yang rung ba'i khu ba rgyam tshwa dang sbyar ba dron pos rna ba gdu bar blugs la/ nang du chub par bskul zhing phyir pho na rna ba'i ning sel to// rgyu ma tshwa bAtags pa shing arka'i lo ma ser po'i nang du phul la
271b6(sman dpyad): de'i phyi rol tu yang / arka'i lo ma rim bdun gyis g.yogs te/ me mar mur gyi nang du bcug la/ lo ma ning rim ma tshig tsam du bsregs nas/ lo ma phyi rim rnams kyang bor/ nang gi rgyam tsha yang bor la/ nang
272a1(sman dpyad): rim gyi lo mA ser po la grwa shwer bag yod pa btsir ba'i khu bra rna bar blugs na yang rnga ba'i nad sel to// bil+yA la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang // thang shing dang / sgron shing rnams lngas gang yang rang
272a2(sman dpyad): ba'i shing bu'i thor to rAs kyis dkris te/ til mar gyi nang du spyugs la bsregs te/ 'bar du bcug pa'i khu ba zags pa dron po rna bar blugs n+ye yang rna bar nang sel to// ru rta dang / bu bran shing dang / shu dag
272a3(sman dpyad): dang / thang shing dang / shu trI dang / shing kun dang / rgyum tsha rnams kyi phye mar gcin dang / til mer gyi nang tu bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa dron po rna dang blugs na yang rna bri'i nad kyi nyam thag pa sel te
272a4(sman dpyad): ru rta dang / a ru ra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khro ba'i ni dA du shing mdor dang / bu tshangs sto dang / mon sran+da sde'u dang / 'o su dang / phag tshil rnams bskol te/ phog tshil gyi zhag nyi tshe lus pa las rna bAr blugs
272a5(sman dpyad): na yang rna ba na zhing sgra b+hung ba s+yel to// rna ba mri bzad par na zhing / sgra 'byung la/ chu ser 'dza gu pa la ni ra gcin bsros pa dron po dang / lce myang tsha sbyar ba rna bar blugs so// yang na shIng ba ru nA dang / ka bit+ta da
272a6(sman dpyad): a mra dang / dzam+bu rnams kyi lo ma'i phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa 'am/ yang na sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba rna bar blugs na/ rna ba nas rnag 'dzag pa'i na ba sel te/ thabs de
272b1(sman dpyad): lhur byas pa las kyang / rnag skum po nang du lus+t+ra pa lA ni/ stAr til mar ram/ spyan+d+ra mar gyis sbyar zhing 'byung du btubA par bya ba'i sman sgyum bag blugs pa dang / dugs kyis bdug pa rnams byas nas/ de'i 'og tu
272b2(sman dpyad): sgra gzhon 'jam pos ru lA par bru bar bya'o// da ni sna'i nad kyi bye brag bshAd de/ de la sti'i nad chum po zhes bya ba ni/ nad gzhi rnam pa gsum las 'gyur te/ rlung las gyur pa ni s+yA nas 'dzag pa sla ba yin no// mkhris pa
272b3(sman dpyad): ldes gyur pa ni 'dzag pa'i mdog ser ba yin no// bad kan las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa dka' ba yin no// nang gzhi kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan mo thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// de la cham pa'i sman ni/ mgro snum
272b4(sman dpyad): gyis byis pa dang / dugs bya ba dang / snar smyan blug pa dang / skyug spyan btang ba dang / spyan mar btung ba dang / khwa zes rI tshu zhing sbyar ba bzla' ba la sogs pa sman pas cho ga bzhin du bya'o// yang na tsham pa lA ni sprin dri
272b5(sman dpyad): zhim mo tsog snod kha sbyar gyi na du bisregs pa'i dud pa s+thi'us drangs twe/ khwa snar brngub par bya'o// yang na dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/ shing tsa dang / sug sme li dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / no ga ge sar rnams lhan cig tu
272b6(sman dpyad): sbyar ba 'am/ yaMng na thaM phe nag po phur mer phur te/ sner snom par bya'o// li zi ri ba dang / ta ma l-i dang / tsha ba gsum gyi phyi ma mar dang bu ram gyi nang du bskol te/ spyir ba zos na yang tsham pa dang / glo brdol ba dang
273a1(sman dpyad): rtsibs logs nA ba dang / snying na bu dang / mkhal rked na ba rnams sel to// byA g+hI dang / dan+ta'i rtsa ba dang / shu dag dang / shi kru dang / bye'u rug b+hA dang / tshwa ba gsum gyi dang / N+ya m+bu tsha rnams kyi phye ma
273a2(sman dpyad): til mar dang / chu'i nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs ni/ cham pa yal bor bor ba las sA las rnag 'dzug pa'i lung sel to// / da nI lce nad kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la lce nAd ni rnam
273a3(sman dpyad): pa gsum ste/ rlung las gyur pa'i lce nad ni/ kha zas kyi ro mi tshori zhing sgo slo bor gyur pa dang / 'gags pa dang / shing a sh+lo ka'i lo ma bzhin du dmaR+sha ba rnams yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lce rtsub
273a4(sman dpyad): cing tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug la cig tsag tsha ba yin no// bad kan lis gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lce ril gyis stug po bem bem por 'dug pA yin no// de ltar lce bem bem por gyur pa la ni/ lce bzhar zhing nad
273a5(sman dpyad): khrag dran pa phyung la nad gzhi gang las gyur pa dang sbyar te/ nang gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan las skur blugs pa dang / mkhur ba bkang zhing phyir dbo pa dang / lce la bsku ba rnams kyi cho ga bya'o// // da ni so na
273a6(sman dpyad): ba'i cho ga bshad de/ so nad zug cing na bi dang / brtse ba rnam pa gnyis ni/ rlung las gyur pa yin te/ de gnyis la yang / mar ram til mar rlung sman dang sbyar ba dron po 'am/ rlung sman bskol ba'i khu ba dron
273b1(sman dpyad): byos kha bshal zhing phyir dbye ba 'am/ yang na pu tse shel dang / glu sbrang dang / te dzo ba ti dang / pa thA dang / yung dang / skyer ba dang / gseng phrom dang / ru d+ha dang / sa mang+ga rnams kyi phye las so drud na/ so'i drung g.ya' ba dang
273b2(sman dpyad): so khrag 'dzag pa dang / zug cing nA ba rnams sel to// btsa' ldan zhing kha nas 'brum pa 'byung ba ni/ khrag dang mkhris po 'khrugs pa las 'gyur te/ de la ni khrag dbyung ba dang / bkru sman btang ba dang / mar dang / til mar
273b3(sman dpyad): dang sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / ba gcin rnams las gang yang rung bas kha bkang la ring du bzhog la phyir dbo'o// yang na sna ma'i lo ma dang / sle tres dang / rgun dang byi tshar dang / skye rI pi dang / 'bras bu gsum po rnams
273b4(sman dpyad): skol ba'i khu ba sbyangs bya sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas mkhur ba bkang zhing phyir po na tsha ldan+da zhing khar 'brum pa byung ba spel to// rkan gyi phug nas lce'u chung ba 'dug pa'i skrad pa'i na ng+ka ni/ bad kan dang / khrag 'khrugs pA las
273b5(sman dpyad): gyur pa yin te/ de nI brtol la/ tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / shu dag dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbya byA khar+ya bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo byas bad kan drang bar bya'o// lkog ma'i nang sha lA ka zhes bya ba/ lkog ma'i nang du
273b6(sman dpyad): 'brum pa rgya shug gi 'bras bu 'dra ba ril por 'byung ba ni/ bad kan las gyur pa yin te/ de'i cho ga ni gtar ba'i dpyad mdzub mo btsags bu phre'u bcings pas rtol te/ snga ma bzhin du de dang 'phrod pa'i sman
274a1(sman dpyad): mur zhing / khu pA phyir dbo bar bya'o// lkog ma'i nad ro hi ni zhes bya ba/ lkog ma'i na du/ sha lhag myu gu ltar skye ba ring po zhig 'byung ba ni/ nad gzhi gsum po re re dang / kun 'dus pa dang / khrag gi
274a2(sman dpyad): nyes pa rnams las gyur pa yin te/ so so'i mtshan ma'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o// de'i cho ga 'chis te cher skyes na/ srog la yang 'bab par byed pas na cho ga myur te bya'o// de la cho ga ni de dag thams cad la yang
274a3(sman dpyad): gtar ga bya zhing khrag phyung la/ na dra gzhi so so gang las gyur pa'i sman sbyar bso kha na bzhag bzhag cing bad kon+da drang bar bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa la ni/ rgya mi tsha dong / kha ru tshwa dang / tsabs ru tsha rnams sbrang rtsi
274a4(sman dpyad): dang sbyar ba khAr bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o// mkhris pa dang / khrag las gyur pa la ni/ kha ra dang / rma shing gi phye maM sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khe na bzhag cing bad kan las gyur pa la ni/ khyim gyi du ba dang / tsha
274a5(sman dpyad): bu gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bu khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o// sman ra sna dang / kha ru tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / khyim gyi du ba dang / gla sgang dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal pa rnams kyi phye ma sbrang
274a6(sman dpyad): rtsi dang sbyar te// khar bzhag cing khu bo phyir pho na yang / lkog mi'i nad do cog 'byang bar byed do// yang rgyam tsha dang / ba bla dang / ldo ngo ros dang / rgya skyag dang / skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ kha ro bzhag
274b1(sman dpyad): cing bad kAn drang bA ni/ lkog ma'i nad rnams dang / khA nA drA rnams sde l+yA bA'i mchog yin no// shing tsha dang / sug+sa sbrel dang / gan+d+ha pa tra dang / na le sham dang / nas tshig 'khus bya'i thal ba dang / shIng pa ta'i thal
274b2(sman dpyad): ba dang / shring ku shi'i thal ba dang / tsha pa rnam lnga lA pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / dbyi mo dang / kru trug tre si dang / bca' ske rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang chu bskol te/ tshos par byas nas phyir phyung pa dang /
274b3(sman dpyad): sbyar te/ ri lAr byas pa khar bzhag cing / khu be phyir pho nA yang lkog ma'i nAd sel to// skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags drang / te dzo bi tI dang pau pi ling dang / skyer khar+t+ta rnams kyi snga ma bzhin du bu ram bskol ba
274b4(sman dpyad): drong sbyar te ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing khu bo phyir pho nA yang / lkog ma'i nad rnams dang / khar 'brum paM 'byung ba'i nad rnams sel to// drug mo nyung dang / bo nga dkar po dang / theng shing dang / pa tha dang / pu tse
274b5(sman dpyad): la dang / gla sgang rnams gats+tshin gyi nad du bskol la/ bzhi cha lus pa bsgrangs taM/ btsags nAs sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba mthungs na yang lkog ma'i nAd stsol to// // da ni klad pa'i nud kyi bye brag bshad de/ rlung
274b6(sman dpyad): las gyur pa'o klang pa'i nad ni/ klad pa stong par 'dug pa snyam byed pa dang / zug cing na ba yin no// mkhris po las gyur pa ni shin tu tsha ba yin no// bad kan las gyur pa ni lci ba bom bem por 'dug pa
275a1(sman dpyad): yin no// gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// klad pa'i nang na srin bu yo pa'i nad ni/ graya' zhing zug ste na bA yin no// klad pa'i nadra nyi ma
275a2(sman dpyad): bzhin du 'khor ba zhes bya ba nyi ma shar nas ldang ba nyid ma nub nas zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / klad pa'i phyed na ba dang / 'di gnyis ni rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur par shes par bya'o// klad pa'i nad za
275a3(sman dpyad): 'gram du zug cing mi bzod par na bA ni/ rlung dang / khrag dang / bad kan las gyur pa yin te/ gsor mi rung gi spang bar bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad la ni/ rlung nod gso ba'i sman gyi tshe
275a4(sman dpyad): ga rnams bya'o// yang na rlung sel ba'i sman+da gyi khu ba las gzhi blangs te sbyar thug ces bya ba/ 'bras dad+ya tIl dang mon s+yan sne'u gsum bsres pa'i thug pa 'am/ 'bras kyi'o thug la sogs pas mgo
275a5(sman dpyad): bsku zhing ngogs par bya'o// yang nA pri pi ling dang / ru rta dang / shu ti dang / uMt+pal dang / tson dan rnams kyi phye ma/ shing karko ta'i khu ba dang / til mar gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags
275a6(sman dpyad): pa snor blugs so// yang na sman gyi phye ma dang / sman gyi khu ba rnams mar dang sbyar te/ mgo bsku bar bya'o// yang na shing mngar dang / ba bla dang / ra sna dang / rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi
275b1(sman dpyad): nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sna cu la sogs pa sman ro mngar ba rnams kyi phye ma bskol la/ marA nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa lngas ran par+ya 'thungasA na/ nam tshong yan cad kyi nad thams cad sel to// dzi ba ka
275b2(sman dpyad): dang zang rtsi ba dang / rgun dang / khI ra dang / shing mngar dang / ba la dang / ut+pal rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang / 'o ma phyed mra'i nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te/ ran par snar blugs na
275b3(sman dpyad): rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad sel to// mkhris pa las gyur pA'i klad pa'i nad la ni/ ba lA dang / stag gi sen mo dang / pu shel tse dang / shing mngar dang / ut+pal dang / tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma
275b4(sman dpyad): 'o ma dang lhan cig tu btags te mgo sku'o// yang na 'o ma 'am/ sman bsile ba'i khu ba la sogs pas mgo bor blugaso// yang na shing tsa dang / gun+d+ha pa tra dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba
275b5(sman dpyad): dang sbyar te btsags te snar blugs so// yang na rgun dang / kha rA dAng / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang / 'o mi'i nad du bskol la/ mar nyi tshwa lus pa btsags te snar blugs so// bad kran las gyur
275b6(sman dpyad): pa'i klad pa'i nad kyis nyi ma thag pa la ni/ sngar shing ma d+ha ka'i snying po cham chom du brdungs te bskol ba'i/ phur mas phur bas klad pa dugs kyis gdug gam/ yang ni thang shing dang / ro hi sha dang / sha raM
276a1(sman dpyad): ga ta dang / rgyam tsha dang / sgron shing rnams kyi phye ma chu dang lhan cig tu btags pas mgo bskus la/ de'i 'og tu sman snar blugs pas/ sna nas chu ser 'byung bar bya'o// de la sna lAsA chu ser 'byung ba'i sman ni/ shu ti
276a2(sman dpyad): dang / e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / shu dag dang / rgya spos dang / bya g+hi'i 'bras bya rnams kyi phye ma/ til mar dang / chu'i nang du bskol lo/ til mi ra nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/ rlung dang / bad kon las gyur pa'i mig nad rab rI ba dang / nam tshong
276a3(sman dpyad): yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to// nad gzhi gsum gau las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ mar rnying pa btung bar bya'o// yang na nad gzhi gsum la/ phan pa'i sman gyi/ cho ga gang yin pa rnams kyang bya'o// srin bu las gyur
276a4(sman dpyad): pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la/ tsha ba gsum dang / rgya spos dang / shig gru'i sa bon rnams bskol ba'i khu ba snar blugs na srin bu sel to// yang na shing a pa marga'i 'bras bu dang / tsha ba gsum dang / yung dang / bsha' ba dang / shing
276a5(sman dpyad): kun+da dang / byi dang kA dang / rnams kyi phye ma pa gcin dang / ti la mar gyi nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te sAr blugs na srin bu sel to// klad pa'i nad nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar du na ba dang klad pa'i phyed na
276a6(sman dpyad): gnyis la ni/ thal tres dang / shing mngar dang / ru rta rnams kyi phye ma rtsabs skyur po dang sbyar te mgor byug go// yang na rlung dang mikhris pa la phan pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu bas mgor blugs par bya'o// kha zas ni zhi ti'u la sogs
276b1(sman dpyad): pa rlung dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o// sna ma'i thal ba dang / gla sgang dang / shing tsha dang / ras bal gyi 'bras bu rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang bskyol la btsags te snar blug
276b2(sman dpyad): na klad pa'i nad thams cad sel to// yang na bca' sga dang / byi dang ka dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma/ bring ga ra dza bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar gyi nang du bskol ba las thigs pa drug snar blugs na nam tshong yan chud kyi nu da thims
276b3(sman dpyad): cad sel to// // da ni skra dkar po'i rtsi bshad de/ pra put+kA rI ka dang / shing mngar dang / pi pi l-ing dang / ut+pal dang / tsan dran rnams kyi phye ma/ skyu ru rA bskol ba'i khu ba dang / tili mar gyi nang du bskol la/ til nyi tshe lus pa
276b4(sman dpyad): snar blugs na/ sgra dkar ba dang / skra ser ba med par byed do// yang nra s+yAn+da ra ma dang / she lu dang / til dwang / ba ru ra rnams kyi mar bying ga ra dzA dang / ni li dang / ku ran d+hu dang / shri sha rnams kyi khu ba dang bskol te/ mur+ra nyi tshe
276b5(sman dpyad): lus bi las rtag tu snar blugs na skra dkar med par gyur ro// rma bya'i mkhris pa dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / shing la kau dang / ma ta ya nu ti dang / stang zil dang / ut+pal dang / ni li dang / b+hing ge ra dza dang / nag tshur rnams kyi phye ma/ ba
276b6(sman dpyad): ru ra'i mar dang / chu'i nang du bskol te/ ba ru ra'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags la zla ba gcig gi bar du lcags kyi snod du bzhag ste/ mgo bsku zhing snar blugs na/ de ma thag tu dus la ma bab par skra dkar ba dang / dus la bab
277a1(sman dpyad): ste skra dkar ba med par byed do// lcags kyi phye mya dang / rgyu ma tsha dang / 'bras rnams rtsa bsdu skyur po dang / tshwa dang / zho kha chu rnams gang yang rung ba'i nang du bskol bas nub mo mgo las byugs la/ nad par
277a2(sman dpyad): 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu bas bkrus ni skra nag por 'gyur ro// skra 'khor ling du byi ba le ni/ sman sra ha tA'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ bskus na skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na 'o ma se'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu gang yang rung ba ga gcin
277a3(sman dpyad): dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na go bye'i khu bas byug par bya'o// shing pa ta'i myu gu dang / bring ga ra dza'i phye ma/ sl-i tres kyi khu ba dang sbyar te/ nyo tshan gyi dr-id kyis bsros pas bskus na yang / skra mi skye ba skye bar 'gyur ro// mig nad la phan par
277a4(sman dpyad): 'dod pas ni rtag tu mar btung ba dang / 'bras bu gsum gyi sman sbyar ba dang / gtar ga gdab pa dang / bkru sman btang zhing kha zas su 'bras dang / mon sran sde'u dang / nas dang / ri dgos skom sa na gnas pa'i sha bza' bar bya'o/
277a5(sman dpyad): mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u rtswa drug pa rdzogs so// // sman dpyid gces pa grub po zhes bya ba/ bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o// de nas dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// dug ni rtsi dug dang / sdig sbrul gyi za dug dang / rnam pa
277a6(sman dpyad): gnyis so// de la rtsi dug ni rtsa ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no// phyi ma ni sbrul la sogs pa las byung ba yin no// dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod de/ ya nga ba dang / ro mi bro ba dang / cha phras te rtsar 'gro ba dang / rtsub pa dang / drod
277b1(sman dpyad): che ba dang / myur ba dang / khyab pa dang / bad kana? bsdud cing 'dren pa dang / dri sbyor ba dang / rno ba snams yin par bshad do// sbrul ni mgo che ba'i rigs dang / lus 'khyil ba'i rigs dang / khra bo'i rigs 'di gsum gyi bye
277b2(sman dpyad): brag las/ rlung gi rang bzhin can dang / mkhris po'i rang bzhin can dang / bdo kan gyi rang bzhin can dang gsum yod par bshad de/ go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro// rigs 'dresnga pA ni mtshan ma gnyis gnyis 'dres
277b3(sman dpyad): pa dang ldan pa yin no// de la sbrul mgro chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ rma kha gnag pa yin no// rlung nad kyi rnam grangs dang / mtshan ma thams cad bskyed do// sbrul lus khyil pa'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ rma kha che la mdog
277b4(sman dpyad): ser zhing skud ba yin te/ mkhris pa'i nad kyi sna grangs dang / mtshan ma thams cad skyed do// sbrul khra bo'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ sma dpal skya zhing / skrong pa myur du 'jub tu mi btub la 'byil zhing snum pa dang / khrags

277b6(sman dpyad): par sbrul gyis zin pa ni shin tu bsgrims na 'ga' zhig 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// tshes bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug dang / dgu dang / nyi shu dgu dang / dus tshigs gnyis te/ nam langs ka dang / nam che ba chub dang / 'di rnams kyi dus kyi
278a1(sman dpyad): sbrulA gyis zin pa yang myi bzad pa yin par bshad do// sbrul gyis zin pa las/ sgra 'byi ba dang / lus phrugs sam/ blung na/ rjes mi snang ba dang / shin tu grang mos kyang ba spu mi ldang zhing / grang 'buM

278a6(sman dpyad): po/ sbrul khra bo'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ ha re nu ka dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / tsha ba gsum dang / pu tse shel dang / po nga dkar po dang / shing mngar dang / khyim gyi dud pa rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba grang mo dang sbyar
