280b6(sman dpyad): sbyar te/ 'thungs no khyi so gdug pas zin pa'i dug 'tsho dka' ba yang myur du sel bar byed do// srog chags phra mo'o cog gis zin pa'i dug sman ni/ nas tshig 'khrus pa'i thal ba dang / swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang / tsha ba
281a1(sman dpyad): gsum dang / shu dag dang / shing kun dang / byi dang ka dang / rgyam tsha dang / rgya spos dang / aM brta dang / bo da dkar po dang / ru rtsa rnams kyi phye ma/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang btang zhing bsku bar bya'o// shing nye
281a2(sman dpyad): rong gi rtsa ba dang / mon sne'u dmar ru'i phye ma cha bsnyams te/ mar dang sbyar ba mthungs na yang srog chags phra mo thams cad kyi dug shin tu mthu che ba yang myur du sel lo// yang phug ron+da gyi rtug pa dang / ngan tiM mu la dang / ba
281a3(sman dpyad): lang gi so dang / rgyamatsho dang / shing nyi reng dang / le brgan rtsi'i sa bon dang / s+phu ha shi ri dang / kru trug tres dang / kan+ti kar rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mo'i dug spel ba'i mchog yin ni// ts+tshan+da dan dang / shug pa dang / ru
281a4(sman dpyad): rta dang / rgya spos dang / pu shel tse dang / pa te la drang / ni rgun thI dang / thal tris dang / she lu rnams sbyar ba ni srog chags phra mo khaM dug go cog gri dug spel ba'i sman yin no// ka prit+sa dang / pa taM li dang / shai lu dang / shi
281a5(sman dpyad): dang / pu na rna ba rnam gnyis dang / shwe ta rnam gnyis dang / 'dri rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mo kha dug go cog gi dug thams cad sel ba'i sman yin+da no// sdig pas zin pa'i dug ma gtogs pa/ dug gis nyam thag pa
281a6(sman dpyad): gzhan thams cad la ni/ kha zas dang / smin la sogs pa bsil ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o// dug gis phog ko cog la khro ba dang / nyi ma la 'dug pa dang / nyin par nyal ba dang / nyal po rnams byar mi rung ngo // dug gis phog
281b1(sman dpyad): pa las rim pa la sogs pa'i b+ha gnyen gyis nad gzhan gyis thebs pa rnams la ni/ so so'i sman gang yin pa sbyar te gso bar bya'o// dug gis nyam thug pa rnams la khu zas kyang tsha ba bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i rnams
281b2(sman dpyad): bza' zhing btung brla bya'o// dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// // de nas smin bcud kyis len dang / re tso bar bya ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bshid par bya'o// de la sman gang sku dkar ba dang / na ba med par
281b3(sman dpyad): byed pa de ni bcud kyi len ces bya ba yin no// de yang na tshod dang / pho gzhon nu'i tshe 'am/ yang nA bar mi'i tshe bsgrub par byas te/ sngar skyugs sman dang / bkru sman dang / khrus la sogs pas lus kyi phyi nang dag par byas nas
281b4(sman dpyad): rtsom par bya'o// de la sgrub pa'i thabs ni/ mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lcags kyi phye maM dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i phye ma rnams sbyor bas bum pa bkang la/ lo phyed kyi bar du nas kyi dkyil du bzhag po las rgyun tu don par zos
281b5(sman dpyad): nasgra dkar por gyur po med par byed do// yang na A ru ra dang / pi pi ling+ga dong / byi dang gau dang / s+phu ru ra dang / khaM ra rnams kyi phye mA dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar drang / til mar+Ya dung s+yAR+Ya te zos na rga bas mi tshugs so//
281b6(sman dpyad): byi dang ka dang / sap+ta par+Na dang / s+phu ru ra dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / til mar rnams dang sbyar ba ji ste mes zos nas gzhon nur gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar mi che'o// byi dang ka dang / 'bras bu gsum dang /
282a1(sman dpyad): bI pI ling rnams kyi phye ma dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi rnams drung sbyar te/ rgyun tu zos na yang rga ba dang / skra dkar por gyur pa sel to// lcags kyi phye mA dang / kha ra dang /
282a2(sman dpyad): bca' sgra dang / pi pi ling rnams kyi phye mo dang / mar dang / tilo mar rnams 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du blugs te/ gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du bskol ba yang / sman bdud kyis len du 'gyur ro//
282a3(sman dpyad): lcags glebs te dmar por bsregs la 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du spyug cing khol bcad par bya ba de lta bur lan mang du byas pa'i lcags te/ se bdar gyis bdar ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang
282a4(sman dpyad): mar dang sbyar te/ zos na yang tshe rnying bar 'gyur re// yang na skyu ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang / mar sbrang rtsi rnams cha bsnams te/ srang brgya brgya dang / lcags kyi phye ma srang nyis brgya dang / 'di rnams sbyar po ljags kyi stong
282a5(sman dpyad): du zhugs te/ bzhag pa yang tshe rnying bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// drub mar cad dang / 'bras bu kA sum gyi phye ma dang / sbra rtsi dang stAr te zlos na yang / gshin rje'i snga ltas skra dkar por gyur pa med pad+ma byid do// b+hi ring
282a6(sman dpyad): ga'i phye ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lcags kyi phye ma rnams che bsnams te/ sbyar ba bum pa'i nang du blugs la/ mon sran sde'u'i dkyil du bzhag pa las ran par zos na/ skra mthing gar 'gyur zhing stobs dang
282b1(sman dpyad): ldan pa bAskAr re/ taM pA la phye mra srang brgya dang / mar dang / sbra rtsi srang brgya sbyar te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du snod kyi nang du bzhag pa las/ rgyun tu zos la kha zas 'o ma dang ldan pad zos na/ sgra dkar po med
282b2(sman dpyad): par byed cing / zla ba bzhin du mdzes par 'gyur ro// sman pa ra hi'i rtsa ba'i bye mo srang brgya sbrang rtsi dang sbyar haM/ mthar gyis za zhing khams phul li kha zas 'o ma dang mar dang ldan per za zhing / nan tan du byas na
282b3(sman dpyad): lang che dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang na zla ba gcig gau bar du sman par hi zhib tu btags pa'i phyi ma s+thA rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lnga gu zos la/ de'i 'og tu bA ra ti'i phye ma 'o ma dang bskal te/ bslangs la btsags pa 'thung
282b4(sman dpyad): na yang sman bcud kyi len du 'gyur ro// pra na rna ba'i rtsa ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma srang phyed 'om bskol te/ byung ba'i nang du btab ste zla ba gnyis sam/ lo g+hA cig gi bar du rgyun tu 'thungs na yang rga bya ming
282b5(sman dpyad): bar 'gyur ro// nyer shing dang / sap+tA par+N+Na dang / pU shel tsA dang / pa shaM dang / ba la dong / nag pa sa dang bi daM ra dang / thal rjes dang / bye g+h+ri rnams kyang re re nas pun rna ba'i cho ga gong du zhing po bzhin du byas na/ yon
282b6(sman dpyad): de bzhin du 'gyur ro// sha skye bar 'dod pa la ni/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du/ sman a she n+d+ha'i bye ma/ til mar dang / mar dang 'o ma dang / chu bskol ba rnon mo rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs la 'bas
283a1(sman dpyad): 'phrod pa bza' bar bya'o// sman bcud kyis len sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ rtag tu khA zas 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa'i chan 'o ma dang / mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang / rkang 'gros dang / ri dgas
283a2(sman dpyad): skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang / sreg cing bza' bar bya'o// ro tsA bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/ shing mngon gyi phye mi zho gnyis mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyad te/ rtag tu zos la de'i rjes la 'o ma 'thungs
283a3(sman dpyad): nArgan po yang ro tsa bar byed do// mon sran sde'u srang re re cho ga gong ma ltar byas na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro// at+ma gup+ta'i sa bon dong / gze ma'i rtsa ba dang / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dAng sbyar ba 'am/ yang na sman uts+tsha
283a4(sman dpyad): de'i phye mu kha ra dang / 'o mau dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang / ro tsA bar 'gyur ro// byi da rA'i phye ma de nyid kyi khu bas lanra ming du bsgos pa btags te/ mar dang / sbrang TI dang sbyar ba'i lde gus ni shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do// r-i
283a5(sman dpyad): dug po'i ldag pa'i 'bras bu 'o ma'i nang du legs par btsos te zhu bar byas pa'i nang du/ til lan mang du bsgos pa zos pa'i rjes la/ 'o ma 'thungs pa gang yin po de'i pho mtshan rtag tu bsgren mar 'gyur ro// yang
283a6(sman dpyad): na mon sran sde'u shun lpags bshus te/ zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang / mar gyi nang du bskol te/ thug pa ska rab tu gyur nas phyung la bsgrangs te/ sbrang rtsi dang / sbyar ba'i ri lu/ shing bil+la'i 'bras bu tsam du byas
283b1(sman dpyad): pa nyin gcig bzhin du zos na yang / pho mtshan bsgren cing / nyal po nus par 'gyur ro// 'bras phye'i nung du til dang / ang+ga gup+ta da dA/ mon sran sde'u rnams kyi phye mas bsres te/ 'o mA dang sprul pa'i khu
283b2(sman dpyad): ba mar gyi nang du btsos pa zos na yang / shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do// khwa zas dang / btung ba rnam po sna tshogs dang / rol mo sgra ska yid du 'ong ba dang / spos dang / byug pa la sogs pa dri zhim po sna tshogs dang
283b3(sman dpyad): me tog dang / phreng ba dang sa dang / rgyan bzang po la sogs pa yang mi ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no// sman bcud kyis len dang / ro tsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // de nas byis pa'i rgyud
283b4(sman dpyad): kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// da la bud med ni dga' bar bya'o// gnas dam pa yin la/ bu rin theng med pa bskyed pa yin pas/ de'i mo mtshan la nad byung na dga' ba dang / bu 'byung ba gnyi ga med par 'gyur te/ dwe
283b5(sman dpyad): bas na de gso ba'i cho ga je bshad par bya'o// de la rlung las gyur pa mo mtshan gyi nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ mo mtshan na ba dang / mdog rtsub pa dang / yon por 'gyur pa dang / mkhrang ba dang / phal phal byed pa rnam yino// /
283b6(sman dpyad): mkhris pa 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ma las gyur pa ni/ mo mtshan che ba 'ur 'ur por byed pa dang / khrag 'dzag pa dang / rims kyis 'debs pa rnams las rtogs par bya'o// bad kan 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan
284a1(sman dpyad): gsa' ba dang / grang b+ha dang / b+he ma bem por 'dug pa dang / 'bras khu 'du bur dkar+ya zhing / sbyin po 'byung 'byung po 'dzag pa rnams yin no// de la rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan g+hi na dA gso ba'i cho ga ni/ 'bras kyi'o/
284a2(sman dpyad): thug gi dugs sam/ mon sran sde'u'i chan gyi dugs sam/ ling na ras ma 'jam po/ tIl mar dron proSh+Ti nudra du sgrogs po nud du btsa'u zhing dugs bya'o// mdor ni rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nang la ni/ sman mAr btung ba
284a3(sman dpyad): dang / dgus bya ba dang / sman mas btang ba rnams bzang ngo // yang na mo mtshan gyi nang la ni/ pi pi li dang / zin thig le'i rtsa ba'i phye mr-i chang dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pi pi ling dang / u bi kun rtsi ka'i sa byon
284a4(sman dpyad): drang / khe ru tshwa rnams kyi phye ma chang dang sbyar te blud do// pha bong gi dreg pa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / b+har+m+mi dang / ra snA dang / sle tres dang / nyi'u shing dang / yung dang / skyer ba dang / byA na rna ba dang / me daM dang / 'di rnams kyi
284a5(sman dpyad): phyi ma n+do gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sumau nu rtsa gnyis dang / 'o mA mar gyi tshad kyi nang du bskol+yA te/ mAr nyi tshe lus pi btsags pa la rnyan par 'thungs na yangang+ga rlung las gyur pA'i mo mtshan g+hi n+yA dA snrel zhing / mkhyaus pA l+yA
284a6(sman dpyad): gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nang la yeng bzang lo/ bu chags par byed pa'i mchog kyang yon no// mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nang la ni// khrig lus pa'i nang bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bshang ba bzhin
284b1(sman dpyad): du bya'o// bad kun las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nang lA ni/ dong gA la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi btung ba dang / bkru ba dang steng du thug pa dang / byug pa la sogs pa thams cad bya'o// de ltar mtshan gyi nyes pa dang /
284b2(sman dpyad): pa dang / nad med par byas nas bu chag par bya ba'i thabs ni/ skye ba snga na su sman dang / kha zas bzang pos lus brta zhing nyal po mi bya bar 'dug lu/ bud med zla mtshan byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu khrus
284b3(sman dpyad): byas nas nyal na bu chags par 'gyur te/ de l-i zla mtshan byung naso zhag bzhi len pa dang / zhag drug dang / brgyad dang / bcu dang / bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe/ nyal na buM khye'ur 'gyur ro// zla mtshan byung nas zhag lce dang /
284b4(sman dpyad): bdun dang / dgu dang / bcu gcig lon lon+da pa'i tshe nyal na/ bu mor 'gyur ro// de la skyes pa'i khu ba mang la/ bud med khrag nyung na nu khye'ur 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i khu ba nyung la/ bud med kyi khrag mang na nr-i bu mor 'gyur ro// zla ma
284b5(sman dpyad): b+hud+de nas zhag bAcu gsum lon phran chud ni b+hur mi 'gyur ro// de la khye'ur 'gyur bar 'dod na/ rgyam tsha 'am shing pra ta'i yal ga'i rtse myo gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'o ma dang bAtags te btsags pa'i khu ba las thigs pa
284b6(sman dpyad): ni ma nyal ba'i snga rol tu bud med kyi sna g.yon par blugs na khye'u mo 'gyur ro// bud med zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshe/ kha lung gi sa bon nam/ na ga ge sar gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te/ bud med kyis
285a1(sman dpyad): 'thungs la skyes pa dang nyal na yang bu chags par 'gyur ro// de la bu 'chags pa'i mtshan ma ni nu mA'i thor to mdog sngo skyar 'dug na bu yod par shes par gyis shig/ de ltar sbrum mar gyur nas la
285a2(sman dpyad): drag shul can drang / mya ngan dang / 'tsher ba dang / khro ba'i bag bsrung zhing / gang yid la 'dod pa dang / 'phrod pa rnams sbyin par bya'o// 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / brdegs shing sdud pa dang / kha zas dang / skom ro che ba dang / drod
285a3(sman dpyad): cha ches pa zos shing 'thungs na ni/ bu 'byil bar 'gyur te/ de yang khrag 'dzag cing na ba'i mtshan mas shes par byas la slar gso ba'i cho ga bya'o// de lta bu gso ba la ni/ sman gyi khu ba grang mo lus la blugs pa dang sman
285a4(sman dpyad): gyi khu ba glang mo'i nang du 'jug pa dang / sman bsil ba'i bag gis lus byug pa rnams bzang ngo // gzhan yang bu 'byil du byed pa slarar+ya gso ba'i sman ni/ sranA 'tsho byed sna bcu'o ma dang bskol te/ btsags la kha rA dang sbyar
285a5(sman dpyad): te blung ngo // yang tsan+da dran dkar po dang / bri tshang rto dang / rgun dang / pu shol tsi dAng / kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / shing mngar dang / rgya shug+na gI 'bras bu dang / sug smel dang / btsod dang / d+ha ta ka'i me tog
285a6(sman dpyad): dang kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig sbyar ba dang / kha ri dang / ut+pal dang / shing mngar dang / gseng phrom dang / tsan don dkar po dang / thal tros rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gsum las
285b1(sman dpyad): gang yang rung ba/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te blung ngo // yang na sman gyi sde tshan sngar bshad pa'i nang nas/ ut+pa la la sogs pa'i sde tshan smos pa rnams btags la/ ShA ra dwang / 'o ma dang sbyar te blud do// yang na n+ya gro d+ha

285b3(sman dpyad): bskol ba'i khu be btsags pa 'bras phye dang kha res sbyar ba 'am/ yang na rtsa ba'i sman de rnams 'o ma dang bskol te btsags lnga kha ra dang sbyar ba blud do// sbrum pa'i kha zas ni thog ma sbrum nas/ zla ba gcig dang / gnyis dang /
285b4(sman dpyad): gsum lon gyi b+harar+ya du mngar bag dang / bsil ba'i kho zas sbyin no// zla ba bzhi la bab pa'i tshe ni kha zas mar dang ldan par sbyin no// zla ba lnga la bab pa'i tshi ni kha zas zhun mar dang / 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin no// zla ba drug dang
285b5(sman dpyad): bdun la bab pa'i tshe ni thug pa bzang po dang / gAze ma la sogs pa'i sman mar ram/ sngar bstan pas btab pa blud do// zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe// kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin zhing / til mar dang / shing mdor dang / 'o ma dang
285b6(sman dpyad): bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i bcung mas btang ngo // de phan chad kyi kha zas ni thug pa dang / rkang 'gros dang ri dgas skams na gnas pa'i sha khu snumo che bas sbag cing zos na bzang ngo // de nas byis pa
286a1(sman dpyad): btsas na/ de'i lte ba sor brgyad tsam lus pa bcad de/ chu ngo 'jam tsam gyis byis pa bkra su la/ zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi cha mi mnyam pa mang du sbyar ba cung zad tsam khang pa/ zhug go/ de nas gzar b+hU bya ma dang //
286a2(sman dpyad): shu dag dang / sman+ma bram+b+hi dang / a ru ra dang / ru rta rnams kyi phye ma zhib mo zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na gser gyi phye ma/ sman bram+b+hi bskol ba'i khu ba dang / sbyar ba las nyung ngu nyung ngu rgyun tu byin na/ bu de
286a3(sman dpyad): yid gzhungs shing / midog bzung baR+Sha 'ong ngo // bud med bu mau byung ba do ni/ thog ma bu byung nAs zhag gsum 'am/ zhag lnga'i bar du/ til mAr ramamar khu tshod ran par blud cing kr-i kha zas snum bgra yod pa sbyin no// sha ma
286a4(sman dpyad): 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/ pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams kyi phye ma chang dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'bras kyi rtsa ba'i phye ma zho gnyis tsam pa gcin rtsa bas skyur po gang yang rung ba dang sbyar
286a5(sman dpyad): tetote byung na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zla ba grangs tshang ba yang / 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/ shing bai ru shra ka'i rtsa bau dang / lu ga li dang / ba sha ka rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang skor bas mo mtshan dang / lte ba
286a6(sman dpyad): bsdus ni 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bu byung ba'i 'og tu bud med la nang a la ka zhes bya ba 'thung ste/ de'i mtshan ma ni snying na ba dang / klang ba dang / klang pa chu sor zug cing na ba yin te/ de la nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba ma
286b1(sman dpyad): ram yang na chu bskol ba dron po gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na pi pi la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na'u su'i 'bras bu bskol ba'i khu ba/ bu sar dang / tsha ba gsum
286b2(sman dpyad): dang / dri smra gsum zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang / sug sbrel dang / gAn+d+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma dang sbyar te blud do// yang nu bu byung bI las nang du gyur pa la ni/ rtsa ba lnga bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ lcags dmar po bsregs pa
286b3(sman dpyad): gzhug cing / de lta bur lon mang du byas pa 'am/ yang nu chang gi nang du snga ma ltar lcags bsregs pa bcug ste/ blung ne zhi bar 'gyur ro// bu'i ma 'am/ nu ma snun pA'i ma mas kha zas dang btung ba lci ba'i beg zos
286b4(sman dpyad): shing 'thungs pa dang / dus snga phyi dang / tshang che chung / zlos shing 'thungs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum 'khrug nas nu zho ma rlung bar gyur paM la sa ni/ bu la nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'byud+b+ha bar 'gyur ro//
286b5(sman dpyad): de la nu zho rlung gis ma rung bar byas pa'i mtshan ma nI/ nu no nyid ro bsku zhing nang du blugs na steng du 'byung 'gyur ba lngas rtogs par bya'o// nu zho mkhris pa lngas ma rungs par b+h+yas bri'i mtshan ma ni/ nu na ro nI sgyur
286b6(sman dpyad): nu no chu'i nang du blugs na steng du ser po shar shar por 'byung ba yin no// ru zho bide kan gyis maM rangs par byis pa'i mtshan ma ni mun sgra ma zhing shin tu lji pa 'byar 'byar po chu'i nang du thugs na zhes su 'bying
287a1(sman dpyad): ba yin no// nu zho nad gaN+DI rnams kyis ma rungs paR+Ya gyur pa ma yin pa tha ma la nI/ chu'i nang du thugs na chu dang 'dres pAr gyur cing / mdog skya bor 'dug pa yin no// de la nad grazhi rnams kyis
287a2(sman dpyad): nu n+do ma rung bar gyur pa'i nyes pa bsal zhing slar gso ba'i thabs ni/ bu'i ma 'am/ nu ma bsnun pa'i mA ma thog mar/ mur khu b+hud la/ de'i 'og tu byi pi ling gau phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi nim+b+ha bskol ba'i khu ba dang / sbyar
287a3(sman dpyad): ba'i skyugs sman blud de/ skyug tu gzhug go// kha zas ni mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang / sha khu dang ldan+da par sbyin no// yang na nu no ma rungs par gyur pa la ni/ tshos blar byed po'i smyan/ birga dang / thang shi dId+ya/ shu dag dung / bA tha
287a4(sman dpyad): dang kha~M da dkar po rnams po skal ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na dong ga le stsogs pa'i sde rgyun bskal ba'i khya ba 'am/ yang na gla sgang la sogs pa sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs pas/ sbyangs par bya'o// byis po'i rims kyis
287a5(sman dpyad): thebs pa la ni/ 'bras bu rdos pa'i dang / skyer khAr+N+Na dang / kha ra dwang / smyig rkang dang / shing mngar rnams kyi phye mA cha bsnams te/ sbrang rtsi dang / skyer ba'i lde gu byin nA rims thams cad sel to// yang nA pi pi ling dang / kho d+ha
287a6(sman dpyad): dkar po dang / bu bran shing rnams btags pa'i bye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bo de dkar po gcig pu'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na/ rims dang / lung pa dang / spyugs pa'i nad rnams sel
287b1(sman dpyad): 'bras yos dang / rgyamra tsha dang / shIng long kog rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin nA skyug pa'i nad sel to// smig rkang dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbyar ba'i lde gu byin nu yang / byis pA'i lud pa dang / dbugs
287b2(sman dpyad): mi bde ba'i nad sel to// 'bras yos da / rgyam tshwa'i phye mo/ khA lung gi shing thug gi phye mIs sbyor ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na 'bras yis dang / kha ra dang / rgya mA tsha dong / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang skyug
287b3(sman dpyad): pa dang / skyigs bu'i nAd sel to// pi pi ling chen po dang / d+ha ha ki dang / gseng phrom dang / bil+la dang / ba lA ka rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbreng rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'ama?/ yang na sman de dag nying+ge bskol bo'i khu ba bsgrangs bri
287b4(sman dpyad): sbrang rtsi dang sbyaR+Sha ba byin na/ byis pa'i dmu rdzing dang / lto ba cher skyes sel to// sa mi ga dang / d+ha tra ka'i me tog dang / thal tres dang / gseng phrom rnams bskal ba'i khu ba bsgrings la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te byin na yeng+ga dAma?
287b5(sman dpyad): d+hIng sel te/ b+his pa rnam+b+haswA g+h+ri mig nang dang / ku ku la zhes bya ba dang / bong thAk+Sha zhes bya b+ha l+ya ni/ la la phung+ga dang / b+hi dang ke dang / khA lA dang / lUng sma dang / ster pa dang / r+g+ha stegs dang / bAtsag+sa sgyog sgyu mo rnams kyi bye ma
287b6(sman dpyad): mig sman blugs par bya'o// yang na thang shing dang / btsag dang / gla sgang rnams kyi phye ma/ ri'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu btsags pa'i lde gus mig gi phyi rol bskus na mig nad sel to// byis pa'i kha ra 'brum pa byung ste
288a1(sman dpyad): btsal langs pa la ni/ shing a sho tha'i shun lpags dang / ru rta'i phye mra sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na skyer pa dang / shing mngar dang / a ru ra dang / sna ma'i lo ma rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang
288a2(sman dpyad): sbyar ba bsku bar bya'o// sman go'u ri dang / shing mngar dang / nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang / gseng phrom dang kos la par+Ne dang / priSh+Ta paN+Da dang / ra dza dra na dang / kha ra dang / shug pa dang / tsan dan dang / rgun dang / me togo pad
288a3(sman dpyad): mo dang / ku mu ta dang / ut+pal drang / dzi ba ka dang / zang rtsi ba dang / me ta dang / bu tshang rto dang / mar nye ba dang // thAl tres rnam gnyis dang / 'di rnams kyi phye ma dang / khro ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang / shun
288a4(sman dpyad): lpags rnams lnga zhes bye ba/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i shun+da lpags dang / u dum+ba rI'i shun lpags dang / A shwat+tha'i shun lpags pa dang / p+lak+Sha'i shun lpags dang / be t+yA'i sa'i shun lpags rnams dang / rtsa ba lnga pa dang
288a5(sman dpyad): 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nya tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni/ ge'u ri la sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/ nang dz+yo ti ka zhes bya ba dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
288a6(sman dpyad): me dpal dang / btsa' nang khar 'brum pa 'ong ba dang / gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bzang ste/ ran par blud na byis pa'i nang de cig sel to// byis pa mtshon mo gnyid log tu mi btub par ngu zhing nur mi
288b1(sman dpyad): btub pa dang / dri mi zhim par gyur pa dang / lus dang rkang lag g.yo ba la sogs pa tshul sna tshogs byed de/ so 'cha' zhing sen mo 'brang par byed pa rnams ni gdon nang las gyur pa yin te/ de la ni sgog
288b2(sman dpyad): skya dra/ nim pa'i lo ma dang / rgya sgyogs dang / smyig ma'i shun lpags lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / yungs kor dang / nim+ba'i lo ma dang / smig ma'i shun lpags dang / rgya skyugs rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang
288b3(sman dpyad): sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa dang / skra dang / lha la phul ba'i mai trog rnying pa dang / yungs kor rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang / bdug pa sbyar ba rnam pa 'di gsum lasA gang yo rung ba mer dang sbyar te bsregs pa'i
288b4(sman dpyad): du bas bdugs nA gdon thams cad sel tau// shing swap+ta par+Na'i shun lpags dang / muR+YA dang / pu rtse shil rnams btags pa'i phye ma tshwa dang sbyar bas byis pa'i lus dril nA yAng gdon thamasa? cad sel to// ma d+hu ka'i
288b5(sman dpyad): me trog dang / shing a shwat+tha drang / sap+ta par+d+ha dang / pe lu ka dang / 'di rnams kyi lo ma lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba grang mos khrus byas ni yang gdon sol to// yang na gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir las thams ce da byed
288b6(sman dpyad): pa'i sngags 'dis gtor mi sbyin pa dang / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi las rnams bya ba dang / sngags kyi skud pa gdags pa la sogs pa bya'o// de la sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba ste/ ga ru ShA ya/ nA ma snyam pa ka ya/ sat+ya sat+ya ta nu/
289a1(sman dpyad): te swA hA/ byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so// // de nas las rnam lnga'i le'u bshad par bya'o// las rnams lnga ni/ skyug sman dang / bkru sman dang / sman snar b+hu kha da/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang /
289a2(sman dpyad): 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams yin par shes par bya ste/ de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// de la sbug sman mas btang ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar sman pas/ nang pa mar dang / til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung
289a3(sman dpyad): ba 'jam rtsi blud la/ de'i 'og tu dugs rnam lnga zhes bya ba khyim dron por lus mes bsro ba dang / rdo bsregs pa'i steng du chu blugs pa'i rlangs pas bdug cing rdul gdon pa dang / nyi tshan gyis bdug pa dang / dugs kyi sman bsrong
289a4(sman dpyad): ba'i phur mas dugs bya ba dang / gos dang / rdo la sogs pa bsros pa'i dugs rnam pa 'dri lnga gang yang rung bas lus legs pa ru dros par byas nas gos dron po bskon te/ smug sman btang / rkub rten pus mor phyin tsam gyi
289a5(sman dpyad): steng du 'dug ste/ e rat+na'i sdong bu 'am/ bya sgro la sogs pa 'jam pos gre ba nas dkrug cing / skyug tu gzhug go// de la smug sman ni/ pi pi ling dang / po son cha dang / rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / shing mdor bskol
289a6(sman dpyad): ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'di ni/ skyug sman gyi mchog yin te/ dron por 'og dros kyis bzung ste/ blung la skyug du gzhug go// yang na sbyar dug ces bya ba/ 'bras dang til dang / mon sran rnge'u gsum bsregs pa'i thug pa po son cha dang
289b1(sman dpyad): legs par btsos pa 'am/ yang na po sonA cha'i sa bon 'o ma dang sbyar te bskol ba'am/ yang na pri pi ling la sogs pa'i skyug sman sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa gong du smos pa rnams po son cha'i 'bras bu lnga bskol ba'i
289b2(sman dpyad): khu ba dang sbyar te dron por 'thungs na sIng tshim par skyug par 'gyur ro// ku ba ro kha bA dang / thang shing dang / dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang / kri ta b+he ta na dang / d+ha ma rga ba rnams kyang skyug sman yin te/ so sor po son cha
289b3(sman dpyad): dang 'dra bar sbyar ro// de nas skyugs pa'i rjes la/ mikhris pa byung ba dang / lte dang / snying kha dang / mgo bo yang bar gyur na skyug sman legs pa yin no// 'di ltar ma gyur pa ni/ skyug smin mi legs pa yin par bshad de/
289b4(sman dpyad): skyug pa'i tshod ma rig ste/ grags na nang du 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ snying gar na ba dang / glo 'grams pA dang / mgul po snad pa dang / dran pa nyams shing myos pa dang / lus 'dir ba dang / khrag skyug pa rnams las
289b5(sman dpyad): rtogs par bya'o// de la skyug sman ni/ bad kAn las gyur pa'i nang dang / cham pa drug po dang / gcin snyi pa'i nad dang / mdze nang dang / lkog nang lha 'or dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / bsud pa rnams lo nyams stongs
289b6(sman dpyad): dang sbyar te/ btang bar bya'o// mig nang rab rib yod pa dang / dmu rdzi na dang / sman dang / sgom pa'i nad dang / rtug rkam gyi nad kyis nyam thag pa dang / sbrum pa dang / rlung nang can dang / skya rbab kyi nad yod pa rnams la ni/
290a1(sman dpyad): skyug sman du btang du mi rung ngo // bukru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar mar dang / tril mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba'i 'jam rtsi blung la/ de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa bzhin
290a2(sman dpyad): du dugs kyis lus bsros te skyug sman btang la/ do'i 'og tu bkru sman btung ngo // bkru smana? btang ba'i thabs de ltar ma byas te/ cho gra log pAr byas na pho ba'i nad skyed par bshad do// de la mkhris pa'i rang
290a3(sman dpyad): btsun can gyi mi ni/ lta sI'o// rlung dang bad kan can gyi rang bzhin can gyi mi ni lho sra ba yin no// nad gzhi rnams stobs mnyam pa'i lho ni 'bring ste/ de dag la sman gyi tshod ci rigs par dpag cing btang bar
290a4(sman dpyad): bya'o// de rlung lngas gyur pa'i nad kyis nyam thag pa'i mi la/ bkru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/ shring nye rong dang / rgyum tshwa dang / bca' sga rnams kyi phye maM rtsa bas skyung po 'am/ rkang 'gros dang / rI dgas skams nA
290a5(sman dpyad): gnas pa'i sha'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te/ btung bar bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ shing nye rong phye ma sman ro mngar ba dang / kha bai la sogs pa mkhris pa'i nad la phan pa'i
290a6(sman dpyad): na gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba dong sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang bar bya'o// bang kan las gyur pa'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa la ni/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ga tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang
290b1(sman dpyad): glacin gyis sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang bar bya'o// pi pi ling dang / bca' skra dang / shing nye rong dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'dri ni/ bad kun las gyur pa'i nang ngo cog

290b4(sman dpyad): sel to// tsha bya gsum dang / dan+ti rtsa ba dang / shing nye rong dang / a rA ra dang / ning dong rnams kyi phye ma dang / dwi sna gsum zhes bya ba/ shing tshwa dang / su gau smel dang / gaun+d+ha pa tr-i rnams kyi btab la/ bu mar dang sbyar te/
290b5(sman dpyad): gong bur dgongs pa'i bAk+Sha sman gyis kyang nad do cog sel to// dmu rdzing la sogs pa la ni/ shing nyi rong dang / shing dod kyi phye ma/ shing sU ha'i lo mas lin mang du btso skos la/ bu mar dang / sbrang TI stAr to/ dI swA

291a2(sman dpyad): 'byung ba dang / rlung 'jug pa dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / sha rjen bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba 'thur du 'byung ba rnams yin no// de la bkru sman ni/ mdze dang / gzhang 'brum dang / srin bu'i nang dang / me dpal dang /

291b5(sman dpyad): pa lA ci chags pa snar blugs so// tshang rnam gcig ni/ sr-ing phyed snar blugs pa yin no// tshad rnam gcig ni nyam stobs che chung las dpags te thigs pa bzhi 'am/ drug gam/ brgyad blugs par bya ste/
291b6(sman dpyad): tshad kyi sna grangs mang po bsten pa 'di kun kyang nang pa'i nyam stobs che chung dang sbyar zhing btang bar bya'o// sman mar ram/ tilo mar snar blugs shing / bad kan dang chu sor sna nas drang po ni nam tshong yan
292a1(sman dpyad): chad kyi nad rnams la btang ba yin ne// da nI sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi dang / bcud mas btang ba'i cho ga bshad de/ sman mas btang ba'i dpyad ni/ lcags dang zangs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba

292a3(sman dpyad): bor byas te/ thor te phra mo logs nas sor gsum gyi tshu rol du phung lo tsam zhig grags byas la/ rtsa ba sbom po legs kyi khar yang sman blugs pa'i snod gnag gi lgang pa bzang po dam por gdags shing /
292a4(sman dpyad): sgang po mi 'bud pa'i gegs ci ran pa/ kha gnyis su bcad la/ de'i bar du lgang pa'i kha btsong bar bya'o// de nas sman btang ba'i tshe/ sngar kha zas zos nas glo g.yon phyogs kyi nyal la/ rkang pa g.yon pa ni brkyang
292a5(sman dpyad): g.yas pa ni bskums te/ gzhang kha dang / lce'u snum gyis byugs la/ spyan shu ti dang / rgya ma tsha'i phye ma mar ram/ ti li mar dang / chu dang ldan par bskol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa 'am/ sman gzhan yang rung
292a6(sman dpyad): ste/ chad srang gnyis sam/ srang gsum mam/ srang bzhi mi nyid kyi nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing / tshod ran pa dang / dran por mas btang zhing / gce'u'i rtse mo nang du bcug la/ gags la thug par byas te/ log pa g.yon pas
292b1(sman dpyad): gce'u'i sked pa nas dam du bzung zhing / lgang pa'i nang du rlung ma song bar byas te/ ha cang mi drag mi dal pa dang / bar du mi gda' mi bcad cing / rgyun chags par ldan gcig gis rdzogs par lag pa g.ya
292b2(sman dpyad): pas lhung pa pA tsir la/ rlung nang du mi 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman gyi lcag mu chung zad tsam lus par bya'o// spyan btang zin nas/ gan N+yal du bskal te/ rkang lag bzhi chur gyen du bteg la/ lan gsum gyi bar du
292b3(sman dpyad): dag tu brkyang zhing / bskum pa byas nas/ kha sbub tu bzlog ste/ bdag nyid kyi rting pas rku ba chos la lAn gnyis gsum du brdabs la/ de'i 'og tu mi gzhan gyis rkang pa'i 'thil du khu tshur gyi lan gnyis gsum du
292b4(sman dpyad): brdems nas/ ro smad stod de nyal du gzhug go// sman mar gyi cho ga 'di ni zhag lon gyi bar du 'khyil te/ phyir ma byung yang mi rung bar 'gyur ro// de bas kyang yun ring du phyir 'byung du ma btub na/ phyi sa 'gags pa'i cho ga
292b5(sman dpyad): sngar bstan pa bzhin du/ sman gyi ring bu mas gzhug pa 'am/ yang nA bkru sman 'jam pos myur du dbyung zhing snang bar bya'o// ji ste phyir me byung yang mi bde ba 'am/ lci ba'i bAg med cing / thA mal par 'dug pa la ni/
292b6(sman dpyad): bkru sman la sogs pa bting mi dgos te/ chu bskol ba'i dron po 'thungs pas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la maud dang phyis 'dres par 'byung ba ni/ sman legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no// phyi sa ma 'dres par
293a1(sman dpyad): mAr nyi tshe 'byung ba dang / lus tsha bar gyur pa ni/ sman ma legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no// mur ni ma byung la/ phyi sa ni tha mal par byung la/ lto mi bde ba'i bag tu su gyur na yang me'i drod che bas sman khrod
293a2(sman dpyad): du zhu bar gyur pa yin te/ mi rung ba med do// kha zas ni sman btang nas namA bkres par gyur na/ gdod yang zhing 'phrod pa'i bag las bza'o// sman rdzas btang nas ring po ma len par phyir byung na sman don du ma gyur pa yin
293a3(sman dpyad): teteyang na cho ga snga ma bzhin du bzlas te btang bar bya'o// de la sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcad mas btang pa/ bkra sman drag po mas btang po'i gnyi ga yang / rlung nad kyi bag yod pa lo btang bar bya'o// zang byed kyi nad dang /
293a4(sman dpyad): mdze nAd dang / gAzheng 'brum dang / smyig pa'i nad dang / gcin snyi ba'i nA dang / dmu rdzing yod pa la sogs pa la nai bitAng du mi rung ngo // bkru sman drag po mas btang bA'i cho ga ni/ skyur zhag gnyis gsum gyi snga rol du/ sman
293a5(sman dpyad): mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas btang la bI kru sman drag po nyid mas btang ba'i nyin par/ nyi ma dron po la stu dro nas lus snum gyis byug cing mnye ba dang / dug sna tshogs kyis lus shin du dros shing / sha grol bar byas la/ nang
293a6(sman dpyad): par nas kha zas kyi bag mi bza' mi btung bar/ nyi ma phyed yol tsam na/ sman mas btang bar bya'o// de la btang ba'i thabs ni gan rkyal du bstsal la/ sman mar gyi bcud mas btang ba bzhin du gtse'u dang / lgang par sbyar
293b1(sman dpyad): nas/ sman ha cang mi tsha ha cang mi grang bar dron por byas te/ lgang pa lag pas btsir la/ ha cang mi drag mi drag mi dal ba dang / bar du mi gda' mi bcad par rgyan chags par lan cig gis rdzogs par btang ngo // dri ma
293b2(sman dpyad): byung ba'i snod dam/ khung bu yang snga nas drung du bsnyen la/ sems gud du mi g.yeng bar sman lto na 'dug pa rnams 'byung la thug go snyam du bsam pa gtad par bya'o// de la dbyung ba'i tshed ni/ sman mas btang nas yi
293b3(sman dpyad): gi'i 'bru sum cu drag dal ran tsam du brjod cing zin tsam na 'byung ba'i rigs te/ tha mal pa cog tsog por 'dug la dbyung bar bya'o// de nas nad ma phyin tam/ ma zhag par gyur na bsnani bzod dang mi bzod ma'i
293b4(sman dpyad): nyam stobs las spags te/ bzod pa 'dra na s+thA ma bzhin du ldan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsnun te/ bkrus nas/ de'i 'og tu/ chu dron pos khrus byis la/ kha zas shra khu dang ldan pa bzang po zos nas de'i rjes
293b5(sman dpyad): la/ lus rlung 'jug pa lta na/ de'i mod la mar gyi 'jam rtsi 'i bcud mas btang ba cho ga sngar ba 'dri pa bzhin du bya'o// 'phral du rlung 'jog pa'i ngogs po med na/ zhag gnyis sam gsum gyis gcad de/ gdong mar
293b6(sman dpyad): gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ngo // bkru sman drag po khong du btang ba des ma byung na/ phyi sa 'gegs pa'i nad dang / zug cing na ba dang / lte spo ba la sogs pa'i nang mang por 'gyur te/ nyen che bas na de la ni/ ra du 'byung ran
294a1(sman dpyad): pa'i dusa? las yol ma thag tu 'jam rtsi snron po mas btang ba dang / bkru sman btung ba dang / skrag par bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na bzang ngo // bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di ni/ phan
294a2(sman dpyad): yon che zhing nyen yang che bas na/ gya tshem du btang du mi rung ste/ cho ga de la mkhas pa'i sman pa mang po tshogs pa ste ldegs par dpyad cing btang brar bya'o// de la bkru sman drag po mas btang ba la ni/ sman gyi khu pra srang drug dang //
294a3(sman dpyad): mar ram til mar cha gcig dang / sman gyi phye ma srang gsum dang / rgyam tsha dang / sbrang rtsi tsi ran pa dang / 'di rnams ni spyi'i cho ga yin te/ gzhi 'di rnams kyi steng du/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kin gang gi sman du gtang
294a4(sman dpyad): ba las/ de dag so so'i sman 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsnun te/ skam+b+ha gsher spyir srang nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung bar grangs bkang zhing cho ga 'og nas rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du sbyar ro// de la rlung nad bsal ba'i bkru sman
294a5(sman dpyad): drag po masa? btang ba ni/ rlung sel ba'i smin gang yin pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / shi ngo nye rong gi phye ma dang / rgyam tshwa bro ba tsam dang / rtsabs sgur po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te dron por bA tang ngo // rgya shu ka la
294a6(sman dpyad): sogs pa'i sde tshan dang / rtsa ba bcu dang / rgya sran dang / la phug skam po rnams las sna re re yang srang gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu chu phul gang la srang brgyad du rtsis pa phul tig drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskal te/
294b1(sman dpyad): chu'i brgyad cha gcig lus btsags pa dang / shu dag dang / u pa kuny+dzi ka dang / pri pi ling dang / shu ti dang / rgyam tshwa dang / gla sgang rnams kyi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / rtsab skyur po dang / ba gcin rnams sbyar ba'i bkru

300b1(sman dpyad): ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po dang / shi ba nIr+m+ma l+ya/ gang gi khyim du bzhag na de skrod par byed do// sA kho Ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / bra ru ra'i rtsa ba gcig tu byas nas gang gi khyim du bzhag

300b5(sman dpyad): ni sa nyi ma la bzhag ste/ skyur yang l-I gu dzi ke'i phye ma/ zho glang byas nas dkrugs te/ rgas pa 'o mA'i bza' ba dang lhan cig zos na zhag bdun gyis mdze nad sel bar byed do// de yang galpa te las
300b6(sman dpyad): kyi dbang gis na mi 'grub bo// de bzhin du skyu ru che bcu dang / byi tang ga cha lnga dang / a ru ra che bcu dang / tsi tra ka cha lnga dang / wA gu dzi cha bdun dang / lcags phye cha brgyad dang / ra mo sheg cha dgu dang / til mar
301a1(sman dpyad): bsres pa zla ba gcig gis skra dkar 'joms so// 'di ni byug pa mdor bsdus pa'o// bye'u khany+dza rI Ta'i rus pa dang / sbrul gyi mgrin pa'i phags pa dang / shing gang la sbyin pa'i bdug pa de/ shing
301a2(sman dpyad): de'i byung du mnyam par dor ro// bye'u khany+dza rI Ti'u sha dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar te/ bya ba'i dus su skye gnas la byugs te/ bud med grang la skyes bu mngon par skrod par byed na de dang po bzhin du skyes pa de'i bur 'gyur/
301a3(sman dpyad): dgon gau'i 'ug pa bzung nas de'i mig dang / pi pi ling gris byugs te/ de'i rdul lhung bas mig la migra sman byas na/ de sbas pa de mi mthong ngo // sne pI ti ta byA d+ha tra ro pa NAM pra yats+tsha ti// nas kyi phye ma dang / yung ba'i
301a4(sman dpyad): bye ma dang / ba'i chu dwang / myur dang / smyos dkAr dang / shing ma r+yA rnams mnyam par sbyar te/ gdong li dral pye byas nA/ gdong pad ma lta bu 'gyur ro// rkang pa dag pad ma'i 'dab ma lta b+hur 'gyur ro// bud med
301a5(sman dpyad): thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang du mdzes shing b+hA ga bAr 'gyur ro// yang shing mngar dang btags te ril bu sbya raro nas chu'i zlum par bcug naM/ bsilnga par 'gyur ro// oM ma hA ba li dza ye swA hA/ gos la yongs su bzlas
301a6(sman dpyad): te bsgos na skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pas spre'u'i mjug ma blangs te sbrang dang btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na ling ga gyen du 'gyur bar the tshom med do// duH dkar po dang / shu dag dang
301b1(sman dpyad): rurta dang / piN+Da tA grA ra'i rtsa ba dang / srin lAg gi khrag rnams mnyam paR+Ya sbyar te/ dur khrod kyi thal ba drang 'di dag sbyar bas skyes pa dang bud myed dbang du byed do// thang khrom pa dang / shu drug dang /
301b2(sman dpyad): ru rta dang / kaN+Di ka ri dang sa tA ba ri dang / 'di dag cha mnyam par byas nas tI lo mar gyis smin par byas pa'i til mar dos/ ling+ga nyid par byas na sbom par byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// lce'i dri ma dang
301b3(sman dpyad): shu dag dang / ru rta dwang / nirma l+ye chu myanyam par phye mar byas nas gAng la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// a ga ru dang / gu gul dwa / shwe ba shuSh+ka dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / bu rA ma sbyar bas bdug
301b4(sman dpyad): pa byas nas bdag nyid rgyal po'i pho brang du song na mchod pa chen po thob cing / btsunA mo rnams kyis dr-i snom par byed do// bye'u kheny+dza rI Ti'i bun blangs te/ sI ri si'i sa bon byugs pas 'chi ba sol to// bya rog gi
301b5(sman dpyad): lce dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bras thug po che bdun dang / bdag nyid kyi khu ba sbyar taM gadr-i li byin pa do dbang du 'gyur r-ikoshu dag dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / gi wang lhan cig btags te/ de'i thig
301b6(sman dpyad): laM byas nas gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// daN+Dot+pa la'i rtsa ba dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig btogs te ril bu byas nas gang la sa rtsi dang lhan cig byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// oM bA ra s+ya mu kham dr-iSh+Ti bA lan
302a1(sman dpyad): sa ma tre dza sA/ tsa tur+tha kam+ma hA g+ho ram k+Shi pra me ba pra Na s+ya ti/ sngags 'di gro ga'i 'dra ba ma la bris te lag pa la btags nas rims nyin bzhi pa pral du nyams par byed do// bA gu dzi ka'i 'bras bu'i
302a2(sman dpyad): phye ma dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas de dril te/ dar ba'i zan dang / skyor ba thams cad dang lhan cig zos na gzhang 'brum dang / rkang 'bam dang / 'brum phran dang / mdze dang / mtshan por rdol be dang dug rnams sel
302a3(sman dpyad): bar byed do// bA gu dzi ka'i 'bras bu dar pa dang lhan cig btags nas de dr-i l-i bas mdze thams cad dang / bi tsA rtsi ka la sogs pa sel bar byed do// bA gu dzi ka bre gang dang / seng ldeng zho gang mnyam par byas te/ chu bre brgyad
302a4(sman dpyad): dang bkolnga bar bya'o// de ni cha phyed lus pa na btungs te/ bya rog gi lce dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / bi lpa'i 'dab ma dang / gur gum dang / bdag nyid kyi khrag dang mnyam par sbyar byas shing dbang du byed do// au pi shI tsI
302a5(sman dpyad): rU pe NA ling+ga ya tsum+ma ya/ b+ha gau sits+tsha yanya swA hA/ sngags kyi tshig 'di chu khyo pa gang la ldan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas ti nyalnga ba'i dus su rig ma gang gi midA smos nas btab na/ zhog nyi shu rtsa gcig gis mi'i dbang po'i
302a6(sman dpyad): btsun mo yin na'ang dbang du 'gyur na gzhan lta ci smos/ khrag skrong pa'i rtsa ba/ karma rang+ga'i rtsa ba dang si h+ya'i lo ma dang / 'di dag mnyam par byas nas rkang pa'i mthil la byugs na sa bon 'ching bar byed do// a ru ra dang /
302b1(sman dpyad): namakhan dang / lung thang gi 'dab ma dang / d+ha pu ra dang / se 'bru'i shun pa dang / sa kha s+yA nAng+ga pra ma do mU nAM tA ye biSh+Ta sa si khAM ka ro ti/ oM ra tsaN+Di ma hA da t+tA ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags nas
302b2(sman dpyad): ges la sogs par mdud pa byas na bya ba ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// na maHsU lI kA pA lA mA la thAM hA/ gzhan ya d+yA b+hi lA'i khrag blangs nasa?/ 'jim 'bras trai la mar gyis bsgos te/ pad ma'i skud pas sdong bu
302b3(sman dpyad): byas nas dbang phyug gi mdu nu du dung po 'chags par byas te mig la byugs pa tsam gyis mi snang bIr 'gyur ro// oM tse te he he/ sngags 'dis chu dkrugs te mig la byugs na the tshom med par grub par 'gyur ro//
302b4(sman dpyad): bya rog gi khrag dang / ce spyang gi mkhris pa dang / 'ug pa'i rus pa dang / 'di dag cha mnyam pa phye ma zhib mer byas te/ rgyu skar nabs so la btags te/ mig la byugs nA mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sA la bar+t+ti lag
302b5(sman dpyad): pa la bcings nas/ sa ma re kAt+tha zlog par byed do// na ma sh+tsaN+Ta badz+ra pA Na ye ma hA yak+ShA swe n+yA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra hrik+Sh+Na swaT/ rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod cing / oM sa tse r-I sta~M b+ha ya swA hA/ kA la sim+bi ka'i rtsa ba
302b6(sman dpyad): dang ga pur dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / 'di dag che mnyam par byas nas/ chu dang / btegs te/ ril bu byas nas grib ma la bsgrims te/ ril bu de la yang dag pa'i reg pa'i skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas par pad+ma 'dab ma
303a1(sman dpyad): brgyad pa kun nas bris te/ lag pa des bud med kyi lag pa g.yas pa gzung na bud med de mod la dbang du 'gyur ro// dri bzang chen po'i rtsa ba rked la bcings na khu ba rengs par byed pa'i mchog
303a2(sman dpyad): tu bstan no// ba rA ha kAn+ta'i rtsa ba chu dang btags te/ rkang pa'i mthil la byugs na/ khu ba rengs par byed do// nA maHsarba sid+he b+h+yaHsid+her+b+ha ba tra me swA hA/ sngags 'di mngon parA bsngags te/ bab la dang / ljong ros dang / spang
303a3(sman dpyad): sprospos dang / ru rta dang / musta ka ste thams cad gcig tu cha mAnyam par byas nas/ zhib tu btags twe bud med kyi mgo la bsnu nA naM/ ma ngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro// na maHkr-iSh+Ta sarba rA yA ma sa kA nAM kuN+DaM ban+d+ha mi swA hA/ dzi
303a4(sman dpyad): sri nyi ma shar gyi bar du/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ sngags 'dis chu khyor ba gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas he/ phyogs bzhiri gtor na/ sbrang bu rnam skrod par byed do// ka ra bI ra dmari po'i rtsa ba'i lani bdun
303a5(sman dpyad): bsngags te bud med kyi mdun du gtorI nA/ bud med de de'i mod khe na la dbang du 'gyur ro// brah+ma der+t+ti dang / shu dag dong / lo ma rnams sbrang dang lhan cig btegs nas ling+ga la byugs nas 'dod pa byas na bdag po
303a6(sman dpyad): gzhan 'dod par mi byed do// pe tsa ka'i mig blangs nas dzA ti dang sun+na dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas phye ma des mig sman byas na/ skyes bu dbang du 'gyur ro// pe tsa ka'i snum blangs nas pa'i mar dang lhan
303b1(sman dpyad): cig gcig tu byas nas dud pa dbab par bya'o// des mig sman byas nas 'byung po dang sha za rnams kyi dbus su rtse bar byed do// pe tsa ka'i snying blangs nas chang dang lhan cig lus la byugs nas 'dod pa byas
303b2(sman dpyad): na/ bud med thams cad skyes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i shing gi rtsa ba khar bcug na khu ba rengs par byed do// lga dang / pI pi ling dang / na le sham dang / rgyam tsha dang / zi ra dang / ze ra nag po dang / shing
303b3(sman dpyad): kun+da dang / sgog pa dang / lana? tshA dang / shing tsha dang / 'drab ma dang / kU Ta rnams chang dang btags te/ p+la hA ros+t+r-i te nra/ a shwe ShA dzI r+N+Na trar+m+ma bA shwar+tha ro g+haHde thams cad nyams par byed do// gang zhig sud+b+hi bcu
303b4(sman dpyad): gnyis 'thungs// bad kan tshogs ni 'joms byed cing / rlung yang nye bar 'dren par byed/ A dzi d+ha dza ra saR+ya sU pI ta maSh+To daM ki niM si a dza mo da tsha ba ga suma?// rgyu ma tshwa zi ra rnam gnyis dang // shing kun+da che
303b5(sman dpyad): brgyud mnyam paR+Ya bzung // 'di yi phye ma mar sAr dang / skye bo gang zhig za byed pa// rlung gI nad ni sel bar byed// mA lam yastA pu nar+N+Na ba yaHrang dga' ba pi be ti k+ShI rai Na bai pra t+yai haM/ tsAr+d+han+ta s+ya gu Do sa mi hi ta ba
303b6(sman dpyad): to dzAr+Ne ya ShaSh+Ta si naHhI nAM go pi saM dzA ya to rtsi ta bI l-I haM sen+da kun+d+ha pra b+hau/ mA so na~M bar+t+ti raSh+Ta baR+Sha ba ya sA mu k+Sho dzi rA brA d+hi b+hi/ a ru ra srang gcig/ ba ru ra srang gcig/ skyu ru ra srang gcig/ tsi tra ka srang gsum/
304a1(sman dpyad): lga srang gcig/ pi pi ling srang gcig/ na le sham srang gcig/ nA gA ge sar gyi phye ma zho bzhi/ pho ba ris dkar po zho ngo // sdig srin rA zho do// dug zho do// 'di dag thams cad phye ma zhib mor byas nAs
304a2(sman dpyad): bu ramA srang lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang bsres te/ gang gis zos pa de me stobs su 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mdze nang bcwo brgyad nyams par 'gyur ro// zad byed kyi nang dang / glo dang dbugs dang / de bzhin
304a3(sman dpyad): du/ mchin na de dang / skya rbeb dang / 'bras dang / rlung nad dang / sbrul dang / srin bu lU ta dang / dug nad sel bar byed do// de bzhin du brtan pa dang g.yo ba 'ang ngo // stobs glang po che dang mnyam par 'gyur ro//
304a4(sman dpyad): shugs rta lha bur 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gis me 'gyur ro// rna ba phag lta bur 'gyur ro// mig bya rgod lta bur 'gyur ro// 'di thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i ri la
304a5(sman dpyad): bu yongs su rdzogs so// // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tra ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM dzA ra gr-i Nu dz+wa ra gr-i Nu gardza gArdza/ tsAr+d+ha ts+tsha rbu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis
304a6(sman dpyad): pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims mi zad pa rnams/ a Ta ha Ta phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ hu ru hu ru/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ sau r-i muny+tsa kar+t+ti muny+dzi hr-i da yaM muny+tsa muny+tsa/ Da da raM muny+tsa/
304b1(sman dpyad): ka Ti muny+tsa muny+tsa kar+N+Na muny+tsa/ hastaM muny+tsu/ pA dro muny+tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT che ge mo'i rims nyams par gyis shig swA hA/ rims bzlog pa'o// dbang po'i nas dang / zhu mkhan dang / pu she tsi drung / mAr sar/ spos dkar
304b2(sman dpyad): pa ya/ pI tA/ ni ba Ta'i 'dab ma rnams/ gcig tu byas nas btags te gdong la byugs na gdong zla ba lha bur 'gyur ro// ka ma yI'i rtsa ba gtsug tu bcings na gnyid du 'gyur ro// ku nA ra ts+tshin+da'i rtsa ba khar bcug na
304b3(sman dpyad): rAl gri la sogs pa zlog par byed do// a lau mu ShA'i rtsa ba rna ba gnyis la bcings na rims nyin bzhi pa nyams par byed do// dur khrod du skyes pa'i dro Na puSh+pa'i khu bas mig bkang na mig gi me tog
304b4(sman dpyad): sel bar byed do// k+Shu dra a si ni ka'i rtsa ba dang / gi wang lhan cig btags nas thig le byas na/ rgyal po'i sgor mchog tu 'gyur ro// tha~M gA la bstu ka'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcings na mIg nad sel bar byed// sa kho
304b5(sman dpyad): Ta ka'i rtsa bas/ mgul nad spel bar byed do// b+hU mI tsam pa kA'i rtsa ba btags nus btungs na lto ba'i zug sel bar byed do// dka' thub pe'i chu 'ongs pa dang / 'bras sA li dnga?/ 'bras thug po che
304b6(sman dpyad): dang / ka ra dkar po dang lhan cig btungs na bud med rnams kyi khrag 'bab pa sel bar byed do// ti shu li ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na glang po che dbang du 'gyur ro// br-i ha tI dkar po'i rtsa ba 'bras thug po
305a1(sman dpyad): che'i chu dang btags nas btungs na rde nad sel bar byed do// su bAr+N+Na se phA li ka'i rtsu ba dar pa dang ldan cig btags nas byugs par byin na khyi rdo sel bar byed do// mngon par bgrod pa'i dus su
305a2(sman dpyad): ag+ni bstu ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mod la bud med dbang du 'gyur ro// a la mu ShI'i rtsa ba kaM dzi ka dang btagase nas mgo bo la byabs na mgo'i nad sel bar byed do// arka dkar po'i rtsa ba dar ba dang btags
305a3(sman dpyad): nas btu ngas na mig ser spel bar byed do// na ga lAm dza ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang lhan cig zos nas chags par byas na bu skye bar 'gyur ro// b+ho dza nany+tsa e ka be la yA dug+ni
305a4(sman dpyad): na sa hA kA ra ye ta/ mkhan pa'i rtsa ba dang / dro Na puSh+pa'i rtsa bla dang / yung ba dang / 'bras thug po che lhan cig byas nas/ dril phyi byas te/ chus bkrus na gsal por smra bor 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nA ga ge sar dang / sgra
305a5(sman dpyad): la kum+b+hi dang / nA ga da ma na kra dang / du mra na ka puSh+pa rnams kyi rtsa bas d+hil phyi byas te chus bkrus na/ klu nor rgyas kyi bu 'ang dbang du 'gyur ro// na mash+tsaN+Tha badz+ra pA Na yaM ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta yai/ tad+ya thA/ a na le a
305a6(sman dpyad): na lai tu tu swA hA/ sngags 'di tsha ba'i til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas te/ rkang pa gnyis la byugs na dpag tshad du mar mi ngal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas
305b1(sman dpyad): bas s+ho// mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis phyag rgya 'byed par 'gyur ro// bcingaswa pa grol ba lngas bzlas par bya'o// na maHku su mA li kA ya hI ma ra du re swa pa ri swA hA/ byi ba sgrib par byed pa'i sngags so// a pa
305b2(sman dpyad): mArga'i rtsa ba la bdun bsngags pa'i srang bu yongs su bcings na rims nyin gcig pa sel bar byed do// bai rA ha krAn+ta'i rtse ba log pa la bcings na lang tsho nyams be la'ang bu 'byung ngo // daN+Dot+pa la'i rtsa ba dang /
305b3(sman dpyad): gi wang lhan cig btags nas thig le byas te/ rgyalnga po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs pa yul lag gnon pa 'khor gyi skye bo dga' bar 'gyur ro// ka ko la'i rtsa ba phrang bar byas na so'i zug rngu sel
305b4(sman dpyad): ra byed do// ta dra s+tha kr-i ma yAHnA sha ya tI/ b+h+r-i ga ra dza'i rtsa ba dang / a bai raM dzi ti'i rtsa ba dang / me tog phyungs te mAgrin par bcings nau lkog 'bras selAM baR+Sha byed do// bstu kwa'i rtsa ba bA sa'i chu dang bcas pa
305b5(sman dpyad): btungs na skya rbab kyi nad sel ber byed do// tik+ta la gu'i rtsa ba krany+dzi ka dang btags te spyi bor byugs na mgo bo'i zug sel bar byed do// su bar+Na se phA li ka'i rtsa ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cing btungs na/ dri chu
305b6(sman dpyad): 'gags po sel bar byed do// sid+d+hi'i rtsa ba pu ram dang lhan cig zos na gnyid du 'gyur ro// bai Ta'i rtsa ba btags nas byin na mig ser sel bar byed do// kaN+Da kA ra'i rtsa ba rked pa la bcings na mig
306a1(sman dpyad): nad sel bar byed do// surma bat+ta dang / b+hany+dza na'i rtsa ba btags nas lga'i khu ba dang / rgyam tsha dang / til mar lhan cig bsre s+yA t+ye rna ba bkang na/ rna ba'i zug rngu sel bAr byed do// kr-iSh+Na sA ka'i rtsa ba btags na so'i zug
306a2(sman dpyad): rngu sel bar byed do// guny+dza'i rtsa ba dum bu bdun du byas nas srang bu bdun rked par bcings na gzhang 'bum gyi nad sel bar byed do// na bla li'i rtse ba ma bkrus pa bya rog mi skrag pa'i dus su bde bar phyung nas srad bu bdun dang bcu
306a3(sman dpyad): pa rked par bcings na tsi twen pa ru mgonaka sel bar byed do// ba D+ha'i la ka'i rtsa ba'i so shing zos na mig ser sil bar byed do// spu'i rtsa ba bkol nas btungs na mdze nAd sel bar byed do// skyu ru ra dang nimA pa'i lo ma lhan cig btags
306a4(sman dpyad): nas zos te/ sU kho Ta ka'i rtse ba dang / kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na rlung 'bras sel bar byed do// sa Na'i rtsa ba so rtsi dang lhan cig zos na dbang po'i nad 'thung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dab ma dang bcas pa'i da ma na ka'i rtsa ba btags
306a5(sman dpyad): nas btungs na yongs su 'gyur ba'i zug rngu sel bar byed do// su war+t+ti se pA li ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na rgyan rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ba sor+ha rA'i si pha phyung nas lte ba'i phyogs su bcings na bud med bde bar ba ra nga // yang dza yan+ti'i
306a6(sman dpyad): rtsa ba khar bcug na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ba rA ha kran+ta'i rtsa po lag pa la bcings na tha snyad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// a pa ra dzi ta'i rtsa baM skar ma rgyal la phyung nas/ ras bal la snu ma byugs te dud pa dbab par bya'o//
306b1(sman dpyad): des mig sman byas na skye bo thams cad dga' brla 'gyur ro// kun+da'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la byung ste/ pra sA ra ka'i gnas su bzhag na tshong rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ma yu ra si khA'i rtsa ba radwa gi khu ba dang btags nas sor mo la byugs
306b2(sman dpyad): na bud med 'dzag par the tshom med do// rA ma du tI'i rtsa ba 'dab mo dang bcas pa btags nas se pa la byugs nas bud med 'dzag go/ nAM ga ge sar gyi yu ba/ 6 gtsug a a sho ka'i rtsa ba dang / so rtsi dang chang gang la sbyin po de'i
306b3(sman dpyad): a mats+tsha ka zhi bar byed do// su rI dang su nA la sau rtsi bcas pa zos na/ khu ba rengs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// b+hing+ga rA dza'i rtsa bA reng gi khu ba dang btags pas mig sman byas na/ gang drang grang mthong ba de dang de dbang du byed do// rang gi
306b4(sman dpyad): khrag dang / gri wang gis thig le byas na bud med gung mthong ba dre dbang du byed do// byi tang ga dang / b+hal+la ta ka ta dang// tsi tra ka dang / a b+ha yA dung sa nA ga rI dang mnyam pa'i ril bus mar gsar lhags na gang dal bar
306b5(sman dpyad): 'gro ba'i skyes bya dre rlung dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// bur shing gi khu bA dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / 'dam gyi pad+ma dang / b+hIng+ga'i khu bos kyang ngo // arma pa b+ha dza na mo sa ba niSh+TaM/ rany+dza ti ke shA ka pA la na san+ne
306b6(sman dpyad): ho guny+dza dkor po'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal byung nas/ te na daSh+Ta ka s+ya na saM bA ma nA si kA yaHpra To pra dat+te tsan+d+ra ti/ guny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba rked pa la bcings na/ bdag nyid kyi khrag sel bar byed do// de'i rtsa ba skye gnas la
307a1(sman dpyad): byug par byin na mngal bsdums pa btsal bar byed do// guny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba phye mya zhib mor byas nas ma he'i 'o ma bcug na b+ho smin par 'gyur ro// swA kho Ta ka'i 'o ma thigs pa gnyis bcug ste/
307a2(sman dpyad): legs par smin pa nyi ma gsum pa la bsrubs pa'i mar gsar blangasA te/ drar ba/ te krany+tsu dza hA sA ya/ me tog dkar po gtor bar bya'o// nyi ma gzhan la dwe'i mi twog nag por 'gyur ro// mar sar des thod par mig smana? du 'gyur
307a3(sman dpyad): ro// dzaM bI ra'i rtsi bA btags na/ dzen+ti ka'i nAd sel bar byed do// pan+na ga pa ti ka'i rtsa ba btags ni/ bems po'i nad sel bar byed do// r-i tu bI tI'i 'byung po'i nyi ma bzhi pa la nA ga ge ser gyi lo ma dang / kha dog gcig pa'i ba'i'i
307a4(sman dpyad): mAmamA btung sA na/ nyi ma bzhi pa la skyes bu'i mdze nad sel bar byed do// skyu ru ra ge sar las skyes pa'i khu ba dang lhan cig lcags kyi snod du btags te/ mIg sman byas nA rab rib selu bAr byed do// pU nA rna wa'i rtsa ba dang / so
307a5(sman dpyad): sopo b+hany+dzi na'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas de nyid btungs na mkhris po selnga ba'i mchog go/ tAn+na l-I ka'i rtsa bas mkha' 'gro ma'i gdin drug gis bzung ba'i snying gA zug rdzu sel bar byed do// kany+tse nA'i
307a6(sman dpyad): rtsa ba dang / shun pa dang / dar ba mnyam par btungs na zas kyis brnangs pa sel bar byed do// I shwa ri'i rtsa ba dang / kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na/ gdug pa'i rma sel bar byed do// de bzhin du gdug pa'i rma'i gnas su
307b1(sman dpyad): byug par yang bya'o// tri sU li kA'i rtsa ba btags nas byug par phyin na/ dugA nad sel bar byed do// tra N+Da li ka'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa'i rtsa ba dang / ag+ni bsku ka'i rtsa ba'i khu ba btags nas lus la byugs na bcud skam
307b2(sman dpyad): sel bar byed do// su daR+Ya kA'i rtsa ba btags nas byugs na/ mig na zhi bar byed do// gr-I dzi hA'i rtswa bA ras bal la bcings nA thA snyadang+ga las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// a shwa gan+d+ha'i rtsa ba mar dang lhan cig btungs na/
307b3(sman dpyad): mngal brtan par byed pa'i mchog go/ su ra b+hi tra ga ra'i rtsa ba btags nus byugs na/ srin bu lu tI'i dug sel bar byed do// gi rI kar+Ni ka'i rtsa ba btags nu/ lkog 'bris spel bar byed do// ut+pal sngon bre
307b4(sman dpyad): dang / gzhan gyis mri thub pa'i rtsa ba sau rtsir byin+da na dbang du byed pa'i mchog go/ a pA mArga'i rtsa bya dang / rmyam+b+ha tsha dang / kam dzi kaM lhan cig zangs kyi snod+ba du sbyar nas mIg sman byis na mig tshig pe s+yel
307b5(sman dpyad): bur byed do// dza yan+ti'i rtsa ba til mar gyis smin par byas nas zos na bcud nyams par byed do// ka rAny+dza'i rtsa ba dang / ma hA kA la'i rtsa ba dang / tAN+Du li'i chu btung bar byin na/ sa'i dug sel bar byed do// /
307b6(sman dpyad): de bzhin du pu naR+sha bI dkar po'i rtsa ba phyung nas sna bug tu byin na/ gdug pa'i dug sel bar byed do// pA tha'i rtse ba dar ba dang lhan cig btungs na tshad pos 'khru ba sel bar byed do// man+ta ra'i rtsa ba 'o mau dang
308a1(sman dpyad): lhan cig btungs nA rlung nada? sel bar byed de/ arka'i rtsa bA dad+hA/ r-i Shau pyA To li kA'i rtsa ba sa byon+ma dang wAn cig chu mnyas par byas nAs chu dang btags twe bA shang lama? du b+hUg+sa
308a2(sman dpyad): na/ gzhang 'brum+ba sel bar byed do// dr-i su li ka'i rtsa ba bau ma dang btags te/ gi wang dang lhan cig zungs kyi snod du bA zhig nusa? myig la byugs na/ rab rib seM la bar byed do// a ru ra dang / zhu mkhan
308a3(sman dpyad): dang lung thung gi 'dab ma dang / shing kun dang / shu thag rnams chu dang lhan cig btags nas galpa te srosa? bta ba na 'chi ba de'i tshe yang 'di byin na rnal du gnas par 'gyur ro// kro ki lAk+Sha'i rtse ba
308a4(sman dpyad): dang / ku DU tsi dang / ba sha ka dang / dbyug pA'i ut+pal dang / su war+Na se phA li ka'i sa bon dang / br-i ha ti'i rtsa ba drang / cha mnyam pAr byas nAs yungs kar gyi skum dang lhan cig bAtungs na/ rkang
308a5(sman dpyad): bA ma dang / rlung nAd sel bar byed do// go dzi hA'i rtsi ba daR+Sha ba dang lhan tsIg btungs na/ rke pa'i nad sel bAr byed do// ut+pA la'i rtsa ba ba'i mar dang lhan cig baMtungs nr-i br-i Sha Na'i rlung sel bar
308a6(sman dpyad): byed do// ku dzi Ta'i rtsa ba phye mar byas nas sbrang dang lhan cig byin ni rtsa'i rma sel bar byed do// ba ra me swa ra'i rtsa ba dang / shu thig byugs na 'bras sel bar byed do// suN+Di kA'i rtsa ba dang / lga dang
308b1(sman dpyad): lhan cig lag pa byugs na/ me rnyings par byed do// ban+d+ha ki'i rtsa bA snar byin nA sna nad sel bar byed do// ba rA ha kran+da'i rtsa ba yungs kar gyi mar dang lhan cig khar bcug na/ skye bo thams cad kyi mig
308b2(sman dpyad): 'ching brla byed do// pASh+Ta mU laM/ oM Shan+taM wA ri NI swA hAtsi/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi si kha la btab nA sau mtshonu bze' bair bya'o// a gu ru dang / gu gulA dang / shrI wA sa dang / tsin ngan dang / ne bA li ka'i 'dab
308b3(sman dpyad): ma dang / nirmA sA rnams gu rim dang lhan cig che mo nyam par byas nas bdag nyid bdugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na skye bo thams cad kyis de'i dri snom par byed cing / thams cad mngag gzhun
308b4(sman dpyad): 'gyur ro// til nag pau dang / s+phu ruM ra drang / b+hIng+ga rA dza dang / 'dI dag cha mnyama? par byas nAs mar dang lhan+de cig zos na skr-i dkar dang / ra ba ri ba dang / skye tsub rnams selpa pAr byed do// kU ka dza
308b5(sman dpyad): g+haM'i rang bzhin bshad par bya ste/ sman chen bai kA ka dzaM g+ha a ti bU lA/ de bzhin du bA la NaM dang / pa raN+DA'i 'dab ma dang / khu ba dang / yungs kar dkaro po dang maN+Du ka'i ri la mAr bre gaing gis
308b6(sman dpyad): smin par byas te/ 'dis rtsa ba bkrus na chu klung gi shugs kyang ni bar byed do// kA kaM dzaM g+h+ra'i khu ba blangs te/ 'di'i rtsa ba dang btags nas rma la btab ni/ rma gso ba'i mchog go// 'di'i 'dab ma dang
309a1(sman dpyad): 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags te bkrus shing bskams nAs rmA tig mar gyis btadA na/ rtsa gso ba'i mchog go// 'di'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang / ba lang gi chu lhan cig khas bzung na kha'i nad sel bar byed
309a2(sman dpyad): drodo&kA ka dzaM g+hA dang / s+yu ru ra dAng / bA ru ra dang / b+hIng+ga rA dza'i khu ba blangs nas/ til gyis tilA maR+YA gyis sbyin byas na khri nya 'phel bar byed do// thos pa rengs pra sil+la bar byed do// sbrang dang lhan cig gis sgrog 'bras sel ba
309a3(sman dpyad): byed de// b+hap+sA tAM ka dang / lhan tsig+ma zos na mdze nA daM sIl bar byed do// mar sar dang lhan cig gis skyes bu'i nang sel bad+ma byed do// sgros+ya dkaR+Sha dang lhan cig gis mtshan par rdol ba sil bar byed do// khaN+DA dang lhan cig
309a4(sman dpyad): gros kha nad sel bar byed do// ba'i chu dang lhan cig gis me dpal sel bar byed do// 'phags pa rdzu bo'i mdzod sman chen po'i rim pa slob dpon dpal ldan 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa yongs su rdzogaso//
309a5(sman dpyad): b+hIb+hi yaM gu dang / ka ko la dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang / yungs kAr dkar po dang / nA gA puSh+pa dang / spos dkar rnams kyi bdug pa byas na myur du tshod 'byeng bar 'gyur ro// sgegs pa zos nas a ru dang / k+ku Ta btags na
309a6(sman dpyad): dri ma med par 'gyur ro// chang btungs nas duH btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro// pra 'i lI'i khu ba bta'i na chang dkar por 'gyur ro// yang / me so bI ra btab ni rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// kI ra sum/
309b1(sman dpyad): dkar po'i rtsa ba dang rma bya'i gtsug phud kyi rtsa ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po'i rtsa ba rnams gcig tu byas nas btags te grib ma lha bskams pa'i ril bu khar bcug cing / lus la byugs byas na g.yul du mtshon
309b2(sman dpyad): cha bzlog par byed do// sbyo ru ra'i rtsa ba dang / me tog phyung nasA khar bcug ne g.yul du mtshon cha rings par byed do// ud+b+had+d+ha ga lau taM ba nA ni sik+ta mr-it+ta kAM gr-i h+ya dAk+to da ra ma d+h+ye prAk+Shi s+ya ya ta gr-i ha phaT le sU ye tau/ ta tra iSh+Ti kA ya tAn+ti/
309b3(sman dpyad): turba sh+ye/ ba tu bI ra br-i k+Sha s+ya dak+Shi Na sU khAM gr-i h+ya ka ra ye tAM shring+ga mat+si sh+ma sha nAg+ni nA tAt+sa ti// phug ron gyi brun dang / lham bu chu gsher gyi chu dang / gu gul dang / shing tsha dang / nr-i gr-i dang / ru rta dang / ka na kri'i sa bon dang / 'di dag gis
309b4(sman dpyad): bdugs pa'i ril thA sbyar tI/ bdug spos 'dis rnyed pa dang / bcas pa'i tshong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sngags ni 'di'o// oM na mo tsaN+Da ku Sha ku ru ku ru swA hA// / 'di ni byams pa gling gi gzims khang du rgya dpe bzhugs pa
309b5(sman dpyad): las chos rje rin po che dog gi dbang phyug bsod nams rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i bka' bzhin du/ zhe lu lo tsa ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya dpe bzhin ji ltar go ba rnams bsgyur ba'o//
310a1(sman dpyad): mo ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA he tur+d+ha ShA na ha tha ga to h+ya ba da ta te ShAny+tsA yo nai ro d+ha ma waM wA dI ma hA shA ma Na swA hA
310b1(sman dpyad): bla ma dang sangs rgyas sman gyi bla drang srong tshe'i rigs byed 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// thog mar nad kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa ni/ pho ba'i nang rnams rlung la brten/ sems 'khrul pa dang zar zir
310b2(sman dpyad): 'byung ba mkhris pa la brten/ rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa bAd kana? la brten/ chung pa ma 'ju ba la brten/ rlung gi tshad pa'i nad yun gyi tshad zhag bdun/ mkhris tshad zhag bcu/ bad kAn tshad pa zhag bcu gnyis/ rlung tshad kyi rtag pa ni//
310b3(sman dpyad): tshigs rnams brdungs pa lta bur na/ g.yalnga stong 'byung zhing bya stosnyong byed snying 'dod/ grang shum shin tu tshe/ lus kyi ba spu ldang / mgo dang chu rgyus rtsibs logs mur gong rkang mthil rnams lhag par na/ skrag pa yang yang 'byung
310b4(sman dpyad): rna ba 'o na/ kha lA raM bska// mig dang sen mo shin tu dmar/ lus la rdul 'byung / de rnams tshang ba 'am shas che na nges par rlung dang ldan pa'o// rtags de rnams shas che zhing rtsar mkhris pa dang bad kin gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i
310b5(sman dpyad): rtags so// mkhris tshad kyi rtags la/ chu yang yang 'tshag snying 'dod cing btsags tshe na zug kyang cung zad 'byung lus drod shin tu che/ mchu skam/ kha'i nang dang lce sogs la thor pa chung ngu mang du 'byung / sna khrag 'bab/
310b6(sman dpyad): mig mnan pa lta bu 'degs dka'/ gis gon 'bung byed snying 'dong / mig dang sen mo mdog ser/ kha nas dri ngan pa 'thung / khar ro// / de rnams tshang ba 'am shas chen mkhris pa ldan pa'o// rtags 'di rnams shas che
311a1(sman dpyad): zhing rtsar rlung rtsa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i nad kyi rtags so// D+ha bad kan gyi rtags la/ lus dang shes pa lci bas gang yang byed mi 'dod pa/ dngas kha 'gags shing zas gang la'ang bro ba med/ mig
311a2(sman dpyad): mnan pa lta bur lci ga/ lus rtseb yaM byed/ lus la d+hod cung zed yod pa/ sems rtsa 'khrug/ nyal snying 'dod// kha la rnyo sbyar/ mchi lnga ma mang du 'byung zhing sbyar dgos pa/ lus mdog mdangs med thal kha dang tshi che/ mig sen mo'i mdo
311a3(sman dpyad): ljang / de rnams ching ba'i shas chen bad kan yin zhing / gong gi rtags rnams phal tshor tshang la rtsar rlung dang mi khros pa gnyis ka ldan pa 'dus pa'i rtags so// !gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rtags la gtam chal chol smra/
311a4(sman dpyad): gnyid tshe/ mig dmar zhing mchi ma 'dzag/ lce 'gas so// Ta nang glo bur ba'i rtags la/ mig gadrangs nas blta nan che zhing g.yo 'gul nyung / lus sdong mi tshugs so// de ltar rtags deng rtsa mthun na rkyang pa dang / dper na rlung
311a5(sman dpyad): gi rtags la mkhris pa'i rtsa/ mkhris pa'i rtags la rlung gi rtsa lta bu 'dug na mkhris rlung ste nges rigs bsgres te shes par bya'o// rtswa rtsal brtagA pa le/ rtsa ba rlung mkhris pad kan gsum gyi rtsa/ de las gyes pa cu bzhi ste/ rlung
311a6(sman dpyad): gi gnas su rlung / mkhris pa/ bad kan dang nye ba'i rlung / mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris pa/ rlung / bad kan/ bde kan dang nye ba'i mkhris be/ bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan/ rlung / mkhris pa/ mkhris pa dang nye ba'i bad kan te bcu
311b1(sman dpyad): gnyis/ gsum ga'i gnas su rgyu ba'i khrag dang chu'i rtsa ste bcu bzhi'o// Tu de la rlung gi DA ni sbom la 'gyogs/ mkhris pa'i rtsa grims la 'gyogs/ bad kan+da gyi rtsa lhong la dal ba yin la/ de yang zhogs pa lus ma 'khrug
311b2(sman dpyad): shing zas gang yang ma zos gong du blta ste mkhrig ma'i gnyer ma dang po nas rim bzhin nAm mkha'/ rlung / me/ chuHsa lnga las na mkha' dang sa'i gnas bor ba'i rlung me chu gsum gyi gnas mtshon kan chag gsum gyi
311b3(sman dpyad): 'og tu rim pa ltar rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi gnas su bzung la/ rlung gnas rang gi rlung / mkhris pa'i gnas kyi rlung / bad kan gyi gnas kyi rlung gsum/ de yang rlung gnas rang gi rlung rtsa sbrul gyi 'gros lta bur 'phar
311b4(sman dpyad): mkhris gnas kyi rlung bya rog gi 'gro sa ltar 'phar/ bad kan gnas kyi rlung rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ de bzhin du mkhris gnas rang gi mkhris rtsa srog pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar/ rlung gnas kyimakhris rtsa shig gi 'gros
311b5(sman dpyad): ltar 'bar/ bad kan gr-i nas kyi mkhris rtsa 'bab chu ltar 'phar/ bad kon ra kyang gnas kyi rtsa dang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ rlung gnas kyi bad kun gyi rtsa srin 'bru pad ma can gyis 'gros ltar a 'phar/ maSh+Ti
311b6(sman dpyad): gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sbal ga pa'i 'gros paci ster 'phar/ khrag la'ang gsum ste rlung ga nas kyi khrag rgya 'i nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ mkhris gnasas kyi khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad ltar 'phar/ khad kan
312a1(sman dpyad): gnas kyi khrag rtsa phu ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar/ chu lnga gnyis te rlung gnas dang mkhris gnas kyi chu'i rtswa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ bad+ma kan gnas kyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar la/ rlung gi
312a2(sman dpyad): gnas su sbrul gyi 'gros ltar 'phar nuka sa rba rang gnas su rang 'gros te nAd med kyi rtse/ sreg pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar ni mkhri sa sa rlung gi nad tshan che zhing bcos dka'/ chu'i ku Ta Tau 'gros ltar 'phar na 'bring / shig
312a3(sman dpyad): gi 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung yin kyang tshan chung la bcos smra/ go rim de bzhin dang pa'i rgyal po sprul pa srin bu pud+ma can+da gyi 'gros lhur 'phar na bad rlung che'i brang chung gsum/ ny+dza'i 'gros ltar 'phar na
312a4(sman dpyad): khrag+h+ra rlung yin kyang tshan chud/ byiru ltar 'phar na khrig rlung 'bring po/ phug ron ltar 'bar na khrig rlung gi nad babs lI de bzhin du rta'i 'gros lhur 'bar na rnying gi chu gso b+hu/ khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar nA gzhi
312a5(sman dpyad): che mi khris pa'i gnas su sreg+ni pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar ni rang gnas su rung sti nad med kyi rmA/ snrel dang rma bya'i 'gros bya rog gi skad gsum rIm pa ltar ma khris rlung che 'bring chung gsum/ ngang pa'i rgyal po srin
312a6(sman dpyad): 'bru pad+ma can spel pa gsum gyis 'gros ltar 'phar na bad mkhris che 'bring chung gsum/ byi'u'i skad ltar 'pher na khrag mkhris chung ngu/ ha dang khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrig mikhra sa tshan che/ rta'i 'gros
312b1(sman dpyad): lhur 'phar na chu dang mkhris pa gzhi chung / khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar nA gzhi che/ bad kan gyi gnas su ngang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'bar na rang gnas su rang ste nad med/ sbrul dang bya rog rma bya gsum
312b2(sman dpyad): rim+b+ha pa lhur bad rlung che 'bring chung gsum/ sreg pa shig chu gsum bad mkhris che 'bring chung gsum/ nya byi'u phug ron gsum bad khrag che 'bring chung gsum/ rta'i 'gro sa ltar 'phar ni chu dang bid kan shres che// khyi
312b3(sman dpyad): bya 'gros sAR+Sha 'phar na chu dang bad kun yin kyang shas chung ngo // de yang mtshon gyi mas+dza sner mkhris rtsa dang / kan b+hI yas+dza sder rlung rtswa/ kan gyi mes skiR+Sha bad kan+da gyi rtsa dang / chug gi yas ster mkhris paSh+Ti rtsa
312b4(sman dpyad): d+hurlu na nye ba'i gnas yin pas skyon chung ngo // rlung gi gnas su mkhris rnga shig gi 'gros ltar 'phyar na rlung mkhris yini kyang bcos na myur du bdi zhing mra bcos kyang 'tsho'o// rlung gnas su bde kun gyi
312b5(sman dpyad): sbyin+da b+hA pad+ma can gyi 'gros ldadu 'gyur na mgo na/ glu dgog pa sogs 'byung b+h+ring skyon chung kyang mi bac+doMs na dang bya'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar song dogs pa'i nyan yod do// 'phral du nang zug gzer rje yang
312b6(sman dpyad): rlung gi gnas su khrag gi rtse nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar ni bcos kyang myur du be de zhing mo btsos kyang mi ring bar 'tshe ba'o// rlung gi gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gres lta bu 'phar na dbugs kha mi bde ba/ mig dmar
313a1(sman dpyad): zhing mig 'dag mang ba sogs 'byung / mkhris pa'i gnas su rlung rtswa bya rnyog 'gros ltar 'phar na kha skam skyom drang che/ tshugs tshigs sogs khrol bur na yang gso bla/ mkhris pa'i gnas su bud
313a2(sman dpyad): kan gyi rtsa sprul pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo bo na/ kho nas mchil ma yang yang 'obo dgos shring mAkhris pa'ang cung zad skyug go// mkhris pa'i gnas su khrag gi rtswa byi'u'i skad ltar 'bar na lus la rtse yam byed cing thor
313a3(sman dpyad): pa chung ngu yong / so rnyil gyi mtshams nas khrag cung zad 'dzag pa dang / thor pa chung ngu 'byung / mig gi mdangs dmer ser du 'ong ngo // mkhris pa'i gnas su chu'i rtsi rta'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na drungs ma 'dzug/ lus
313a4(sman dpyad): 'khyams shing 'khor/ mig na zhing mig chu 'dzag go/ pad+ma kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na lus grang shum byed cing rkang lag gi mgi drod med/ mdog snum zhag chung zhing skya thal/ pho ba spes pa
313a5(sman dpyad): dang 'khrog pa 'byung ngo // bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris bu'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na glo dgog/ brang tsha/ 'grim zhing dbugs mi bde/ pad+ma kan gyi gnas su khrag gi rtsa phug rlon gyi 'gros ltor 'phyar nA lus
313a6(sman dpyad): drong che/ rdul 'bab/ 'og sgor khrag cung zad 'dzag/ 'phongs lug pa sogs 'byung / bad kan gyi gnas su rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na tshigs na zhing cung zad spang ba/ lus kyi mdangs mi gsal zhing tshi che/
313b1(sman dpyad): lus dI zhim mo// rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'byung ba lta byur 'brar na/ dwangs ma 'dzug rked pa na/ lus drod che/ lus la rdul mang du 'dzag/ lus kyong // mkhris pa skyug/ mig ser/ dru ser por 'brub pa stsogs
313b2(sman dpyad): 'byung zhing 'di ni mikhris rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la zag/ rlung gi sa ru mkhris pa'i rlung gi rtsa bya rog gi 'gros lta bu 'phar na/ lus brdungs pa ltar na/ pheM ba stos/ rna ba 'on/ lus la thor pa dang shu ba sogs 'byung ngo // rlung gi gnas
313b3(sman dpyad): su mkhris pa'i bad kani gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ lus 'dar zhing g.yo/ gos gon mi 'dreng / cung zad mthur du 'khru/ bya gnyung dang / g.yul stong byed/ pho ba 'khrog pa sogs 'byung / rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrags
313b4(sman dpyad): gi rtsa byi'u'i 'gros ltar 'phar nA/ lus la za 'khrug byed/ tshags tshigs dang mgo bo na/ mig na bA sogs 'byung / rlung gI gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtswa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ so rnye ba sbyangs shing chu ser dang khrag 'byung / ma
313b5(sman dpyad): tshad bsgyid / dbugs mi bde/ gnyid cha/ lus lci bi sogs 'byung ngo // rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa dang bi'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltung 'phar na lus brdungs shing bcus pa ltar na/ mgo bo 'khor/ dngas kha 'gag/ lus thil
313b6(sman dpyad): na chu gtong ba dka' ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni bang rlung gi gtso bo ste btsos la zab bo// rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma byi'i 'gros ltar 'phar na pho ba gcus pa ltar ni/ rtsa gtor dka'/ rkang pa dang chu rgyus na/ rlung sbran
314a1(sman dpyad): sogs 'byung ngo // rlung gi gnas su pad kan gyi mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar nA brang tsha/ glang bsil che/ kha skoms/ mig dang sen mo'i mdog ljang gur snang ba/ drangs ma 'dzug pa sogs 'byung
314a2(sman dpyad): po// rlung gI gnas su bad kan gyi khrag gi rtse phu ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phyar na/ rdul 'dzag/ shri bru dang thor pa 'ong / mig dmar zhi 'byed 'dzum nyung ba sogs 'byung ngo // rlung gi gnas su bde kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros lhor

314a6(sman dpyad): ni/ spyi bo na/ le lo dang gnyid che/ mchi la ma mang / kha ro kha bo sogs 'thung ngo // mkhris gnas su rlung gi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ lus mdog dmar zhing ba spu'i bug nas khrag kyang cung zad 'dzag/ mig chu mang

320b6(sman dpyad): 'bras tsamo re za/ 'di ni spyi 'joms chen mo ste/ rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rims sogs nad gsar rnying gang dang gang la yang 'dis mi phan pa med pas sman thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bu'o// zha nye nag po

321a2(sman dpyad): par btags/ rdza snod dro zha nye blug l-i me btang ste bzhu ba dang / gong gi tshal mdong ros bsres pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs pa dang mAnyam du skya bAs dkrugs/ legs skyes par 'dre saMny+dzaHsa nas thal bar song ba
321a3(sman dpyad): dang / shing gi wa kI ra'i khu ba blag ste skya bas dkrug cing nyin phyed kyi bar me btang thal bar song ba dang kha legs par bcad la nyin lnga dang nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi bar me btang / de nas grangs pa dang ston la

321a5(sman dpyad): dang ma 'ju ba sogs pho ba'i nad la phan/ a ru ra'i phye ma dang / mnyam du btang na mkhris pa'i rigs la phan/ pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dngas kha 'byed/ khrag dang rlung la brtan nas dang sA ma
321a6(sman dpyad): 'dzags na bu ram rnying pa dang mnyam du btang / mkhris pa la brten nas 'dzag na a ru dang mnyam du btang / ba mar gsar pa dang mnyam du zos na stobs bskyeng bar byed/ gcong gis zin pa'i nad
321b1(sman dpyad): lus+yA shrin tu rI ba na gur gum+b+ha dang mnyam du gtong zhing gzhan yang nad tsha grang dang bstan te kha bsgyur te byas btang bas kun la phan par 'gyur ro// ti tsha'i bsha' tshe nyag gang rdza snod du bzhu la pha
321b2(sman dpyad): Da ki ri nyag phyed dang / s+pho raM hUM ga phyed bsres te zhib par btags pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs/ shing lcags gzar chung ngu'i lhag pas nyed cing dkrugs nyin phyed kyi bar byas pas 'dres te thal bar
321b3(sman dpyad): stong pa dang khebs rgyab la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig me btang / grang thag tshong pa dang ston la phye mar byas te dAr la btsags/ de nas b+he maM de dang / li shi/ dza trA~M gsum se ba re/ po rIsau/ g+hu/ pI pi ling / gsum
321b4(sman dpyad): se ba gsum re rnams zhib par btags/ sbrang rtsis rtu byas la ril bu spyan ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la ril bu re btang bas byis pa 'khru ba'i nangadang 'cham pa phan zhing

321b6(sman dpyad): bsres nas btang na kha'i dri ngan pa rtsa ba nas 'byin/ zho dang mnyam du btang na sban thon/ kha ru tshwa dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel lo// zangs mang nyung gang byed kyang sbrang gshog legs

322a3(sman dpyad): skyugs yong la/ gzhan yang skyugs phan pa'i nad gang la 'ang byatang bas skyugs sman gyi mchog go// kha rbA sa b+hA nyeg phyed brdar ba'i phye mya dang / mu zi ser po nya ga phyed/ de dul+ya chu spor gang gsum rdo grwa zhong ngu nyi mu'i bzhi
322a4(sman dpyad): cig gi ring zhib par nyes la gi wa kA ra'i khu bas gar sru zho tsam byas pa nyi ma deng grib ma phyed khyer nyes/ rkam thog chod byA dang sbyar yang khu ba lcogs phyi sogs ts+tshin ban+d+ha ga sum hU~M bar byed/ ba

322b1(sman dpyad): gi nang bye ma'i dkyil du bcug la kha ldegs par bcad de nyin zhag bzhi'i bar me mtshams ma chad par btang / de nas grangs pa dang ston la nad babs chen sran+na ma gcig tsam nas nAd med la 'bras nyis 'gyur gyi bar/
322b2(sman dpyad): 'os 'gab btang bsra na ngos zin ma zin gsar snying gang la yang phan zhing / nad med kyis zos na rgas kha sra ba dang / stobs bskyed pa la sogs pa phan khron bsam mi khyab bo// zha nye dkar po nyag gang lus kong du bzhu la legs

323a2(sman dpyad): de nas lci thal gsar te sro ma ra tsa'i dkyil du tshal dkar me la sreg pa ltar yong pa de gzhan dang mA 'dres par 'don/ so ma ra tsa nyung ba dang mAM tshas na bsha' dka' thig pur 'dril yong bas ran pa gAl che/ de ba sid+d+ha pad+ma zer te thun
323a3(sman dpyad): tshad se baM gsum nas bzhi'i bar na gzhi che chung dang bstun nas gtong / de kha bsgyur byed lugs ni/ ga pur cung zad dang mnyam du zos na kha'i dri ngaR+sha pa sel/ dza ti nyis 'gyur bsres nas btang na lus kyi stobs 'phel por 'gyur/ yang ba
323a4(sman dpyad): mar dang mnyam du btad kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra// tu la pi'i lo ma'i thang chu dang bsros nas btang na dngas ma chu grang gang gis 'jig pa yang chod/ shel dkar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ pa mar sar pas rta byas bta
323a5(sman dpyad): nas mkhris pa shA ser dang grang rlung la phan/ ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel/ tsha la mer bsrel ba'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na khrag skan thon par 'gyur/ yung ba dang mAnyam du btang na khrag mkhris

323b1(sman dpyad): kha 'byed/ 'o mas rta byas btad kyang gong dang 'dra/ a ru ra dang mnyam du btang na steng rlung dang dbugs kha mI bde ba la phan/ sa mu dra ba la dang mnyam du btang na sna'i na da la phan/ lI shri dang mnyam du btang na pho

327a5(sman dpyad): drugra rnams zhib par btags la ril bu s+phu ru ra tsama? byas nyi ma bdun gyi bar la re re sarba za zhing sman zas nas ma 'jus bAr la dro bcos byes // yang pA rA/ ti la nag/ gan+ta ka/ a dza wau Na/ suM Tha/ gu DA tsas rnams su
