327b1(sman dpyad): 'dzem so rnyil dang rke la sogs pa skrangs kyang sman ltar chags su btang bas grol bar 'gyur ro// yang smyug ma'i lo ma'i rtse/ saM b+hA lu'i lo ma/ oM gA'i lo ma/ swa ta d+hU pa'i lo ma/ hing+ku la rnams se bA bzhi re cha mnyam pa btags
327b2(sman dpyad): la thun bcu bzhi bzos la thun re grang sa gsari ba lte bucu 'then nas mgo lus gtums te du ba rma gang yod la 'bud/ de'i bar l-I dro bcos dang rlung ma 'phog pa gal tsho'o// yang / 9dza hu'i me tog zhib par btags pa dar la
327b3(sman dpyad): btsags/ bu ram dang cha mnyam la ril bu s+phu ru ra tsam dril ba nyin bdun gyi bar re re khong du btang / bA rA/ ni ba gnyis se ba bzhi bzhi zhib par btags/ nim+ba'i thang chus 'khar sder gyi nang du sbrus la rkang pa dang lag pa la sman za ba
327b4(sman dpyad): dang mnyam du blugs/ de'i bar gyi dri chu rdza snod lta bur bsags pa'i chu'i nang du gong gi dngul chu se ba'i a rba grangs gang btang ba de yong zhing de 'phral phan par 'gyur ro// de'i bar la bag thug las dngar sgyur sogs 'dzem/ gzhung
327b5(sman dpyad): 'brum gyi nAd dang mtshan par rdol ba la/ pi pi la'i pags pa zhib par btags pa thur mgo dro tsam pa'i zho phul gang tsam la btabA ste 'thungs pas myurarA du phan/ yang na/ nad pa mgo zhabs slob ste rkang pa gdung ma lta bur btag+sa
327b6(sman dpyad): la ba'i gci bas rtsa lam nan cher bkrus/ de nas ma nu khrag can gyi khrag ston la byugs/ de steng u Da da zhib par btags pa'i phye ma chus sbrus pa'i phag gis bkab/ de'i thog tu sol me lta bu me rdog chung ngu zhig chu tshod

333a4(sman dpyad): nyi ma bdun gyi bar btang na rlung gi nad dang me dronganyams pa mig gi rab rib la phan no// b+hIng+ga rA dza'i khu bas rta byas nyi ma gtsog la ril bu bzhi bAtang na rlung rigs 'dar bu la phan no// ra'i 'o mas rta
333a5(sman dpyad): byas nas btang na dngas ma 'jig pa tshwa grang gang la yang phan/ kha'i chus rta byas na yang nus pa gling dang 'dra'o// yang dngas ma chu dang mnyam du 'dzag cing nad zug byed na go yu dang mnyam du btang bus phan
333a6(sman dpyad): no// yang khrag tu 'dzegs na a ba la'i rtsas chu bas rta byas btang na ben por 'gyur ro// nem bu'i khu bar sbyar la mig la thugs na 'byung po gang gis kyang glegs mi rnyed do// 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma thu
333b1(sman dpyad): mgo gsum tsam dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btung na mas rlung gyen ldog dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs dang yan lag zha ba la phan/ yang zi ra dkar bro dang mnyam du btang na yang mas rlung gyen log dang stod
333b2(sman dpyad): rlung sogs rlung rigs la phan no// a me lI zho gang dang ril-i bu bzhi mnyam du bting na chu 'tshog rgyu chen po med pa la yang yang 'tshag dgrosra shing btsags pa dang na tsha chen po yong ba la phan/ sho mo
333b3(sman dpyad): spyi dang mnyam d+hu btang nA dngas ma 'phel zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro// zi ra nag po dang mnyam du chur brdar nas so na ba'i thad kyi phyi la thugs na zug gzer 'phral du zhi'o// bang khrom gyi lo mya
333b4(sman dpyad): cung zad dang ril g+ha/ r+ya btang na grang mchis kyi nang lpa hU~M/ su~M bA ra dang lhun du brdad nas bse drug gi rma dang shu ba le blugs na 'phral du pan+ti/ 'bras chur sbyangs pa'i thu bas rje byes byur btang na btsa
333b5(sman dpyad): dag sbyar dus gyur dag sogs drug rigs thams d+he l-i mchog tu pan+d+ha nA~M// ba sgra ng+yas kyi/ nA ba la sbyar nas lus la bAr+m+ma dza~M swaM b+h+yam+b+ha nA 'dus pa'i rlung la byin+de na~M/ d+hI d+ha rA drAn+ti/ byAs d+mo byas khyod dru btud byung

336b2(sman dpyad): 'dzag pa'o// khrag madz+r-i la yan lag dang rna ba sna sogs kyi rtse chad cing rnag khrag 'dzag cing mdog kyang dmar por 'ong ngo // khrag mkhris la brten pa gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che ba'o// grang

347a1(sman dpyad): mnyam zhib par btags la chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na pho ba dang rked pa na bar phan/ ku Ta ki cha gnyis/ po rIs cha gcig/ tshwa tsha phyed rnams zhib par btags pa chur sbyar te byugs

365b1(sman dpyad): rus chag la sogs dang / rtsa rgyus khum chad gsar rnying rma rigs la/ shi la dza d+hu sdus pa'i thang de ni// khyi la byugs dang khong du btang ba yis// de rnams kun la phan pa myong bas 'grub// shi la dza d+hA sdus
365b2(sman dpyad): pa thang du btang // bu btsas skyed pa na dang pho na 'joms// dug nyung phag brun skye ro rbu tsam nyid brun// chu mnyam nus ldan sregs pA snum dang sbyar// khong btang phyi la byugs pas zhwa gum nad// gsar rnying kun
365b3(sman dpyad): la btang bas 'joms par nges// glang chen lci ba'i dud pa mngal nang bting // bu dang shA ma phral du thon par nges// bla ma dam pa'i zhabs lho phyag 'tshal lo// grub thob chen po gorga nA thas gsungs pa'i dri chu'i
365b4(sman dpyad): rtags la nyin re'i legs nyes rtag pa ni/ dge slong lta bu khrims ldan la shin tu bden cing // khyim pa'ang rtag rung ba ste// de yang tho rengs kyi dri chu thog ma la rtag pa byed rgyu'i dgongs nyal po// drag shul/ chang
365b5(sman dpyad): 'thung ba sogs spang zhing / srong 'khor tsam la dri chu lan gcig dor// de nas sang lus kyi ba sgra mthong bya tsam la dri chu dror la de la rtag par ste/ gsang gnas kyi kha nas dri chu g.yas ngos su 'khyogs nas 'gro na
365b6(sman dpyad): de'i nyin bkra shis shing bde legs dang ldan la bya ba gang brtsams kyang 'grub pa sogs shin tu logs so// gzhogs g.yon du 'gro na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'phrog bcoms sogs 'byung zhing bya ba brtsams kyang
366a1(sman dpyad): mi 'grub la/ gtam mi snyan pa thos pa sngogs 'byung ngo // chu byings thang kar 'gro zhing gsung gnas kyi mtshams nas 'og tu thig pA babs na zas gos srogs yid dang mthun pa'i nor zhig nges par
366a2(sman dpyad): rnyed par 'gyur ro// gsang gnas kyi mtshams nas chu rkang gcig la de nas gnyis gyis shing slar gcig tu 'dril nas 'gro na nye du mdza' bshes sogs yid dang mthun pa'i mi phyogs su song ba zhig nges par 'khor zhing
366a3(sman dpyad): 'phrad par 'gyur ro// thog mar 'dril zhing de nas lab mo srab por 'gro la slar yang 'dril nas 'gro na rgyal po'i chad pa 'am rku dzag gtor ba sogs nor la gong kha 'byung ngo // chu byings lbu ba dang bcas nas 'gro
366a4(sman dpyad): zhing 'og tu thig pa yang 'bab la sar 'bab pa rnams kyang 'khor zhing lbu pa dang bcas na char chen po 'byung ngo // sgra dang bcas te byung na mi 'gyang bar byes su 'gro dgos 'byung ngo // dgo ru ltar g.yon du bcus
366a5(sman dpyad): nas thad kAr 'gro na de nyin nor sbyor ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// chu phar mi 'gro bya gyen du tshur log nas gsang gnas kyi steng du 'bab na zhag bcu gsum song ba'i nyon nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// g.yas su gcus nas 'gro
366a6(sman dpyad): na nor stor ba'ang zhag khungs 'jol ba lta bu ma rnyed pa zhig rnyed par 'gyur ro// de rnams rnam dpyod dang ldan pas ma 'khrugs par rtags na so sor bshad pa'i 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba ni myong bas grub pa'o//
366b1(sman dpyad): zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' byed kyi bden pa'i gtam rang gi lu.A kyi grib mar legs nyes rtag pa ni/ tshes bco lnga'i mi khyi'i skad sogs sems mi gnas pa'i rkyen med pa'i gnas dben par nam
366b2(sman dpyad): mkha' sbyin dang khu rdul sogs kyis grib ma med pa'i shin tu drangs pa'i skyabs rtag ste/ lus gcer bur phyung la lus+t+ra drang por bsrangs te langs lag pa gnyis cha mnyam du brkyangs zla ba rgyab tu khuR+Sha twe rtag la/
366b3(sman dpyad): de yang thog mar sa la shar ba'i grib ma'i mthe bong nas rim bzhin gyen du 'jigs te mig dang thang mnyam gyen phyogs kyi nam mkha' la grib ma sprin lta bu zhig 'char la/ de yang nam mkha' 'char ba'i grib ma
366b4(sman dpyad): der lus kyi dbyibs med par zla ba nya lta bu'i bzod byibs la shin tu dkar ba zhig gnang na tshe ring nad med sdug bsngal mi 'byung / bsod nams dang longs spyod mnga' thang rgyas/ grags pas sa steng khyab pa
366b5(sman dpyad): sogs shin tu legs so// lus gzhan mi gsal bar mgrin pa gcig po mthong na/ sems la sdug bsngal chen po 'byung ngo // lus thams cad tshangs zhing de yang spangs pa'i dbyibs lta bu sbom por mthong
366b6(sman dpyad): na/ myur du nang drag po 'byung ngo // tshad dbyibs sbom phra sogs rang gi lus dang mtshungs par mthong na nang mi 'byung zhing legs so// lus byings gsal la mgo bo med na zla ba drug nas nges par 'chi'o// lag
367a1(sman dpyad): pA gnyis mA gsal na rang la yang nad 'byung zhing spun+ya zla gcig nges par 'chi'o// kha dog nag por gan+d+hang na nor la gong kha chen po 'byung ngo // pad+ma g.yas g.yon glang rigs la bug pa 'dugs
367a2(sman dpyad): na chung ma nges par 'chi'o// lte ba'i thad du bug pa 'dug na thab mo dang kha mchu rtsod pa sogs 'byung ngo // grib ma shin tu ring zhing mgrin pa mi mthong na/ yul gyi rgyal po sogs mi chen po zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ro// stsol ba'i
367a3(sman dpyad): mdog lta bu nag por mthong na/ sa zhing dang nor rdzus la sogs pa longs spyong gzhan gyi 'phrog par 'gyur ro// ser por mthong na gzhan gyi mi kha 'bab bo// dkar por mthong na nad med cing longs spyod thob
367a4(sman dpyad): pa sogs mchog tu legs so// mig mi mthong na yid dang mthun pa'i mdza' grogs 'chi ba 'a ra gtor ba sogs kyi sems la sdug bsngal 'byung ngo // lus kyi cha shas thams cad tshang zhing gsal
367a5(sman dpyad): la kha dog dkar zhing bkrag dang ldan na lo drug tshun chad du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med cing nad drag pa mi 'byung ngo // longs spyod dang snyan grags 'phel zhing bde skying phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba
367a6(sman dpyad): 'di yang dag pa'o// zhes phyi nang drang srong gi tshe'i rig byed rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang nas mang ngag yul dbus 'gyur 'chang du gtsug lag gnyis pa shes pa'i mkhas mang la brten nas dang rgyas pu yod
367b1(sman dpyad): pa'i sman dpyad ba la mkhas pA kha ba can gyi ljongs 'dir du mu zhig 'ongs tshod du 'dug rung paN+Di tA spr-i tri phun tshunaM kyi brda mA 'phrod pas rta nag tu lug+na rdzi mdzad pa'i lo rgyas ltar ci yin
367b2(sman dpyad): cha ma 'tshal bar rang yul du phyir ldog ste gzhan phan gyi 'phrin las ma byung ba dang / la las tshe 'i rig byed shes pa'i rna thos tsam go yang bod+ma kyi gso rig pas cho gshes nas
367b3(sman dpyad): legs ba shadra rin po chur/ tsan dAn+na gser lngas rin che ba/ blun pas so lA bAR+sha byas la ltos/ smyos pa ltar shes bzhin khyud gsod kyis dor ba 'ang mchis rung rab byung bcu
367b4(sman dpyad): gcig pa'i shing 'brug gi lo ra shAkya mu ne'i pho byang chen po'i mdun phyogs rgyu gar ba'i mI rigs du ma tshogs khrod du sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod dam zer ba'i gtam thos pas rkyen byas 'dir pa
367b5(sman dpyad): lo chen dri mal byed du bcug pa 'phags yul nub phyogs ma hau ra'i si'i char bram ze gtsang mo'i rigs su skyes pa saM n+ya si gau dai ra rany+tsor ste khyim spangs sa spyod ces bya bas rgya gar dbus/ shaR+Sha/ nub/ lho/
367b6(sman dpyad): byung / de pA la dang bcas pa chu bzhin sprul nas slob dartson gau tam d+han+ti/ ut+mam gri re/ u kA ro hU~M d+hi sags gus pas bsnyen po'i mkhas pa chen zor rtogs te 'angar pa paN chen gyis
368a1(sman dpyad): bgyis dar mo sman rams par bsab tu bcug par gso rig gi lag len ngo mtshar ba du ma b+hud rung phyogs 'dir mi rnyed pa'i snyun gyi rigs 'tshol bar rgyu bal phyogs su phyir
368a2(sman dpyad): bteg/ bal po yAm bu'i rgyal blon la rogs ngan dgos tshul gyi sde pa'i hung rgya'i mtshams sbyor sdong ba la brten sman+da gyi rigs rnam grangs shin tu mAng ba dang bcas mau mo sbrul lo'i dbyer
368a3(sman dpyad): 'byor pa'i rgya bal gyi slob dpon mkhas pa rnams kyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi las 'ongs pa'i tshe'i rig byed kyi man ngag gnad kyi snying po bsdus pa 'di nyid/ mi chos gnang phreng las/ sngon dus
368a4(sman dpyad): bod 'di srin po'i rgyal khams 'dra// dring sang dus su rgya gar 'phags yul 'dra// bsams kyin lo ts+tsha bod la bkra' drin che// zhes dang / sa paN+Di tas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs
368a5(sman dpyad): b+hA na med/ zhu che no sgyur byed mtshan bu'i granas thob pa// skad gnyis sgyu mkhras lo tsatsA de dag ni// de dag bdag cag rnams kyi mig bzhin gyur// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ pA Ni bye ka ra Na
368a6(sman dpyad): sogs sgra mdo chen bzhi la blo gos kyi lang tsho mchos rgyas pa sau dkar rigs kyi theg le 'dar pa lo sA ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis bsgyur cing gso ba rig pa'i gzhung lugs
368b1(sman dpyad): sa slob dpon mkhas pa bcu phrag tsam bsten nas dras pa'i yar stong drar mo sman rams pa blo bzang chos grags kyis 'bad pa chen pos gtan la phab pa'o//
368b2(sman dpyad): chu ga trer slar yang ma bsgrubs ston me pa'i// rig byed bdud rtsi'i bum pa thob pa'i tshe// mes pos dran pa'i gso dpyang dubya // rngu bsangs de mos pa cung zad lcong //
368b3(sman dpyad): tI si'i mdangs ltar rab dkar lhag pa'i yid// lus can tshogs lnga rjes chags kun+da'i tshal// 'dzum pa'i cho ga gtong min se mo bskyed kyi// bsil sbyin mkhan po'i chu shes nye bar
368b4(sman dpyad): phyogs brgyar gzigs ma 'thor ba ka U rA'i// dad pas tsha gdung gcil la mtshar dz+r-i ne da// yongs grub pa t+ya dang rtsa gcig kro no/ sman gyi dpokyi bsam 'khri shing 'di sus bskrun
368b5(sman dpyad): s+yA su mra rgyud 'gro la 'jigs bral ba'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs rgyal sras kyi// rlabs chen spyod la 'jug rnams sangs rgyas zhes// grags can bzod dka'i se de mi ring snyem/
368b6(sman dpyad): bzod min tshor ba drag po'i nang gnod dang // do rgyu sgrib gnyis lus pa med bcas pa// 'joms pa'i sman pa che mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'grub pa'i skal pa bzang por bdag 'gyur shog/ tsAn
369a1(sman dpyad): 'byugs dang te'us rdeg pa la// snyoms par zhal 'ches thugs rje snyigs dus 'dir// bskul na 'jig rten gu sum gyi duHkha rnams// mkhyen brtse nus pas pa mthar
369a2(sman dpyad): mdzad du gsol// 'gro mang srog zungs bcud len bdud rtsi'i gter// mya nges pa'i 'bras bu nam mkhas ga zhal dka pa'i// dge tshogs mA lus mtha' bral sems can kun// bla med byang chub
369a3(sman dpyad): 'thob pa'i rgyu ru bsngo// zhes tshe'i rlig byed mthu' dag gi snying po bsdus pa'i glegs bam gyi che brjod bsgyur byung smon lam gyi rim pa 'di ni za hor gyi ban+de tshangs sras bzhed pa'i rdo rjes ngo mar
369a4(sman dpyad): ser can gyi lo khrums kyi zla ba'i dkor cha'i rgyal ba dang po'i tshes la rgyab khab chen po po ta ler sbyor ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong 'jam dbyangs grags pas bgyis pa dza yin+tu//
369b1(sman dpyad): oM ye d+ha ma he hu pra b+ha wA he tuHShAr+d+ha thA ga to h+ya ba data/ twe Shany+tsa yo ne ro d+ha e waM wA di ma hA shra ma Na sa hAHtshul 'di'i rgyal ba stan yun reng 'phel bar rmon/ sarba mang+ga laM/
370a1(sman dpyad): 'phags yul pha ha'i sman pa da ma nga sa'i sman bcos rnams bzhug so//
370b1(sman dpyad): dan rog dang mu zi ser po gnyis cha gnyis re/ dngul chu/ rgya mtshul/ tshal dkar cha re rnams zhib pAr btags pa'i phye ma la bye dkar sbyar nas chu skol
370b2(sman dpyad): gyis phul nas btang na/ chu nad tsha grang med par sbyong/ lus zung na dA stobs dang sbyar te thun gyi kha grangs dpag ste bya/ cig srogs spyi dang 'dra/ phyi'i byugs sman la/ thar nu khaN+Da/ tsu gang
370b3(sman dpyad): shing dngar/ rgyu gar stong rnga rnams zho dro re/ shu dag/ gser mdog/ zi re dmar po rnams zho gsum re/ sman chen zho gang / glu rtsi se ba brgyad/ du ba ral pa zho brgyad rnams thog mar so sor
370b4(sman dpyad): btags la bsres nas btagraswa pa'i phye ma lcags snod du chu la sbyar te gar sla zho tsam byas byugs pas phran no// !ga pur+ya/ zi rA dkar po/ pho bi ral/ rgyam tshwa/ sbrang rnams cha re/ bye dkar cha
370b5(sman dpyad): gnyis rnams zhib par btags pa'i ril bu smr-i ru ra tsim chu grangs gi rta byos bting bas pad kun dang rlung / tshad pa rnying pa rnams la brten pa'i glo la phan/ ga bur/ ku tsi lnga/ mer bsregs nas pags pa phud
370b6(sman dpyad): pa/ se mu dra so Sha/ a pi ma/ a ki re ka ra rnams cha mnyam zhib btags lug gi ril ma tsam re chu grang gi phul te nyin bcu bzhi'i bar bsten na dbang po las su rung shing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro//
371a1(sman dpyad): gi hang dang 'jam 'bras zho re/ dom mkhris dang ni la tho tha zho phyed/ ba bla s+ye ba bcwo lnga rnams zhib par btags thun tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu grang gi phul ste btang nA se dug gsar rnying thams cad
371a2(sman dpyad): la phan no// yang se dug gi rma gsar rnying gang yin kyang chu dron mos bkrus la sdong dza dang go yu bsregs pa zho do re/ ni la tho thA dang gla rtsi zho phyed re bcas zhi ba btags nad pa'i mchil mas khu ba byas bya rnyog gi sgros
371a3(sman dpyad): rma gar yod la byugs pas myur du bsas par 'gyur ro// 'jam 'bras/ shing kun/ pho ris rnams zho re/ ngan rog zho phyed/ zi ra dkar po zho do rnams zhib par btags pa thun tshad bong dang 'dra ba chu skol gyi rta byas
371a4(sman dpyad): btang bas pho ba sgras khrog/ dang kha mi bde bya rnams la phan no// rgya gar gyi sha tshe dkar po lcags snod du legs par bzhu la lugs skong lU sno mi 'dzag pa zhig tu blug/ dI steng dngul chu zho gang blug/ de nyid
371a5(sman dpyad): 'dres nus khengs pa dang slar btegs pas zho gsum 'byung la/ dau ras rnying pas lan grangs mang por cha chung mgo tsam ma bar byung dkris/ de khog mA lta bu'i nang du me shin tu tsha ba'i dkyil du res rnams
371a6(sman dpyad): rim gyi tshigs nas ston pas dngul dkar gyi mdog lta bu 'byung / de nas zho char bteg pa'i rdzing nas dang mnyam pa re ba na dang snyam du btang na mdze rigs gang la yang phan no// gong gi sman thun che ba tsam
371b1(sman dpyad): la dza ti rdog po phyed shing rtsa dang li shi gnyis se ba bzhi re rnams zhib btags rjid nas rdog che ba gnyis dang munyam pa pa nu dang snyam du btang na lus stobs bskyed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// bar skran rlung la
371b2(sman dpyad): brten pa 'don na khong sman gong gi ka rany+dza brgyad pa khong du btang / skran gang yin le snum byugs la mtha' nas btsir te dung 'khor lta bu'i dkyil du gcur/ de yang phyogs bzhi nas mdzub mo mnan/ dkyil du rgyu khab
371b3(sman dpyad): kyi rtse mo la bsregs pa sor gang tsam sgren thog tu btang / kro si ni zhes pa rdo'i rtse snum la bcug ste me la sros nas khrab kyi shul du tshugs ltar mnan pas skran rigs de dag la phan par 'gyur ro// gro phye'i kha
371b4(sman dpyad): ro spu che/ so ma ra tsa/ spos dkar/ rgya mtshal/ sdug che rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa phyi ma la btab pa'i du ba bshang lAm gyi phar tshur du gzhang 'brum gyi me tog rgyas pa'i khar du ba bdugs pa'i
371b5(sman dpyad): rjes gong gi se dug gi byugs sman+da de rma'i khar nad pa'i mchil mar sbyar te pho rog sgros ma drag par byugs pas sel/ stod dza/ shing sol/ 'bu sgyogs me la bsregs pa'i thal ba de gsum cha mnyam zhi
371b6(sman dpyad): btags phye ma bshang lam nang gi 'bum pa bcad rjes khrag rlung gi rgyal 'gro ba 'jigs mi dgos/ de rjes kro si na'i rdo'i rtse snum la bcug ste me la bsros nas shin tu tsha ba byas te/ 'brum pa bcad shul
372a1(sman dpyad): bsregs pa'i rjes gong gi sman sna gsum po srin bal gyi sted du snum dang sbyar te phong gi nang du bcug/ de'i khar ras kyi kha dam par bsdums te mAM grag gri bar du bzhag pas phan no//
372a2(sman dpyad): gzhang srin nad la/ s+ye dug gi blugs sman gyi steng du nim bu men na ste zhib par btigs pa lcags sgyed du nAd pa'i mchil ma dang sbyar ba gzhang srin gyi ze phrug gAng byed pa'i mthar me grag byar byugs
372a3(sman dpyad): shIng skam pas sel lo// ya mas mgro bo'i rtsa rgyud glogA ltar khyug pa la ya khung gi rtswa steng drang lhag pa'i spu khyim gyi rtsa steng bsregs pos khrag dang rlung la bsten pa'i yau ma'i rigs la phan no// mig phye
372a4(sman dpyad): ba'i rjes nyin dang po gu yu dang ni ra mu li gnyis badz+rar ba'i khu ba mig la byugs te/ de steng srin bal yung bI'i chur sbrang laM bkab/ gnyis par sgye ru ra shas che ba/ yung ba cung zad brdar ba'i khu ba mi ga
372a5(sman dpyad): la byugs// srina? bal klong ltar byAkra ba/ mig gi phyi sbyangs na kha che sha kha ma/ s+yu ru ra/ skra sner+Ya/ gri ru rnams cha mnyam/ a phi ma cung zid sbyar ba zhib ba t+yagras chu la sbyar mig gi ganga? na sar
372a6(sman dpyad): thugs/ mig 'byedus glo byung na gro sman la oM dzi wa na cha gnyis/ d+ha tu ra cha go cag/ pi pi ling cha phyed rnams zhib par btags pa tshur sbyar lo gro phye cung zad bo tabs nas ril bu sran
372b1(sman dpyad): ma tsam sgrilnga bya lto stong du so rtsag mchil ma drang lhun du mis pas phan mig 'bye gdong du drar ma bcud can zos pa'i mi'i ris rnams la nyin zhag re'i zas kyi rigs bkag/ skom kyang cung
372b2(sman dpyad): zad las mi gtong / rgan rgon dang zas skya ba'i rigs la mtshan gang re gong bzhin bkag/ mig 'byed zas spyod spyi dang 'dra/ skyugs pa sogs byung na/ rma bya'i sgro mar bsregs pa'i phye ma
372b3(sman dpyad): lug rilpa tsam chu grang hu ba ra sbyar khong du batrang bas skyugs pa thams cad la phan no// mig gi 'bras bu dmaur paur song nA/ skyu ru ra/ sha Ne bA/ ska ser cung zad sbyar ba'i khu ba srin ba la
372b4(sman dpyad): sbyar nas mig la bteb pas phan no// mrig gi 'bras bu nig po dkar por song na pha Ta ki ri zho gsum / tshwa zho gcig bcas zhib pirarA btags pa'i phye ma rdo'i steng ngu s+yAm+l-i cung zad tsam blug pa dung
372b5(sman dpyad): bsres te go yus 'dres par bkrugs pa'i khu bA mig sman ltar dkar po'i steng du blug pas sel lo// mig gi 'bras bu'i nang du khrag gi dmar porarA song na/ rdo steng du chu thig pa gcig blug/ de'i
372b6(sman dpyad): steng lan tsha cung zad brdar/ de'i steng go yu gong bzhin brdar/ de steng snum thog gcig blug/ de rnams go yus 'dres par brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du mig sman lhor btab
373a1(sman dpyad): ba'i rjes mig btsum+b+ha ste srin bal la sgyum bslus par tsha zhib btab pa srin bral g+hi phyi la sbyar mig gi steng du rdzus rnams phyi la yod pa byas bkab pas phan no// 'di dag lag
373a2(sman dpyad): len rgya gar dbus 'gyur pha ta ha'i yul glu nas yongs pa'i sman pa da n+yA da sa ste/ sbyin pa'i 'bangs zhes pa las dari mo 'tsho byed kyi snyed pa'o// tig tu thang thun tsAm+ba zhig chu grang dkar yol
373a3(sman dpyad): gsum gnyis tsam gyi nang du spang la kha gtsing rgyu ba/ snyir ma mthong saR+Wa saM rub nas/ nam ldang bar bzhag/ khu bo thon nges byas pa'i ro ma pho/ pi pi ling che chung 'bring gsum
373a4(sman dpyad): btags pa'i phye ma btab lnga// zhag gsum gyi bar btungs pas nad zhi na dang / de min tshad pa rnying pa'i rigs la lan bdun btang bas/ tshad pa gsar rnying thams cad la mi phan pa med
373a5(sman dpyad): do// bud med bu skyes pa'i 'o ma 'thur ma gang tsamA la rgya mtsho'i lbu ba zhib par btags pa thun chung ngu zhig btab/ me la 'jam tsam bsros la rna ba'i nad zug ma grag par blug pas phan/
373a6(sman dpyad): sman chen sran ma tsam/ sa mu dra pha la gcig zhib btags phyo ma nas tsam sna khrag gang 'dzag pa'i rnag rnams srin bal gyis phyis/ de rjes ma grag bar skam 'debs byas pan/
373b1(sman dpyad): tsi tra ka 'am tsi ta zhib par btags pa thun gsum+ba tsam chu dkar yolu phyed tsam g+hi nang du spang ste/ khu ba btsags pa'i khar 'bu sgrog mer bsregs pa'i thal ba dkar po thun gcig btab
373b2(sman dpyad): pas chu de dmyur po 'gro/ de btungs na mchin pa/ mtsher ba/ pheM ba sogs la bad rlung gi spros twe nad zug byed pa la phanA~M zhing kha dog dmar ser du 'grim yod/ zas spyod rtsam pa/

391a3(sman dpyad): de bzhin gI ba kro Ti'i khu 9bar lugs thengs bcu byas/ a ka ba na'i khu bar lan bcu/ b+hang+ga ra'i khu bar lan bcu/ pa'i chur lan bcu/ tri pha la'i khu bar lan pa tsu/ pa'i 'o ma'i spyir yan
391a4(sman dpyad): bcu ba'i gci ba smon pa ra lan+da bcu/ ba'i zhor lan bcu/ til snum la lan bcu/ ba'i 'o mar lan bcu/ ba'i mar la lan bcu/ nam+b+ha'i khu bar lan chags nA bcu rnams bcu rnams bzhu lugs

392b1(sman dpyad): mAng la 'dzin par 'gyur la/ sha mya ma thon pa yang thon zhing mo nang dngos gzhi la yang phan no// yang na/ sir sa ka pa ta/ dza ye pha la/ sa mu dra phe na/ ba ye bi rang+ga/ a la ya dzi/ ga dza ke sa ra rnams cha mnya

397a3(sman dpyad): dag khyad par can kun la med pa'i khyad chos/ slob dpon ha ri ha ri b+har+thi'i gdams pa zab mo ni/ pA lA sh+ma bi dze'i snum legs par ston la/ snum se ba phyed/ sbrang rtsi se ba phyed gnyis/ ba mar se ba do ste yongs skyil
397a4(sman dpyad): se ba bzhi'i rtsis ri tho rangs ltar tshogs rgyun du zos na nyin mo'ang skar ma thams cad mthong / tshe rong thung lha dang mnyam/ gzhan gyis mthong na lus shin tu ring zhing sgom pa blos mi 'khyud pa tsam du mthong / gzi

397b2(sman dpyad): ma reg par bAr snang la 'gro/ lcags dang zangs me la bsregs par dri chu bran na gser du 'gyur/ lus la grib ma mi 'byung ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa thob de yang thog mar skan btang nas lo bcu gnyis
397b3(sman dpyad): tshun la gong gi rtag rdzogs par rim can du 'byung ngo // thog ma sman sbyor ba dang za ba gnyis ka gza' skar legs pa la byed do// nang gsar rnying tsha grang gang la'ang sbyongs 'gro ba'i rigs
397b4(sman dpyad): gtong na/ bi dA ra zhing tags la zho gsum chu sgrol gyis phul la btang nas lus ma 'khyags pa byas/ de nas ma dag par chu skol gyis bcag rim bzhin rgyab la gtsang ma tshams su sleb pa dang rkang
397b5(sman dpyad): lag chu grang mos pa rgyas par chod la/ rjes kyi zas spyong sogs stong cing dang 'dra'o// !a dza mau da/ tsi ta/ ma ri tsi/ pip+sa l+yA/ bA yi bi rang+ga/ de b+ha dA ru/ saMn+na lo Na/ bip+sA la ka mu la/ shur+N+Ne/ si la dzi ta rnams slang
397b6(sman dpyad): re ha ra tA ke srang lnga rnams zhib par btags la bu ram srang ba tsa lngas rta byas ril bu gyi mang skyu ru ra tsam sgril la chu ske ci shol bzhi cha bsdus pa tsam skyis phul nas tho rangs btang bas pho ba mi bad
398a1(sman dpyad): bAdA ts+tsha pA/ bad kAn/ rlung rmAn// spyan nang // gsung 'brum// lbu ba'i rlung gzang // chags rgyags na bya/ ba ba smos khrag/ khadz+ra ma b+h+yAs pa/ rlung ga rigs/ 'dus pa rnams la mchog tu phan nAng ngas nga
398a2(sman dpyad): par 'gyur ro// !ka ka dza~M ga~M rtsa ba nang po'i tshul brdar nas rma gang yang la byugs pas mnga' gri pog pa sogs mags rlung kun bsas shing khrig cung chad do// ba dang ma spro ba gang gis gas /
398a3(sman dpyad): tsar tsi ri'i lo ma phyed dang gsum/ Ta rus tsam re dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing / lo ma chur brdar ba mkhar yang byugs pas rma myur du bsas zhing khyi drug go ni/ nod pa yang mi 'byung ngo / phywa
398a4(sman dpyad): rgya mtshal/ lha tshoro// ngas// lcags sogs thabs lasashA ra 'dul lugs ni// ni bcu rgyu ba'i nang byed du mA rba nr-i s+t+rai d+hAg+sa/ dASh+Ta
398a5(sman dpyad): po dang rnga'i spar bu lta bu khebs ljin gyi nAng ma rdib mos brgyangs pa'i dkyil du bcug nas kha legs par bsgrigs/ de ris brdungs pa bsres pa'i 'dam bag sbyin pos srab thug nas phyung tsam gyis bsnams/
398a6(sman dpyad): de nas se dong khru gang tsam zhig bru se la ra'i ril mas bkang ba'i dkyil du bcug/ de la me spar te me ma ngal tsam la slar yang ril ma bstan te zhag gsum gyi bar me mi chad par btang / de nas grang thag tshod pa dang bton
398b1(sman dpyad): mar sa rany+tsi brdungs pa'i khu ba srang lnga dang mnyam du blug la kha legs par bsdams nas kha mtshams 'byin pas byugs la rlung mi 'gro ba byas te nyin phyed tsam gyi bar shing gi me mtshams ma chad par btagang rwa
398b2(sman dpyad): nang gi nang du nib pa btags/ tho ga mar gro tsam+ba re dang / de nAs sen ma tsam re dza ti'i bzhi cha ro dang mnyam du btang nA lus stobs 'phel/ dngas kha bang / bzhon sha chags pa sogs yon
398b3(sman dpyad): tshal 'dul thibs ni/ sing+ku ra pa srang ngo bol ba'i 'bras bu'i kha nas mtheb gang tsam ma chag bskor ba'i nang du blug/ de nas sgor ba des kha bcang / ras brdungs pa bsres pa'i 'byin pa sbyin pos srab
398b4(sman dpyad): thubug nas gang tsam tsu mas/ de nas sa dong bruse la ra'i ril ma'i nang na me gtong lugs yun tshad sogs gong bzhin tsharar+ya byA dang bton/ 'byin pa sogs gang legs par byas rjes rgya mtshal bil ba dang dbyer med song ba de rdo gnod gi nang du leT par
398b5(sman dpyad): snusbyar la sran ma tsam ro laM shrI rdog bzhi tsam btab pa dang mnyam du btang kyang yon gong dang 'dra'o// lhang tsher 'dul thabs ni/ oM b+h+ra ka srang lnga/ snum bton pa'i ro ma ba cha srang bcu dang mnyam du legs par brdungs te srab thub bag lab tsam byas la skam
398b6(sman dpyad): thig chong pa dang gci ba'i me'i dkyil du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar bsregade nas bton la grang thag chod pa dang gi wa ko To'i khu ba dang mnyam du rdo gzhing ning du nyin gcig ring brdar te slar yang srab thug bag leb tsam zos/ de skam thag chong pa dang gong bzhin ga
399a1(sman dpyad): bI me nang du nyin phyed kyi bar ba.en/ se ho di'i khu bas nyin cigi bar nyed pa dang bag leb tsam bcos nas gci ba'i mer bsregs pa sogs sngar bzhin byas/ pa na pu khri'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyed pa sogs gzhan ma gong dAng 'dra ba
399a2(sman dpyad): la gci ba'i me nang du nyin gcig gi bar bsregs la/ de nas grangs thag tshong pa dang bton la rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags l-i ras la bcags/ de nas 'bras tsam re li shi bzhi tsam brdungs pa'i phye ma
399a3(sman dpyad): dang mnyam du btang bas lugs rgyags po/ brtan pa/ gzi mdangs che ba/ rgas kha sra ba/ 'dod pa spyod nus pa sogs stobs bskyed kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// zangs 'dul thabs ni/ tam+ba mang
399a4(sman dpyad): nyung ji ltar 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par then de mer bsregs/ de snum gyi dkyil du bcug/ yang mar bsregs/ snum nang du 'jug pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/ de bzhin du rim pa ltar/ zangs
399a5(sman dpyad): dar ba/ bi'i chu/ ba'i zho/ star bu'i khu ba rnams lan bdun re byas rjes/ de nas rdza snong du ru'i chu zangs mang nyung dang bstun pa'i snod kyi phyed tsam gang ba blugs la me butang ste/ chu de skam thag chod
399a6(sman dpyad): pa dang / chu gtsang mas legs par bkrus/ de nas dngul chu zongs lab gang yang gang yod kyi phyi nang tshangs mar mdog de kar por ma song bar byugs/ de steng b+hang+ga ri'i khu ba legs par byugs
399b1(sman dpyad): de nas zangs dang brjid mnyam pa'i mu zi ser po btags pa zangs brtsegs pa'i srubs la gang myong ba byas nas khog ma gsar pa'i nang du bcug/ khog ma'i kha dam par bcad de kha mtshams 'byin pas sdums nas
399b2(sman dpyad): rlung mi 'gro ba byas/ de lcags skyed lta bu'i steng du bzhag nas nyin gnyis dang mtshan gcig gi bor me mtshams ma chad par btang / de yang nyin dang po la me cung zad chung ba btang / nyin mtshon phyi ma gnyis la
399b3(sman dpyad): shin tu tsha bau bAtang / de nas grangs thag tshod pa dang ras kyi khung du snyams nas chu gtsang mar 'jug 'don thengs lnga tsam byas/ de rjes skam thag chod pa dang rdo gzhong du zhib par btags/ de nas 'bras tsam re nam
399b4(sman dpyad): zla grangs dus li shi dang / gro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du btang bse pho ba'i me drod che cher bskyed de zas gang zos kyang 'phral du 'ju bas dngas kha shin tu bde la lus gci mdang dang stobs rtsal che zhing gzhon sha chags
399b5(sman dpyad): pa stsogs yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo // lcags 'dul lugs ni/ lu ha mang nyung dzaM ltar 'dod pa sra ba thug nas phyed tsam brdungs pa sor bzhi gru bzhi tsam pa bcos/ de rdza snod kyi nang ngu bi sa kha
399b6(sman dpyad): pa ri'i khu ba dang mnyam du brug la nyi ma gang tsha sar zhag nyi shu'i bar khu ba skam lpags rim bzhin du blugs nas bzhag/ zhag grangs thim pa dang gton la slar yang gong bzhin la phug brtsi ri ba'i khu ba dang mnyam
400a1(sman dpyad): du zhug nyi shu'i bar bzhag/ de nas bton la sos pa'i me nang du skams pas bzung la dmar por tshig pa dang ba'i chu'i nang du bcug/ slar yang sreg 'jug gong bzhin lan lnga'i bar byas
400a2(sman dpyad): la de nas rdo gzhong nang ngu zhib par btags la nas tsam re nam zla grang dus lga dang / dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du zos par dngas ma 'phel zhing lus stobs bskyed la/ mu sa par dang mi nyam du zas na/
400a3(sman dpyad): rmu rdzing dang skya sbreb sel/ a ka ra ka ra dang lang+ga cha mnyam btags pa se ba phyed ngo dang / gong gi lcags phye se ba phyed bcas bting na dbugs kha mi bde ba/ glo/ mig ser rnams la phan no// zha nye
400a4(sman dpyad): nag po 'dul thabs ni/ shi sha mang nyung ji sha~M ltar 'dod pa srab thug ras tsom brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtu bos/ de dang brjid mnyam pa'i pip+pa la dang mnyam du rdo gzhong nang du nyin gnyis kyi bar
400a5(sman dpyad): skam nyeng zhib par byas/ de gnyes sa po nas ras la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar li shi cha ma mnyam du btags pa zho re dang mnyam du dza thar btang na/ lus shin tu reng cing gshing med pa
400a6(sman dpyad): sogs la mngangs dang lus stobs mchog tu bzanga' bar 'gyur ro// sha tshe 'dul thabs ni/ sa ta ji lta 'dod pa lcags snod du gzhu ba de dang brjid mnyam pa'i ba ku ci zhib par btags pa thug
400b1(sman dpyad): 'dabs shang dkrug/ de legs par 'dres nas khengs pa dang rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang ka ko la cha mnyam du
400b2(sman dpyad): btang na tsha ba'i nang rigs thams cad la phan no// bab la 'dul thabs ni/ ha ri ta la ta pa ki srang nyi shu zhib par btags li ras la bsdums khog Na gong gi 'bras mo'i na du bcug la ras
400b3(sman dpyad): 'og ma'i mthil la ma reg pa'i ngos ras thums chu dkyil du yong pa'i thi gu ring thung mtsham sa na shog bu ltar dathun pa 'phye rgyu yong pa zhig yong / pa btags shing tshag khog ma'i par 'jog/ khog ma lA
400b4(sman dpyad): skyeng lta bu'i steng du bzhag nas me nyin phyed kyi ring bar ma chad par btang / de nas bA ton la ro gzhong nang du a dz+ya pA la srang do dang mnyam ras shing gartsu bas khu pa byas la tan gsum gyi bar du snur/
400b5(sman dpyad): bu'i stang du bzhag nas ma nyan phyed kyi rang bar ma chad par/ bzhin du pa la tA sha'i khu ba/ b+hang+ga ri'i khu bA/ dA d+hA ra'i khya ba/ ku hA Da'i khu ba/ ba Ta ka i'i khu ba rnams kyis rim pa bzhin nyin ga sum
400b6(sman dpyad): re'i bar sbyar la/ de nas srab thug bag leb tsam byas la skam/ de nas khog ma'i nang du pa la sha brdar ba'i phye mas khog ma'i phyed brgyangs pa'i stang du bzhag/ de steng du yang shing phye khengs par blugs
401a1(sman dpyad): la kha gcod legs par sgrigs pa'i mtshams 'byin pas bsdums nas rlung mi 'chor ba byas/ de lcags skyed kyi steng du bzhag la thog mar nyin phyed kyi bar me chung ba rta ma chang tsam re btang /
401a2(sman dpyad): de nas nyin phyed kyi bar de las che tsam btang / de nas nyin mtshan gnyis kyi ring mi shin tu chi ba btang / de nas thag tshong pa gton la rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags pa se ba
401a3(sman dpyad): phyed dang ha lau d+hi zho do dang mnyam du zos na khrag mkhris kyi nad sel lo// TA ba yi bi rang+ga zho gang hA la d+hi zho ngo bcas pa zhag lI yu rtsa gcig gi ring zos na skem po'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro// tsa ra tsi ri'i
401a4(sman dpyad): thang chu lba sa zho lnga dang sen+na le Na zho gang bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu 2/ dgu'i bar !zas na mdze dkar po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no// pip+sa la zho ngo dang a dza wa Na zho lnga dang bcas pa

401a6(sman dpyad): rtsa ba nas thon no// !dza ya pa tri dang khur ba sa a dza wa ni zho re bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na sha khra'i nad sel lo// ni ra guN+Di'i khu ba zho gsum/ la bAng+ga zho lnga dang bcas pa \u0f88\u0f90 gcibacu
401b1(sman dpyad): dku'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo gum pa dang yan lag zha ba sogs bsos so// su ba ri dang ma tsi zho re bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na khrag la brten pa'i mdze la phan no// pad+ma pa las
401b2(sman dpyad): zhe gsum re bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo yan lag go yu bsag na kha dog dgang bar yang pho ros chad pa da sna chang pa zhom pa sogs bsos so// pa lo lo tsa drong sA/ Na dang pa na
401b3(sman dpyad): re bcas pa zhag grangs gong bzhin zos na rlung la brten pa'i yan lag zha gum/ ba sogs bsos par 'gyur ro// sa dang mnyam du bzhag bcu bzhi'i bar zos na 'dus pa'i nang sel lo// la wang+ga
401b4(sman dpyad): ba bzhi dang mnyam du zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na bse dug gi nad sel lo// pip+pa la dang sen+na lo Na zho re/ la wang+ga zhwa do dang bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na chu rdzing gi nad thams
401b5(sman dpyad): pa bar 'gyur ro// kai lnga'i khu ba/ pip+pa la/ gu ra gsum zho ngo pang bcas pa mras zhag grangs gong bzhin zos na mgo gzer gyi nad sel lo// pur+t+ti dang a sa kan+ta zho re dang
401b6(sman dpyad): ces pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar drod kyar zos khang na khong nang gi rlung skan zhi bar 'gyur ro// dza la kum+bi 'o/ sum/ hi re bi'i khu ba zho gang dang bcas pa zla gci ga zhig bcu dgu'i bar
402a1(sman dpyad): ngu zos na mdze rigs thams cad rtsa ba nas thon no// pip+pa la dang pa d+hA ra'i khu ba zho raM/ pa na dum+b+ha tsam dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du zos na sgrags pa dang 'byin pa sel lo//
402a2(sman dpyad): !e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang ba yi bi rang+ga wo do re/ dza pa pha la zho gang dang A[ऽ]bcas pa nyin bcu bzhi'i bar zos na srin nang rtsa ba nas 'byin no// na go nga ba ni'i rtsa ba/ ka ba dza/ shur+t+ti gsum b+ho do raM
402a3(sman dpyad): dung dan 'jo bcas pa zla khyi ga gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na rtsa 'dar gyi nad sel lo// pad+ma na'i khu ba zho do dang mnyam du zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na sna'i nang!sal lo/ hi t+ta pa
402a4(sman dpyad): ro li'i khu ba zho do// rang+ga ni'i khu ba zho drug dang bcas pa nyin bcu bzhi'i bar zos na tshan par rdol ba'i nang sel lo// nIm+ba'i pags pa zho / a dza wa ni zho brgyad dang bcas pa zhag nyer gcig gi bar btang na
402a5(sman dpyad): gzhung 'bum gyi nad sel lo// saM kha bA lI'i khu bzho do dang mnyam du zos na mr-i gi'i nad sel lo// tsa ra tsi ri'i khu ba dang // bur+t+tirbang zho gsum ra dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos
402a6(sman dpyad): na za phug gi nad so la lo// sbrang rtsi dang rang+ga ni zho gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos kyang phan yon gong dang 'dra'o// de rnams ni bab la btul kha sgyur dang bcas pa'i phan yon te/
402b1(sman dpyad): sman de rnams gtong ring ro sgyur ba dang la phug mi bza'/ khyad par mdze nad kyi rigs la gtong skabs zas gung la'ang tshwa bsrung dgos so// sha dkar ram zha nye dkar po 'dul lugs ni/ rang+ga srang byed gsum sra
402b2(sman dpyad): thug shog bu tsum brdung sa pa sen mo tsam du gtubaso/ A dza wa ni dang be Da ha gnyis srang nyi shu re so sor zhib par btags lA gci ba khru gang gru bzhi tsam brtsegs pa'i steng du ras 5/ gting / de s+ya
402b3(sman dpyad): gau la la phud kyi phye ma'i phyed snyoms par brdul/ de sgreng ba ru Ta'i las zang phye ma'i phyed snyoms par gting / de steng gong gi zha nye dkar po bkram/ de steng la la phud kyi phye ma byed po brda la/ de steng ba
402b4(sman dpyad): phye ma phyed po brdol la gau tsi bi me sbar te me ma dal bar bzhag/ grang thag chod pa da zha nye dkar po rnams skyugs la rdo gzhong du zhib par btags ta ras la btsags pa sau ba gang / e la lA tsi saM ba gang dang

403a1(sman dpyad): zab gnang can sna tshogs dang bcas sbyor ba kha bsgyur sdom pa sum brgyar nye ba'i bstan bcos 'di ni/ dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus pa'i spyi gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad

403a5(sman dpyad): te gtan ya phab pa'i yi ga pa ni nyang stong pa 'jam dbyangs dbang pos 'gyis pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan par gyur cig// shu b+ha ma stu sarba dzag/

404a1(sman dpyad): lag sa tshul dbul 'argya rgya ming rgyal rigs kyi sman pa ra gu swa pa'i gdams pa bzhug so//
404b1(sman dpyad): 'dre gdon gyi gnod pa rang gzhan gnyis ka la bsrung nA/ a kA sha ki ka mi ni ban+d+he/ ba ta la kin ni ni sten thA/ myangasasan+d+hu n+te/ dA hi ne nA ra sing+ga ban+d+he/ sa ta sa ta hu la ban+d+ha/ pany+tsa pany+tsa hU la ban+d+he/ tsau nga hA
404b2(sman dpyad): ra ne ban+taM/ u Dan+ti sa ma sa na ban+d+he/ ra ka ti a ma sa n+ya ban+d+he/ tsi sa dzi yo gi ni ban+d+he/ bab na bi Nir ban+d+he/ a tra si ka ru bA pan+te/ daMb n+de/ no s+m+R+YuM/ ki yo ka ra mo k+te/ a pa no pa rA o ban+d+ha/ l-i ge oM bi la ge o ban+d+he/
404b3(sman dpyad): tsha hi sa ro ga mA ro ga ban+d+he/ go hi dza te/ ka pa la he/ l+r-ir+thitAM/ na bo na ri ba ha ha Shitsiko Tha te/ ya haM pa ba hi taM ban+d+he/ a de d+h+waM ro ban+d+he/ yu ga dza bai ro ban+te/ tsa ri khu Ta pany+tsA i de ha ri ban+te/ a tha
404b4(sman dpyad): ha ba na sa ba pa ti ban+d+he/ na po la khA ka ba ru ban+d+he/ sa ba su me ra pa ra ba ta ban+d+he/ ban+d+he ban+d+he saM a da pa ra ha na/ ri khum te re man+ta ki sak+Shi/ me ri bak+ti/ pho raM man+ta i shwa r-i pa tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags
404b5(sman dpyad): 'di dag par gzungs la thog mar nyi zla gang rung gza' 'dzin yod dus mdun du ma ra me/ spos/ lug sha tshon tsam/ chang phung bcas gza' 'dzin ma grol bar bsnyen pa gang 'gro skye la/ de rjes rang
404b6(sman dpyad): bsrung na gang dgos dus bzlas shing / gzhan 'dre gnod gyis gnod pa la phus btab pas/ sha za/ yi dgas/ 'byung po sogs 'dre gdon gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do// yang / ha tha kha~M pa ra ka re re ka pa
405a1(sman dpyad): lA/ ma ri mu sa ni hUM phi ruM mo hI ra khre ma hA ma kA la/ A de bai ro ki rak+Sha/ u ka de br-i rau ki rak+Sha/ yaM gA rAk+ShaM yaM gi shwa ra/ ka ya rak+She b+he sa su ra/ si sa ra rAk+She sni ta la/ hi yo rak+She ba ma ha ri/ ba ma rak+She
405a2(sman dpyad): k+She tra pA la/ na bo na ri ba hA tra ko tha ra rok+ShaM ba ra bi ra/ kau na bi ra hI nu man+ta bi ra/ rA dza rA mi tsan+na ke pa yi ka/ ma hi sha kuny+dzi ki ba ha na/ sI tA ke sa ho nga ri/ me ri b+hak+She/ gu ru ki sik+ti/ pho ri man+ta i shwa ro ba tsa/ zhes pa 'di
405a3(sman dpyad): dgra pAr bzung la rab mig dmar re gzar nA ma yod dang / de min zla ba rer mig dmar yod pa'i tshes grangs gang yin+da la ngo ma stongs tsam re khrus byas/ mdun du ras gtsang ma'i steng gro phye mar/ ka rA gsum bsres
405a4(sman dpyad): pa'i ril bu bya sgong tsam gcig/ de'i steng du sin+d+hu ra tshon tsam/ mar ma/ spos dang bcas bzhag la tshwar gsum las mi nyung ba'i gang lcogs re bzlas na gzhan gyis sngags/ rdzas/ ti 'dzin sogs kyi sgo nas ngan
405a5(sman dpyad): byed byasA pa thams cad byed po kho rang laM bzlog tsi pU lasta glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing 'dre gdon gyi gnod pa'ang mi 'byung ngo // !A daM shra gu ru gum pur+tha de shra yo gi ni/ ba chi ma nI ra d+hA ra/ ban+d+ho khaM DI pA haM pra d+ha
405a6(sman dpyad): r-i i shwa ra ma hA dzo ba/ ru pe pA u/ so du ri me aM ge tsa d+ha l-i/ a tra oM tra d+ha ra tsu raM/ ru aM baM tso i/ ka ma ru ka maM k+Sha ki ngo ha yi/ ru oM baM ga ngo ha yi/ gu ru goR+Sha na tha ki ngo ha ya~M/ me ri b+hak+ti gu re ki
405b1(sman dpyad): sak+ti/ phu re man+ta ne na yo gi nI bA tsA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di blo la bzung la g.yul lu 'jug skabs sogs nam dgos dus tshar bdun bgrangs la swa gang rigs la btab ste lus la byugs na gri ring thung gang gis
405b2(sman dpyad): kyang glags mi rnyed // 3uM hi ba ra pa ti la kA ri mang+ga yi/ so la ka ri haM ma tsu le lai/ dza ra thaM bu/ dza ra ka thaM bu/ thaM bu ma ga la ha thi/ dza ra ta taM la gi/ hu ka ra yi tham bu/ taM bi sa kA raM ma sa khI/ dze hUM dz+r-i hUM te la ba raM/
405b3(sman dpyad): si ra u pa ra gau ra ke si rA sa thim/ phu re man+ta i shwa ro ba tsA/ sngags 'di blo la bzung la snum bkrug skabs tshur bdun bsgrangs la lag par phus btab la bkrugs pas lag pa tshig par mi 'gyur ro// !ha tha pa
405b4(sman dpyad): khA ru/ mu kha do uM/ De ba ke ba duM bA ra/ rU dza he ka ruM pA ra dza/ me hA thA he ka ru se a ra sa dr-i ba o pra dz+ya/ sing+ga b+he ni ka su/ tsit+to ka re dzi byA tsa re/ baM dzu na sa sing+ga dzi gi mu ha ni/ ra hi dzu ga tru mo tsha yaM/ de Sho na ra sing+ga/
405b5(sman dpyad): ki sak+Shi/ me re b+hUk+ti/ phu re mAn+ta i shwa rai ba tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di tshwar bdun bgrangs la phur bu ba tabA nas kha ljag gdong gsum bkr-is tre phyin na/ rgyal po/ rgyal phran/ blon po/ gtso bo sogs kyis dgyes
405b6(sman dpyad): par brtse bas skyong zhing rang gi 'dod pa gang yin gter la gang smras bden par 'dzin no// ka thu su ba ri tsu Na/ istI ka pe dza d+he/ pi thi ho i la ge ma ra to ma san ho au/ dza ga dzi bai to ta ra ba tsa traM/ me ri b+hak+ti gu
406a1(sman dpyad): ra ki sak+Shi/ phu re man+ta i shwa ro ba tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di gro yu phyed mar btab pa la lan sum cu bgrangs te bsngags la dzar btab ste bud med gang 'dod la sbyin na rang gi dbang du 'dus nas ci zer
406a2(sman dpyad): nyan par 'gyur ro// sbrang bu zi ra pho mo gnyis gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin zin la dur khrod du pho mo ma nor bar me la bsregs pa'i brel ba ma nor ba so sor tshogs byas/ de'i pho'i thal ba bud med kyi skyes par byin na skyes
406a3(sman dpyad): pa de dab du 'du zhing / mo'i thal ba sngon la phur bA po dang rjes la phur ba mo'o// skyes pas bud med la byina? nA bud med de dbang du 'gyur nges so// !a ra dza ra ko ni ra ba re/ a ra dza ra go ra pa ra ba ti ni ra bi raM/ ngo ha i ha nu
406a4(sman dpyad): man+ta kai/ me ri b+hak+Shi gu ra ki sak+ti/ phu re man+tha I shwa ro ba tsa/ ya mas mgo bo phyed na ba la mi zhig mgo bo na ba nas 'dzin du 'jug rang gis sngags 'di tshar bdun ma song bar gri rtses sa la ri mo rig mangs
406a5(sman dpyad): ris gang mang bris/ sngags grangs tshar ba dang gri rtse mo'i dkyil du btsugs la nad gang la na 'dug dris/ gzhan du 'phos 'dug na de nas zin la sngar lhar byas pas zug zer 'phral du chags nas nang med bde bar
406a6(sman dpyad): 'gyur ba ni myong grub zab gnang ca no// de ltar shin tu zab pa'i man ngag gi tshogs 'di rnams kyang 'phags yul dbus 'gyur ma thu ra'i rgyal rigs kyi sman pa ro gu nA tha las ngar mo sman rams pas rnyed pa'o// /
406b1(sman dpyad): oM ye d+ha ma he tu pra thAg he tun+de lan ta thag to bya ba na te 'argya yo ni roHe la wa di ma hA shra ma ma swA hA/ tshul bde'i tshul bstan yun rang 'phel bar mom/ na la//

408a1(sman dpyad): byas pa'i steng du rgyu glum brgyub pa'i rtse nas phyeng tsam mthong ba nges bsnun nas pags pa phebs pa byas rjes thur mu bra bo 'dra bas chung ngur skud kyi mtshams su sleb pa rgyal mor

409a1(sman dpyad): lam nyin mo gnyid mi nyal/ ldan pa g.yas g.yon phab nas ma sdong / dgong mo nyal sa stengs gshong la 'gro dgos yong tshe ngal bus phyin nas/ nyal zhing rkang pa brkyangs

409a5(sman dpyad): phyogs rin chen shol gyi gzhal ya s+yA nA// bude chen pad+ma dkar po'i gdan khri la// sku yi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas// dang n-i 'dir zhi ba'i dpung dang byin brlabs
409a6(sman dpyad): stsol// lho'i drang srong ser po// kye ma lho phyogs rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas nas// bde chen pad+ma ser po'i klong dkyil nas// yon tan rigs kyis drang srong 'khor dang bcas//
409b1(sman dpyad): dang 'drir rgyas pa'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol// nub kyi drang srong dmar po// kye ma nub phyogs rin chen mchong gi gzhal yas nas// bde chen pad+ma dmar po'i dkyil dbus nas// gsung gi
409b2(sman dpyad): rigs kyis drang srong 'khor dang bcas// deng 'dir dbang ldan dbang gis byin rlabs stsol// byang gis drang srong ljang gu// kye ma byang phyogs rin chen gal yi gzhal yas nas// bad+ma chen
409b3(sman dpyad): pad+ma ljang gu'i gdan stengs nas// 'phrin las rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas// deng 'dir 'phrin las dbang dang byin brlabs stso lo// dbus kyi drang srang mthing gA/ kye ma dbus phyogs
